40001001	Yomba i Yesus Krais kowamo awamo wagle ye kangino epigl. Yesus ye Devit yungumo ombuno mina ta moglkwa. Te Devit ye Abraham yungu ombunomo ta moglkwa.
40001002	Abraham ye wam Aisak, te Aisak ye wam Jekop, te Jekop ye wam Juda ya te angiglma tau bogl meglkwa.
40001003	te Juda ye wam suwo Peres ya Sera. Ye suwo i mano Tamar. Peres ye wam Hesron, te Hesron ye wam Ram,
40001004	te Ram ye wam Aminadap, te Aminadap ye wam Nason, te Nason ye wam Salmon,
40001005	te Salmon ye wam Boas, ye mam Rehap, te Boas ye wam Obet, ye mam Rut, te Obet ye wam Jesi,
40001006	te Jesi ye wam King Devit moglkwa, te Devit ye wam Solomon ye mam okuna imbo Uriya embiye kra,
40001007	te Solomon ye wam Rehoboam, te Rehoboam ye wam Abiya, te Abiya ye wam Asa,
40001008	te Asa ye wam Jehosafat, te Jehosafat ye wam Jehoram, te Jehoram ye wam Usia,
40001009	te Usia ye wam Jotam, te Jotam ye wam Ahas, te Ahas ye wam Hesekia,
40001010	te Hesekia ye wam Manase, te Manase ye wam Emon, te Emon ye wam Josaia,
40001011	te Josaia ye wam Jehoiakin ya te angiglma tau meglkwa. Enge igle Israel yomba kane ende Babilon eingwa.
40001012	Ye kane ende pi Babilon eingo, ana Jehoiakin ye wam Sialtiel, te Sialtiel ye wam Serubabel,
40001013	te Serubabel ye wam Abiut, te Abiut ye wam Eliakim, te Eliakim ye wam Asor,
40001014	te Asor ye wam Sadok, te Sadok ye wam Akim, te Akim ye wam Eliut,
40001015	te Eliut ye wam Elieser, te Elieser ye wam Matan, te Matan ye wam Jekop,
40001016	te Jekop ye wam Josep. Ana Josep ye Maria wiye moglkwa. Te Maria Yesus kugl yongwa, ye kangiye Krais we dingwa.
40001017	Yegl orko Abraham kowamo awamo mogl wingo ende wu Devit moglkwa engemo i epiglmo 14 orkwa. Te Devit kowamo awamo mogl ende wu kane Babilon eingwa i epigl 14 orkwa. Te ye mambuno bogl mogl ende wu kane Babilon pindre ende ikine wingo Krais enge igle plau dungwa, yomba i ama prapra epigl 14 orkwa.
40001018	Yesus Krais plaudi moglkwa kamo boglo i yegl. Mam Maria ye Josep inambe dipandiglkwa. Ba ye akiye ta pai wanmoglkiurko, ye kanigwa Maria gak dane moglkwa. I Holi Spirit gak dane moglkwa.
40001019	Wiye Josep, ye yagl du-yene. Ye prukwa Maria gak dane moglme digo, ye kinde kondinagledi prukwa. Ba ye yegl erimbo Maria ye yomba ongumutno wagle angai gogl dinambedi prukwa. Yeglpre ye uglmange ere kondinagledi prukwa.
40001020	Josep taragl i poglodi pir moglko, uglkumbu mina Yaglkande angelomo suwarata plau dite yegl dungwa, “Josep, ene Devit yungumo ombuno ta motnga, ene Maria i-wanatnga i embin mereyegl i-wanatnga, ipre ene kundugl goglkro. Pro. Gak etne dane mina moglkwa i Holi Spirit gak moglkwa.
40001021	Ye yagl gak ta kurambuka, ene kangiye Yesus we dinatnga. Sraglpre, ye yombama tandaglmeno koko ende te, ye ere-inambuka.”
40001022	Taragl prapra plau dungwa i Yaglkande kamo propet dumere mere paiyungwa. Propet ka yegl dungwa,
40001023	“Piryo, ambai mor ta ye yagl bogl ta akiye wanmoglpai erekrambuka. Ye gak dane panan yagl gak ta kugl yenambuka. Ana ye kangiye Imanuel we dinaglkwa.” Kangiye i mambunomo yegl, “God nono bogl akiye moglkwa.”
40001024	Ana Josep ye ugl pamara andigltre, ye Yaglkande angelomo ditomere ere, Maria embiye mereyegl auro yend yungumugl ongwa.
40001025	Ba ye akiye ta kungro paikre wanmogl embriko, ana Maria wam kugl yongwa. Ana Josep eremogl gak kangiye Yesus we dungwa.
40002001	Herot king moglkwa enge igle Judia taun Betlehem kamun igle Maria Yesus kugl yongwa. Yesus kugl yongwa moglko, ande umara iro pirpogl singwa yomba ye wu Jerusalem undre ana krapogl yegl dingwa,
40002002	“Juda yomba ene kingno, gak kuglambu i aglo moglme? No ande umara iro kugl-kurimo kandre, ana no dembiye karaugl ere tenamnedi pre umga.”
40002003	Yegl digo King Herot ka i pirtre kinde prukwa, te Jerusalem yomba ye bogl akiye meglkwa i prapra pirkwa.
40002004	Ana Herot eremogl pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba dimakaisi krapogl prukwa, “Yomba ere-inambuka yagle ye morambe dingura i kamun aglo morambedi dune?”
40002005	Ana ye yegl diteingwa, “Betlehem kamun Judia makan. Propet ka yegl muno boglko pangwa.
40002006	God yegl dungwa, “‘Betlehem kamun ene, Juda makanomugl, sugl meglkwa yomba kamuno yongwa ye mina ene atne kaima ta moglkitnga. Ene mina king ta morambuka ye na yombanma Israel sugl morambuka.’”
40002007	Yegl digo Herot pirtre ana ye ande umara iro pirpogl singwa yomba wingwa ikra uglmange ere di-indre kugl-kuri wu nongugl ongwa engemo i kirendi dipera ere prukwa.
40002008	Ana yegl ertre Betlehem kamun enaglme dungwa, “Ene pi wakai ere doko gak kembra kaniyo, ana kanimbi kade wu na di narimbi na ama pi kan dembiye karaugl eretenaglka.”
40002009	Ana king kamo pirtre okuwo ye ende eingwa, ye pi konbo ande umara iro kugl-kuri kanigwa ikra aglke wu nongugl pi okuna yeite pipi gak giglte moglmara yungu igle mitna kogl gidi pangwa.
40002010	Ye kugl-kuri pango kandre gun kandekinde kaima yeingwa.
40002011	Ye ende yungugl pi gak giglte mam Maria bogl miurko kandre ana mangidi goglkuno bondugl dembiye karaugl ereteingwa. Yegl ere pandigl ana gagl bona yauro gol ya, kungo ya te paura demine orkwa i munduwo argan pre teingwa.
40002012	Ana God uglkumbu mina ye ende ikine Herot moglmara pikriyo ditongo, ana ye konbo pereta ende ikine yungunomugl eingwa.
40002013	Pirpogl singwa yomba ikra endpi endeingo, ana Josep ugl pamara Yaglkande angelomo wu uglkumbu mina yegl dungwa, “Ene andigl gak kembra mam bogl auro imin teke ende Isip makan piyo. Igle pi mogl paimbi na ka aglketa ene ditenaglka, sraglpre Herot ye gak kembra doko kan indre sigoragle dungwa.”
40002014	Yegl ditongo, Josep ye enduwer andigl gak kembra mam bogl auro yungo, teke ende Isip eingwa.
40002015	Ye Isip mogl paingo Herot goglkwa. Ana propet ye Yaglkande kamo ta dungwa i paiyungwa. Ye yegl dungwa, “Na wana Isip makan moglko aglendi menda endiga.”
40002016	Enge igle King Herot yegl prukwa, ande umara yomba ye kakimbi ditendre ende eingwa ipre ye dem pond kumbrukwa. Yeglpre yomba diendungo Betlehem kamun kande ya kembra winambodi yagl gak kembra buglayungu suwo mogl ende atne wingwa i sigogl kondingwa. Sraglpre, Herot eremogl yagl gak buglayungu suwo neingwa sigolo dungwa i okuna kana nomano pai pogl sungwa yomba ye kugl-kuri koglkwa engemo i ditengo ye prukwa pre yegl orkwa.
40002017	Yegl erikwa i propet Jeremaia ka ta dungwa pangwa i paiyungwa:
40002018	“Rama dumo kande suna kai kaglkane kande ere tembrumba yei meglkwa. Resel ye nangiglma wagle kaino orkwa, ye dem munduwo siyau dinamune dingwa ba ye manedi prukwa, sraglpre, ye nangiglma prapra gogl kondingwa.”
40002019	Herot goglko ana Yaglkande angelomo ye Isip makan iro Josep uglkumbu mina wu nongugl pi tongwa.
40002020	Angelo yegl di Josep tongwa, “Ene andigl gak kembra mam bogl auro imin ende ikine Israel makan enaglmiwo. Yomba gak kembra sigoramune dingwa yombamo ikra gogl kondingwa.”
40002021	Yegl dungo, Josep andigl gak kembra mam bogl auro yungo ye ende ikine Israel makan eingwa.
40002022	Ba Josep yegl di prukwa. Arkeleas ye nem Herot wu suglosi Judia kingno moglkwa yeglpre Josep igle enambuka kundugl goglkwa. Ba God uglkumbu mina ye ka ditongwa pre ende Galili makan taun eingwa.
40002023	Ye endpi taun ta kangiye Nasaret we dimara igle meglkwa. I propet ka dingwa pangwa i paiyungwa, “Ye Nasaret nem we dinaglkwa.”
40003001	Enge igle Jon Baptais eremogl, ye Judia dumo kande makan waule, yomba moglkrimara wu, plau dindre ana yaglambu kamambuno di pene ende tongwa.
40003002	Ye yegl dungwa, “Ene nomano yake teiyo. Heven kingdom ende magl ungwa.”
40003003	Jon pre God propetmo Aisaia dra mina dite yegl dungwa: “Makan waule suna yomba ta wiyau endungwa, ‘Yaglkande pre konbaunamo akekun eriyo. Ye unambuka pre konbo si-ake du endiyo.’”
40003004	Jon bugla-kamel yungo mina gaglsuna erikwa i ende-ende orkwa. Te bugla-kau nangiye kumagl ta dane mina suna dongwa. Te kaiya moknamo i mongondo ya te brume are nuglo ne-ne orkwa.
40003005	Enge igle Jerusalem ya Judia kamun mundu te Jodan Nigle mangigl dumo tau yongwa i yomba prapra Jon moglmara wingwa.
40003006	Ana ye yene tandaglmeno dipeglko, ana ye Jodan Nigle yomba baptais eretongwa.
40003007	Jon ye kango Parisi ya Sadyusi wagle merkinde baptais eramnedi wingo ana ye yegl ditongwa, “Ene toki kinde wagle, God dem kumbrukwa ene mina una orkwa. Ira ene dite teke enaglkwa kuno orme dume?
40003008	Ene nomano yake tembi, ana embriyeno diporambuka, ene i-yake tengwa pangwa.
40003009	Ene Abraham pre no kowano awano moglmedi nomano yegl pirkriyo. Na ene yegl diteinga, God pra we dinan ana kombuglo i Abraham gawamo plau dinaglkwa.
40003010	Dimaima endi prapra mambuno mina yeikondungwa. Endi prapra ta mongo wakai koglkraglkwa okuwo boro-gundi atne ende ana piyasi donga mina endinaglkwa.
40003011	“Ene nomano yake tenaglkwa pre, na nigl mina ene baptais ereteinga. Ba okuwo yomba ta unambuka i yombuglomo pai mitna ende na yombura i engrukwa. Na yomba wakai moglmbo kade ye kagle towo poko yendenaglka kuno erekrukwa. Ye eremogl ene Holi Spirit ya te donga mina ene baptais ere tenambuka.
40003012	Ye ikanmo sawol ake indre ungwa. Ye wit sundina prapra siplendi menda ende ana wit mongo gande i yene kaiya moknamo yungu yungugl endinambuka. Ana sundina mongo paikrambuka ye donga gongokre aimande depamara gagltenge erambuka.”
40003013	Enge igle Yesus Galili kamun kondo Jon baptais ere narambedi pre ende Jodan Nigle ongwa.
40003014	Ba Jon manedi yegl dungwa, “Ene na baptais ere natn kuno erambuka. Sraglpre ene na moglmara une?”
40003015	Ana Yesus ka yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Yegl manga, erme na dimere yeglmere ero. Embriye du-yene yegl mina nono pra God munduwo pamere yegl ouglo kade kuno erambuka.” Ana Jon eremogl Yesus dumere orkwa.
40003016	Yesus baptais erekondo oglandi, nigle ende egli undre ende menda ungo. Ana enge i keunde kamun mitna audungo, ye kango God Spiritmo kua yumugl mereyegl ende atne undre ye moglmara egli moglkwa.
40003017	Ana heven imbo ka ta yegl dungwa, “I na Wana, na ye wakai kandre nomana wakai teinga.”
40004001	Okuwo Holi Spirit eremogl Yesus auro yendpi dumo waule yomara ongwa, i Satan di nusinambuka pre auro yongwa.
40004002	Igle Yesus ermine 40 ya te enduwer 40 kaiya mawagl ere nekre mogl kindan goglkwa.
40004003	Ana bagl nusinambuka yaglmo ye moglmara undre yegl ditongwa, “Ene God Wam kaima motnga panan kombuglo moglkwa imer dimin wu bret yeingwa no.”
40004004	Ba embi Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Kamambuno pepa mina muno beglkwa pangwa, ‘Yomba bret keunde ta nendre kor aimande moglkraglkwa. God dra mina ka prapra ungwa i engenge pir sikasi moglpai eraglkwa.’”
40004005	Satan aglke Yesus yendpi Jerusalem siti holi pindre ana God holi yungumo mina bolamugl punduno kaima endungwa andigl moglko.
40004006	Yegl ditongwa, “Ene God Wam kaima motnga panan ene puglodi ende atne po. Kamambuno pepa mina muno yegl beglkwa pangwa: “‘God angelomo ene pre diendinan ye wu onguno mina ene boglo ere mitna endimbi, ene yange kombuglo suwarata katn boglkrambuka.’”
40004007	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ka ta ombugl yegl muno beglko pangwa, ‘Yaglkande ene Godnen ye ta eran kanagledi bakagl tekro.’
40004008	Ba Satan aglke kordagl Yesus yendpi kamun muglo oltokuri kaima ta yomara endungwa moglko ana makan koglkoglo taragl prapra ya dumo kande koglkoglo yombuglomo ya bumbuno orkwa i prapra ombuno dite,
40004009	yegl dungwa, “Taragl prapra kanga i na ene mundu tekondinaglka. Erme ene goglkun bondugl na dembina karaugl ere naro.”
40004010	Dungo Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Satan, ene ende eglke po. Kamambuno pepa yegl muno beglko pangwa, ‘Yaglkande ene Godnen suwara dembiye karaugl ere tendre ana ye suwara kongunmo eratnga.’”
40004011	Yegl dungo Satan eremogl Yesus kindekondo endongo ana angelo wu Yesus akeple dingwa.
40004012	Yesus prukwa Jon kane sime digo ana ye ende ikine Galili ongwa.
40004013	Ye Nasaret kamun kindekondo endpi Kaperneam kamun Galili niglmong bina moglpai orkwa, iwe Sebulun ya te Naptali yomba makanomugl.
40004014	Sragl yegl orkwa i propet Aisaia ka dungwa pamara i kaima paiyungwa:
40004015	“Sebulun makan ya te Naptali makan, konbo endpi mundi nigl kande ongwa, Jodan Nigle bina Galili kamun igle Yomba Bina meglmara.
40004016	Igle yomba mim mina meglkwa, erme ambuglange kande sungwa kanigwa, ye geglkwa mambuno pamara wanmeglko, ambuglangesi i-pene ende tongwa.”
40004017	Enge igle Yesus mambuno bogl God kamo di pene endungwa, “Ene nomano yake teiyo. Sraglpre God kingdomo ene mina mangigl ungwa.”
40004018	Galili Nigle bina igle Yesus wan pi kango angigle angigle suwo miurka. Saimon kangiye ta Pita we dingwa, te angigle Andru, ye fis ere simbrika yomba, yeglpre ye fis ere singwa gagl ende nigle ende miurka.
40004019	Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ene na mokonamugl wiro, na beke teimbo ene yomba ere-inambrika.”
40004020	Ana tambre kana fis ere simbrika gatno kindekondo ana omara embrika.
40004021	Ye kurita ende inde pindre kango, Sebedi wam suwo Jems ya te angigle Jon neno Sebedi bogl fis gagl bot mina ake kuno ere meglko ana Yesus yagl suwo agle dungwa.
40004022	Ana tambre kana ye suwo neno ya te bot kindekondo ana Yesus omara mokomugl embrika.
40004023	Yesus Galili kamun prapra wu ikine ikine pi, makai yungu merkinde yomara pi God kingdomo ka wakai dipene endindre ana kinde imbo kanekane ere ende, te kinde singwa ere ikor ende tongwa.
40004024	Ye taragl orkwa i yomba diwai digo Siria makan prapra pirkondingwa. Ana yomba kinde kanekane sungwa i-wingwa. Nangino giugl singwa ya te spirit kinde bogl meglkwa ya te kuakiku singwa ya te mau singwa i prapra i-wingo, ana ye erewakai ere tongwa.
40004025	Ana Galili yomba merkinde kaima wingwa, te Dikapolis yomba ya te Jerusalem yomba ya te Judia dumo kande bina yei ende wu Jodan Nigle yomara koglo imbo i prapra Yesus omara mokomugl eingwa.
40005001	Yomba merkinde wingo Yesus kandre ye endpi kamun muglo ta amedungwa. Te disaipelma wagle ye moglmara wingo.
40005002	Ye mambuno bogl ka beke tongwa:
40005003	“Yomba yene spiritno pre kundugl gogltre ana nomano ake atne ende waningwa, God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, heven kingdom inaglkwa.
40005004	Yomba kai kaglkane ere meglkwa, God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, God deno munduno akebiyei tenambuka.
40005005	Yomba ye yene pre pirko atne orkwa i God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, God makanmo i prapra ye tenambuka.
40005006	Yomba mambuno du-yene pre sikasi, kaiya ya nigl mere yegl kindan gogl moraglkwa, God eran ye gun yenaglkwa. God te kuno erambuka.
40005007	Yomba ta eremogl yomba tau pre mitno gogl waningwa yomba, God eran ye gun yenaglkwa. God ye mitno gogl tenambuka.
40005008	Nomano suna pesungwa yomba God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, ye God kanaglkwa.
40005009	Yomba deno munduno bipokndi yenambedi konbo singwa yomba God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, God na nangrima meglme dinambuka.
40005010	Yomba mambuno du-yene erikwa ipre ye ere singwa, God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, heven kingdom ye inaglkwa.
40005011	“Yomba kanimbi ene na yombanma meglmbi, ana ye eremogl ene ka kinde dite, ere sindre te, kakimbi kanekane ditembi, ana God eran ene gun yenaglkwa.
40005012	Ene gunyei argan eriyo, sraglpre ene topono kande heven suna ene pre yei-pangwa, okuna ye ama yegl propet wagle ere singwa mere ene ere sinaglkwa.
40005013	“Ene manginagle mundi mere meglkwa. Ana mundi i druwomo ta paikran, nono sragl oun kade druwomo aglke wu panambe? Mundi yeglmere kongunmo ta paikrukwa. Yomba toindi ende engre kuwagl paglkwa.
40005014	“Ene makandle ken ambuglange meglkwa. Siti ta kamun muglo yenambuka, ye taragl ta si yokokrambuka.
40005015	Te yomba ken-lam ta gagl ipi baket mina atnekra ta yeikraglkwa. Tamanga. Ye ipi boglmo mina bolamugl yeingo ana ambuglangesi yomba yungugl meglkwa i prapra tongwa.
40005016	Kuno yeglmere, ene ambuglangeno i yomba ongumutno-mugl ambuglange sinan yomba ene mambunono wakai eraglkwa i kandre ana ene Neno heven suna moglkwa imbo ye dembiyesi tenaglkwa.
40005017	“Na winga i lo ya propet kanno mambuno i ta i-eglke endinagledi pre umedi pirkriyo. Na ka i kaima erekuno era pre winga.
40005018	Na ka kaima di ene teinga, kamun kua ya makan wau borambrika enge igle, lo muno kembra beglkwa pangwa i suwara yene ta, wu taya pikrambuka. Tamanga. Lo kamo beglkwa i prapra paimogl enan taragl i pra plaudi kondinambuka.
40005019	Yeglpre yomba ta God lomo i suwarata piran taragl yoko mereyegl eran sende pandigl, ana pi yomba ta bekete mambuno yegl ero dinan, ana ye heven kingdom imbo kangiye wu atne enambuka, ba ye na lona i sika sindre ana yomba ta bekete kuno yeglmere eriyo dinan, ye kangiye kande heven kingdom suna panambuka.
40005020	Yeglpre na ene diteinga, “God mambunomo du-yene i ya te pirngi dingwa i ta yombuglo ere lo beke teingwa yomba ya te Parisi wagle engre atne ende pi kawa tekrimbi, ene heven kingdom suna ta pikraglkwa.”
40005021	Yesus ka tau yegl dungwa, “Kowano awano ka di wingwa i ene pirkondingwa, ‘Ene yomba sigoglkriyo, yomba ta eremogl yomba ta sigoran, ye kot erambuka.’
40005022	Ba na ka yegl di ene teinga, yomba ta eremogl angigle ta dem kumbro tenan ye kot wagle enambuka. Aglke yomba ta eremogl, angigle ta ka kinde ditenan, ye iyu kot kande wagle enaglkwa. Ba yomba ta eremogl yomba ta yegl ditenambuka. Ene yagl tom du we ta dinan, yombamo i guglo kamun pi donga denambuka.
40005023	“Yeglpre, ene ofan iyu kamambuno yungu alta mina undre noman suna pitn ana angitn taragl tandaglme ta ere tongwa pai dinan,
40005024	ana ene ofan i alta wagle mangigl yei pandigl, ene aglke ende ikine pi angitn moglmara emin ana ka i di akedu endinambrika, yegl erekondo pandigl okuwo ofan ipi God tenatnga.
40005025	“Yomba ta ene ipi kot ere tenagledi eran, ene oglandi akedu endiro. Ene konbo bange enambrara i ka di akedu endiro, tamanan ye ene ipi ka tange teingwa yomba ongo wagle yenambuka. Ana ka tange teingwa yomba ene ipi kimbirnem kande ongo mina yenan, ana ye ene ipi kane yungu endinambuka.
40005026	Na ka kaima diteinga, ene ende menda ukre kane paimogltre ana kot dumere mere topo prapra te kondinatnga.”
40005027	Yesus ka ta yegl dungwa, “‘Yaglambu wino embino meglkwa kunogl gundokrikwa,’ kamo i kamkand diteingo pirkondingwa.
40005028	Ba na ene diteinga, yagl ta ye ambu kandre bumbuno kaima yene goran, ana yagl i dem munduwo wagle ime ye ambu kunogl gundo kondungwa.
40005029	Yeglpre ongumutn wokra tandaglme eratnedi eran, i pogl endekondo. I wakai yene, ene ta pogl endekitn, ongun nangin mundu ipi guglo kamun endinatnga.
40005030	Te ongun wo i tandaglme ta eratnedi eran, goglumdi kinde kondo. I wakai yene, nangin kembra ta ere i-suagle sinan nangin mundu ipi guglo kamun ende dinambiwo.”
40005031	Yesus ka ta yegl dungwa, “Okuna ka yegl dingwa, ‘Yagl ta embiye sendinagle dinan, ana ye yaglambu simbiglki dingwa pepa i muno bogltre pandigl, ana ye embiye sendinambuka.’
40005032	Ana na ene diteimbo piryo: Yagl ta embiye kinde kondinan, ana ambu i konbo gua wanambedi pre yegl orkwa. Te yagl ta ambumo kinde kondungwa ikra inan ye ama kunogl gundungwa.”
40005033	Yesus ka ta ama yegl dungwa, “Kowano awano okuna yegl dingwa i ene pirkondingwa, ‘Ene kakimbi di i ka kaima endekro. Yaglkande ongumuglo wagle kamo dinga i akegidi moglo.’
40005034	Ba na erme ene diteinga, ene ka di gidi heven imbo we dikraglkwa, heven i God boglmo yongwa;
40005035	te manginagle God kagle yei prukwa dumo yongwa, te Jerusalem, King Kande sitimo yongwa,
40005036	ana ene bitn mina ka digi dikratnga. Sraglpre, ene bitn yungo suwarata ere kama ende kruwo ende erekratnga.
40005037	Ene ka mongo bogl dinatnga. Owo din pra iwe, te tamane dimin manga iwe. Ana ka tau pitnara dinatnga ikra Satan mina ungwa.”
40005038	Yesus ka ta yegl dungwa, “Okuna ka digo ene pirkondingwa, ‘Yomba ta eremogl yomba ta ongumuglo si doksinan, ana mongo kuno yegl ereto. Te yomba ta eremogl singiye si uglo sinan, ene ama kuno yegl ere tenatnga.’
40005039	Ba na ene etne yegl ditenaglka, yomba ta ene erekinde ere tembi, ene ere-ikine ende tekriyo. Te yomba ta paunan wokra atndang sinan, ama koglo kondakra temin sinano.
40005040	Te yomba ta ene ipi kot ere tenagledi yombuglo ere gatn suna atne gugl inan, ama gagl tembe akiye gugl to.
40005041	Te yomba ta yombuglo ere ene gaglmo bona konbauna sungunagle kine ipo dinan, ene konbauna olto kine ipo.
40005042	Ana yomba ta taragl ta naro dinan, ene to, te ta taragl kur i-wanagle dinan ama to.”
40005043	Yesus ka tau ama yegl dungwa, “Okuna ka yegl digo ene pirkondingwa, ‘Enene yombanma kanwakai yei, kundan ikine kankinde yenatnga.’
40005044	Ba na etne ene yegl ditenaglka, ene kundano ikine kanwakai yei, te ene eresingwa yomba ye pre God kamange eretenaglkwa.
40005045	Yegl erimbi Neno Kande heven moglkwa imbo kaima nangiglma moraglkwa. Yeglpre, ye orko ande si yomba kinde ya te du-yene wagle akiye tongwa, te ye dungo kamun si yomba kinde ya te du-yene wagle akiye tongwa.
40005046	Ana yomba ene wakai kanaglkwa i ene ye ama wakai kanimbi ana ene God mina sragl topo inaglme? Takis ingwa yomba mambuno kuno yegl ama erekrimo?
40005047	Ana ene yeinenga keunde ka wakai dite motn, sragl ere yomba pere kanwakai yenatne? Kamambuno pirpogl sikrikwa yomba ama yegl erekrimo?
40005048	Yeglpre ene Neno heven imbo du-yene moglmere yegl ene ama du-yene molo.”
40006001	Yesus aglke yegl dungwa, “Ene kan kuno eriyo! Ene mambuno du yene eraglkwa i yomba no kanaglmedi erekriyo. Ene yegl ta erimbi, Neno heven suna moglmara topono ta ikraglkwa.
40006002	“Yeglpre yomba mirte ta moran ene taragl ta tenagledi pirmin, bu dingwa mereyegl erekratnga. Kamambuno kakimbi yomba ye makai yungu yungugl ya te konbo bange yomba no kandre dembino sinaglmedi yegl ere-ere erikwa. Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ye topono mundu i-kondingwa.
40006003	Ba yomba taragl ta inagledi doko moran ene tenatnga, i ongun wokra taragl ta erambuka i ongun kondakra pirkan erekrambuka.
40006004	Yeglpre ene yomba taragl eretenga i teke panambuka. Ana okuwo ene Nen taragl teke pangwa kangwa nem, ye ene topo te ikine endinambuka.
40006005	“Ene kamange eraglkwa enge, i kamambuno kimbi yomba erimere yeglmere ene erekraglkwa. Ye makai yungu yungugl kra ya te konbo bange andigl mogl, yomba no kanaglmedi kamange ere waningwa. Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ye topono boglkango igo kondungwa.
40006006	Ba ene kamange eragledi piratnga enge, ene ende kiule panara pi yungu dra yongugl pandigl ana Neno teke moglkwa ye kamange ere tenatnga. Ana ene Neno taragl teke pangwa pirkan orkwa nem, ye pra ene topo te ikine endinambuka.
40006007	Ana ene kamange eraglkwa enge, ene kayoko kanekane dindre kakimbi yomba erimere yegl erekraglkwa, sraglpre, ye kamange olto ouno kade God ye kamangeno pir norambedi yegl ere-ere erikwa.
40006008	Ene ye erimere yegl erekraglkwa. Ene taragl dokingwa i Neno kan kondungo ene okuwo krapogl teingwa:
40006009	“Ipre ene kamange yegl eraglkwa: “‘No Neno ene heven suna motnga, ene kangin holi panambiwo.
40006010	Ene kingdomnen unano. No ene pitnere mere makandle yegl keunde eramniwo, i heven suna erimere yegl.
40006011	No kaiya mokna enge yomere yomere ninamga i noratniwo.
40006012	No tandaglmeno kinde kondo noro, no yomba tau ye kinde ere norikwa i kindekondo tenamga.
40006013	Ene no auro i baglnu mina pikro. Taragl kinde mina ene no i-eglke endo.’
40006014	Pirmo! Ene yomba tau tandaglme ere tenaglkwa i kindekondo tembi kade, ene Neno heven moglkwa imbo yeglmere ene kindekondo tenambuka.
40006015	Ba ene yomba tau tandaglme ere tembi, ene kindekondo tekrimbi, ana ene Neno heven moglkwa imbo ene tandaglmeno ama ere ende tekrambuka.
40006016	“Ene kaiya mokna mawagl eraglkwa enge, gumano drano kinde ere, kakimbi dingwa yomba erimere yeglmere erekraglkwa. Ye gumano drano kinde erikwa i yomba ye kaiya mokna mawagl erikwa pamiwodi kanaglmedi pre yegl erikwa. Na kaima ene diteinga, ye topono mundu makandle i-kondingwa.
40006017	Ba ene kaiya mokna mawagl ta eratnga enge ana kungo bitn mina ere, te guman dran nigl koratnga.
40006018	Yegl etn kade yomba ye ene kaiya mokna mawagl panga i ta kanpogl sikraglkwa, ba Nen teke moglkwa ye suwara mundu pirkan erambuka. Ana ye taragl teke pangwa pirkan orkwa Nem ye ene topo te ikine endinambuka.
40006019	“Ene makandle bona pikaugl ninambuka te bugl sungum dinambuka te yomba kunogl ninaglkwa, taragl i pre ene gande makai sikriyo.
40006020	Ene heven suna di minge bona pikaugl ta nekrambuka te bugl sungum dikrambuka te yomba ta kunogl ikraglkwa, taragl i gande makai siyo.
40006021	Pitno! Bona ganan wakai yomara dumo igle ene nomano ombugl igle yenambuka.
40006022	“Ene ongumutn i nangin ken-lam. Ene ongumutn wakai panan, ene nangin mundu ambuglange sinambuka. Ongumutn suwo-akiye wakai pandre ana nangin mundu pra ambuglangesi tenambuka.
40006023	Ba ongumutn suwo-akiye kinde eran, ene nangin mundu mim ere kondinambuka. Te noman ambuglangemo mim eran, aya, mim bongond kaima erambuka.
40006024	“Yomba suwarata ye yagl kande suwo konguno erekrambuka, ye ta kan wakai yei, ana ta ekriye bogl tenambuka. Mo ta kamo pinande ere ana ta kamo sendinambuka. Ene eremogl God kongunmo ya minge moni kongun i-suwara ende erekraglkwa.
40006025	“Ipre na ene diteinga, ene kor-moraglkwa i pre pir yumbun dekraglkwa. Mo nangino pre pir yumbun de yegl dikraglkwa. Sragl taragl ne moglpai eramne? Mo nangino pre pir yumbun de yegl dikraglkwa. Sragl taragl i-were wanamne? Kor meglkwa i pai mitna ende kaiya mokna engrukwa, te nangino pai mitna ende kungugl gagl engrukwa.
40006026	Ene kua waningwa i kaniyo, ye kongun ta ere yaglmo, mo simakaisimo, mo gande yei nekrikwa, ba Neno heven moglkwa ye kaiya moknano i-pene ende tongo neingwa. Ana sragl we dinamun, ene mogl mitna kaima ende kua engrekrimo?
40006027	Mo ene yomburo ta pra panan kor-moglpai eraglkwa i pre enene engeno ta pra ake olto endinaglmo?
40006028	“Sraglpre ene kungugl gagl pre pir yumbun deime? Ene akindile endikan kuiye si pai ongwa, i mambunono piraglkwa imba. Ye kungugl gagl wedi konguno ta erekrikwa.
40006029	Ana ipre ene diteimbo. Okuna King Solomon ye ekin nogl gagl wangwa, ba ye taragl kuiye wakai yeglmere ta ekin gagl i-wankrukwa.
40006030	Ana akindile endikan kuiye yeglmere, etne plaudi pangwa, te tangina mereyegl puro gagltenge eraglkwa, iwe God yene embriye wakai yeglmere panambedi prukwa pre plaudi pangwa. Yeglmere ene kungutno gatno pra i-pene ende tekrambo? Ene pirngi dingwa kembra pangwa.
40006031	Ipre ene pirngidi yegl dikraglkwa, ‘Sragl taragl i-ne moglpai eramne, mo sragl taragl were i-wanamune?’
40006032	Iwe kamambuno kiurikwa yomba ye nomano kande taragl igle mina pago sika singwa. Ene taragl dokingwa i, Neno heven moglkwa imbo ye pir kondungwa.
40006033	Ene eremogl God kingdomo, ya te mambunomo du-yene komnaiye doko kan imin kade ana okuwo taragl tau prapra pitnere ama tenambuka.
40006034	Ene barma pre gokgake dikraglkwa. Barma kongunmo iwe, yene barma taragl. Ande suwara suwarandi yumbuno i yene perepere ungwa.
40007001	“Yomba ta erambere ene yumbu sikriyo, ene yegl etn, God ene yegl keunde eretenambuka.
40007002	Ene mambuno etnere yegl, God yegl keunde eretenambuka, te ene yomba ere tenaglkwa yeglmere God ama ene ere tenambuka.
40007003	“Sraglpre ene angitn ongumuglo mina endi surmane yongwa yendo dine? Enene ongumutn mina endi bange pond pangwa imbor yende ana okuwo angitn yendo ditenatnga.
40007004	Ene engenge ongumutn mina ende bange pond ta panan, ene sraglpre angitn ongumuglo mina taragl kembra yongwa, i yendinagle dine?
40007005	Ene kakimbi yomba, okuna kana endi bange enene ongumutn mina pangwa imenda ende ana okuwo ene kanpogl sindre ana angitn ongumuglo mina endi surmane yongwa i ere i-endinatnga.
40007006	“Taragl God teingo holi yongwa i ene indre agl tekriyo, te ene taragl wakai i-wan meglkwa i bugla tekriyo. Ene yegl erimbi, ye katno mina engre deruwagl baruwagl ere, okuwo ana kan ikine ende enene si ninaglkwa.”
40007007	Yesus ka aglke yegl dungwa, “Krapotn ana God ene tenambuka, dokun ana ene kanatnga. Sigiu dimin ana yungu dra yauro ende tenambuka.
40007008	Yomba prapra God krapogltre, inaglkwa; te ye dokindre kanaglkwa. Te ye sigiu dimbi, yungu dra yauro ende tenambuka.
40007009	“Ene mina yagl suwarata wam kaiya wedi kra poran, ye kombuglo ta pra i-tenambo?
40007010	Mo ye fis ta kra poran ye toki ta i-tenambo? Tamanga.
40007011	Ene yomba kinde meglkwa ba, pirpogl sindre nangro taragl wakai i-teingwa, yeglmere Neno God heven moglkwa imbo, yana dinaglkwa ye taragl wakai mere tenambuka.
40007012	Ene engenge yomba taragl ere naraglmedi pitnere yeglmere ye eretenatnga, i we Moses lomo ya te propet wagle ye kanno i mambuno kaima pangwa.
40007013	“Ene konbo dra kembra yomara i suna enaglkwa. Konbo dra kande yongwa i yei endpi guglo kamun ongwa, igle yomba merkinde eingwa.
40007014	Ba dra kembra yendre te konbo urur yomara i yombuglo ere, endpi kor-moraglkwa kamun ongwa, i yomba kurita doko kan ingwa.
40007015	“Ene kan kuno ere molo, propet kakimbi yomba unaglkwa. Ene ye kanimbi nangino tembe sipsip mereyegl ere unaglkwa, ba ye nomano suna i agl are mereyegl pangwa.
40007016	Yombamo i moglpai eraglkwa mambunono i ene kanaglkwa. Yomba ta pra pi endi kangigle ormara suna wain mongo kogl panan urambo? Te yomba ta kugl kinde panambara suna i ende kogla mongo kogl panan uraglmo mo? Kaima tamanga.
40007017	Yeglmere endi wakai pangwa i mongo wakai koglkwa, te endi kinde pangwa i mongo kinde koglkwa.
40007018	Endi wakai ta mongo kinde koglkrambuka, te endi kinde ta mongo wakai koglkrambuka.
40007019	Endi ta mongo wakai koglkrambuka, i boro ende ipi donga mina gagltenge eraglkwa.
40007020	Yeglmere ene propet kakimbi yomba ye mambunono i wu pene enan kanaglkwa.
40007021	“Ene yegl di pirkraglkwa, yomba na kangina dagl, Yaglkande, Yaglkande di moraglkwa, ba ye prapra heven enaglmedi ta pirkraglkwa, yomba ta Nina heven moglkwa imbo ye prumere mere sika sinambuka i ye heven kingdom enambuka.
40007022	Enge kande mina yomba merkinde yegl di naraglkwa, ‘Yaglkande, Yaglkande, no ene kangin mina kamambuno dikunedino? Te ene kangin mina spirit kinde sende kuno endino? Te kimagl kanekane erekunedino?’
40007023	Yegl dimbi okuwo na nongugl kaima yegl ditenaglka, ‘Na ene ta kanpogl sikrika. Ene ende eglke piyo, ene mambuno kinde kanekane erikwa yomba.
40007024	“Yeglpre yomba tau na kanna pirpogl sindre ana duglo boraglkwa, yombamo i eremogl yomba tau nomano pai pogl sungwa kombuglo bolamugl yungu kei paingwa yeglmere.
40007025	Ana kamun pond sungwa, nigl si, ir iwanga mange yungu mina sungwa. Ba yungu i kombuglo bolamugl keingwa pre ukandi yange sikrukwa.
40007026	Te yomba tau na kanna i pirtre ana ye sika sikraglkwa, ye yagl du orkwa ta eremogl yungumo okupo yomara bolamugl keingwa yeglmere.
40007027	Ana kamun pond sungwa, nigl si, ir yuwanga mange yungumo igle sungwa, bukondi yangesi bogl deruwagl ere kondungwa.”
40007028	Ana Yesus ka i dite kondungo, yomba merkinde makaisi meglkwa ye kamo i pir sipuglo dingwa.
40007029	I sraglpre, ye yombuglo gigledi kande pangwa pre ka giglendi beke tongwa, i lo beke teingwa yomba yeglmere manga.
40008001	Enge igle Yesus kamun muglo kondo ende atne ungo, ana yomba merkinde ye omara mokomugl eingwa.
40008002	Ana yagl ta kaglande sungwa Yesus moglmara undre guma mina goglko bonduglte yegl dungwa, “Yaglkande, ene na erewakai ere naraglendi pitn kade, ene erewakai ere naro.”
40008003	Ana Yesus ongo duglosi yaglmo akindre dungwa, “Na pirka, ene kinden pra wakai erambiwo.” Ana oglandi yaglmo kaglande sungwa ikra nangiye winge dungwa.
40008004	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ene yomba suwarata ditekratnga, ba ene du ende pris moglmara pindre ana nangin ombuno dimin. Ye ene kanan, yomba prapra ene kaglande singa winge dungwa i kanaglkwa, Moses dumere ere ana ofa garatnga.”
40008005	Ana enge igle Yesus ende Kaperneam kamun suna ongo, Rom kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle ta Yesus moglmara undre akepledi narambedi pre dungwa,
40008006	“Yaglkande, na nitna konguna yomba kinde kande sungo mau si bogl mina yono pangwa.”
40008007	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Na pindre ye erewakai ere tenaglka.”
40008008	Ana kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Yaglkande, na yomba wakai ta moglkrika, ipre na yungunamugl ta ukratniwo. Ene ka keme dimin ana na konguna yomba argan erambuka.
40008009	Na yombanma kande meglmara atnekra moglka. Te na moglmara atnekra kimbirna nem meglkwa. Na ta endpo digo ye endongwa. Te ta wo digo ye ungwa, te nigl konguna yomba ta ene kongun i ero digo, ye orkwa.”
40008010	Yegl dungo, Yesus ka i pirtre sipuglo dindre ana mokomugl eingwa yomba dite dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, Israel yomba ene mina yomba ye pirngi dumere yegl ta pirngi digo kankrika.
40008011	Ipre na ka yegl diteinga, yomba merkinde ande umara ya beimara wu Abraham, Aisak te Jekop ye bogl heven kingdom suna dumo indre makaisi mokna bir ninaglkwa.
40008012	Ba komnaiye heven kingdom unaglmedi, digaglkwa yomba ye piyasi menda endinan mim bongond ormara, atne pi kai kaglkane ere singino gikir ere moraglkwa.”
40008013	Ana Yesus eremogl kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle yegl ditongwa, “Ene ende yungun po! Ene taragl yegl erambedi pirngi dinga i pra ere tenambuka.” Ana nigl kongunmo yomba ikra enge igle keme kindemo argan orkwa.
40008014	Yesus ende Pita keipamara yungugl ongwa enge, Pita ambu imake kinde si nangiye ninga pond dungo ye bogl mina uglpai moglkwa.
40008015	Yesus eremogl ongo akungo ye nangiye ninga dungwa i dundungwa, ana ambumo andigl kaiya mokna ere Yesus tongwa.
40008016	Ana pokndungo, yomba merkinde spirit kinde ye mina meglkwa pre, auro iyu Yesus moglmara wingwa. Ana ye spirit kinde dimenda ende, kindeno prapra erewakai orkwa.
40008017	Ye orkwa i okuna imbo propet Aisaia dumere mere wu geundi pangwa: “Ye yene nono kindeno imbo kanekane pangwa i kake yend ongwa.”
40008018	Yesus kangwa, yagl ambu merkinde wu ye moglmara mogl winambo digo ana ye disaipelma wagle yegl ditongwa, “Ene ende niglmong koglo imbo piyo.”
40008019	Ana lo beke tongwa yomba suwarata wu Yesus moglmara yegl ditongwa, “Ka Beke Notnga, ene kamun koglkoglo enatnara na mokonomugl enaglka.”
40008020	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Agl are yungumo kombuglo mur yongo, te kua ye yungumo yongwa, ba Yomba Wam ye yungumo toglmo ta yeikrukwa.”
40008021	Ana disaipelmo suwarata yegl di Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, komnaiye kana na kanwinge etn pindre ana nina maugl sinaglka.”
40008022	Ba Yesus di ikine ende ye tongwa, “Kondo ene na mokonamugl wo. Kanwinge etn geglkwa yene geglkwa yomba maugl sinaglkwa.”
40008023	Yesus ende bot mina suna ongo ana disaipelma wagle omara mokomugl eingwa.
40008024	Ye ende niglmong suna eingo ana ir yuwanga pond kaima ungo, nigl pembigldi wu bot i-atne endinagledi orkwa. Ba Yesus uglpai moglkwa.
40008025	Ana disaipelma pi ye pai moglmara uglo yoko dingwa, “Yaglkande, no akepledo, no nigl enaunga!”
40008026	Ana ye di ikine endungwa, “Ene pirngi dingwa kembra pangwa. Sraglpre ene kundugl geglme?” Ana ye andigl ir yuwanga ya nigl pembigl ka tongo ana ir yuwanga bu yongo te nigl kiendi moglkwa.
40008027	Ana prapra alagl sindre dingwa, “Ye sragl yomba moglme? Ir yuwanga ya nigl pembigl ye dumere kamo pir pinande eurika.”
40008028	Yesus wan endpi niglmong koglo imbo Gerasa kamun ongwa enge, yagl suwo spirit kinde suna meglko, ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara mina pai wanbrika yaglmo suwo, ye wu Yesus omara plau dimbrika. Ye yomba simbrika pre yomba konbauna igle wankrikwa.
40008029	Ye kaglkane kande ere dimbrika, “God Wam, ene no sragl ere noratn? Enge yeikrumara unga, ene no nangino giu ere noragledi pre un kana?”
40008030	Ana bugla merkinde kaima tau eglke dagl kaiya ne meglkwa.
40008031	Ana spirit kinde ye Yesus ambran ka dite yegl dingwa, “Ene no dimenda endinagledi pitn kade, no di bugla meglmara iro endimin ende suna enamuniwo.”
40008032	Digo, Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ende piyo!” Spirit kinde yagl suwo i kindekondo ende menda wu ana bugla mina ende suna eingo, ana bugla sinuglundi dangine mukundi ende atne pi niglmong mina nigl ne gogl kondingwa.
40008033	Ana bugla sugl yomba teke ende taun suna pindre, igle taragl prapra orko kanigwa, ya te yagl suwo mina spirit kinde suna meglko dimenda endungwa i akiye ka boglo kugl yomba teingwa.
40008034	Ana taun yomba prapra Yesus kanamnedi ende menda wingwa. Ye wu Yesus bogl tengigl yendre ana kamunomugl igle mogl dinambedi mane ditengwa.
40009001	Yesus bot mina wu tembe pindre, ende ikine pi nigl koglo imbo ye yene kamunmo kaima plau dungwa.
40009002	Ana yomba tau yagl ta kinde sungwa kake yu ye moglmara wingwa, yaglmo ongo kagle mau sungwa boglmo mina pandigl kake i-wingwa. Yesus kango ye pirngi dingwa pangwa pre ana ka yegl di kinde sungwa yagle tongwa, “Wana, ene noman pokndi yenano. Na ene tandaglmen kindekondo teinga.”
40009003	Lo beke teingwa yomba ye Yesus kamo i pirtre ana ye yene ka yegl dipirkwa, “Yomba i God kenaglmo sungwa.”
40009004	Yesus ye nomano mina kan-kondo ka yegl dungwa, “Sraglpre ene nomano mina pirko kinde orme?
40009005	Tandaglmen koko ende teiwo diga, mo andigl ende po diga i undi pame?
40009006	Ba ene yegl piryo, Yomba Wam ye yombuglo kande pangwa pre, makandle tandaglmeno prapra koko ende tenambuka.” Yesus ka yegl dikondo, ongo kagle kinde sungwa yaglmo moglko kandre yegl ditongwa, “Ene andigl kungutn indre ende yungun po.”
40009007	Ana yaglmo i andigl ende yungumugl ongwa.
40009008	Enge igle yomba prapra i kandre kundugl geglkwa. Ana yegl kandre God dembiye si teingwa. Ye yombuglo giglendi yomba tongwa.
40009009	Yesus ye kamun igle kondo endongwa, ana pi yagl ta kangiye Matyu, ye takis ingwa yungu igle amedi moglko kandre ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ene na mokonamugl wo.” Ana Matyu andigl Yesus omara mokomugl ongwa.
40009010	Enge igle Yesus ye disaipelma bogl Matyu yungumugl kaiya mokna ne meglko ana takis ingwa yomba ya tandaglme erikwa yomba merkinde wingo ye disaipelma bogl akiye kaiya mokna ne meglkwa.
40009011	Yegl eriko, Parisi wagle ye i kandre disaipelma meglmara krapogl teingwa, “Sraglpre ene ka beke tongwa yagle ye takis ingwa ya tandaglme erikwa yomba bogl akiye kaiya mokna ne meglme?”
40009012	Yesus ka i pirtre ye yegl dungwa, “Yomba ta kinde sikrambuka ye dokta moglmara ta pikrambuka, ba kinde sinan ye enambuka.
40009013	Ene pindre God kamo pangwa i kere piryo, ‘Kombuglange gaglkwa ipre na nomana kande paikrukwa, ba yomba mitno goraglkwa pre na nomana kande pangwa.’ Na yomba du-yene aglendi inagledi pre ta ukrika, na tandaglme yomba di-inagledi pre winga.”
40009014	Enge igle Jon disaipelma wagle undre Yesus moglmara kra yegl pogl teingwa, “Sraglpre no ya te Parisi wagle kaiya mokna mawagl ounga, ba ene disaipelma wagle yegl erekrime?”
40009015	Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ambu inambuka yagl ye yombama bogl akiye meglmbi sraglpre ye miriye goraglme? Tamanga. Enge ta yenan ye ikorugl endimbi kade ana yombamo kaima kaiya mokna mawagl eraglkwa.
40009016	“Yomba ta gagl alap kor kembra ta bagladi indre, gagl suna kande goglo mina simborambuka. Ye yegl eran, gagl kor simboglkwa i yombuglo ere gagl goglo arglandi wu kande kaima enambuka.
40009017	Ana yomba ta wain kor toindi meme nangiye gagl goglo mina ta suna endekrambuka. Ye yegl eran ana wain meme nangiye sibagla dinan ana wain ya meme nangiye akiye kinde erambrika. Yeglpre, ye wain kor toindi meme nangiye kor mina atne endinambuka.”
40009018	Ana Yesus ka yegl di Jon disaipelma wagle temoglko, makai yungu sugl moglkwa yomba ta, Yesus moglmara mangigl undre ana goglko bonduglte ka yegl ditongwa, “Na ambura erme keme gogl dundungwa. Ba ene undre ongun ye mina yemin ana ye pra ukor enambuka.”
40009019	Ana Yesus andigltre yaglmo i omara ongo, ana ye disaipelma wagle akiye ende eingwa.
40009020	Ambu ta moglkwa, ye ba engenge kanmogl ongo buglayungu 12 orkwa. Ambumo i Yesus omara moko mina mangigl pindre ongo duglosi Yesus gaglmo suna olto punduno ime akungwa.
40009021	Ambumo yene yegl di prukwa, “Na gaglmo suna punduno akimbo kade, na kindena i pra wakai erambuka.”
40009022	Yesus ye kan akete ambu i kandre yegl dungwa, “Na ambura, ene noman pokndi panano. Ene pirngi dinga i enene erewakai eretongwa.” Ana erme keunde ambu i kindemo wakai orkwa.
40009023	Yegl ertre ana Yesus endpi kamambuno sugl yomba keipamara yungugl pindre, ye kango yomba tau puming sigo, kai eriko, gaugl kande meglko,
40009024	ye ditongwa, “Ene prapra ende wenda piyo. Ambai kembra ye goglkrukwa, tamanga. Ye yoko ugl paimoglkwa.” Yegl dungo ye prapra gaugl ereteingwa.
40009025	Ba ye yomba prapra di wenda endekondo, Yesus ende yungugl pi ambai ongo akungo ana ambai anduglkwa.
40009026	Ana Yesus taragl orkwa i ka boglo kiglko waidi ende dumo koglkoglo ongwa.
40009027	Yesus kamun igle kondo endongo, yagl suwo ongumutno kin yongwa mokomugl pindre ana agle binan bogl di yegl dimbrika, “Devit Wam, ene no mitno gogl noro!”
40009028	Yesus ende yungugl ongwa enge, ongumutno kin yembrika suwo ye moglmara wimbrika. Ana Yesus krapogl yaglmo suwo tongwa, “Na taragl i pra erambedi pirngi dimbro?” Ana ye ditembrika, “Yaglkande, no pirngi dumbuglka.”
40009029	Ana Yesus ongo ongumutno mina akindre dungwa, “Ene pirngi dimbrika pre, taragl yegl ene mina plau dinambuka.”
40009030	Ana ye ongumutno pinedungo, Yesus ka giglendi yegl ditongwa, “Taragl ene mina plau dungwa i yomba ta ditembir pirdinaglmiwo.”
40009031	Ba ye pi Yesus taragl ormere i yomba merkinde dite kondimbriko ka boglo i waidi ende dumo koglkoglo ongwa.
40009032	Ana yagl suwo Yesus kondo ende embriko, yagl ta spirit kinde suna moglkwa, ye dra yake tongo ka dikrukwa. I yomba auro yu Yesus moglmara wingwa.
40009033	Ana Yesus spirit kinde i simenda endungo, du ikra ka dungwa. Yegl orko kandre yomba merkinde kundugl dindre ka yegl dingwa, “Okuna imbo Israel kamun taragl yegl ta plau dungo kankungra.”
40009034	Ba Parisi wagle yegl dingwa, “Spirit kinde nemyagl ye yombuglomo Yesus tongo ana ye spirit kinde simenda endungwa.”
40009035	Yesus winambodi endpi taun kande ya kembra makai yungu yungugl pindre, God kingdomo ka wakai yomba dipene ende ana bekete orkwa. Te kinde imbo ya kinde kanekane nangino mina pangwa i ama akiye erewakai orkwa.
40009036	Ana Yesus kango yomba merkinde makaisi meglko, ye i kandre mitno goglkwa. Sraglpre, ye nomano sikugl endungo ere wanaglkwa mere mango, te ye sipsip sutno yomba mogl akeple dinaglkwa mere manga.
40009037	Ipre ye disaipelma ditongwa, “Kaiya mokna merkinde mongo de bogl yei kondungwa, ba kongun yomba mere mogl simakai sinaglkwa manga.
40009038	Yeglpre, Yaglkande kongun nemyagl kamange ere teimbi, ye kongunmo yomba di endinan ana yene kaiya moknamo mongo simakai sinaglkwa.”
40010001	Yesus disaipelma 12 dimakai sindre, ana spirit kinde yomba mina suna meglkwa i simenda ende te kinde imbo kanekane ya te kinde sungwa i erewakai eraglmedi pre yombuglo tongwa.
40010002	Aposelma wagle 12 ye kangino yegl: Kangiye gumamugl pangwa Saimon, kangiye ta Pita we dingwa. Ye angigle Andru. Te Jems angigle Jon ye Sebedi wam suwo.
40010003	Te Pilip ya Batolomiu, Tomas, te Matyu, ye takis yungwa yaglmo. Te Jems, ye Alfias wam, te Tadius.
40010004	Te Saimon ye Selot yungu ombuno mina ta moglkwa. Te Judas Iskariot, ye Yesus yaglkumba ikine tongwa yagle.
40010005	Yesus aposelma 12 diendungwa ende enamunedi eriko ka yegl ditongwa, “Ene pi Yomba Bina ye meglmara ya te Samaria yomba tauno yomara igle pikriyo.
40010006	Ene enaglmere du-yene endpi sipsip taya eingwa yomba Israel ye meglmara igle piyo.
40010007	Pindre ana ka yegl dipene endinaglkwa, ‘Heven kingdom ende magl ungwa.’
40010008	Kinde sinaglkwa erewakai ere, goraglkwa ikor ende, kende kaglande sinaglkwa ake wu wakai pi, ana spirit kinde mange menda endiyo. Ene topo erekre yoko ingura, ipre ene topo ikre yoko ereteiyo.
40010009	Ene gol mo, moni silva mo, moni gogl, i ta gatno kamban mina panan indre pikriyo.
40010010	Ene konbauna enaglkwa enge, gatno kamban ta ikriyo. Te gatno suna suwondi ikre, te katno towo mo buglo muglmbo ta ipikriyo. Kongun yomba ye taragl ta inagledi pirambuka i yomba tenaglkwa.
40010011	“Ana ene wan ende pi taun kande mo, kembra ta suna eimbi igle ene kanpogl siyo, yomba du-wakai ta mogl ene di gundo yungumugl enagle dinan, ene pra ye bogl moglpai pi ende enaglkwa enge dumo igle kondiyo.
40010012	Ene ende yungugl enaglkwa enge, ka yegl diteyo, ‘Enge wakai ene mina yenano.’
40010013	Ana yungu nem embriyeno wakai panan ene bipokndi ye mina endimbi yei-panano. Ba ye embriyeno kinde ta panan ene tengwa ikra ikine endiyo.
40010014	Te taun kande mo kembra ta embi yomba ta ene di gundo yungunomugl endekre, te ka dinaglkwa pirkre, te ene una endwo ta dikrimbi, ene kamun igle kondindre ana katno sura mina kungane tamasi endiyo.
40010015	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, enge kande mina God yomba ka-tange tenambuka enge igle, Sodom ya Gomara yumbun ikra engre atne ende tendre, ana taun igle nem taragl yumbun pond kaima inaglkwa.
40010016	“Piryo, na ene sipsip mereyegl di agl koglma meglmara pukamugl endiga. Yeglpre ene toki mereyegl pirpoglsi kiendi wanaglkwa. Te kua yumugl mereyegl aglau erekre waniyo.
40010017	Ene kanpoglsi wanaglkwa, yomba tau ene kanesi kaunsol meglmara ipindre ka-tange tenaglkwa. Te ye ama ene imakai yungu yungugl ende kumba uglmbo sinaglkwa.
40010018	Ana ene na nangrima meglkwa pre, ene ipi king ya gavman mina ka-tange tenaglkwa. Yegl erimbi ene yomba kande ya Yomba Bina ye gumano mina andigl mogl ana kamambuno diteyo.
40010019	Ene auro i-kot mina enaglkwa enge, ene ka sraglwe dinaglkwa mo srambre mere dinaglkwa i kundugl goglkraglkwa. Enge igle ene sragl ka dinaglmere i God tenambuka.
40010020	Ana ene ka dinaglkwa, i ene kanno erekrambuka. Ba i Neno Kande Spiritmo wu ene drano mina dimenda endinambuka.
40010021	“Yomba ta ye yene dimbi angro kaima sigoraglkwa. Te neno ama yegl dimbi nangro sigoraglkwa. Te nangro ye ekriye bogl yomba di nusimbi neno eremogl mano sigoraglkwa.
40010022	Yomba prapra ene kankinde yenaglkwa, i na kangina ene mina pangwa pre yegl eraglkwa. Ba yomba ta pirngidi wanmogl pi enge pradinambara enan, God ere-inambuka.
40010023	Ene dumo kande ta moraglmara ye doglko ene eresimbi, dumo i kondo teke ende bangeta piyo. Na kaima ene diteinga, ene Israel dumo kande prapra yeiomara i kongun ere poriya sikrimbi, Yomba Wam unambuka.
40010024	“Skul gak ta ye kande ere beke tongwa yomba engrekrukwa, te nigl-kongun yomba ye kande ere suglmo yomba ta engrekrukwa.
40010025	Yeglpre skul gak ye beke tongwa yomba moglmere yegl moran pra, te nigl-kongun yomba ye suglmo yomba mereyegl moran pra. Yeglpre yungu nemyagl ye Belsebul wedi kangiye yeimbi, yomba akiye moglpai erikwa yomba ye kangino wu kinde kaima enambuka.
40010026	“Yeglpre, ene yomba kundutno goglkraglkwa. Sragl erme tusi pangwa i okuwo tusikrambuka, ana taragl prapra teke paingwa i okuwo wu pene embi kanaglkwa.
40010027	Na ka mim mina uglmange ere diteingra, ene erme ande panan dipene endiyo. Te ene ka ninudi kinano mina endinga pirkura i ipi yungu bolamugl mogl wisi wiyau endiyo.
40010028	Ene kundugl goglkriyo, yomba ene nangino sigoraglkwa ba kuiyano nomano ta sigoglkraglkwa. Ene God suwara kunduglmo golo. Ye kuiyano nomano ya nangino akiye si guglo kamun endinambuka.
40010029	Moni gogl wan toya indre kua inawa suwo topo eraglkwa, ba Neno Kande ye kanwinge eran suwarata yange makandle sikrambuka.
40010030	Ene ama bitno yungo prapra pangwa i kere kondungwa.
40010031	Yeglpre ene kundugl goglkriyo, ene topono pond pai mitna imbo ende kua inawa merkinde engrikwa.
40010032	“Yomba ta ye yomba meglmara na kangina dagl pene ende, na Yesus yombamo mole dinan na ama yombamo i kangiye heven suna Nina moglmara dagl pene endinaglka.
40010033	Yomba ta ye yomba meglmara na kangina dagl pene endekran, na ama ye kangiye heven suna Nina moglmara dagl pene endekraglka.
40010034	“Na winga i enge wakai i-umedi ene yegl pirkriyo. Tamanga. Na enge wakai ta i-ukrika, na dikumba prak i-winga.
40010035	Na winga i: “‘Neno eremogl wano bogl i-perepere endimbo, ye kunda ikine ikine moraglkwa. Te mano eremogl amburo bogl kunda ikine ikine moraglkwa. Te koglo embiyamo ye kunda ikine ikine moraglkwa.
40010036	Te yagl ta ye yene yombamo ya te embiye nangigle bogl kunda ikine ikine moraglkwa.’
40010037	“Yomba ta ye nem mo mam pre munduwo kande panan, na wedi pirkran ye na angra morambuka kuno erekrukwa. Te yomba ta wam ya ambuglo pre munduwo kande panan, na wedi piran paikran ye na angra morambuka kuno erekrukwa.
40010038	Ana yomba ta yene endimo-prak kake ikre na dutna yoko sika sinan, ye na angra morambuka kuno erekrukwa.
40010039	Te yomba ta yene kor-moragledi kongunmo ere wanmoran ana orkwa i pra taya enambuka. Ba yomba ta na pre ere kor-morambuka i kinde kondinan ye kor-morambuka tenaglka.
40010040	“Yomba ta ene di-inan, ye na diyungwa. Ana yomba ta na di-inan, ana ye na diendungo winga yombamo i diyungwa.
40010041	Te yomba ta God propetmo moglmedi pre di-inambuka ikra, ye God propetmo moglkwa pre ye propet topo inambere yeglmere kuno inambuka. Ana yomba ta ye yagl du-yene moglkwa i di-inan, ana ye yomba du-yene moglkwa pre, yagl du-yene topo inambere yeglmere, ye ama kuno inambuka.
40010042	Ana na ka kaima diteinga, yomba ta niglkor kap ta kogl yomba na mokonamugl wingwa kangino paikrukwa i suwarata tenan, ana ye na disaipel moglkwa pre, yombamo i topomo ta wau boglkrambuka.”
40011001	Yesus ye disaipelma wagle 12 kongun eraglmere ka dite kondo, ye dumo igle kindekondo, ana Galili taun tau yomba ka dipene ende bekete eragledi pre endongwa.
40011002	Jon kane yungu paimoglko Krais kongun ere umere i digo pirtre ana ye disaipelmo tau Yesus diporaglmedi diendungo eingwa.
40011003	Ana ye yegl krapogl dipirkwa, “Ene yomba ta unambe dingura ikra uno mo, manan no yomba ta unambuka pre suglmo moramne?”
40011004	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene ende ikine pi taragl pirkan erikwa i Jon diteiyo.
40011005	Ongumutno kin yeingwa yomba ye kanigwa te katno kinde orkwa yomba ye andigl ende eingwa. Ana kende kaglande singwa wu wakai eingwa, te kinano gidungwa ye ka pirkwa. Geglkwa andigl ukor eingo te kiuglgiunde yomba meglmara kamambuno wakai dipene ende teingwa.
40011006	Yomba ta na pre pirngi dingwa gugl sikrukwa i God eran ye gun yenaglkwa.”
40011007	Jon disaipelma ende ikine eingo ana Yesus yomba merkinde meglmara Jon pre yegl ditongwa, “Ene Jon moglmara makan waule suna eingwa i sragl taragl kanamnedi eindune? Ken buglo ta ir mange kuraura ere pangwa i kana pre einduno?
40011008	Yegl ta manan, ene sragl kanamnedi eindu? Yagl ta ekin nogl gagl moglmo? Tamanga, ekin nogl gaiglkwa yomba ye king yungumugl moglpai erikwa.
40011009	Yegl ta manan ana ene sragl kanamnedi pre endu? Propet ta kana pre eimo? I kaima, ba na ene yegl diteinga, ene kanigwa i propet mereyegl ta manga. Ye mogl-mitna endungwa.
40011010	Jon suwara pre God pepamo mina ka yegl beglko pangwa. God dungwa, “‘Na kakepna yomba di endimbo ene okuna yei tendre, konbaunan si akedu ende tenambuka.’
40011011	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, makandle yomba kugl yeingwa ye mina ta Jon Baptais imara ende pi kawa tekrikwa. Ba yomba ta heven kingdom moglkwa kangiye paikrukwa ye Jon imara ende pi kawa tenambuka.
40011012	Jon Baptais kamambuno di moglkwa enge igle mogl wu enge erme mangigl i, yomba heven kingdom dumo kor inamunedi kunda yombuglo ere kongunmo erikwa yomba, i akegidi meglkwa.
40011013	Ana propet wagle ya te Moses lomo dingwa yombamo ye Neno Kande kamo dinongugl ende, mogl wingo enge igle Jon plau dungwa.
40011014	Ana ene ka i pra piramnedi pirmbi, pra piryo. Ye Elaija unambedi meglkwa ikra Jon ungwa iwe.
40011015	Yomba ta ye kina panan kade ka i pra pirondo.
40011016	“Na yomba erme mogl wingwa i sraglwe dibogl dinagle? Ye gak kembra mereyegl kaiya mokna maket ere nemara dumo suna makaisi mogl ana aglendi imboriya ende meglkwa:
40011017	“‘No ene pre puming sitomgo, ana ene katno engrekrikwa, no yomba geglkwa mitno geglkwa giglange dumga, ba ene kai erekrikwa.’
40011018	Jon ungwa enge, ye nigl kaiya mokna tau nekre mawagl orko ana ye dingwa, ‘Spirit kinde ta ye mina suna moglkwa.’
40011019	Yomba Wam ye wu kaiya mokna ya wain nigl nongo ana yomba dingwa, ‘Yagl i kaniyo! Ye kaiya mokna ya wain depigl nendre ana ye takis ingwa yomba ya tandaglme erikwa yomba bogl akiye yene wanmeglkwa.’ Ba God nomanemo wakai ye embriye ormara i wu pene ongwa.”
40011020	Ana Yesus dumo kande tau pindre kimagl kanekane orkwa, ba yomba nomano yake tekrikwa yeglpre, dumo kande yomba ye ka giglendi ditongwa.
40011021	“Aya Korasin kamun nem, yumbun kande pana orkwa ene mina plau dinambuka! Ama Betsaida kamun nem ene mina akiye yumbun kande pana orkwa! Ene mina suna kimagl gaglebogl erikra i Taia ya te Saidon ye mina ta eriya daglma, ye tambre kana tandaglmeno pre kundugl gogl weraisi, yungum gamba mai indre, ana nomano yake tomnedi ombuno digo.
40011022	Ba na ene diteinga, enge kande mina God yomba yumbu sinambuka i Taia ya te Saidon yomba ye mitno pond gogl tendre, ene mitno kurita gorambuka.
40011023	Ana ene Kaperneam kamun nem, enene akepledi i-kamun mitna endinaglmo? Tamanga. Ene ake piyasi endimbi geglkwa dumo atne enaglkwa. Ene mina suna kimagl ounga i Sodom kamun ouna daglma, kamun i erme yei pango.
40011024	Ba na ene diteinga, enge kande mina God yomba yumbu sinambuka. Ene yumbun kinde kaima imbi ana Sodom yumbun ingwa ikra engraglkwa.”
40011025	Enge igle Yesus ka yegl dungwa, “Nina, ene heven ya te makandle Yaglkande motnga, na ene dembin si teinga. Taragl pirpogl singwa yomba ene kamambunon aketeke yeitendre, te gak kembra mere nomano pangwa yombamo i ene ombunodi tenga.
40011026	Owo, Nina, ene taragl i panambedi pitnga mere plau dungwa iwe.”
40011027	Yesus ka aglke yegl dungwa, “Na Nina taragl prapra nare kondungwa, yomba suwarata wam ira moglkwa i ta kanpogl sikrikwa. Nem keunde kangwa, ana yomba suwarata nem ira moglkwa i ta kankrikwa. Wam keunde kangwa, ana Wam ye yomba pinde yungwa i ombuno dungo ye nem kanigwa.
40011028	“Yomba ene kongun kande ere yumbun pond kake i-wanigwa, ene prapra ende na moglmara wiyo, ana na ene mogl ir sinaglkwa tenagliwo.
40011029	Ene na endina i kake indre ana wu na mina beke pirpogl siyo, na nomana ya mambunona winda dungwa pre, ene kuiyano nomano pokndi panan, ana mogl ir sinaglkwa inaglimiwo.
40011030	Na endi ene kombano mina kake tenaglka i kunambu orkwa, te na yumbun ta ene tenaglka i undungwa.”
40012001	Sabat yongwa enge Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl wit yaglkwa moglmara igle suna eingwa. Ana ye disaipelma wagle kindan gogl wit tau uro ana pogl mongo neingwa.
40012002	Ye yegl erikwa i Parisi wagle kandre Yesus diteingwa, “Kanno! Ene disaipelma ye Sabat enge nono lono mane dumara yegl erikwa.”
40012003	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene okuna Devit yombama bogl kindan gogl sragl erikwa i ene kere pirkrimo?
40012004	Ye God yungumo mina yungugl pindre, God pre bret yeitengwa i igo yombama bogl akiye neingwa. Ana bret iwe ye ninaglkwa paikrukwa. Pris keme ninaglkwa pamara ye i neingwa.
40012005	Mo ene Moses lomo mina beglkwa pangwa i kere kankrimo? God holi yungumo mina Sabat enge pris kongun erikwa i ta aglau erekrikwa.
40012006	Na ene yegl diteinga, mangigl i yomba ta moglkwa ye kande mogl-mitna ende God holi yungumo kande engre tongwa.
40012007	Ka ta yegl God pepamo mina beglko pangwa, ‘Na kombuglange gagl naraglkwa pre manga, na ene yomba mitno goraglmedi pirka.’ Tandaglme erekrikwa yomba ene dikinde yeikraglkwa.
40012008	Sraglpre Yomba Wam ye Sabat i nemyagl moglkwa.”
40012009	Ana Yesus kamun igle kondo endpi, ye yene makaino yungu ta yomara yungugl ongwa.
40012010	Ana igle yagl ta ongo kembra sungwa moglkwa. Yomba tau Yesus ta eran kandre ana ka-tange tenamnedi pre krapeglkwa, “Sabat enge yomba erewakai ere teiyo dingwa lo mina ta pamo?”
40012011	Ye di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene meglmara yomba ta sipsipmo suwarata moran, ana Sabat enge yange murmaugl atne i panan, ye boglo ere imenda endekrambo?
40012012	Yomba mogl-mitna ende sipsip engre teingwa. Ipre nono Sabat enge lo pamere mere yomba akepledi tenamga.”
40012013	Ana ye yagl i ditongwa, “Ene ongun duglo suwo.” Ye ongo duglo sungo ana wakai ere ongo koglo pamere yegl kokunkuno pangwa.
40012014	Ba Parisi wagle ye ende menda pindre ana Yesus sigoramnedi pre ka dikeglkwa.
40012015	Parisi wagle ka dingwa i Yesus pirtre, ana dumo igle kindekondo endongwa. Ana yomba merkinde kinde sungwa ye omara mokomugl eingo, ana ye kindeno erewakai ere tongwa.
40012016	Ana Yesus mambunona yomba tau ditembi pir dinaglmedi pre mane ditongwa.
40012017	Ye yegl orkwa i God kamo propet Aisaia ka pandum ta dungwa i paiyungwa:
40012018	“Kaniyo, i na konguna yomba, na ye morambedi pinde i kondiga. Ye pre suwara munduna pangwa, te ye wakai kaninga. Nana Spiritna di ye mina endinaglka, ana ye yomba makan koglkoglo mambuno du-wakai eraglmedi pre, dipendigl ende tenambuka.
40012019	Ye nongasi kaglkane ta erekrambuka, te konbauna ka kande ta dinan yomba pirkraglkwa.
40012020	Ken engre ta kunambu ere parkidi pangwa i ye ta simbuko dikrambuka, ana endi bauglo kembra orkwa i ye ta sigongokrambuka. Ye kongun wakai ere auro ipi du-wakai moraglkwa, yombuglo i-pene endinambuka.
40012021	Ana ye kangiye mina yomba makan koglkoglo pirngi dinaglkwa ana ye akepledi norambedi pre suglmo moraglkwa.”
40012022	Enge igle yomba tau eremogl yagl ta spirit kinde ye mina suna moglko, auro yu Yesus moglmara wingwa. Yagl iwe ongumuglo kin yei te dra aketongwa. Ana Yesus erewakai ere tongo, ye ka dindre ana pinedi kangwa.
40012023	Yesus yegl orko yomba merkinde akaindi meglkwa, ye i kandre alaglsi krapogl yegl dingwa, “Ye Devit wam moglum kana?”
40012024	Enge igle Parisi wagle ye ka i pirtre, yegl di ikine endingwa, “Ye spirit kinde wagle sendungwa, i ye Belsebul ye spirit kinde wagle yaglkandeno taragl yegl erambedi yombuglomo tongo yegl orkwa.”
40012025	Yomba nomano suna pirkwa i Yesus kan-kondo yegl ditongwa, “Makan bange tau yomba ye yene ikine ikine kogl kunda beglmbi dumo kamun wilekole enambuka. Te yungu ombuno suwarata ye yene ikine ikine kogl kunda beglmbi yungu togl ta yeikrambuka.
40012026	Yeglpre Satan eremogl Satan yene dimenda endinan, ye yene mina poim sungwa; okuwo ye yene sragl mere wakai morambe?
40012027	Na spirit kinde sibina endinga i Belsebul yombuglo tongo yegl ormiwo dingwa, ana ene yombano spirit kinde simenda endingwa, i ira akepledi yombuglo tongo sendim? Yeglpre, enene yombano ye kanno ene yumbu sinaglkwa.
40012028	Ba na God Spiritmo mina spirit kinde sendiga panan ana ene kanaglkwa, God kingdomo i ene meglmara wu plau dungwa.
40012029	“Ta ama yegl, yomba ta srambre ere yagl giglekui dungwa yungumo mina pi si-arusi bonamo inambe? Okuna kana yagl giglekui dungwa i kanesi pandigl, okuwo ye yaglmo i bonamo yungugl yongwa i wausi inambuka.
40012030	“Yomba ta na bogl moglkrambuka, ye na kundana ikine moglkwa, te yomba ta na konguna mina akepledi yomba imakai sikrambuka, ye yomba si perepere endungwa.
40012031	Ipre na ene diteinga, yomba tandaglmeno prapra ya te ka kinde dingwa i prapra God koko endinambuka. Ba Holi Spirit yomba ta kenaglmo sinaglkwa, God ye tandaglmeno i prapra ta koko ende tekrambuka.
40012032	Yomba ta eremogl Yomba Wam dikinde yenambuka, ye tandaglmemo God koko ende tenambuka. Ba yomba ta ye Holi Spirit kenaglmo sinambuka, ye tandaglmeno kinde i etne ya te okuwo imbo, ama akiye ta koko ende tekrambuka.”
40012033	Yesus ka yegl dungwa, “Endi wakai ta panambuka i mongomo wakai keunde korambuka. Te endi kinde ta panambuka i mongomo kinde korambuka. Yomba ende mongomo i kandre pandigl ye pirkwa, endi kinde mo wakai i ye kanpogl singwa.
40012034	Ene yomba toki kinde nangiglma meglkwa, ene mambuno kinde beglkwa pre ka wakai dikrikwa. Yomba nomanemo suna taragl kinde kausi pamere mere, i dra mina dimenda endungwa.
40012035	Yomba wakai ye nomanemo mina suna taragl wakai kausi pangwa pre ye embriye wakai keme erikwa. Te yomba kinde ye nomanemo mina taragl kinde kausi pamere mere embriye kinde erikwa.
40012036	Ba na ene i diteinga, God yomba prapra ka-tange tenambuka enge baglkwa, enge igle yomba ka kinde kanekane dimere yumbu sinambuka.
40012037	Enene kanno mina, God ene ka-tange te, ene yomba du-wakai we dinambuka. Te enene kanno mina, God ene yomba kinde we dinambuka.”
40012038	Ana lo beke teingwa yomba tau ya te Parisi tau ye Yesus diteingwa, “Ka beke notnga yagle, ene kimagl ta etn no kanamnedi punga.”
40012039	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ambu enge erme meglkwa i ene taragl kinde erikwa yomba, ene God nomano kaima tekrikwa yomba. Na kimagl ta erimbo kanamnedi pre dimo? Ba na ta erekraglka. Tamanga. Propet Jona mina kimagl plau dungwa i keme ene kanaglkwa.
40012040	Jona fis kande dane mina suna ande enge suwota, te enduwer enge suwota pangwa. Yegl mere Yomba Wam ye makan atne ande enge suwota, te enduwer enge suwota panambuka.
40012041	God yomba ka-tange tenambuka enge, Niniwe yomba ye andigl mogl yagl ambu enge etne meglkwa i ye mambunono kinde dipene ende enaglkwa. Sraglpre, Niniwe yomba ye Jona kamambuno dipene ende tongo pirtre, nomano yake teingwa. Ana ene piryo. Yomba ta mangigl ya moglkwa, ye kande mogl-mitna ende Jona tongwa.
40012042	Te God yomba ka-tange tenambuka enge, Ambu Kuwin Makan Yoglmbo kra moglkwa ye andigl mogl yomba etne meglkwa i mambunono kinde ditenambuka. Ye King Solomon nomane pai pogl sungwa kamo piragledi pre ye makan yoglmbo uglomugl kondo eglke kuri mogl ungwa. Ana ene piryo. Yomba ta erme mangigl ya moglkwa, ye kande mogl-mitna ende King Solomon tongwa.
40012043	“Spirit kinde yagl ta mina ende menda unambuka enge, ye endpi dumo kugla dumara ta mogl ir sinambuka ba dumo i ta doko kan ikrukwa.
40012044	Yene yegl dinambuka, ‘Na ende ikine yungu okuna kondimara igle enaglka.’ Yegl dindre pi kangwa yunguna i yoko yongo, wiglki kuro ende ake wakai kaima ere endigo yongwa.
40012045	Ana ye ende ikine pi spirit kinde 7 yene mereyegl manga, ye kinde kaima meglkwa auro ipi yungu yungugl igle suna ongo meglkwa. Ana yombamo i okuna kurita wu kinde ongwa ba erme ye wu kinde kaima enambuka. Embriye yeglmere, yomba kinde geke beglkwa ye enge etne meglmara i plaudi panambuka.”
40012046	Yesus yomba ka dite moglko, mam ya angiglma wagle ye wu mendakra andigl mogl, ka ditenamnedi pre sugl mogl krapeglkwa.
40012047	Ana yomba meglkwa ikra suwarata di Yesus tongwa, “Kanno! Man ya angitnma wagle ene ka ditena pre wingwa mendakra andigl sugl meglkwa.”
40012048	Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Na mana irane? Te na angrima irane?”
40012049	Yegl dindre ongo buglosi yene disaipelma meglmara ende ana dungwa, “Kaniyo, magl meglkwa iwe, na mana ya te na angrima wagle.
40012050	Yomba ta na Nina heven suna moglkwa, ye prumere pinande orkwa yomba i ye na angra ya na ambara ya te na mana meglkwa.”
40013001	Ande enge suwara igle, Yesus yungu i kondo pandigl ende menda pi, nigl numbun bina amedi moglkwa.
40013002	Moglko yagl ambu merkinde wu ye moglmara makaisi winambo dingwa pre, ye pi bot mina suna amedi moglko, ana yagl ambu ye nigle bina andigl meglkwa.
40013003	Ana yegl eriko, Yesus ka mere di simbogl yegl dungwa, “Yomba ta ye mokna mongo sunduraglendi kongunmo mina ongwa.
40013004	Ana ye sundugl ongo, mongo tau yange konbauna sungwa, ana kua undre i ne kondingwa.
40013005	Ana mongo tau yange kombuglo moglmara singwa, igle makan tembe kurita yongwa pre tambre kana wisungwa.
40013006	Ana ande ende egli ungwa enge, mokna ande de yamuno ana ye gigle geglkwa, sraglpre ye duglono ende atne pi kuno erekrukwa pre ana ye geglkwa.
40013007	Ana mongo tau yange kugl kangigle yaglmara suna sungwa. Igle pare wisi egli ungo, ana kugl kinde i bogl wu egli pi, ana i bre atne endungwa.
40013008	Ana mongo tau yange makan burkono dumara sungwa, i ana mongo merkinde koglkwa; endiye tau mongo 100 koglkwa, tau 60 koglkwa, te tau 30 koglkwa.
40013009	Ana yomba ta kina panan, ka i pro do.”
40013010	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ye moglmara wu krapoglte yegl dingwa, “Ene sraglpre ka di simbogl yomba ditene?”
40013011	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Heven kingdom kamambuno teke pangwa i God ombunodi ene tekondungwa. Ba yomba tau i ta tekrukwa.
40013012	Te yomba taragl ta ake moglkwa pre ana God taragl tau ama akiye tenan, ana ye taragl merkinde pai tenambuka. Ba yomba taragl i ta ake moglkrambuka, ana ye kurita ake moglkwa, i God i-eglke endinambuka.
40013013	Mambuno yeglpre na ka di simbogl diteinga: “Ye kanim imba, ye kanpogl sikrikwa, te ye ka pirm imba, pir kuno erekrikwa.
40013014	I pre propet Aisaia ka okuna dungwa, i ye mina plau dungwa: “‘Yomba i ka aglke aglke piraglkwa, ba mambunomo kiuraglkwa, ye aglke aglke kanaglkwa, ba kanpogl sikraglkwa.
40013015	Yomba i nomano giglendi kondungwa, te kinano gidi kondungwa, te ongumutno kugl kondungwa. Aglau eran ye ongumutno kanimbi, ye kinano ka pirmbi, te nomano mina ka mem pirpogl simbi, ana ye kan akete na mina endinaglkwa, ana na ye erewakai ere tenaglka.’
40013016	Ba ene ongumutno taragl kanigwa, te kinano ka pirkwa, ana i pre God eran ene gun yenaglkwa.
40013017	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, propet wagle ya te God yombamo du-yene merkinde erme ene taragl kanigwa i ye okuna kanamnedi ere wingwa, ba ye ta kankrikwa. Te ene ka pirkwa, i ye piramnedi ere wingwa ba ta pirkrikwa.
40013018	“Ana mokna mongo sindiglkwa ka di simbogl diga pirkura i mambunomo diteimbo pirpogl sinaglkwa.
40013019	Yomba heven kingdom kamambuno i diga pirkwa, ba pirpogl sikrimbi ana ye mokna mongo yange konbauna bange sungwa yeglmere. Ana Satan undre mokna mongo yange nomano mina suna yongwa ikra ake towasi ikorugl endungwa.
40013020	Te mokna mongo tau yange makan kombuglo moglmara sungwa, i yomba ta kamambuno digo pir indre oglandi gun yongwa yeglmere.
40013021	Ba ye ka i nomano mina suna kaima pikrukwa pre, enge sungunagle keme ye mina yongwa. Ana God kamo pre kunda ya yumbun kande ungwa enge ana ye oglandi yange singwa.
40013022	Te mongo tau yange kugl kangigle ormara sungwa, i yomba ta kamambuno prukwa, ba ye manginagle moglpai erambuka ya te bona gana sinambuka taragl i nomanemo kande pangwa, yeglpre kamambuno prukwa i si-atne endungo ye mongo koglkrukwa.
40013023	Ba mongo tau yange makan burkono dumara sungwa i yegl, yomba ta ye kamambuno pirtre ana pirpogl sinaglkwa. Ye mongo keglkwa, tau mina mongo 100 korambuka te tau 60 te tau 30, yegl di kogl enaglkwa.”
40013024	Yesus ka ta ama di simbogl yegl ditongwa, “Heven kingdom i yomba ta mokna mongo wakai ipi kongunmo mina sundugl ongwa yeglmere.
40013025	Ba enduwer suna yomba uglpai kondigo, ye kundamo ikine undre, kugl kinde mongo ipi wit yaglmara suna sundugl kondo ana teke endongwa.
40013026	Ana wit wisi mongo koragledi orko, ye kanigo kugl kinde ama akiye bogl egli ungwa.
40013027	“Ana kongunmo yomba undre kongun nemyagl moglmara yegl diteingwa, ‘Yagl kande, no punga ene wit mongo wakai keunde kongun mina sundugl engra. Ba kugl kinde sraglmere ere wu suna pare pame?’
40013028	“Ye ditongwa, ‘I kunda ikine ta sunduglko parkwa.’ “Yegl dungo ana kongun yomba dingwa, ‘Ene prawedi pirmin no pi puro endinamno mo?’
40013029	“Ba ye yegl ditongwa, ‘Taman, ene kugl kinde i puro endinamnedi ere kawa tenan wit ama akiye puro ende dinaglkwa.
40013030	Ye pra suwo-akiye pai embir mongo uraglkwa enge mangigl eran ana uraglkwa yomba yegl ditenaglka. Okuna kana ene pi kugl kinde kan puro gagltenge eraglkwa pre koglo sinaglkwa. Ana okuwo wit mongo uro makaisi ipi na kaiya moknana yungu yungugl yenaglkwa.’”
40013031	Ana Yesus ka ta di simbogl yegl ditongwa, “Heven kingdom i mastet mongo mereyegl, yomba ta mastet mongo indre ana ye kongunmo mina suna yaglkwa.
40013032	Mokna mongo tau pare wimara suna i mastet mongo kembra kinde kaima yongwa, ba ye pare pond kaima pai mokna tau engre wu ende mereyegl ongo, ana kua wu yongagle mina yunguno yeingwa.”
40013033	Yesus ka ta ama dibogl yegl ditongwa, “Heven kingdom i yis mereyegl. Ambu ta yis tau indre ana plawa bogl dis mina sikugl ende nokungo ana ake bei puro dungwa.”
40013034	Yesus yomba merkinde meglmara taragl prapra ka di simbogl dungwa i ka mongo kaima ta ditekrukwa. Ye ka di simbogl keunde ditongwa.
40013035	Yegl orkwa i propet ta ka yegl dungo pangwa i mongo kaima paiyungwa. Ana propet i ka yegl dungwa: “Na ka di simbogl keme ditenaglka, na dumo makan plau dungwa enge ime taragl kanekane tau teke pai ungwa i dinaglka.”
40013036	Ana Yesus yomba merkinde kindekondo ende yungugl ongo, ana disaipelma wagle ye moglmara undre yegl dingwa, “Ene kongun mina suna kugl kinde pre ka dibogl dinga ikra mambunomo dinoro.”
40013037	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta mokna mongo wakai sunduglkwa, iwe Yomba Wam.
40013038	Te kongun ereyaglkwa dumo iwe makan koglkoglo. Te mokna mongo wakai iwe heven kingdom inaglkwa yomba. Te kugl kinde iwe, yomba kinde Satan nangiglma.
40013039	Te kunda ikine ta kugl kinde mongo sunduglkwa, iwe Satan. Te mokna simakai sinaglkwa enge iwe, dumo makan dundinambuka enge. Te mokna si imakai sinaglkwa yomba iwe angelo.
40013040	“Te kugl kinde puro ende donga mina suna ende gagltenge erikwa yeglmere, ana enge kande mina kuno yegl plau dinambuka.
40013041	Yomba Wam angelomo diendinan, ye pi God kingdomo mina yombamo mambuno kinde kanekane erikwa ya, te taragl kinde kanekane erimbi yomba tandaglme eraglkwa, angelo imenda endinaglkwa.
40013042	Ana donga aimande de bauglo ere pamara i ye piyasi suna endimbi, igle ana kai kaglkane ere singino gikir ere moraglkwa.
40013043	Te du-yene meglkwa yomba ye Neno kingdom mina sunakra ande mereyegl ambuglangesi moraglkwa. Yomba ta ye kina panan ka i pra pirondo.
40013044	“Heven kingdom i minge moni mereyegl kongun ere yaglmara suna teke yeingwa yeglmere. Ana yagl ta kan indre, ye aglke kordagl simbi dungwa. Yegl ere ye gun pond yei, ana pi taraglmo prapra yomba tendre topo bogl i-kondo, ana ende ikine pi makan i topo orkwa.
40013045	“Ama ta yegl, heven kingdom i yagl ta bis wakai-yene pre dokungwa yeglmere.
40013046	Ana ye bis wakai-yene topo kande borambuka ta kandre, ye endpi taraglmo prapra topo bogl i-kondo, ana pi bis ikra topo orkwa.
40013047	“Ta ama yegl, heven kingdom i fis singwa gagl yeglmere, yomba tau gatno indre piyasi nigl numbun moglmara ende fis kanekane singwa.
40013048	Ana fis gagl i kau sungo fis singwa yomba ikra gundo i-bina eingwa. Pindre ana amedi mogl fis yumbusi, wakai kan i basket gre, kinde kan piyasi kinde kondingwa.
40013049	Enge kande makandle plau dinambuka i kuno yegl. Angelo ende menda undre, ana yomba kinde ye yomba du-yene meglmara pukamugl meglkwa i pinde i-eglke ende,
40013050	ana piyasi donga bauglo mina suna endimbi, igle ye ende de kai kaglkane ere singino gikir ere moraglkwa.”
40013051	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene ka i prapra mambunomo pirmo?” Ye di ikine ende dingwa, “Owo.”
40013052	Ana ye yegl ditongwa, “Yeglpre ana lo beke teingwa yomba ye heven kingdom ka i okuna mambuno ere beke pir kondimbi, ye yungu nemyagl mereyegl mogl, yungu kiule taragl ake-nongwa yomara kor ya te goglo akiye imenda ungwa.”
40013053	Yesus ka merkinde di simbogl dungwa i pra dundungo, ye kamun igle kondo endongwa.
40013054	Ye ende ikine yene makanmo bre mina undre, makai yungu yomara igle yomba ka beke tongo pirtre, ana ye kundugl di alagl sindre ana ye krapeglkwa, “Yagl i pirpogl sungwa ya te kimagl orkwa yombuglo i aglokra beke yum manda?
40013055	Yomba i kamda wam moglkwa. Ye mam kangiye Maria, te angiglma wagle, Jems, Josep, Saimon te Judas.
40013056	Ye ambaglma wagle prapra nono bogl akiye meglkwa. Ye taragl i prapra aglokra yum manda?”
40013057	Ana ye deno kumbruko pir kinde yei teingwa. Ba Yesus ditongwa, “Propet ta kamun bange bange enan ye pra pirmitna ende tenaglkwa, ba yene kamunmo bre ya kei pamara i ta kangiye paikrambuka.”
40013058	Ana yomba ye pirngino paikrukwa, ipre ye dumo igle kimagl merkinde ta erekrukwa.
40014001	Herot, Galili makan gavman moglkwa enge Yesus kamo digo ye pirtre,
40014002	ana ye kongunmo yomba ditongwa, “Jon Baptais kaima goglkwa ikra andigl ukor ongwa, yeglpre, yombuglomo kaneta paitongo kimagl kanekane orkwa.”
40014003	Herot eremogl Jon akegidi mogl kanesi ipi kane yungu endungwa. Sraglpre yene angigle Pilip embiye Herodias pre munduwo pango orkwa.
40014004	Sraglpre okuna Jon ka yegl ditongwa, “Ene ambu wike ina etnga i lo paikrumere etnga.”
40014005	Ye eremogl Jon sigoragledi prukwa, ba ye yomba kundutno goglkwa, sraglpre, Jon propet ta moglme dingwa.
40014006	Herot mam kugl yongwa engemo yongo ana yomba Herot bogl makaisi meglkwa. Herodias ambuglo ye kagle engre tongo, Herot wakai yene kandre munduwo argan orkwa.
40014007	Ye ka dipandigl ambai tongwa, “Na ka kaima yene digi, ene taragl ta pre dinatnga, taragl i pra ene tenaglka.”
40014008	Ana ambai mam eremogl ambuglo kina si endungo ye pi ka yegl dungwa, “Etne keunde Jon Baptais bre gare plet mina tembe yei iyu magl ya naro.”
40014009	Yegl dungo king Herot i pirtre munduwo kinde orkwa, ba ye yombamo meglmara mambro mina digi digra wedi pre ana angai gogl dinagledi ambai dumere mere kimbirnem yegl eriyo diendungwa.
40014010	Ana ye pi Jon kane yungu suna moglmara nungo garsire
40014011	ana ye bre plet mina tembe yei, ana kimbirnem ipi ambai teingo ana ambai ipi mam tongwa.
40014012	Ana Jon disaipelma wagle wu nangiye kake ipi maugl si pandigl, ana ye pi Yesus diteingwa.
40014013	Ana Yesus prukwa Jon sigeglme digo, dumo i kindekondo ye yene bot indre ende makan waule ongwa. Ana yomba ye ende omedigo pirtre, ye tauno tau kondo makandle ye omara eingwa.
40014014	Yesus bot mina ende atne wu, ana yomba merkinde meglkwa kandre, ye mitno gogl ana yomba kindeno erewakai ere tongwa.
40014015	Ana pokndungo disaipelma wagle ye moglmara wu yegl dingwa, “Kamun igle makan waule kra ande bena orkwa. Ene yomba prapra diendo, ye ende yungu epigl pi ana yene kaiya moknano topo eraglkwa.”
40014016	Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ye ta ende enaglkwa paikrukwa. Enene taragl ninaglkwa ta indre ye teiyo.”
40014017	Ye di ikine endingwa, “No taragl merkinde ta yeikrukwa, bret 5 yongo te fis suwo yongwa.”
40014018	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Yu na moglmara ya wiyo.”
40014019	Ana ye dungo yomba kugl wagle amedi meglko, Yesus bret 5 ya te fis suwo indre kan mitna heven ende God diwakai yeite ana bret bukondi disaipelma wagle tongo ye indre yumbusi yomba teingwa.
40014020	Ye prapra neingwa kuno orko ana ikine yoko yongwa. Disaipelma wagle gande imakaisi gagl basket 12 gre kau singwa.
40014021	Ana yomba neingwa yagl keunde kerikwa 5,000 orkwa, ba ambu ya gak ta kerekrikwa.
40014022	Yesus tambre kana disaipelma wagle diendungo ende bot mina suna pindre okuna kana ende nigl mongo koglo imbo enapre eingo ana Yesus yene yomba prapra di perepere ende moglkwa.
40014023	Ana yomba prapra endpi kondigo, yene mundu makan muglo kamange era pre ende egli ongwa. Yene mundu moglko mim pangwa.
40014024	Ana enge igle bot ende nigle miniye suna ongo, ana ye enaglmara ir pond mange ana nigl pembigl di wu bot sungwa.
40014025	Ana kamun tange ungo, Yesus ye nigl bolamugl engre pi disaipelma wagle eimara plau dungwa.
40014026	Ana ye nigl bolamugl konbauna ongo disaipelma wagle ye kandre, kundugl pond gogl kaglkane ere ana ye dingwa, “I gigl ta!”
40014027	Ba Yesus oglandi ye ditongwa, “Ene nomano gigle dinano. I na winga. Ene kundugl goglkriyo.”
40014028	Ana Pita di ikine ende tongwa, “Yaglkande, ene kaima unga panan, ana ene dimin na nigl bolamugl engre unara i unaglka.”
40014029	Yesus ditongwa, “Ana wo!” Dungo Pita bot kondo ende atne wu nigl bolamugl Yesus umara ongwa.
40014030	Ba ye pindre kangwa ir kande ungo kundugl gogl, ana ye mambuno bogl ende nigl atne pindre kaglkane orkwa, “Yaglkande, na akepledo!”
40014031	Yesus oglandi yene ongo duglosi Pita ongo ake i-mitna ende ana yegl dungwa, “Ene pirngi dinga kembra pangwa ene sraglpre noman suwo yene?”
40014032	Ana ye akiye ende bot mina suna embriko ir bu yongwa.
40014033	Ana bot mina disaipelma wagle ye yange mangidi dembiye karaugl ere te yegl dingwa, “Kaima yene ene God Wam motnga.”
40014034	Ye niglmong siprak si ende Genesaret kamun wingwa enge,
40014035	ana igle makan nem wagle Yesus ongo kandre, ka di dumo koglkoglo endigo, yomba pirtre kinde sungwa yomba prapra auro iyu Yesus moglmara wingwa.
40014036	Ana ye eremogl Yesus diteingwa, “Ene kan winge etn, kinde sungwa yomba ye ene gatn suna olto punduno akenaglkwa.” Ana prapra Yesus gaglmo akingwa mere kindeno argan orkwa.
40015001	Enge igle Parisi wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba tau ye Jerusalem kindekondo ende Yesus moglmara undre ana krapogl teingwa,
40015002	“Sraglpre ene disaipelma wagle nono kowano awano ka kindine di norikwa i sendime? Ye komnaiye kana onguno nigl koglkre kaiya mokna neingwa!”
40015003	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene sraglpre God lomo sende ana enene okuna mambunono akegidi meglme?
40015004	God yegl dungwa, ‘Ene nen ya man pirmitna endinatniwo.’ Ana, ‘Yomba ta ye nem mo mam mangagl sinan, ye pra gorambuka.’
40015005	Ba ene beke teingwa, yomba ta ye taragl paitongwa, i nem ya mam akepledi tenambuka prukwa. Ba ye ditongwa, ‘I God taraglmo yome dungwa.’
40015006	Ye nem akewakai ere tenambuka pre pirkrukwa. Mambuno yegl mina ene God dumere erekrikwa. Enene kowano awano beke teimere i erikwa.
40015007	Ene kakimbi yomba! Aisaia ka propet dungwa i ene pre kaima mendigl pandigl dungwa:
40015008	“‘Yaglambu magl i ka drano mina keunde God wakai we dingwa, ba ye nomano suna ya poglodi pirkwa i eglkekuri kaima yongwa.
40015009	Ye na dembina karaugl yoko erikwa. Sraglpre, ye yomba ka kindine bekingwa i keme yomba ditendre ana i God kamo we dingwa.’”
40015010	Ana Yesus yomba merkinde aglendi moglmara ende, ana ditongwa, “Kinano yei ana pirpogl siyo.
40015011	Taragl drano mina nenguro erikwa, i yomba ta ere sideglmbi yeikrukwa. Ba taragl drano mina ende menda ungwa i yomba ere sideglmbi yongwa.”
40015012	Ana okuwo disaipelma wagle ye moglmara undre ana krapeglkwa, “Ene pitn Parisi wagle ka dinga i pirtre munduno kinde ormedi pitno?”
40015013	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Endi kugl-kan Nina heven suna moglkwa ye ta yaglkrukwa, i duglomo bogl puro endinambuka.
40015014	Ene Parisi wagle pre ningadi pirkre kanwinge eriyo, ye ongumutno kin yongwa yombamo. Ana ongumuglo kin yongwa ye ongumuglo kin yongwa yomba ta konbauna okuna yeitenan, ana ye suwo-akiye yange maugl mina ende atne enambrika.”
40015015	Ba Pita di ikine endungwa, “Ka di simbogl dinga i mambuno dipoglsi noro?”
40015016	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene ama akiye pirpogl sikrimo?
40015017	Ene i pirkan erekrimo? Taragl prapra yomba drano mina nenguro erikwa, i ende deno biglke mina suna ongo ye dete murmaugl atne endingwa.
40015018	Ba taragl drano mina di menda endingwa, i nomano suna ende menda ungwa. Ana i yomba ere sideglmbi yongwa.
40015019	Ana nomano kinde suna ende menda wu yomba erekinde orkwa, i mambuno yegl. Yomba sigeglkwa ya, yagl ambu kunogl gundingwa ya yagl ambu bogl ikre gua kakingwa ya, kunogl gogl neingwa ya, kakimbi dingwa ya, ana ka kinde kanekane di yomba ta teingwa.
40015020	Taragl i yomba ere sideglmbi yongwa. Ba onguno nigl koglkre kaiya mokna neingwa, i yomba ta sideglmbi yeikrukwa.”
40015021	Ana Yesus kamun i kindekondo endpi Taia ya Saidon dumo kande mangigl ongwa.
40015022	Ana Kena ambu ta kamun igle moglkwa, ye Yesus moglmara undre kaglkane ere dungwa, “Yaglkande, Devit Wam, na mitna goglo. Spirit kinde ta na ambura mina suna mogl paimoglko, ye wu kinde kaima ongwa.”
40015023	Ba Yesus ka ta di ikine ende ambumo i tekrukwa. Ana disaipelma wagle ye moglmara undre yegl diteingwa, “Ambu i agle dindre nono umunara mokonomugl ungwa, ene ambu i diendimin ende enano.”
40015024	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “God na di endungwa i sipsip wau beglkwa, Israel yomba ye pre suwara.”
40015025	Ba ambu i Yesus moglmara magl wu yange goglko bondugl tendre ana dungwa, “Yaglkande, na akepledo.”
40015026	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Nono gak kembra kaiya moknano indre piyasi agl meglmara endinamga kuno erekrukwa.”
40015027	Ana ambumo dungwa, “Yaglkande, ene ka kaima dinga. Ba agl ye neno kaiya mokna neingo surmane yange bogl atnekra sungwa i ye neingwa.”
40015028	Yesus di ikine ende ambumo i tongwa, “Ambu ene pirngi dinga kande kaima pangwa. Ene taragl mundun pango krapotnga mere i ere tenambuka.” Ana enge i keunde ambuno i ambuglo argan orko wakai moglkwa.
40015029	Yesus dumo igle kindekondo endpi Galili niglmong bina ongwa. Ye makan muglo ta ende egli pindre ana igle amedungwa.
40015030	Ana yomba merkinde Yesus moglmara wingwa. Ye katno kinde sungwa ya, ongumutno kin yongwa ya, mau singwa ya, du drano aketongwa ya, te kinde kanekane sungwa merkinde tau ama auro iyu Yesus moglmara kagle mina endigo meglko ana ye erewakai eretongwa.
40015031	Ana yomba drano aketongwa ye ka digo, te mau singwa wakai eriko, te katno kinde orkwa ye konbauna endeingo, ana ongumutno kin yongwa ye pinedi kanigwa. Ana yomba i kandre alaglsi Israel yomba ye Godno dembiye siteingwa.
