40027044	Ana kunogl gogl nembrika yaglmo suwo-akiye Yesus bogl endi-prak mina singo pambrika. Yaglmo suwo i ama dimere kuno yegl di Yesus tembrika.
40027045	Ande kuiya 12 klok orko, makan koglkoglo mim waidi were kondungo pai endpi ande kuiya 3 klok orkwa.
40027046	Ana 3 klok mina, Yesus kai kaglkane binan bogl ere yegl dungwa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” I mambuno yegl, “Na Godna, na Godna, sraglpre ene na kinde kondine?”
40027047	Yomba tau magl igle andigl meglkwa ye ka dungwa i pirtre ye dingwa, “Ye Elaija pre agle dungwa.”
40027048	Ana ye meglmara suwarata erme keunde mukundi pi ana giyagin indre, wain geu orkwa kurita simbai indre, buglo muglo mina pandigl ana Yesus bindi ninambedi pre tongwa.
40027049	Ba yomba tau yegl dingwa, “Kanwinge eriyo, Elaija wu ye ere-inambuka mo ere-ikrambuka, i nono sugl mogl kanamna.”
40027050	Ana Yesus aglke kordagl kaglkane pond indre, munduwo iyenda endungo ana spiritmo endongo ye goglkwa.
40027051	Ana engemo igle keunde God holi yungu yungugl gagl alap kugl beglkwa mitna imbo yei sunawom si-aragladi wu koglkoglo ongwa. Te makan pinga dungo ana kombuglo sibladi wu koglkoglo eingwa.
40027052	Kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara bukondi audungo ana God yombamo holi merkinde okuna geglkwa ye nangino bogl andigl ukor eingwa.
40027053	Ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara mina ende menda wingo ana okuwo Yesus anduglko, ye prapra ende God dumomo kande Jerusalem suna eingo ana yomba merkinde ye kanigwa.
40027054	Ana kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle ta ya te kimbirnem tau ye bogl akiye Yesus suglmo meglkwa ana imem ungo, te taragl tau prapra orkwa i kandre ana ye kundugl gogl dingwa, “Kaima yene, ye God Wam moglkwa!”
40027055	Igle ambu merkinde Galili ye Yesus omara mokomugl pindre ana Yesus taragl doknan ye akepledi tenamnedi wingwa. Ana ye kurita eglke dagl mogl kanmeglkwa.
40027056	Ye meglmara suna i Makdala kamun mam Maria ya te Jems ya Josep mano Maria, te ta Sebedi wam suwo mano.
40027057	Kamun pokndungo, yagl ta di minge mere paitongwa Arimatia kamun nem, ye ungwa. Ye kangiye Josep, ana ye okuna ama Yesus disaipelma ta moglkwa.
40027058	Ye Pailat moglmara pindre ana Yesus nangiye pre krapoglko ana Pailat prawedi nangiye Josep teiyo dungwa.
40027059	Yeglpre Josep nangiye indre ana gagl alap kor ta were tongwa.
40027060	Ana Josep eremogl Yesus nangiye ipi ye yene kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara kor ta waugl yomara sunakra yongwa. Ana ye kombuglo kande ta egla pagl ipi maugl dra si pere dungwa.
40027061	Maria Makdala kamun mam ya te Maria ta ye igle tau eglke dagl amedi mogl kan kombuglo dra ende miurka.
40027062	Sabat pre akekun eraglkwa engemo i magl ungo ana pris kande wagle ya Parisi wagle Pailat moglmara pindre,
40027063	ana yegl dingwa, “Yagl kande, no ka ta pir mounga. Ye kakimbi dungwa yagle, ye kor-moglkwa enge yegl dungwa, ‘Na ande enge suwota yenan aglke andigl ukor enaglka.’
40027064	Yeglpre ene dimin ye pandiglmara pra sugl wakai mogl-embi, ande enge suwota erano. Aglau eran yene disaipelma wagle wu ye nangiye kunogl indre ana yomba kakimbi ditenaglkwa. Ye andigl ukor omiwo dimbi ana okuwo kakimbi dinaglkwa i wu kande kaima pi ana komuno dungwa i engrambuka.”
40027065	Ana Pailat ye ditongwa, “Kimbirnem tau imbi, ye pindre ana kombuglo dra pandiglmara ene pirmere ere sugl wakai yene molondo.”
40027066	Ana ye pindre pandiglmara kombuglo dra mina bolamugl ye diu ta ere pandigl ana kimbirnem diendingo kombuglo dra sugl meglkwa.
40028001	Sabat dundungo, Sande tangina kinde kana, Maria Makdala kamun mam ya te Maria ta ye Yesus kombuglo dra mina pandiglmara kanambugledi embrika.
40028002	Ana oglandi imem giglendi ungo ana Yaglkande angelomo heven kondo ende atne wu, kombuglo dra mina kombuglo sigetdi pandiglkwa i berandi ikorugl ende ana bolamugl amedi moglkwa.
40028003	Ye gumadra kamun potndumere yegl ambuglange sungwa. Te gaglmo suna olto kamun kua mere kruwo mundu orkwa.
40028004	Ana kimbirnem sugl meglkwa yomba ye kunduglmo gogl ye onguno katno pur-dungo ana ye yangesi yomba geglkwa mereyegl ere paingwa.
40028005	Ba angelo ambu suwo i ditongwa, “Ene kundugl goglkriro. Na kaninga ene Yesus pre doko umbrika, ye endi-prak mina singura.
40028006	Ye yawagle ta pai moglkrukwa. Yene okuna dumere kra kaima orkwa. Ye andigl ukor ongwa. Ene wu ye pandiglmara dumo kaniro.
40028007	Erme ene oglandi pi ana ye disaipelma wagle diteiro: ‘Ye goglkura, erme andigl ende ukor ongwa. Ana erme ye ene pre okuna yeite ende Galili kamun ongwa. Igle ene ye kanaglkwa.’ Na ka erme ene diteinga.”
40028008	Yeglpre ambu suwo oglandi kombuglo dra pandiglmara kindekondo, kundugl gogltre, te ama ye gun pond kaima yei ana yene disaipelma wagle ditenambugledi mukundi embrika.
40028009	Ana Yesus oglandi ye bogl tengigl yengo ana dungwa, “Nomano pokndi ene mina panano.” Ana ye moglmara ambumo suwo wu kagle akindre ana yange mangidi goglkuno bondugl dembiye karaugl ere tembrika.
40028010	Ana Yesus, ambu suwo ditongwa, “Kundugl goglkriro. Ene pindre na angrima wagle ditembir ye ende Galili kamun pindre ana igle ye na kanaglkwa.”
40028011	Ambu suwo konbauna endpi miurko ana kimbirnem tau kombuglo dra sugl meglkwa ende ikine siti pindre ana taragl prapra okuna kana plau dungwa ikra pris kande wagle diteingwa.
40028012	Ana pris wagle ya te ende okuna eingwa yomba ye wu suwara pindre ana ye ta eraglmere ka ta dikogl pandigl, ye moni pond gagl gre kimbirnem tendre,
40028013	ye diteingwa, “Ene yegl dinaglkwa, ‘No enduwer ugl du pai moungo yene disaipelma wagle enduwer undre ana ye nangiye kunogl yendeingwa.’
40028014	Ana gavana ye ka i ta piran, no ye bogl ka di dem munduwo siyau dumuno ene yumbun ta ikraglkwa.”
40028015	Yeglpre kimbirnem moni indre ana ye yegl eriyo ditemere erikwa. Ana ka boglo i Juda yomba mina suna waidi pi kuno orko, erme i ama di meglkwa.
40028016	Ana disaipelma wagle 11 ende Galili kamun muglo suna eingwa. Igle Yesus okuna piyo dumara pre ye eingwa.
40028017	Ye Yesus kandre, goglkuno bondugl mangidi, dembiye karaugl ere teingwa. Ba tau ye nomano suwo yeingwa.
40028018	Ana Yesus ye meglmara magl undre ditongwa, “God yombuglomo heven suna ya makandle i prapra na nare kondungwa.
40028019	Yeglpre ene ende makan koglkoglo pi ana erimbi yomba prapra na disaipelna eraglkwa. Ana Nem ya Wam te Holi Spirit ye kangiye mina baptais ere teiyo.
40028020	Na taragl prapra ene dite kondingra, i ene beke tembi yomba pir pinande eraglkwa. Ana kaima yene, na ene bogl akiye engenge mogl-eimbo enge i dundinambuka.”
41001001	God Wam Yesus Krais pre, kamambuno wakai i mambuno boglkwa.
41001002	Propet Aisaia ka muno yegl boglkwa: “God dungwa, Na kanna kep yomba diendimbo ene okuna yeite, ene konbaunan akekun eretenambuka.”
41001003	“Makan waule suna yomba ta wiyau endungwa, ‘Yaglkande pre konbaunamo akekun eriyo. Ye unambuka pre konbo si-ake du endiyo.’”
41001004	Ana yeglpre, Jon Baptais makan waule unongugl pi ye yomba dipene ende tongwa, “Ene nomano yake tendre baptais erimbi, God ene tandaglmeno koko ende tenambuka.”
41001005	Ana Judia kamun yomba mundu-yene yeingo te Jerusalem dumo kande yomba prapra Jon kamo piramnedi kikesi ende moglmara pindre, ye yene tandaglmeno dipeglko ana ye Jodan Nigle yomba baptais eretongwa.
41001006	Jon bugla-kamel yungo mina gaglsuna erikwa i ende-ende orkwa. Te bugla-kau nangiye kumagl ta dane mina suna engenge de wanmoglkwa. Te kaiya moknamo i mongondo ya te brume are nuglo ne-ne orkwa.
41001007	Ye ka yegl dipene ende yomba tongwa, “Ba okuwo yomba ta unambuka i yombuglomo pai mitna ende na yombura i engrukwa. Na yagl wakai ta moglmbo kade goinge ere ye kagle towo mina kan-tonguma pangwa i na ta pirka sinaglka kuno erekrukwa.
41001008	Na nigl mina ene baptais ereteinga, ba ye ene Holi Spirit mina baptais eretenambuka.”
41001009	Ana enge igle Yesus Nasaret kamun Galili dumo kindekondo ende ungo ana Jon eremogl Jodan Nigle suna ye baptais eretongwa.
41001010	Ana Yesus oglandi nigle kondo ende menda undre, ye kango heven audungo ana Holi Spirit kua yumugl mereyegl ende atne ye moglmara ungwa.
41001011	Ana heven imbo ka ta yegl dungwa, “Ene na Wana, na ene wakai kandre nomana wakai ene teinga.”
41001012	Ana oglandi Holi Spirit diendungo Yesus ende dumo waule suna ongwa.
41001013	Ye igle wanmoglko ande enge 40 orkwa. Satan wu bagl nusinagledi ka kra merkinde poglkwa. Ye dua-kambu ya agl-bugla are bogl meglko ana angelo wu Yesus akeple dingwa.
41001014	Jon sikane yungu suna endigo, okuwo Yesus Galili kamun suna pi ana God kamo wakai dipene endungwa.
41001015	Ye dungwa, “Enge kaima plau dungo ana God kingdomo ene mina mangigl ungwa, ene nomano yakete kamambuno wakai pirngi diyo!”
41001016	Yesus ende Galili Niglmong bina pindre, ye kango Saimon ya angigle Andru bogl fis gagl piyasi niglmong atne ende miurka. Sraglpre, ye fis ere simbrika yaglmo.
41001017	Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ene na mokonamugl wiro, na beke teimbo ene yomba ere-inambrika.”
41001018	Ana ye oglandi fis ere simbrika gatno kindekondo ana omara embrika.
41001019	Ye kurita ende inda pindre kango, ana Sebedi wam Jems angigle Jon bogl, botno mina suna mogltre ye fis ere simbrika gatno simbogl akekun ere miurka.
41001020	Ana ye kandre tambre kana agle dungo, yagl suwo neno Sebedi ya kongun di imbriko erikwa yomba bot mina suna akiye meglko kondo pandigl ana ye Yesus omara mokomugl ende embrika.
41001021	Ye ende Kaperneam kamun eingo ana Sabat enge yongwa, Yesus ende makai yungu yungugl pindre ana mambuno bogl ka beke tongwa.
41001022	Yomba ka beke tongwa i pirtre sipuglo dingwa. Sraglpre, ye lo beke teingwa yomba dimere yegl manga. Ye yomba ta yombuglo gigledi kande pangwa mereyegl ta ka wakegagl ditongwa.
41001023	Enge igle ye makaino yungu mina yagl ta spirit kinde moglkwa yungugl mogl ana kaglkane binan bogl yungwa.
41001024	“Yesus Nasaret nem, ene sragl taragl ere noragledi une? Ene no erekinde ere nora pre un kana? Na ene pirpogl siga. Ene God Holi Yombamo!”
41001025	Yesus ka giglendi di spirit kinde tongwa, “Ene dran simundo ana yagl i mina kindekondo ende menda wo!”
41001026	Spirit kinde yombuglo ere yagl i ake pur-dindre ana kaglkane kande ta dindre ye mina ende menda ungwa.
41001027	Yomba kindaginde yene sipuglodi kundugl dindre ye yene krapogl dipirkwa, “I sragl taragl? I ka kor ta beke dungwa. Yagl i yombuglo gigledi kande pangwa ipre ka dungo spirit kinde dumere pir kamo sika singwa.”
41001028	Ye kamo boglo i tambre kana waidi Galili dumo mundu kuno orkwa.
41001029	Ye makai yungu kondo ende menda wingo, ye Jems ya Jon bogl akiye du yene endpi Saimon ya Andru yungunomugl eingwa.
41001030	Saimon ambu imakiye kinde si nangiye ninga dungo bogl mina ugl pai moglkwa. Ana Yesus ende yungugl ongo, ye tambre kana ambu kinde sungwa ipre diteingwa.
41001031	Ana Yesus ambumo pamara pi ye ongo ake ana ake bonduglkwa. Ambu nangiye ninga dungwa i dundungo ana ye mambuno bogl kaiya mokna yomba pre akekun ere tongwa.
41001032	Ande bei kamun pokndungo, yomba kinde singwa prapra ya spirit kinde bogl meglkwa yomba auro yu Yesus moglmara wingwa.
41001033	Taun yomba mundu wu yungu dramugl makai singwa.
41001034	Ana ye yomba kinde imbo kanekane sungwa erewakai ere tendre, spirit kinde merkinde simenda endungwa. Ba ye spirit kinde ka ta di dinaglmedi pre, angai tekrukwa. Sraglpre ye Yesus pirkan erikwa.
41001035	Kamun kor tange akemim ere pango, Yesus andigl yungu i kondo ende menda pi ana dumo wau yomara igle ye kamange orkwa.
41001036	Saimon ya angiglma tau ye akiye wan eingwa, Yesus pre ende menda pi dokingwa.
41001037	Ye kan indre yegl diteingwa, “Yomba prapra ene pre dokingwa!”
41001038	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Nono kamun tau yungu epigl mangigl yomara i endeinamga. Yungu ombuno igle ombugl na kamambuno dipene ende tenaglka. Na taragl ipre winga.”
41001039	Yeglpre ye Galili kamun prapra wan wu ikine ikine pi, makai yungu yei-omara prapra kamambuno dipene ende te spirit simenda endungwa.
41001040	Yagl ta kaglande sungwa, Yesus moglmara undre goglko bondugl ana akeple dinarambedi pre anduwa yei dungwa, “Ene na erewakai ere naraglendi pitn kade, ene erewakai ere naro.”
41001041	Ana Yesus miriye kinde gogl ana ongo duglosi yaglmo akindre dungwa, “Na pirka, ene kinden pra wakai erambiwo.”
41001042	Erme keme kaglande sungwa ikra dundungo ana ye nangiye winge dungwa.
41001043	Yesus ka giglendi kaima ditendre ana tambre-yene diendungwa.
41001044	Ana Yesus ye ditongwa, “Ene yomba suwarata ditekratnga, ba ene du ende pris moglmara pindre ana nangin ombuno dimin. Ye ene kanan, yomba prapra ene kaglande singa winge dungwa i kanaglkwa, Moses dumere ere ana ofa garatnga.”
41001045	Ba yaglmo ende pindre boglo kuglko ana kamo andemagle-wai dungwa. Yegl orko Yesus taun prapra suna enambuka mere mango ye pi kamun bina dangine yomba moglkrimara wanmoglkwa. Ana igle yomba koglkoglo kikesi ye moglmara wu meglkwa.
41002001	Ande enge tau endongo okuwo, Yesus aglke ende ikine Kaperneam kamun ongwa. Ye ende yungugl ongwa i ana ka wai dungo yomba pirkwa.
41002002	Yeglpre, yomba merkinde wu igle makai singo ama yungugl angai sitndungo te mendakra yungu dramugl pra meglko ana Yesus kamambuno dipene ende tongwa.
41002003	Enge i yomba tau wingo ana yagl 4 eremogl, yagl ta ongo kagle mau sungwa bagl yombugl iyu Yesus moglmara wingwa.
41002004	Ana yomba merkinde kau-kau eriko, ye kinde sungwa yagle iyu Yesus moglmara enaglkwa mere mango, ye Yesus moglmara yungu tembe i indaun terke ende kenge gundo endingwa audi yongo, ana yagle gagle mina pai moglko ende atne endingwa.
41002005	Ye pirngi dingwa Yesus kandre, ye ongo kagle mau sungwa yagle ditongwa, “Wana yagle, ene tandaglmen prapra koko endiga.”
41002006	Enge igle, lo beke teingwa yomba tau igle amedi meglkwa, yene nomano wagle yegl pirkwa,
41002007	“Sraglpre yagl i ka yegl dume? Ye God kenaglmo sungwa! Yomba tandaglme ta koko endekraglkwa, ba God suwara koko endinambuka.”
41002008	Yomba nomano mina poglodi pirkwa i Yesus oglandi kandre ana ye ditongwa, “Sraglpre ene taragl i poglodi pirme?
41002009	Sragl ka undungwa ditenagle, ‘Ene tandaglmen i prapra dundume dinaglo’ mo ‘Andigl kungutn indre, ana konbo ende po’ dinaglka i undume?
41002010	Ba i ene kanaglkwa. Yomba Wam ye yombuglo kande pangwa pre, makandle tandaglmeno prapra koko ende tenambuka.” Ana ye ongo kagle mau sungwa yagle ditongwa,
41002011	“Na ene diteinga, ene andigl kungutn indre ende yungun po.”
41002012	Ana ye andigl kunguglmo indre ana yomba prapra ongumutno-mugl konbo endongwa. Ye prapra i kan sipuglo kinde di ana ye God dembiye sindre dingwa, “Nono okuna taragl yeglmere ta kankunga!”
41002013	Yesus aglke kordagl ende ikine Galili Niglmong bina ongwa. Ana yomba merkinde ye moglmara wingo ana ye God kamo beke tongwa.
41002014	Ana ye konbo ende pindre kangwa, Levai, ye Alfias wam yene takis yumara yungu yungugl amedi moglko ana Yesus ditongwa, “Na mokonamugl wo.” Ana Levai andigl ye omara mokomugl endongwa.
41002015	Okuwo pokndungo Yesus ye takis ingwa yomba ya te tandaglme erikwa yomba, ye disaipelma bogl wu suwara pi Levai yungumugl kaiya mokna neingwa. Yeglpre yomba merkinde ye omara mokomugl eingwa.
41002016	Lo beke teingwa yomba tau ye Parisi wagle bogl kaningo Yesus tandaglme erikwa yomba ya takis ingwa yomba bogl mogl kaiya mokna akiye neingwa. Ana Parisi wagle krapogl Yesus disaipelmo wagle teingwa, “Sraglpre ye takis ingwa yomba ya tandaglme erikwa yomba bogl akiye kaiya mokna neme?”
41002017	Yesus ka dingwa i pirtre ana di ikine ende tongwa, “Yomba kinde sikrukwa ye dokta moglmara ta pikrikwa, ba kinde sungwa yomba i keunde eingwa. Na yomba du-yene aglendi inagledi pre ta ukrika. Ba na tandaglme yomba pre winga.”
41002018	Jon disaipelmo ya Parisi wagle kaiya mokna mawagl meglkwa. Yomba tau undre ana krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Sragl mambuno pango Jon disaipelmo wagle ya Parisi nangro kaiya mokna mawagl erikwa. Ba ene disaipelnen mawagl erekrikwa?”
41002019	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ambu inambuka yagle ye digaglko wingwa yomba bogl akiye mogl panan kade, ye sraglpre kaiya mokna mawagl eraglme? Taman. Ye bogl akiye meglkwa pre ye yegl ta erekraglkwa.
41002020	Ba enge ta yenambuka enge, ambu inambuka yaglmo ye mina ikorugl endimbi, ana enge igle ye kaiya mokna mawagl moraglkwa.
41002021	“Yomba ta gagl alap kor kembra ta bagladi indre, gagl suna kande goglo mina simborambuka. Ye yegl eran, gagl kor simboglkwa i yombuglo ere gagl goglo si arglandi wu kande kaima enambuka.
41002022	Ana yomba ta wain kor toindi meme nangiye gagl goglo mina ta suna endekrambuka. Ye yegl eran ana wain nuglo meme nangiye sibagla dinan ana wain ya meme nangiye akiye kinde erambrika. Yeglpre, ye wain kor toindi meme nangiye kor mina atne endinambuka.”
41002023	Yesus Sabat enge ta wit yaglkwa moglmara ende suna ongwa. Ana ye disaipelma wagle omara akiye pindre, ye mambuno bogl wit mongo tau ake ditndi ingwa.
41002024	Yegl eriko, Parisi wagle Yesus diteingwa, “Pro, Sabat enge nono lono mane dumara ene disaipelnen sraglpre yegl erime?”
41002025	Yesus di Parisi wagle tongwa, “Okuna imbo Devit yombamo bogl kindan gogltre ana ye taragl ninaglkwa tamanga enge, ye taragl ta erikwa ikra ene kere pirkrimo?
41002026	Abiatar pris kande moglkwa enge, Devit eremogl God yungumo mina yungugl pindre ana bret God pre yei teingwa i nendre ana tau yombamo akiye waningwa tongwa. Ba bret i we pris wagle keunde ninaglkwa pre lo pangwa.”
41002027	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Sabat yomba akeple dinambuka pre God ere yongwa. Yomba Sabat akeple dinambuka pre ta ere yeikrukwa.
41002028	Yeglpre Yomba Wam ye Sabat i nemyagl moglkwa.”
41003001	Enge ta Yesus ende ikine makai yungu yungugl ongwa, ana igle yagl ta ongo koglo mau sungwa moglkwa.
41003002	Yomba tau Yesus aglau ta eran kandre ka-tange tenamnedi dokingwa. Yeglpre ye kinde sungwa i Sabat enge erewakai erambo mo di mangigl yene sugl kan meglkwa.
41003003	Ana Yesus yagl ongo mau sungwa ikra ditongwa, “Yomba prapra meglmara gumanomugl igle andiglo.”
41003004	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Sabat enge i lo mina mambuno wakai boramuno mo mambuno kinde boramune? Mo nono yomba ereyumun wakai moraglmo mo yomba sigoramne?” Ba yomba ye ka ta dikor erekrikwa.
41003005	Ana ye dem kumbrusire kan winambodi ye kangwa, ba enge i keunde Yesus ye mitno gogl prukwa, i ye nomano giglekui dungo aglau erikwa pre. Ana ye yagl ongo mau sungwa ikra ditongwa, “Ene ongun duglo suwo.” Ye ongo duglo sungo ana ongo wakai orkwa.
41003006	Ana Parisi wagle oglandi andigl endpi Herot yombamo bogl akiye makaisi mogl ana ye ka-tange Yesus sigoramnedi pre ka dikeglkwa.
41003007	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl kamun i kindekondo, Galili Niglmong bina eingwa. Ana Galili yomba merkinde kaima ye omara mokomugl eingwa.
41003008	Yesus taragl prapra orkwa i ye pirtre ana Judia ya te Jerusalem dumo kande ya Idumea te Jodan Nigle koglo imbo, makan yongwa i prapra ya Taia te Saidon suna akiye ana yomba merkinde ye moglmara wingwa.
41003009	Yomba merkinde meglkwa pre ana Yesus disaipelma wagle bot ta ye pre akekun ere yei tenaglmedi ditongwa, i yomba na bre sidakagl dinaglmedi dungwa.
41003010	Ye okuna kana yomba merkinde kindeno erewakai ere tongwa pre. Ana kinde imbo kanekane pangwa, ye egluwe ere ende okuna pi Yesus ake piramnedi erikwa.
41003011	Spirit kinde yomba mina suna meglkwa ye Yesus kanigwa enge, Yesus guma mina ye yangesi kaglkane ingwa, “Ene God Wam.”
41003012	Ba Yesus ka giglendi di spirit kinde wagle tongwa, “Ene na kangina yomba pendigl dinongugl endekriyo.”
41003013	Yesus kamun muglo ta pindre ana ye yomba tau pinde inagledi prukwa i agle dungo ana ye moglmara wingwa.
41003014	Ana Yesus pinde yungwa yomba 12 ye Yesus aposelmo kangino yongwa, i ye bogl akiye meglmbi ana ye dimenda endinan pi kamambuno dipene endinaglkwa pre.
41003015	Ye yombuglomo tenan indre ana spirit simenda endinaglkwa.
41003016	Ye yomba 12 pinde yungwa i kangino yegl: Ta Saimon (Yesus kangiye ta “Pita” we dungwa);
41003017	Jems, Sebedi wam, ana ye angigle Jon (ye suwo kangino kor yongwa Boanesis, i mambuno yegl, “Kamun Gurgagla Nangro”);
41003018	ana Andru ya Pilip ya te Batolomiu ya Matyu ya Tomas te Jems, ye Alfias wam; te Tadius ana Saimon, ye Selot yungu ombuno mina ta moglkwa.
41003019	Ana Judas Iskariot Yesus yaglkumba tongwa yaglmo.
41003020	Ana Yesus ende yungugl ta ongo, yomba merkinde aglke kordagl wu makai singwa. Yeglpre ye disaipelma wagle bogl kaiya mokna ta ninaglkwa enge yeikrukwa.
41003021	Ana ye nem-angiglma ka i pirtre ye suglmo moramnedi eingwa, sraglpre, yomba dingwa, “Ye nomano kuno paikrukwa.”
41003022	Ana lo beke teingwa yomba tau ye Jerusalem yei ende atne undre dingwa, “Belsebul ye mina suna mogl tongwa! I spirit kinde wagle yombamo kande ye yombuglomo tongo ana spirit kinde wagle simenda endungwa.”
41003023	Yeglpre, Yesus yomba aglendi moglmara ende ana ka ta di simbogl ditongwa, “Satan srambre ere Satan simenda endinambu?
41003024	Kamun kande ta mundu yumbusi epigl suwo ende yene ikine ikine kogl kunda beglmbi ana kamun i ta andigl paikrambuka.
41003025	Yomba bormai suwara ye yene yumbusi epigl suwo ende ikine ikine kogl kunda beglmbi, ana ye komuno okuwo wu perepere enaglkwa.
41003026	Yeglmere, Satan ye yene kunda ikine moledi ana yumbusi suwo endinan, ye enge olto ta andigl moglkre, ye dundinambuka.
41003027	Kaima, yomba ta yagl giglekui dungwa yungumo mina si-arusi ende yungugl pi gaglmo bona kunogl yoko ikrambuka. Ye komnaiye yagl giglekui dungwa akegidi kanesi pandigl, ana okuwo ye gaglmo bona yungugl yongwa i wausi inambuka.
41003028	Na kaima ene diteinga, tandaglme kanekane ya te God kenaglmo singwa, i God kindekondo tenambuka.
41003029	Ba yomba ta Holi Spirit kenaglmo sinaglkwa, God tandaglmeno ta koko ende tekrambuka. Ye tandaglme orkwa i yene mina aimande aimande pai enambuka.”
41003030	Yomba tau dingwa, “Ye mina spirit kinde suna moglkwa.” Yeglpre, Yesus ka i dungwa.
41003031	Ana Yesus mam ya angiglma wu plaudi, yungu mendakra andigl mogl, ana Yesus ditenaglmedi pre yomba tau di yungugl endingwa.
41003032	Yomba merkinde Yesus moglmara amedi mogl winambo dindre ana ye diteingwa, “Ene man ya angitnma mendakra mogl ene kanamne dingwa.”
41003033	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ira na mana ya te na angrima?”
41003034	Ana yomba ye moglmara amedi mogl winambo dingwa i kan winambo dindre ana dungwa, “Kaniyo, magl meglkwa ya na mana ya te angrima!
41003035	Yomba ta God prumere orkwa, i na mana ya angra ya te ambara meglkwa.”
41004001	Aglke kordagl Yesus mambuno bogl Galili Niglmong bina ka beke tongwa. Yomba mere ye moglmara makaisi winambo dingwa. I pond kaima, yeglpre ye ende bot mina suna pi ana suna kra amedi moglko, bot niglmong bolamugl pai moglkwa. Ana yomba prapra nigle bina niglmong wu sing yomara andigl meglkwa.
41004002	Ye ka di simbogl taragl merkinde beke tendre ana beke tomara suna i yomba ditongwa,
41004003	“Piryo, yagl suwarata, yene moknamo mongo sunduraglendi pre endongwa.
41004004	Ye mokna mongo kongunmo mina suna sundugl ongo ana tau yange konbauna singwa, ana kua wu ne kondingwa.
41004005	Ana mongo tau yange kombuglo moglmara singwa, igle makan tembe kurita yongwa pre tambre kana wisungwa.
41004006	Ana ande ende egli ungwa enge, mokna ande de yamuno ana ye gigle geglkwa, sraglpre ye duglono ende atne pi kuno erekrukwa pre ana ye geglkwa.
41004007	Mongo tau yange kewan kangigle orkwa mina suna singwa. Kewan i bogl egli wu ana mokna yatne endingwa, yeglpre mokna mongo koglkrikwa.
41004008	Ba mongo tau ama yange makan wakai burkono dumara suna singwa. I pare ende egli wu yake kande pi ana mongo mere keglkwa; tau 30 keglko, te tau 60 keglko ana tau 100 keglkwa.”
41004009	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Yomba ta ka pirambuka pre kina panan, ye ka i pra pirondo!”
41004010	Ana Yesus yene mundu moglkwa enge, yomba tau okuna kamo pirkwa ya te disaipel 12 ye Yesus moglmara undre, mogl winambodi ana ka di simbogl dungwa i mambuno dipene endinambedi pre krapogl teingwa.
41004011	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “God kingdomo mina ka teke pangwa i ene dite kondungwa. Ba yomba tau menda meglkwa, ye taragl prapra ka di simboglka mina i mambuno pirkwa. Yeglpre,
41004012	“‘Ye kan-kan eraglkwa, ba kanpogl sikraglkwa. Ye pirpir eraglkwa, ba pirpogl sikraglkwa. Ye kan-akete God mina endimbi, ana ye tandaglmeno kindekondo tenambuka!’”
41004013	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene ka di simbogl i mambuno pirkrimo? Srambre ere ene ka mere di simbogl dingwa i mambuno pirpogl sinaglme?
41004014	Yomba mokna mongo sunduglkwa i God kamo sunduglkwa.
41004015	Yomba tau, mokna mongo yange konbauna simere yeglmere ana ye ka i pirkwa enge Satan oglandi undre ye mina suna God kamo sindiglkwa i ere ikorugl endungwa.
41004016	Yomba tau, mokna mongo yange makan kombuglo moglmara bolamugl simere yegl. Ye ka pirkwa enge, ana oglandi ye gunyei ka ingwa.
41004017	Ba ye duglono atne pikrukwa pre, ye enge olto ta pai moglkrikwa. Ye ka pirkwa ipre bakagl tendre eresi ka-teingwa enge, ye tambre-kana yangesi kinde kondingwa.
41004018	Yomba tau ana mokna mongo sunduglko yange kewan kangigle erikwa mina suna simere yegl. Ye ka pirkwa,
41004019	ba wanmoglpai eraglkwa ipre dangir dangir pirtre, taragl mere ere ninamnedi pre munduno pango, ana taragl tau mere kaima inamunedi pirkwa i suna kau sungwa, te God kamo si-atne endingo ana ye mongo koglkrikwa.
41004020	Ba yomba tau mokna mongo sindiglko yange makan burkono dumara simere yeglmere. Ye ka pir indre ana ye mongo keglkwa, tau 30, te tau 60, ana tau 100 keglkwa.
41004021	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene ken-lam ta isuna un kade, baket mina atnekra yena mo bogl atnekra yena pre yune? Ene ken-lam yene boglmo mina bolamugl yenatnga pangwa.
41004022	Taragl prapra teke mamande pangwa i okuwo wu pendigl enambuka. Ana taragl prapra tusi pangwa i wu pendigl enaglkwa.
41004023	Yomba ta ka pirambuka pre kina panan kade, kanwinge erimbi ye ka i pirondo.”
41004024	Ye ditongwa, “Ka ta pirkwa i wakai ere kinano gundo piryo. Ene yomba ere tenaglkwa yeglmere God ama ene ere tenambuka, ba tau ama akiye ere kawate tenambuka.
41004025	Yomba ta taragl tau paitongwa, okuwo God ama mere tenambuka. Ana yomba taragl ta paitekrambuka, taragl kembra kaima ta paitongwa, i ye mina i eglke endinambuka.”
41004026	Yesus ka ta ama yegl dungwa, “God kingdomo i yeglmere. Yagl ta mokna mongo yene makanmo mina suna sunduglkwa.
41004027	Etne ya enduwer ye ugl pangwa, mo kor-mogl pango, mokna mongo wisindre ana boglkwa. I sragl ere boglkwa, ye ta pirpogl sikrukwa.
41004028	Makan nuglo yene orko mokna bogl wu kande pindre ana mongo koglkwa. Komnaiye pare wisindre ana yaundo sungwa, okuwo muno sindre ana muno mina mongo merkinde koglkwa.
41004029	Mokna mongo bogl yongwa enge, ye maima pigl mawasi nongwa indre mambuno ere keglu sungwa, sraglpre, uraglkwa engemo ungwa.”
41004030	Ye kordagl dungwa, “Nono sragl we dindre God kingdomo yeglmere we dinamun? Mo nono sragl taragl ere dibogltre, i dipene endinamun?
41004031	God kingdomo i mastet mongo mereyegl, makan uglomugl koglkoglo mongo i kembra kinde kaima ana yagl ta indre makan mina yaglkwa.
41004032	Yaglkwa enge i kurita mogltre ana bogl wu kande kaima pi mokna prapra togl suna paingwa i-yatne endungwa. Ana yongagle merkinde sibina endungo, igle kua undre yongagle bi-yomara suna yunguno yeingwa.”
41004033	Yesus yene kamo yomba ditongwa. Ka tau merkinde kuno yegl akiye di simboglkwa. Ye ka mere yomba pra pir inaglmere kuno ere ditongwa.
41004034	Ye kayoko prapra ta ditekrukwa, ka di simbogl keunde dungwa. Ba yene disaipelma wagle bogl mundu meglkwa enge, ye taragl prapra mambuno dipene ende tongwa.
41004035	Ana enge suwara i kamun pokndungo Yesus yene disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Nono niglmong sipraksi ende bina koglo imbo omuno.”
41004036	Yegl dungo, ye yomba merkinde meglmara kondo, ye bot ta mina suna moglmara i disaipel wagle ende suna pi ana ye Yesus auro ingo akiye endeingwa. Bot tau igle pandiglkwa i ama ye bogl akiye ende eingwa.
41004037	Ana ir yuwanga pond giglendi ta mangungo ana igle nigl pembigl mambuno ere siplendi ende bot mina suna ongwa. Yeglpre bot mina nigl kau sinambuka mangigl kaima orkwa.
41004038	Yesus bot mokomugl suna kra mogltre ana endi iku suwarata bre mina yei ugl pangwa. Disaipel wagle ye uglo yoko andigltre ana dingwa, “Beke Notnga, nono ende nigl atne ena ounga, i pra pi gogl yenamnedi pitno?”
41004039	Ana Yesus andigltre ir yuwanga ka tendre ana nigl pembigl ditongwa. “Ir ene wermane erekro.” Ana ye nigl pembigl ditongwa, “Kiendi moglo!” Ana ir bu yongo te nigl yange daudungwa.
41004040	Ana Yesus yene disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Sraglpre ene kundugl geglme? Ene pirngi dikrim kana?”
41004041	Ye prapra kundugl kinde gogl ana yene krapogl di ikine ikine endingwa, “Yagl i irane? Ir ya nigl pembigl kamo dumere pinande eurika.”
41005001	Yesus yene disaipelma wagle bogl ende Galili Niglmong koglo imbo Gerasa yomba dumonomugl eingwa.
41005002	Ana Yesus bot mina ende menda ongo, yagl ta spirit kinde bogl moglkwa, ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara ende menda ungo, igle Yesus bogl tengigl yembrika.
41005003	Kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara suna igle, yagl i pai wu ikine ikine ongwa, ana yomba suwarata ye ake kane sinambuka mere manga, ama sen koraglkwa kuno erekrukwa.
41005004	Sraglpre enge mere ye ongo ya kagle kane singwa. Ba engenge ye sen simbiglki dindre ana ye kagle pagl ain si erekrukwa. Yomba suwarata yombuglomo kuno eran ye ake gidinambuka mere manga.
41005005	Etne ya enduwer ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara suna i mogl ana meglmbe giglte suna igle ye kina gundo kaglkane ere, ana kombuglo indre yene nangiye simbiglki dungwa.
41005006	Ye tau eglke dagl mogl Yesus kandre, ye mukundi pi yange Yesus guma mina goglko bonduglkwa.
41005007	Ana kaglkane pond kaima yungwa, “Yesus, God mitna imbo kaima Wam! Ene na sragl ere naratne? God kangiye mina na yana diga, ene na giu ere narekro!”
41005008	Ye ka dungwa i sraglpre, okuna Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ene spirit kinde, yagl i mina ende menda wo!”
41005009	Ana Yesus krapogl ye tongwa, “Ene kangin irane?” Ye di ikine endungwa, “Na kangina Ami, sraglpre no merkinde kaima mounga!”
41005010	Ana ye yana aglke aglke di Yesus tongwa, “Makan igle spirit kinde dimenda endekro.”
41005011	Bugla merkinde makaisi meglmbe giglte mangigl ta akete mogl kaiya ne meglkwa.
41005012	Spirit yanadi Yesus teingwa, “No di bugla meglmara iro ende ana kan winge etn no ende bugla deno munduno mina suna enamga.”
41005013	Yesus ye yegl eriyo ditongo ana spirit kinde wagle ende menda undre ana ende bugla deno munduno mina suna eingwa. Ana bugla merkinde kaima kerikwa 2,000 orkwa, dangine pigle moglmara kopap ende atne pi yange niglmong mina suna pi, ana nigl ne geglkwa.
41005014	Bugla sugl yomba ye mukundi endpi ana taragl orkwa i taun ya yungu epigl meglmara i pra boglo kugl diteingo ana yomba sragl mere plau dungwa i kanamnedi pre ende menda eingwa.
41005015	Yomba ende Yesus moglmara undre ye kanigwa yagl ta okuna spirit kinde merkinde ye mina suna meglkwa. Ye nomanemo wu du-wakai pango, kungugl gagl endindre igle amedi moglko ana ye prapra kan kundugl geglkwa.
41005016	Yomba tau yagl ta spirit kinde bogl akiye moglko, Yesus taragl okuna orko plau dungo kanigwa i yomba ditendre ana bugla mina plau dungwa i ama akiye diteingwa.
41005017	Ana yeglpre yomba mambuno bogl Yesus ka-tange tendre ye makano mina igle moglkre kondo endpo dingwa.
41005018	Yesus ende bot mina suna ongo ana yagl ta okuna spirit kinde suna moglkwa ikra Yesus omara akiye enambugle dungwa.
41005019	Yesus ye unambedi pirkrukwa, ba dungwa, “Ene ende yungunomugl pindre ana Yaglkande ene mitn gogltre ana taragl pond ene ere tongwa i yombanma meglmara dito.”
41005020	Yegl dungo yagle i ende dumo kande Dikapolis we dimara pi ana mambuno bogl, Yesus taragl ye mina ere tongwa ikra ditongwa. Ana yomba prapra pir sipuglo dingwa.
41005021	Yesus kordagl bot mina ende ikine niglmong koglo imbo pi niglmong bina moglko, yomba merkinde ye moglmara makaisi mogl winambo dingwa.
41005022	Ana Jairus, ye makai yungu yagl kande, ye igle wu Yesus kandre, yene yange Yesus kagle mina sindre
41005023	ana ye nomanemo bogl akiye kamange pond ere tongwa, “Na ambura kembra goragledi orkwa. Ene kaima undre ana ongun ambai kembra mina tembe yemin kade ye kindemo dundinan ana wakai morambuka.”
41005024	Ana Yesus ye bogl akiye ende embrika. Yomba merkinde kaima omara pi ana mogl winambodi kitne kitne erikwa.
41005025	Ana ambu ta igle moglkwa, ye nangiye mina bormai wu pango buglayungu 12 orkwa.
41005026	Ambumo dokta merkinde kango geu pond ere teingwa, te ye monimo prapra marasin mina ende kondungwa. Ba ye kindemo argan eragla paiyondi, kondo ere wu kandekinde kaima ongwa.
41005027	Ambumo i okuna Yesus kamo boglo prukwa. Yeglpre yomba merkinde meglmara pukamugl ye Yesus mokomugl undre ana gaglmo suna olto akungwa.
41005028	Sraglpre, yene yegl di prukwa, “Na ye gaglmo keunde akimbo na kindena argan erambuka.”
41005029	Ye eremogl Yesus gaglmo olto akungo ana oglandi bormaimo siget-dungwa. Ana yene nangiye sunakra prukwa ye kindemo bu yongwa.
41005030	Oglandi Yesus prukwa ye mina yombuglomo ende menda ongwa. Ana ye yomba merkinde meglmara suna kan aketendre, ana krapoglkwa, “Ira na gatna suna akume?”
41005031	Yene disaipelma wagle di ikine endingwa, “Ene kano, yomba merkinde mogl ene sidakaglkwa. Ene kan yei pandigl krapogl, ‘Ira na akume dinga?’”
41005032	Ba Yesus ira akungwa i kanagledi aimande toro kan winambo dungwa.
41005033	Ana ambu ikra prukwa taragl ye mina plaudi tongwa, ye undre ana yange Yesus kagle mina sindre, kundugl gogl noko purdungo, ana taragl ormere mundu kaima boglo kugl Yesus tongwa.
41005034	Yesus ambumo i ditongwa, “Na ambura, ene pirnginen orko kinden argan orkwa. Noman pokndi yenan endpo, ana kinden ikra argan orkwa.”
41005035	Yesus ka i di moglko, Jairus makai yungu sugl yomba yungumugl yomba tau meglkwa undre, dingwa, “Ene ambutn goglkwa. Sraglpre ene ka denbi wakane ka beke tongwa yomba bogl di motne?”
41005036	Ye ka dingwa i Yesus pirwinge ere ana ka yegl di makai yungu sugl moglkwa yagle tongwa, “Ene kundugl goglkro, ene pirngi keunde do.”
41005037	Ana yomba prapra ta dungo ye omara akiye pikrikwa, Pita ya Jems te angigle Jon bogl eingwa.
41005038	Ana Jairus makai yungu sugl moglkwa yagle yungumugl ye wingo, Yesus kangwa, yomba kai kaglkane pond ere terebare yei meglkwa.
41005039	Yesus ende yungugl pindre ana yomba ditongwa, “Sraglpre ene prapra miriye gogl nomano kinde orko, kai kaglkane erim? Ambai gak i ta goglkrukwa, ba ye ugl keunde pangwa.”
41005040	Ba yomba ye bakagl gaugl ere teingwa. Yeglpre ye prapra dimenda ende ana ye ambai gakmo nem mam ya, yene disaipelma suwota akiye eingwa ikra bogl ye ende yungugl kiule ambai gak pai moglmara igle eingwa.
41005041	Yesus ambai gak ongo akindre ana ditongwa, “Talitha, koum!” (Ka i mambuno yegl, “Ambai kembra, na ene diteinga, andiglo!”)
41005042	Ana ambai gak oglandi andigl ana mambuno bogl konbo wu ikine ikine ongwa (ambaimo i buglayungu 12 nongwa). I plau dungwa enge ye prapra sipuglo dingwa.
41005043	Ba Yesus ka giglendi di ye tendre, dungwa, “Ene yomba suwarata ka i ditembi pir dinaglmiwo, ambai taragl ninambuka pre ta i teiyo.”
41006001	Yesus dumo igle kindekondo ana ye ende ikine pi, ye yene yungumo kamuno ongwa. Yene disaipelma wagle ama akiye wan eingwa.
41006002	Sabat enge yongo ye mambuno bogl makai yungu yungugl yomba ka beke tongwa. Ana yomba merkinde Yesus kamo pirtre, ye sipuglo dindre ana krapeglkwa, “Yagl i taragl prapra aglokra yume? Taragl nomano wakai i ira ye to du, te aglokra yundu? Sragl ere ye kimagl kanekane orme?
41006003	Ye kamda moglkrum kana? Ye Maria wam moglkrum kana, te ye angiglma Jems, Josep, Judas te Saimon moglkrim kana? Ana ye ambaglma nono bogl akiye moglkuno?” Ana ye ka yegl dindre deno kumbro teingwa.
41006004	Yesus yomba ditongwa, “Dumo koglkoglo propet ye kangiye pangwa. Ba yene yungumugl ya bormaimo suwara ya te yombamo mina ye kangiye paikrukwa.”
41006005	Ye kimagl tau ta erambuka mere manga, suwarata orkwa i yomba kinde sungwa suwom ta ongo ye mina tembe yei ana kindeno erewakai ere tongwa.
41006006	Ana Yesus sipuglo dungwa, sraglpre, yomba pirngi dingwa paikrukwa. Ana Yesus endpi yungu epigl igle yeimara winambo dindre yomba kamambuno beke tongwa.
41006007	Yesus disaipel 12 prapra agle dungo wu makai singo ana ye suwo suwondi dimenda endungwa. Ye spirit kinde simenda endinaglmedi pre yombuglo giglendi tongwa.
41006008	Ana ye yegl piryo ditongwa, “Konbauna enaglkwa taragl ta ipikriyo, buglo muglmbo keme i yo, ene bret ya gagl bona ya te minge moni tau kumatno mina suna pandiglkriyo.
41006009	Katno towo endinaglkwa, ba gagl suna kawate ta ipikriyo.
41006010	Ene yungu aglokra ta dimbi ende yungugl enaglmara, yungumo igle keunde moglpai ere pi ana ende enaglkwa enge taun i kondiyo.
41006011	Ana dumo tau yomba ta ende wiyo dikrimbi, mo ene kanno pirkrimbi, ene ende enaglkwa enge katno gamba tama bagl endiyo. Ye piraglkwa mambunono kinde erikwa i ombunodi tenambuka.”
41006012	Yegl dungo ye ende menda pi yomba nomano yake tenaglkwa pre kamambuno dipene ende teingwa.
41006013	Ye spirit kinde merkinde mange menda ende, ana yomba kinde sungwa merkinde olip nuglo kungo eretendre, ana kindeno erewakai ereteingwa.
41006014	King Herot ka i prapra prukwa. I Yesus kangiye pir kuno erikwa pre yomba tau yegl dingwa, “Jon Baptais goglkwa ikra andigl ukor ongwa pangwa. Yeglpre kimagl yombuglo bogl ye mina suna kongun orkwa.”
41006015	Tau yegl dingwa, “Ye Elaija.” Ana tau dingwa, “Ye propet okuna imbo meglmere yeglmere ta moglkwa.”
41006016	Ba Herot ka i pirtre yegl dungwa, “Jon Baptais na okuna nungo gare endigra. Ba ye erme andigl ukor ongwa pai dungwa!”
41006017	Herot yene okuna ka giglendi kimbirmo nem ditongo ana Jon kane sindre ipi kane yungu suna endingwa. Herot yegl orkwa i Herodias pre orkwa. Yene angigle Pilip embiye okuna ye wike yungwa.
41006018	Jon okuna ka yegl di Herot tongwa pre, “Ene angitn Pilip embiye wike inga i lo mina yegl paikrumere etnga.”
41006019	Herodias ye dem pond kumbro Jon tendre ana ye Jon sigoragledi prukwa. Ba ye kuno erekrukwa.
41006020	Herot Jon kunduglmo goglkwa, sraglpre, ye prukwa i Jon yagl du-yene, ana holi moglkwa. Yeglpre Herot eremogl Jon kanwinge orkwa. Ye eremogl Jon kamo wakai ere pruko ana ka merkinde ye nomanemo sikugl endungwa. Ba ye engenge Jon kamo piragledi prukwa.
41006021	Okuwo kaima Herodias engemo wakai plau dungwa. I Herot mam kugl yongwa engemo plau dungo ana ye kaiya mokna pond ere yomba tongwa. Gavman kongun erikwa yomba kande ya kimbirnem sutno moglkwa yagle ya te Galili dumo kande makan nem ende okuna eingwa yomba prapra wu meglkwa.
41006022	Enge igle Herodias ambuglo ende suna undre ana kagle engrukwa. I Herot ya yomba kande digaglko kaiya mokna ne meglkwa, ye kan gun yeingwa. Ana king di ambai tongwa, “Ene taragl kanekane ta inagledi piratnga, krapogl naro? Ana i na ene tenaglka.”
41006023	Ana ye ka dipandigl ambai tendre ka kaima yene we dungwa, “Taragl ta pre ene krapogl dimin na ene tenaglka, te na dumo makana simbiglkidi ikine naro dimin pra ene tenaglka.”
41006024	Ambai ende menda pi ana mam ditongwa, “Na sragl taragl naro dinagle?” Ana mam di ikine endungwa, “Jon Baptais bre.”
41006025	Ana ambai oglandi kaima ende ikine king moglmara pindre ana mam ditomere ikra di king tongwa, “Ene erme keunde Jon Baptais bre gare plet ta mina tembe yei yu na naro.”
41006026	King ka i pirtre munduwo kinde kaima orko, ye mane dinagledi prukwa, ba yomba kande gumanomugl ka di giglekui dingra wondi pirtre, ana ye pra wedi ambai tongwa.
41006027	Yeglpre ye tambre kana kimbirmo nem ta diendungwa, “Ene pi Jon bre gariwo” dungo, ana kimbirnem ende kane yungu suna pindre Jon bre garikwa.
41006028	Ana kimbirnem Jon bre gare plet ta mina bolamugl yei yu ambai tongo ana ambai ipi mam tongwa.
41006029	Jon disaipelma wagle ka i pirtre ye wu Jon nangiye indre ana ipi kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara yeingwa.
41006030	Yesus kongun eraglmedi diendungwa yomba ende ikine wu Yesus moglmara makaisi winambo dindre ana ye kongun erimere ya ka beke teimere boglo kugl Yesus teingwa.
41006031	Enge igle yomba merkinde ende wingo te ende eingo orkwa. Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl enge ta yenan kaiya mokna ninaglkwa mere manga. Yeglpre ye disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Enene keunde wimbi na bogl nono ende dumo wau ta yenambara omun ana kurita mogl ir sinaglkwa.”
41006032	Ana ye bot ta indre, ye yene keunde ende menda pi dumo waule ta eingwa.
41006033	Ba yomba merkinde kanigwa ye ende eingo ana ye pirkan erikwa. Taun yomba prapra makandle katno pagl mukundi ende okuna kana pi ana Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl enaglmara igle eingwa.
41006034	Bot pango Yesus ende menda ungwa enge, ye yomba merkinde kaima meglkwa i kandre ana ye mitno goglkwa. Sraglpre, ye sipsip mereyegl sutno yomba moglkrikwa. Ana Yesus mambuno bogl taragl merkinde yomba beke tongwa.
41006035	Enge i ande beinambuka magl kaima orkwa, yeglpre, Yesus disaipelma wagle ye moglmara undre ana dingwa, “Igle eglkekuri yomba moglkrimara, ana ande bei kondungwa.
41006036	Yomba diendin ye pi kaiya mokna magl ta ere yaraglmara ya yomba yungu togl yenambara pindre ana yene kaiya mokna ninaglkwa pre tau topo eriyondo.”
41006037	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ye taragl ninaglkwa enene ta i-teiyo.” Disaipelma wagle Yesus diteingwa, “Ene pitn kade no pindre ana minge mongo K200 ende bret topo ere tomun kuno erambo?”
41006038	Yesus krapogl disaipel wagle tongwa, “Ene bret sramuna yeingwa yome? Ene pi kaniyo.” Ye doko kandre ana ye diteingwa, “Bret 5 yongo te fis suwo yongwa.”
41006039	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ditendre, pi yomba prapra yumbusi ombuno mere endimbi kugl mina amedi molondo dungwa.
41006040	Ana ye amedi meglkwa, i ombuno tau 100 meglko, te tau 50 meglkwa.
41006041	Ana Yesus bret 5 ya te fis suwo ikra indre ana ye kanimbo heven ende, ana God diwakai yeite, ye bret buko dindre, ana disaipelma wagle tongwa ye i yumbusi yomba tenaglkwa. Ye ama fis suwo bukondi disaipelma wagle tongo ana yomba prapra bunondi tekuno erikwa.
41006042	Yomba prapra neingo ana kuno orkwa.
41006043	Ana disaipelma wagle bret ya fis ikine deruwagl orkwa gande imakaisi ana basket 12 indre gre kau singwa.
41006044	Yomba bret ya fis neingwa, ikra yagl keunde kerikwa 5,000 orkwa.
41006045	Oglandi Yesus disaipelma wagle diendungo bot mina suna pindre ana okuna kana ende niglmong koglo imbo Betsaida kamun eingo, yene yomba prapra di perepere ende moglkwa.
41006046	Ana yomba diende, okuwo Yesus kamange era pre ende makan meglmbe akete ongwa.
41006047	Ana mim orkwa enge, bot ende niglmong wu sunawom ungo ana Yesus ye yene makan mina moglkwa.
41006048	Ana ye kango disaipelma wagle yombuglo ere enaglkwa mere manga. Sraglpre ye enaglmara ir pond mange bot guma ake gidungwa. Iwe ande kuiya 4 klok kamun tanginagledi orkwa. Ye nigl bolamugl konbauna pindre ye kondo endinagledi orkwa.
41006049	Ba enge igle disaipelma wagle kaningo, Yesus niglmong bolamugl konbauna ungwa. Ana ye pirkwa Yesus pre gigl ta umedi pirtre ana ye kaglkane kinde ingwa.
41006050	Sraglpre disaipelma wagle prapra Yesus kandre ana ye kundugl pond geglkwa. Tambre kana Yesus disaipelma wagle dite dungwa, “Giglendi moraglmiwo. I na, kundugl goglkriyo.”
41006051	Ana Yesus bot mina mongo ende suna disaipelmo wagle meglmara ongo akiye meglko ana ir bu yongwa. Disaipelma wagle prapra sipuglodi poriya erikwa,
41006052	sraglpre, Yesus okuna bret bukondi yomba 5,000 tongwa ikra ye mambuno kiurikwa. Ye nomano torwa sungwa.
41006053	Ye niglmong siprak singwa enge, ende Genesaret pindre ana igle ye bot kane kogl pandiglkwa.
41006054	Ye prapra bot kondo ende menda eingo ana yomba oglandi Yesus kanpogl singwa.
41006055	Yomba mukundi ende dumo kande suna i mundu pindre ana yomba kinde sungwa gagle ere kake iyu Yesus moglme dingo pirmara igle wingwa.
41006056	Ana Yesus dumo aglokra suna omara i yungu epigl ya taun tau ya kamun kande bina, yomba kinde sungwa ye ipi maket dumo suna pandiglkwa. Ana kinde sungwa yomba ye Yesus gaglmo suna olto punduno akenaglmedi pre yomba yanadi Yesus tengwa. Ana prapra Yesus gaglmo akingwa mere kindeno argan orkwa.
41007001	Parisi wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba tau ye Jerusalem kamun meglkwa wu Yesus moglmara mogl winambo dindre,
41007002	ana ye kanigwa, Yesus disaipelma wagle tau onguno nigl koglkre kaiya mokna ake neingwa.
41007003	Parisi wagle ya Juda yomba prapra kowano awano mambuno pamere i ake meglkwa. Okuna kana ye onguno nigl koglkrimbi ye kaiya mokna nekraglkwa.
41007004	Ye maket dumo wanmogl ana ende ikine wingwa enge, ye kaiya mokna nekre ana komnaiye nigl pandre ana neingwa. I ye kowano mambunono tau akiye sika singwa. Ye nigl mingi tokaisi te sin gala tokaisi ana dis ya botno akiye nigl endingwa.
41007005	Yeglpre Parisi wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba Yesus krapogl teingwa, “Sraglpre ene disaipelnen wagle kowano awano ka beke temere mere erekrime? Ye onguno nigl koglkre kaiya mokna ake neingwa.”
41007006	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Aisaia ene pre ka pai inambuka dungwa i kuno orkwa! Ene kakimbi yomba, ye ka yegl muno boglkwa. “‘Yomba i drano mina na diwakai yeingwa. Ba ye nomano na mina eglke kaima yongwa.
41007007	Ye na dembina karaugl yoko erikwa. Sraglpre, ye yomba ka kindine bekingwa i keme yomba ditendre ana i God kamo we dingwa.’
41007008	Ene God lomo prapra kinde kondo ana yomba mambunono akegidi i-wan meglkwa.”
41007009	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene God lomo prapra sendinaglkwa pre pirkwa pangwa. I enene okuna mambunono akegidi mora pre erikwa.
41007010	God lo Moses tendre yegl dungwa, ‘Ene nen ya man pirmitna endinatniwo.’ Ana, ‘Yomba ta ye nem mo mam mangagl sinan, ye pra gorambuka.’
41007011	Ba ene ka yegl dingwa, ‘Yagl ta ye nem mo mam ditenambuka, na taragl ene akepledi tenagledi yeinga. Ba, i God pre tekondinga.’
41007012	Ana ene kan winge erimbi ye nem mo mam taragl kanekane i akeple dinambedi pre ere dinaglmiwo.
41007013	Yegl erikwa i okuna yomba mambunono beke tendre ana God kamo siplendi menda ende, ake atne endingwa. Ana ene taragl kuno yegl tau merkinde erikwa.”
41007014	Kordagl Yesus yomba merkinde aglendi magl moglmara ende, ana dungwa, “Ene prapra na kanna kinano yei ana ka i pirpogl siyo.
41007015	Taragl menda yongwa ende yomba mina suna ongwa i yomba ta ere sideglmbi yeikrukwa. Kaima tamanga. Taragl yomba mina suna yei ende menda ungwa i ere yomba sideglmbi yongwa.
41007016	Yomba ta ka pirambuka pre kina panan kade pirondo.”
41007017	Okuwo ye yomba merkinde kondo ana ende yungugl ongo, yene disaipelma wagle ka di simbogl dungwa ipre krapogl teingwa.
41007018	Yesus ditongwa, “Ene pirpogl sikrim kana, i ene kankrimo? Taragl menda yei ende yomba mina suna ongwa, i ere yomba pra sideglmbi yeikrambuka. I ene kankrimo?
41007019	Yeglpre, i endpi ye munduwo mina pikrukwa. Ba i ende dem biglke mina suna pindre ana ye dem mina ende menda ongwa.” (Ka yegl dungwa i Yesus dipene endungwa, ‘Kaiya mokna prapra deglmbi yeikrukwa.’)
41007020	Ta ama yegl dungwa, “Taragl yomba mina suna yei ende menda ungwa i ere yomba sideglmbi yongwa.
41007021	Yeglpre taragl yomba dem munduwo mina sunakra ende menda ungwa, i nomano kinde pirkwa ya, yagl ambu mambuno paikrumere gundingwa ya, kunogl gogl neingwa ya, yomba sigeglkwa ya, yagl ambu wino embino meglkwa kondo kunogl gundingwa,
41007022	bumbuno gogl, nomano kinde ya, mambuno kimbi kinde kinde ere, ka kindine paikrumara erikwa, mirmogl teingwa, kakimbi dingwa, bakagl teingwa, te kenaglme erikwa.
41007023	Taragl kinde i prapra yomba mina sunakra yei ende menda undre ana yomba ere sideglmbi yongwa.”
41007024	Yesus kamun i kondo ana endpi Taia kamun dumo kande magl ongwa. Ana ye yungu ta mina ende yungugl pindre ana ye ungwa igle moglmedi yomba suwarata pir dinaglmedi prukwa. Ba ye teke panambuka mere manga.
41007025	Kaima yene, onglandi ambu ta Yesus we dingo pirtre, ambumo i ambuglo kembra spirit kinde ye mina suna moglkwa. Ana ye undre oglandi Yesus kagle mina yange sungwa.
41007026	Ambumo i Grik, Yomba Bina, Siria kamun suna Ponisia kugl yeingwa. Ambumo i ambuglo mina spirit kinde suna moglkwa, simenda endinambedi pre yanadi Yesus tongwa.
41007027	Ba Yesus di ambumo tongwa, “Komnaiye kanwinge erimbi gak ye kaiyano moknano prapra ye ninamnedi pirmere ninaglkwa, ipre gak wagle kaiyano ta indre piyasi agl meglmara endinaglkwa kuno erekrukwa.”
41007028	Ambu di ikine endungwa, “Kaima, Yaglkande, kuno ere din ba, agl bogl atnekra meglkwa ye gak wagle kaiya neingwa surmane gande neingwa.”
41007029	Yeglpre Yesus di ambumo i tongwa, “Ene ka mongo di ikine endinga, ipre ene ende yungunomugl po, spirit ambutn kinde kondungwa.”
41007030	Ana ambumo i ende ikine yungumugl pindre ana kango, ambuglo bogl mina paimoglko ana spirit kinde ambaimo i kondo ende menda ongwa.
41007031	Yesus Taia kamun dumo tau mangigl yongwa i kondo ana endpi Saidon dumo kande pindre, ana ende yoglmbo Galili Niglmong pindre, ana Dikapolis kamun kande suna ongwa.
41007032	Igle yagl ta kina gidi ana ka dinagledi orko manga ta moglko yomba auro iyu Yesus moglmara undre, ana Yesus ongo pagl yaglmo i akenambedi yana di teingwa.
41007033	Yegl dingo Yesus yomba merkinde meglmara yaglmo i auro i-bina pi yene mundu miurko, Yesus ongo mongo yagle i kina mina koglkoglo suna ende ana eursi ongo mongo simbai yagle i drambiye akungwa.
41007034	Yesus kan imbo heven ende mur indre ye ditongwa, “Epata!” (mambuno yegl “Yauro!”),
41007035	ana oglandi ye kina audungo ana drambiye pirka sungo wermane ere ana ye mambuno bogl ka pamere dungwa.
41007036	Ana Yesus taragl orkwa i ye ka diwaidi dinaglmedi mane dungwa, ba ye taragl merkinde ama orkwa. Yeglpre yomba ka i aimande diwaidi meglkwa.
41007037	Ana yomba prapra ka i pirtre sipuglo pond dindre, yegl dingwa, “Ye taragl prapra wakai keme orkwa. Yagl kina gidungwa orko ka prukwa, te drambiye aketongwa orko ka dungwa.”
41008001	Engemo igle keunde yomba merkinde tau kordagl wu makai singwa. Ye taragl ta ninaglkwa yeikrukwa. Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle aglendi moglmara ende ana dungwa,
41008002	“Na yomba i mitno pond goglka. Sraglpre ye na bogl ande enge suwota mogl kondingwa pre ana erme kaiya mokna ninaglkwa ta yeikrukwa.
41008003	Kaiya mokna tekre ye yoko di yungunomugl endimbo, ye konbauna bange ongumutno mangran yange sinaglkwa. Sraglpre, yomba tau dumo eglkekuri wingwa.”
41008004	Yene disaipelma wagle di ikine endingwa, “Ba dumo waule suna i yomba kaiya mokna aglokra indre yomba te kuno erambe?”
41008005	Yesus krapoglkwa, “Ene bret sramuna yeingwa yome?” Disaipelma wagle di ikine endingwa, “7 keunde yongwa.”
41008006	Yesus yomba merkinde makandle amediyo dungwa. Ana ye bret 7 indre, God diwakai yei, ye bret prapra buko dindre ana yene disaipelma wagle tongwa. Ye yumbusi yomba tenaglmedi pre tongo, ana ye yumbusi yomba teingwa.
41008007	Ana disaipelma wagle fis kembra kembra kurita akiye yeingwa. I ombugl ye God diwakai yeite ana disaipel wagle i akiye yumbu siyo dungwa.
41008008	Yomba prapra neingo dano orkwa. Okuwo, diure kawa tongwa ana disaipel wagle gande makaisi basket 7 gre kau singwa.
41008009	Yomba prapra 4,000 mereyegl neingo, ana Yesus diendungo ende eingwa.
41008010	Ana ye disaipelma wagle bogl akiye ende bot mina suna pindre ana ende Dalmanuta makan kande eingwa.
41008011	Parisi wagle undre ana mambuno bogl Yesus krapeglkwa. Ye ta eran kanamnedi pre te ye God prawe dungo ormo mo di heven suna diumo suwarata erambedi pre krapeglkwa.
41008012	Ba Yesus nomane kinde orko mur isuna ende ana dungwa, “Sraglpre yomba epigl erme meglkwa i kimagl ta ombuno dinambedi pre krapeglme? Na kaima ene diteinga, diu ta ere yomba ombunodi tekrambuka.”
41008013	Ana Yesus Parisi wagle kindekondo ende ikine bot mina suna pindre, mambuno bogl ana niglmong sipraksi ende koglo imbo ongwa.
41008014	Disaipelma wagle bret ta pir ikre wingwa, ba bret suwarata bot mina suna ye meglmara yongwa.
41008015	Ana Yesus ka giglendi ditongwa, “Ene kanpogl siyo, Parisi wagle yisno ya te Herot yismo pre ene sugl wakai molo.”
41008016	Disaipelma wagle yene di ikine ikine ende ana dingwa, “Nono bret ta yeikrukwa pre, ye ka i dungwa.”
41008017	Ye ka dingwa i Yesus pirkan orkwa, yeglpre ye krapogl tongwa, “Sraglpre ene bret ta yeikrume dime? Ene kankre ana pirpogl sikrikwa pangwa? Ene nomano siget-dum kana?
41008018	Ene ongumutno pangwa, ba ene kankrimo? Ene kinano pangwa, ba ene pirkrimo? Ene pir moglkrim kana?
41008019	Na bret 5, yomba 5,000 pre buko dinga enge, ene surmane kawa tongwa gande makaisi basket sramuna gre kau sindu?” Ye di ikine endingwa, “12 kra.”
41008020	Ana Yesus krapoglkwa, “Na bret 7, yomba 4,000 pre buko dinga enge, ene diure kawa tongwa gande makai singo basket sramuna gre kau sindu?” Ye di ikine endingwa, “7 kra.”
41008021	Ana Yesus disaipelma ditongwa, “Ene ikra pir moglkrikwa pangwa?”
41008022	Ye ende Betsaida dumo kande wingo ana igle yomba tau yagl ta ongumuglo kin yongwa auro iyu Yesus moglmara undre, ana Yesus ongo pagl yaglmo akenambedi yana dingwa.
41008023	Ana Yesus yagl ongumuglo kin yongwa ongo ake, ana ye auro yend yungu epigl bina kra ongwa. Ana ye enge i eursi yaglmo ongumuglo mina koglkoglo endekondo ana yene ongo koglkoglo yaglmo ongumuglo mina akindre, ana krapogl tongwa, “Ene taragl kanekane ta kano?”
41008024	Yaglmo kan mitna ende ana dungwa, “Owo, na yomba kan kumbugl kambugl erika, ye endi mereyegl konbauna wanmeglkwa.”
41008025	Ana aglke kordagl Yesus yene ongo koglkoglo yaglmo i ongumuglo mina akungwa. Enge i keunde yaglmo ongumuglo pinedungo wu dumomugl pango ana ye taragl prapra kan dime dungwa.
41008026	Ana Yesus yaglmo di yungumugl ende dungwa, “Ene ende ikine yungu epigl suna pikro.”
41008027	Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl endpi Sisaria Filipai kamun yungu epigl yeimara igle mangigl eingwa. Konbo bange ye disaipelma wagle krapogl tongwa, “Dinariyo, yagl ambu na pre ira we dime?”
41008028	Ye di ikine endingwa, “Tau Jon Baptais we dingwa, te tau Elaija we dingwa, ana tau dingwa, ene pre propet ta we dingwa.”
41008029	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ba ene sragl wedi pirm? Enene na pre ira we dim?” Pita dipene endungwa, “Ene Krais, yomba ikine endinatnedi God pinde yungwa.”
41008030	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ka giglendi ditongwa, “Na pre ene yomba suwara kaima ta ye yegl we ditekriyo.”
41008031	Ana Yesus mambuno bogl disaipelma wagle beke tongwa, “Yomba Wam giu kanekane ere tembi, te yomba mina ende okuna eingwa yomba ya pris kande wagle ya, lo beke teingwa yomba ye mokono tembi, ana sigoraglkwa. Ba ande enge suwota eran okuwo ye andigl ukor enambuka.”
41008032	Yesus ka i dinongugl kaima ende disaipelma wagle tongwa. Yeglpre Pita eremogl ye auro i-bina pindre ana mambuno bogl ka tongwa.
41008033	Ba Yesus kan akete yene disaipelma wagle kandre ana ye Pita ka tendre, dungwa, “Satan, ende wu na mokona kra po, ene ka dinga i God nomano pamere ta dikitnga, ba yomba pirmere dinga!”
41008034	Ana Yesus agle dungo yomba merkinde yene disaipel bogl meglmara wingo ana ye ditongwa, “Yomba suwarata na bogl unagledi pirambuka, ye yene pre pirkre ana endimo-prak kake indre, ana na wimara wondo.
41008035	Te yomba ta yene kor-morambuka ere-inagledi eran, okuwo kor-moglkwa i wau borambuka. Ba, ta ye na pre ya te kanna mambuno wakai pre ere kor-moglkwa i kinde kondinan ana yene okuwo ere-inambuka.
41008036	Yomba ta makan koglkoglo taragl prapra imakaisi kuno erambuka, ba ye kuiyamo wau boran ana taragl i prapra sragl ere ye akeple ditenambu?
41008037	Mo yomba ta sragl taragl i-tendre ye kuiyamo ikine endinambe?
41008038	Ana yomba epigl erme tandaglme kanekane ere ana na pre ya te na kanna pre angai gorambuka, okuwo Yomba Wam ye Nem ambuglangemo mina sunakra angelomo holi bogl unaglkwa enge, ana ye yomba i angaimo gorambuka.”
41009001	Ana ye ditongwa, “Na kaima ene diteinga, yomba tau magl ya andigl meglkwa ye goglkre mogl paimbi, God kingdom yombuglo bogl unan kanaglkwa.”
41009002	Ande enge 6 mokomugl, Yesus eremogl Pita ya Jems te Jon indre ana okuna yei tongo ende kamun muglo ta egli pi igle yene mundu meglkwa. Igle ye ongumutno-mugl Yesus nangiye yakete wu kane ta ongwa.
41009003	Ye gaglmo suna olto kruwo ere potndungwa. Ana yomba makan koglkoglo gagl alap nigl keglmbi kruwo mundu yegl ta erekrambuka.
41009004	Ana igle disaipel suwota ongumutno-mugl Elaija ya Moses wu pene embriko, ye Yesus bogl ka denbi dingwa.
41009005	Pita di Yesus tongwa, “Beke Notnga, nono igle mounga wakai pangwa. Ana no yungu akrika suwota sinamga, ta ene pre, te ta Moses pre, ana ta Elaija pre.”
41009006	(Pita sragl ka dinambuka i pirpogl sikrukwa, yeglpre ye suwota kundugl pond geglkwa.)
41009007	Ana kamun kuakawa ta plau dindre, ana ye prapra were isuna ende si yokungo ana ka ta kamun kua mina igle menda ungwa, “I na Wana, ye na wakai kaninga, ye kamo piryo.”
41009008	Ana ye tambre kaima kan winambo dingwa, ba yomba suwarata moglko kankrikwa. Yesus suwara ye bogl akiye meglkwa.
41009009	Ana ye kamun muglo ende atne wingo, Yesus ye ka giglendi ditongwa, “Ene taragl kanigwa i yomba suwarata ditekriyo, ana ene mogl-embi Yomba Wam gogl andrambuka.”
41009010	Ye Yesus dumere erikwa, ba ye yene mina mambuno bogl ka i di pirpir ere dingwa, “Gogl andrambuka I mambuno sratne?”
41009011	Ana ye krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Sraglpre lo beke teingwa yomba ye Elaija okuna kana unambedi du?”
41009012	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Pirpogl sinaglkwa, Elaija komnaiye kana undre taragl prapra erekun erambuka. Sraglpre, kamambuno muno beglkwa i yegl dingwa, ‘Okuwo Yomba Wam yumbun pond tendre ana mokono tenaglkwa?’
41009013	Ba na ene diteinga, Elaija okuna kana ungwa. Ana yomba ye taragl kanekane pirmere mere ere teingwa, ye pre ka muno beglko pamere mere kuno orkwa.”
41009014	Ye ende wu disaipelma wagle tau meglmara wingwa enge, ye kanigwa yomba merkinde ye meglmara yombugl winambodi meglko ana lo beke teingwa yomba ye bogl tengramo dingwa.
41009015	Enge i yomba prapra Yesus kandre, ye nangino kogl sipuglo dindre ana mukundi pi ye diwakai yei teingwa.
41009016	Ana Yesus krapogl disaipelma wagle tongwa, “Sraglpre ene ye bogl tengramo dime?”
41009017	Yagl suwarata yomba merkinde meglmara sunakra mogl di ikine endungwa, “Beke Notnga, na wana auro iyu ene motnara winga, spirit kinde ka dikrukwa ta ye mina suna mogl ake gidungo ana ka dikrukwa.
41009018	Enge mere spirit kinde gak i mina kongun ertre gak si piyasi makandle endungo ana gak dra euriye sungo, singiye gikir ere ana nangiye mundu diglkindi yongwa. Na ene disaipelma wagle spirit kinde simenda endinaglmedi pre krapoglka, ba ye sendinaglkwa kuno erekrukwa.”
41009019	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene pirngi dikrikwa yomba epitno. Enge sramuna na ene bogl moragle? Enge sramuna na ene akeple dinagle? Yagl gak auro iyu na moglmara wiyo.”
41009020	Yegl dungo ye yagl gak iyu Yesus moglmara wingwa. Enge i spirit kinde Yesus kandre, ye oglandi kaima gak si piyasi makan mina endungwa. Gak yange makan mina si ana berakara ere winambodi, dra euriye sungwa.
41009021	Yesus krapogl gak nem tongwa, “Enge sramuna ye yegl ere pai moglum?” Gak nem di ikine endungwa, “Yagl gak kembra moglkwa enge i ere ungwa.
41009022	Ye enge merkinde sigoragledi pre piyasi donga ya nigl mina suna endungwa. Ba ene taragl kanekane ta eratnga kuno panan, no mitno gogl ana no akeple dinoro.”
41009023	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Owo, enene pra pitn eratnga kuno eran kande, taragl prapra yomba ta pirngi dinan erambuka kuno orkwa.”
41009024	Ana gakmo nem oglandi kaima kaglkane pond orkwa, “Na pirngi dinga, ba kuno erekrukwa, ene na akeple dinatn kade pirngi dinga giglekui dinambuka!”
41009025	Yesus kangwa yomba merkinde ye meglmara mukundi mangigl wingo ana ye spirit kinde ka-tendre, dungwa, “Ene kinan gidi ana ka dikitnga spirit. Na ene diteinga, ene gak mina ende menda undre, ana aglketa ende gak mina suna pikro.”
41009026	Ana spirit kinde kaglkane ere, gak muglkumdi si yakemakete pandigl ana ende menda ungwa. Ana yagl gakmo i goglkwa mereyegl pango yomba merkinde dingwa, “Ye goglkwa.”
41009027	Ba Yesus gakmo ongo akindre ana ake bonduglko ye anduglkwa.
41009028	Okuwo Yesus ende yungugl ongo, yene disaipelma wagle mundu krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Sraglpre no spirit kinde simenda endekrumune?”
41009029	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Taragl tau mina tamanga, kamange mina suwara taragl yeglmere ende menda unambuka.”
41009030	Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl dumo igle kindekondo ana du endpi Galili eingwa. Ye aglokra meglmara i yomba suwarata pirkan erekraglmedi prukwa,
41009031	sraglpre ye disaipelma wagle ka beke tendre, ditongwa, “Yomba Wam ye indre yaglkumba onguno mina endimbi ana ye sigoraglkwa, ba ande enge suwota eran ye andigl ukor enambuka.”
41009032	Ana disaipel wagle Yesus sraglpre dungwa i ye mambuno pirkrikwa, ba ye krapogl tenamnedi pirkwa ba kundugl geglkwa.
41009033	Ye ende Kaperneam undre ana ende yungugl pi kondingo, Yesus krapogl disaipelma wagle tongwa, “Sraglpre ene konbauna bange tengramo dime?”
41009034	Ba ye kurita di ikine endekrikwa, sraglpre konbauna bange ye yene mina ira kande moglmedi tengramo dingwa pre.
41009035	Yesus amedi ana disaipel 12 agle dindre, ditongwa, “Yomba ta mogl okuna endinagledi piran kade ana ye okuwo kaima mogltre ana yomba prapra konguno yoko ere to do.”
41009036	Ana Yesus gak kembra suwarata indre ana endungwa ye meglmara gumanomugl sunakra andigl moglkwa. Yesus eremogl gakmo ongo komba mina koglkoglo ake mogl ana disaipelma wagle ditongwa,
41009037	“Yomba ta gak kembra yeglmere suwarata na kangina mina di-inan, ye na diyungwa. Ana yomba ta na di-inan, ye na suwara ta di ikrukwa, ba ye na diendungo winga yomba i ama akiye diyungwa.”
41009038	Jon di Yesus tongwa, “Beke Notnga, no kamga, yagl ta ene kangin mina spirit kinde simenda endungo ana no erekrodi mane ditomga. Sraglpre ye nono bogl akiye wankrukwa.”
41009039	Yesus ditongwa, “Mane ditekriyo, yomba ta na kangina mina kimagl ertre, enge sungunagle ta endinan ka kinde kanekane na pre ta dikraglkwa.
41009040	Yomba ta nono erekinde ere norokrambuka i nono yombano.
41009041	Na ene kaima diteinga sraglpre, na kangina mina ene Krais yombamo we dindre, niglkor kap suwarata kogl tenan, ye topomo ta wau boglkrambuka.
41009042	“Gak kembra yeglmere ta na pre pirngidi moran ana yomba ta gak i tandaglme erambedi bagl nusinan, i wakai kaima, yaglmo dumugl kombuglo kande ta ye nungo mina kane kogl pandigl ana piyasi mundi nigl atne endinaglkwa.
41009043	Ene ongun ta eran pirngi dinga gugl sinan tandaglme etn, ana sigoglumdi endo. I wakai kaima, ene ongun suwara panan kor aimande moratnga inatniwo. Te ongun suwo panan ene ende guglo kamun donga gongokrukwa depamara igle suna enatnga.
41009044	Dumo igle kimin negle goglkre meglmara ya donga bauglo gongokre depamara suna endinaglkwa.
41009045	Ana ene katn tandaglme erondi eran, ene pirngi dinga gugl sinan, ana sigoglumdi endo. Katn koglo ekrike panan i wakai kaima, kor aimande moratnga inatniwo. Katn suwo-akiye panan ana ene piyasi guglo kamun suna endinambrika.
41009046	Dumo igle kimin negle goglkre meglmara te donga bauglo gongokre depamara suna endinaglkwa.
41009047	Te ene ongumutn tandaglme erondi eran ana pogl endo. Ongumutn suwara panan i wakai yene, ene God kingdomo mina suna enatnga. Ana ongumutn suwo-akiye panan ene piyasi guglo kamun suna endinambuka.
41009048	Igle “‘Ye kimin negle goglkrikwa giugl kaglmbi, te endi donga denaglkwa i gongokrambuka.’
41009049	Prapra donga nangino mina mundi mereyegl de ake beinambuka.
41009050	“Mundi taragl wakai. Ba mundi druwomo dundinan, ene srambre mere ere druwomo aglke ikine endinambe? Enene mina suna mundi panan, ana ene prapra akiye nomano bipokndi yenan molo.”
41010001	Yesus dumo igle kindekondo, ana ende Judia makan kande pi ana Jodan Nigle sipraksi ende koglo ongwa. Ana yomba merkinde aglkekor ye moglmara wingo ana ye engenge ormere ikra ere beke tongwa.
41010002	Ana Parisi wagle tau ye moglmara undre ana aglau ta erambo mo di krapogl teingwa, “Dinoro, nono lono mina yagl ta embiye pra sendo dumo?”
41010003	Yesus krapogl ikine endungwa, “Moses sragl lo ene dito du?”
41010004	Ye yegl di ikine endingwa, “Moses yegl eriyo dungwa, yagl ta embiye si endinagledi eran, ye ambu sendingwa pepa muno ta bogl tendre ana embiye sendo do dungwa.”
41010005	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Lo i ene pre Moses muno bogl tongwa. Sraglpre, ene nomano giglekui dungwa ana ka beke tenan pir inaglkwa mere kuno erekrukwa.
41010006	Ba, ‘God kamun makan mambuno bogl ere yongwa enge, ana yagl ya ambu beke yongwa.’
41010007	‘Ana mambuno yeglpre, yagl nem ya mam kondo ana ye embiye bogl wu suwara embir
41010008	ana ye suwo nangino wu yomba suwara nangiye orkwa. Yeglpre ye suwo moglkiurka, ye yomba suwara miurka.
41010009	Yeglpre taragl God tongumasi i-suwara endungwa. I kaima yomba ta simbiglkidi i perepere endekraglkwa.”
41010010	Ana ye prapra aglke ende ikine yungugl eingwa enge, disaipel wagle Yesus dungwa ipre krapogl teingwa.
41010011	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ta embiye sende ana ambu ta inan, yaglmo i ambu kunogl gundungwa.
41010012	Ana kuno yegl ambu i eremogl wiye sende ana yagl kor ta enan, ambumo i yagl kunogl gundungwa.”
41010013	Yomba tau gak kembra Yesus akenambedi pre auro iyu ye moglmara wingwa. Ba disaipel wagle yomba ka-teingwa.
41010014	Ana Yesus i kandre, ye munduwo kinde orko ana disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene kan winge erimbi gak kembra na moglmara wiyondo, ana ene ye i-teke pandiglkriyo. Sraglpre, God kingdom imbo gak kembra yeglmere moraglkwa ye pre yongwa.
41010015	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta gak kembra yeglmere moglkran God kingdomo ta ikrambuka. Kaima yene suna ta pikrambuka.”
41010016	Ana ye gak kembra kungro i-magl komba mina ende suwarandi ongo bitno mina yei ana kamange ere tongwa.
41010017	Yesus mambuno bogl endongo yagl ta mukundi wu Yesus guma mina undre, yange goglko bondugl tendre ana krapogl tongwa, “Beke Notnga, yagl wakai, na sragl ere kor aimande moraglka inagle?”
41010018	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Sraglpre ene na wakai we dine? Yomba wakai ta moglkrikwa, ba God suwara wakai moglkwa.
41010019	Ene lo prapra pitnga: ‘Ambu kunogl gundokro, yomba ta sigoglkro, kunogl gogl nekro, kakimbi dikro, ana nen ya man dinambrere ero.’”
41010020	Ana yagl i dungwa, “Beke Notnga, na yagl gak kembra moglka enge lo i prapra pamere mere pinande erika.”
41010021	Ana Yesus toro mendigl pandigl kandre ana ye wakai kan dungwa, “Ene taragl suwarata erekitnga, ene endpi, taragl ake-nenga prapra topo bogl indre, ana moni ipi kiuglgiunde yomba to. Ana ene heven suna taragl wakai mere paitenambuka, yegl ertre ana okuwo na wimara wo.”
41010022	Yagl gakmugl ka i pirtre gumadra wu kinde ongo, ye kinde pir endongwa. Sraglpre, ye diminge merkinde paitongwa pre.
41010023	Yesus kan winambo dindre ana disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yomba taragl merkinde paitenambuka ye yombuglo ere ende God kingdomo mina suna enamunedi eraglkwa ba manambuka.”
41010024	Ana disaipel wagle ye kamo i pirtre sipuglo dingwa. Ba Yesus aglke dungwa, “Gak wagle, yomba ende God kingdomo suna enamunedi eraglkwa i yombuglo kaima pangwa!
41010025	Bugla-kamel kar kuiye mina ende suna enan kuno erambuka. Ba yomba taragl merkinde paitongwa God kingdomo mina suna enagledi eran kuno erekrambuka.”
41010026	Ana disaipel wagle ka i pir sipuglo pond dindre ana ye yene di imboriya endingwa, “Yegl panan God kingdom okuwo ira pi ereinambe?”
41010027	Yesus toro ye kandre ana dungwa, “Yomba taragl prapra eraglkwa kuno erekrukwa, ba God taragl prapra erambuka kuno orkwa.”
41010028	Ana Pita di Yesus tongwa, “Kanno, no taragl prapra kindekondo ene unara umga!”
41010029	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, na pre ya te kamambuno wakai pre ye yungumo toglmo mo, angiglma mo ambaglma mo nem mo mam mo nangiglma mo kaiya mokna togl kondinan,
41010030	ye enge erme 100 merkinde i-ende mitna enambuka, ana ye yungumo toglmo mo angiglma mo ambaglma mo mama mo nangiglma mo kaiya mokna togl, te yumbun indre mogl enan ana okuwo enge ta unan ye kor aimande meglkwa inambuka.
41010031	Ba erme yomba mere ende komnaiye wingwa, ye ende okuwo embi, te yomba mere okuwo wingwa ana ende okuna enaglkwa.”
41010032	Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl ende egli Jerusalem enamunedi konbauna ende eingo, Yesus konbo okuna yei tongo ana disaipel wagle nomano kanekane yeingwa. Ana yomba tau akiye omara mokomugl eingwa, ye kundugl geglkwa. Aglkekor ye disaipel 12 aglendi i-bina ende ana taragl ye mina plau dinambuka ipre ditongwa.
41010033	“Piryo, nono ende yenda Jerusalem omun, ana Yomba Wam tekoglo pris kande wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba mina endimbi, ana ka dikogl ye sigoramune dindre ana tekoglo Yomba Bina onguno mina endinaglkwa.
41010034	Ana ye bakagl tendre, eursi te, kumba wip si ana ye sigoraglkwa. Ba ande enge suwota mina ye andigl ukor enambuka.”
41010035	Ana Jems ya Jon, Sebedi wam suwo Yesus moglmara undre dimbrika, “Beke Notnga, no taragl ta pre kra porambuglka i ene dinambuglere ere noratnga.”
41010036	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene na sragl ere norambedi pirmbre?”
41010037	Ye di ikine endimbrika, “Ene ambuglange botnen mina suna moratnga enge, no kanwinge etn ene bogl akiye ongun wokra ta moran ye ongun kondakra ta moran erambuglka.”
41010038	Yesus ditongwa, “Ene taragl kra peurka i mambuno ta pirpogl sikiurka. Na nigl mingi ninaglmara i ene pra ninambro mo? Te na baptais eraglmere kuno yeglmere ene ama erambro?”
41010039	Ye di ikine endimbrika, “No pra kuno orkwa.” Yesus ditongwa, “Na nigl mingi ninaglmara i ene kaima yene nendre, te na baptais eraglmere kuno yeglmere ene ombugl erambrika,
41010040	ba onguna wokra amedinaglkwa mo kondakra, i na ta moglo ditenaglka kuno erekrukwa. Dumo yeglmere yomba inaglmedi pre God akekun ere kondungwa yongwa.”
41010041	Disaipel wagle ye ka i pirkwa enge, deno pond kumbro Jems ya Jon teingwa.
41010042	Ana Yesus eremogl ye prapra aglendi makai sindre ana dungwa, “Ene i pirkwa, Yomba Bina kingno kande mogl-mitna ende yombano teingwa. Te king kongunmo yomba kande ye yombano no kanno pinande eraglmedi yombuglo gigledi kaima tongwa.
41010043	Ene mina mambuno yegl paikrano. Yomba ta ene wagle kande eragledi piran kade, ye ene nitno konguno yomba moglo do.
41010044	Ana yomba ta mogl komuno endinagledi piran kade, ana ye yomba prapra nitno konguno yoko erondo.
41010045	Te Yomba Wam na akepledi naraglmedi pre ta ukrukwa. Taman, ye yomba akepledi tendre ana ye kor wanmoglkwa i kindekondo, ana yomba merkinde topo ere i-ikine endinagledi pre ungwa.”
41010046	Ye ende wu Jeriko wingwa, ana Yesus ya disaipelma wagle yomba merkinde bogl akiye ye siti kondo ende menda wingo, yagl ongumuglo mim orkwa ta kangiye Batimias, ye Timias wam, konbauna menda amedi mogl taragl ta naraglmedi pre yana di-di orkwa.
41010047	Ana ye pruko i Yesus Nasaret nem umiwo dingo pirtre ana ye mambuno bogl kaglkane yungwa, “Yesus Devit Wam, na mitna goglo!”
41010048	Ana yomba merkinde ye katendre ana kiendi moglo dingwa. Ba ye kaglkane binan bogl yungwa, “Devit Wam, ene na mitna goglo!”
41010049	Yesus andigl mogltre ana dungwa, “Ye agle diyo.” Ana ye ongumuglo mim orkwa yagle agle dindre, dingwa, “Ene gunyei andiglo. Ye ene pre agle dungwa.”
41010050	Ye gaglmo suna olto piyasi eglke ende ana ye puglondi andigl, ende Yesus moglmara ungwa.
41010051	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene na sragl ere narambedi pitne?” Ana ongumuglo mim orkwa yagle ye dungwa, “Beke Notnga, na pinedi kanagledi pirka.”
41010052	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Endpo, enene pirnginen erewakai ere tongwa.” Oglandi kaima ye pinedi kandre ana Yesus konbauna omara mokomugl ongwa.
41011001	Ye ende Jerusalem kamun mangigl wingo Olip Kamun Muglo mogltre Betfasi te Betani dumo magl yomara meglkwa. Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle suwo di okuna ende,
41011002	ye erambirere mere ditongwa, “Yungu epigl nongagle yomara iro pi ana ene ende suna iro pindre kanambrika, dongi gakmugl ta kane kogl pandiglko pangwa. Dongi i yomba ta bolamugl amedi mogl ausi i-wankrikwa. Kane poko ende, ana i magl ya wiro.
41011003	Ana yomba ta ene krapogl tendre, ‘Sraglpre ene yegl erimbre?’ dimbi, ana ene ye diteiro, ‘Yaglkande kongunmo ta pangwa ertre, ana oglandi te ikine endinambuka.’”
41011004	Ana ye pindre kanbrika dongi gakmugl i konbauna bina, yungu dramugl kane kogl endingwa pai moglkwa. Ana ye kane poko miurko,
41011005	yomba tau igle andigl mogl krapogl teingwa, “Ene sragl era pre dongi kane pokimbre?”
41011006	Yesus ka diro ditomere ikra di ikine endimbriko ana yomba ye kanwinge eriko dongi indre ende embrika.
41011007	Ye dongi yu Yesus moglmara undre ana ye gatno suna olto gugl moko bolamugl yembriko ana Yesus bolamugl amedi moglkwa.
41011008	Yomba merkinde gatno suna olto gugl konbauna kugl yei eingwa. Te tau ye endi yaundongo ere yaglmara bukondi yu kugl ake waidi yeingwa.
41011009	Ana yomba tau ende okuna eingo te yomba tau okuwo wingo ana mambuno bogl mangre kaglka dingwa, “God dembiye siyo!” “God ye erewakai ere tongwa, ye Yaglkande kangiye mina ungwa!”
41011010	“God dembiyesi mitna imbo kaima endiyo! Nono neno King Devit yungumo ombuno mina suna, king kor ta ungwa i God erewakai ere tenambuka!”
41011011	Yesus ende Jerusalem suna pindre ana ende God holi yungumo togl suna ongwa. Ye kan winambodi taragl prapra erikwa i kangwa. Ba ande gungugl dungo, ye disaipelma 12 bogl ende menda Betani kamun eingwa.
41011012	Ana tangina ye prapra Betani kondo ende ikine wingo, Yesus kindan goglkwa.
41011013	Ana ye eglke dagl mogl kango endi kogla ta yaundo pangwa, ana endimo i mongo tau kogl pamedi pre Yesus magl ongwa. Ba ye doko kango, yaundo keunde pangwa. Sraglpre, endi kogla mongo keglkwa engemo yeikrukwa.
41011014	Ana Yesus endimo i ditongwa, “Yomba suwarata ene mina mongon aglketa nekraglkwa.” Ana disaipelma wagle ye ka dungwa i pirkwa.
41011015	Ana ye Jerusalem plau dingo, Yesus God holi yungumo togl suna pindre ana igle mambuno bogl yomba taragl topo bogl ingo te topo eriko ere meglkwa i prapra simenda endungwa. Ye yomba moni topo ere imboriya ende botno i ya te ende egle yomba amedi mogl kua yumugl topo bogl ingwa i prapra ake i-yake tongwa.
41011016	Ana ye yomba suwarata kan winge eran God holi yungumo togl suna taragl kanekane ta kake ipikraglkwa.
41011017	Ana Yesus yomba ditendre dungwa, “Kamambuno mina muno yegl beglko pangwa. God dungwa, “‘Yomba na yunguna i kangiye kamange yungu we dinaglkwa.’ Ba ene erikwa wu ‘kunogl gogl yomba dumono’ yeglmere orkwa.”
41011018	Ana pris kande wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba ye ka i pirtre ana sigora pre mambuno bogl konbauna tau dokingwa. Ba ye Yesus kunduglmo geglkwa. Sraglpre yomba prapra ye ka beke tongwa ipre sipuglo dingwa.
41011019	Enge igle mim panagledi magl orko ana Yesus disaipelma bogl siti kondo ende menda eingwa.
41011020	Tangina kinde kana ye disaipelma wagle bogl konbauna endpi kaningo, endi kogla mundu gigle gogl endpi duglo mina poriya sungwa.
41011021	Yesus enduwe taragl plau dinambe dungwa ikra Pita pir mogl ana Yesus ditongwa, “Beke Notnga, kano! Ene endi kogla mangaglsi tengra ikra gigle goglkwa.”
41011022	Yesus ka mongo di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene God pirngi ditenaglkwa.
41011023	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta kamun muglo i yegl ditenambuka, andigl enene puglondi ende mundi nigle suna po dinan, ana ye nomane suwo yeikrambuka. Ye taragl dungwa i plau dinambedi pre pirngi dinan, i pradumere erambuka.
41011024	Yeglpre na ene diteinga, ene taragl ta pre kamange ere krapogltre taragl inagliwo di pirngi dimin, ana taraglmo i inatnga.
41011025	Ana ene andigl mogl kamange eratnga enge, yomba tandaglme kanekane ta ene ere tembi panan ana kindekondo teiyo.
41011026	Yeglmere Nen heven suna moglkwa, ene tandaglmen ama prapra kinde kondo tenambuka.”
41011027	Yesus disaipelma bogl kordagl wu Jerusalem suna plau dingo ana igle Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo suna konbo wanmoglko, ana pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba ya te yomba mina ende okuna eingwa, Yesus moglmara undre,
41011028	ana krapogl teingwa, “Ira ene yombuglo gigledi tongo ene taragl i prapra etn? Ene ira taragl yegl erondi yombuglo gigledi tome?”
41011029	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na ene ka kra suwarata pogl tenaglka. Ene ka mongo di ikine ende narimbi ana na sragl yombuglo gigledi mina taragl i prapra erika, i ene ditenaglka.
41011030	Jon eremogl yomba baptais ere tongwa i God mina umo mo, yomba mina ume? Dinariyo!”
41011031	Ye yene mina suna ka i di imboriya ende ana dingwa, “Nono heven ume dumun, ana ye ka kra porambuka, ‘Sraglpre ene Jon pirngidi tekrime?’
41011032	Ba nono yomba mina ume dumuno i kuno erekrambuka.” (Sraglpre, ye yomba prapra Jon propet kaima ta moglmedi pirkwa.)
41011033	Yeglpre ye Yesus diteingwa, “No ta pirkunga.” Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Na ama sragl yombuglo gigledi indre taragl i prapra erika, i ene ta ditekraglka.”
41012001	Ana Yesus ka di simbogl ditongwa, “Yagl suwarata wain ereyagl togl ere winambo dindre, wain nuglo dukunaglmedi pre maugl pere yei ana kuie moraglkwa pre yungu oltokuri mitna imbo keingwa. Ana ye wain toglmo topo gundo inagledi pre kongun ere yagl-yagl erikwa yomba tau tendre, ana ye yungumo kindekondo ende konbo eglke ta ongwa.
41012002	Ana wain mongo urikwa enge yongo ye nigl kongunmo yomba suwarata wain togl sugl meglmara pi mongo tau urikwa imakai sinambedi pre diendungwa.
41012003	Ba sugl meglkwa yomba ikra kongun yomba akegidi mogl, ere sindre ana endingo taragl ta ikre yoko ende ikine ongwa.
41012004	Ana wain togl nemyagl nigl kongunmo yomba ta ama di meglmara endungo, ana ye bre mina sindre angai kinde gorambedi ere teingwa.
41012005	Te kongun yomba ta ama diendungwa. Ana yaglmo suwara i ye sigeglkwa. Ana ye tau ama kuno yeglmere diendungo, ana tau ye ere sindre, tau sigeglkwa.
41012006	“Ye suwarata yoko moglkwa ana diendinambuka, i yene wam suwara; ye wakai kangwa. Okuwo kaima yene wam di ende, dungwa, ‘Ye na wana, kan gunyei tenaglkwa.’
41012007	“Ba wain togl kongun yomba yene di ikine ikine endingwa, ‘I wain togl nemyagl wam. Wiyo, ye sigogltre ana wain toglmo nono inamga.’
41012008	Yegl dindre ana ye wam indre sigogl ana yonobriye wain togl mina piyasi menda endingwa.”
41012009	Ana Yesus krapoglkwa, “Okuwo wain togl nemyagl sragl erambe? Ye undre ana wain togl kongun erikwa yomba sigogl, ana wain togl kongun i yomba tau tenambuka.
41012010	Kaima ene kamambuno okuna muno beglkwa i kerekrimo? “‘Kamda wagle kombuglo kinde wedi egla pagl menda endingwa, ba kombuglomo i giglendi kauglange sunawom pangwa.
41012011	I Yaglkande yene orkwa, ana i no ongumutno mina wakai kaima kamga.’”
41012012	Ana Juda yomba kande wagle Yesus kane sinamnedi konbauna ta dokingwa. Sraglpre ye pirkwa, Yesus ka di simbogl dungwa i ye pre mendigl pandigl dungwa. Ba ye yomba mere kundutno geglkwa. Yeglpre ye kindekondo ana ende eingwa.
41012013	Okuwo ye eremogl Parisi wagle ya te Herot yombama wagle tau ye Yesus kamo pirtre kane sinaglmedi pre diendungwa.
41012014	Ye Yesus moglmara undre ana dingwa, “Beke Notnga, no punga ene ka kaima dindre ana yomba ta kundutno goglkitnga. Sraglpre, ene yomba sraglmere meglkwa i ene ta kinan gundo pirkitnga. Ba God prumere kaima yomba beke tenga. No dinoro, pra kuno eran no takis Sisa Rom yagl kande tenamuno mo tekramne?
41012015	Nono takis pra tenamuno mo tekramne?” Ba ye kakimbi dingwa i Yesus pirtre ana ye krapogl tongwa, “Sraglpre ene na diporamnedi pre dime? Moni mongo suwarata i na moglka wimbi ana na kanimbo.”
41012016	Ye moni mongo ta i-wingo ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “I ira kuiyamo pam? Te ira kangiye pam?” Ye di ikine ende teingwa, “Sisa kuiyamo ya te kangiye pangwa.”
41012017	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Sisa taraglmo Sisa teiyo, te God taraglmo God teiyo.” Ana ye prapra Yesus kamo i pirtre sipuglo dingwa.
41012018	Ana Sadyusi wagle ye yomba geglkwa ta andiglkraglme dingwa yomba, ye ka kra ta poramnedi pre Yesus moglmara undre ana dingwa,
41012019	“Beke Notnga, Moses lo i nono pre muno bogl norkwa, yagl ta angigle goran ana embiye morambuka, ba nangigle ta moglkrimbi, ana angigle ambu werai i kambe nendre ana gak angigle pre kugl tenambuka.
41012020	Enge suwarata angiglma angiglma 7 meglkwa, angro komuno ambu ta indre ana gak ta kugl yeikre goglkwa.
41012021	Ana angigle okuwo ambumo werai suwara i kambe nongwa. Ba ye ama gak ta kugl yeikre goglkwa, ana angigle 3 kuno yegl keunde erikwa.
41012022	Kaima yene angiglma 7 ikra prapra ambu suwara i indre ana gak ta kugl yeikre gogl kendingwa. Okuwo kaima ambumo ama goglkwa.
41012023	Angiglma angiglma 7 prapra okuna ambumo suwara i ingwa, ana yomba geglkwa andraglkwa enge ambumo i ira embiye morambe?”
41012024	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene kuno pamere ta dikrikwa. Sraglpre ene God kamo mambuno pepa, mo God yombuglomo ta pirpogl sikrikwa.
