41012025	Yomba geglkwa andraglkwa enge, yagl ambu ye bogl ikraglkwa. Ye angelo heven suna meglmere yeglmere moraglkwa.
41012026	Ba yomba geglkwa andraglkwa ene Moses pepamo mina suna kerekrimo? Okuna imbo endi mina suna donga dongwa i God ye pre ka sraglmere ditongwa, ‘Na Abraham Godmo mogl, Aisak Godmo mogl, ana Jekop Godmo moglka.’
41012027	God yomba geglkwa Godno manga, ba yomba kormeglkwa Godno. Ene yomba geglkwa andiglkraglme dingwa i aglau kinde kaima erikwa.”
41012028	Lo beke teingwa yomba suwarata undre ana ye pruko ka tengramo dingwa. Ana ye kango Sadyusi wagle kanno Yesus wakai yene ere di ikine ende tongo, ana ye krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Lo prapra pangwa i sragl lo gumamugl kaima pame?”
41012029	Ana Yesus ka mongo ditongwa, “Lo gumamugl kaima i yegl pangwa, ‘Piryo, ene Israel yomba, Yaglkande nono Godno, ye suwara Yaglkande.
41012030	Yaglkande Godno, ene deno munduno mina ya, kuiyano mina ya, nomano mina ya, te yomburo mina prapra kanwakai yenaglkwa.’
41012031	Ana lo ta mokomugl pangwa i yegl, ‘Enene pre wakai kanere yeglmere, ana yomba ene motnara magl meglkwa i wakai kano.’ Lo tau ta kande pai mina ende suwo i ta engrekrikwa.”
41012032	Ana lo beke tongwa yomba ta di ikine endungwa, “Beke Notnga, wakai we, ene kuno ere dinga. God suwara Yaglkande moglkwa. Ana god tau ta manga, ba ye suwara.
41012033	Ene God wakai kanatnga i den mundun mina ya, poglodi pitnara ya, yombutn mina prapra akiye, ana enene wakai kanatnere yeglmere, ene motnara yomba magl meglkwa i wakai kanatnga. Lo suwo i kande kaima pandre ana kombuglange gaglkwa ya ofa teingwa i engre atne endungwa.”
41012034	Enge i Yesus kango ye wakai ere di ikine endungo ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene God kingdomo mina eglkekuri ta moglkitnga.” Ana mokomugl i yomba suwarata Yesus krapogl tenaglkwa mere manga.
41012035	Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo yomara togl suna yomba ka bekete mogltre ana ye krapoglkwa, “Sraglpre lo beke teingwa yomba Mesaia ye Devit wam we dime?
41012036	Devit ye yene Holi Spirit akeple dungo ana dipendigl endungwa, “‘Yaglkande di na Yaglkandena tongwa, “Na onguna wokra ya amedi mogl endenan, na kundan ikine prapra ene katn mina atnekra yenaglka.” ’
41012037	Devit yene Krais pre ‘Yaglkande’ we dungwa. Sraglmere Krais, Devit wam moglme?” Yomba merkinde Yesus kamo pir gun yeingwa.
41012038	Ana Yesus ka bekete mogltre yegl dungwa, “Lo beke teingwa yomba i ene kanpogl siyo, ye gagl olto ende indre wanmoun, ana maket dumo suna yomba no diwakai yenaglmedi pre yegl erikwa.
41012039	Ana makai yungu yungugl bogl wakai kaima mina amedi mogltre, te mokna bir nemara ye dembino sinaglmedi angai nongagle ingwa.
41012040	Ye ambu werai wagle bakaglte yunguno wausi indre ana yomba no kanaglmedi kamange oltokuri erikwa. Yomba yegl erikwa i okuwo yumbun kandekinde kaima inaglkwa.”
41012041	Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo mina ofa yeimara dumo koglokra magl amedi mogltre ana yomba merkinde ye monino ofa teingo kanmoglkwa. Ana yomba merkinde moni paitongwa pre moni kande piyasi suna endingwa.
41012042	Ba ambu werai kiuglgiunde ta undre ana moni mongo gogl kembra suwokagle ipi tongwa. Moni mongo i 1 toya mere kuno orkwa.
41012043	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle prapra aglendi moglmara ende ana dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ambu werai gonduglme i moni endemara ende kawate yomba mere engrukwa.
41012044	Yomba prapra moni mere paitongwa, ana ye kuri ta te menda endingwa, ba ambu i paitongwa mere mundu ende kondungwa. Ye okuwo ta yenan ere ninambuka manga.”
41013001	Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo kondo ende menda ungo ana disaipelma wagle ye mina suwara ta yegl ditongwa, “Beke Notnga, kano! Kombuglo kande wakai wakai ya yungu wakai wakai keingwa.”
41013002	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene yungu kandekinde yeingwa i kanimo? Kombuglo kembra kinde yongwa ya suwarata, kombuglo ta mina bolamugl yeikrambuka, prapra sigurndi piyasi atne endinaglkwa.”
41013003	Yesus Olip Kamun Muglo amedi mogltre ana kan koglo God holi yungumo ende moglko, Pita ya, Jems ya, Jon te Andru, ana yene mundu ye moglmara undre krapogl teingwa,
41013004	“No dinoro, taragl i enge aunake plau dinambe? Deu sraglmere plau dinan kandre ana taragl i prapra pai inambuka magl ormedi piramne?”
41013005	Yesus disaipelma ditongwa, “Sugl wakai molo. Ene kanwinge erimbi yomba suwarata kakimbi dite dinaglmiwo.
41013006	Yomba merkinde na kangina mina undre ana yene pre, na Krais we dindre ana yomba merkinde bakagl tenaglkwa.
41013007	Ana ene kunda kande mangigl wora bogl mangre kaglka dimbi pirtre, te kunda kande eglke beglmbi ka boglo kiglmbi piraglkwa enge, ene sipuglodi kundugl goglkriyo. Taragl yeglmere pra plau dinambuka, ba enge kande unambuka magl erekrukwa.
41013008	Kantri ta yomba pi kantri ta yomba kunda bogl tenambuka. Te king ta yombamo bogl pi king ta kunda bogl tenambuka. Te imem bange bange unan ana kindan kande yenambuka. Taragl yeglmere okuna kana plau dinambuka i ambu gak kuramnedi nangino giu geglkwa yeglmere.
41013009	“Ene enene sugl wakai moraglmiwo. Ene kane sindre ana auro i kaunsol mina enaglkwa. Te makai yungu yungugl kra ene kumba sinaglkwa. Te gavman yomba kande ya king ye mambro mina na kangina pre ere ene auro ipi endimbi andigl mogltre, ana kamambuno diteiyo.
41013010	Ana okuna kana kamambuno wakai dipene ende tembi makan koglkoglo yomba prapra piraglkwa.
41013011	Ene sikane sindre ana auro i kot mina enaglkwa enge, ana sragl ka dinamunedi pir yumbun dekriyo. Enge igle ka ta tenambuka i keunde diyo, ka dinaglkwa i ene kanno ta dikrikwa, ba ka i Holi Spirit dipendigl endinambuka.
41013012	“Yomba yene angro kaima tekoglo yaglkumba onguno mina endimbi sigoraglkwa, ana neno kuno yegl keunde ere yene nangro tenaglkwa. Te nangro kan akete yene neno mano ere sindre ana yomba tembi ye sigoraglkwa.
41013013	Ana yomba prapra ene kankinde yenaglkwa i na kangina ene mina pangwa pre yegl eraglkwa. Ba yomba ta ye andigl giglendi moran ana enge pradinan God eremogl yombamo i ereinambuka.
41013014	“Ene kanimbi taragl kinde kaima i paikrambara dumo suna igle andigl panambuka. (Yomba ka i kerambuka mambuno sraglmere pangwa i pir dime dinambuka.) Ana yomba Judia kamun suna meglkwa, teke undupagl ere ende kamun muglo enaglkwa.
41013015	Ana yagl ta yene yungumo indaule mogltre ende atne yungugl pi taragl kanekane ta imenda endekrambuka.
41013016	Ama yomba ta kongunmo mina suna wanmoglkwa, i ta ende ikine yungugl pi yene gaglmo suna olto ikrambuka.
41013017	Enge i ambu gak dano meglkwa ya te ambu gak am temeglkwa, ye yumbun pond inaglkwa.
41013018	Kamun kumbosi bi erambuka enge, taragl i plau dikrambuka pre God kamange ere tenaglkwa.
41013019	Sraglpre, enge i yumbun gaglebogl kaima plau dinambuka, God makan koglkoglo mambuno bogl taragl ere yongwa enge i ende erme ungwa, yumbun yeglmere ta paikrukwa. Ana okuwo yumbun kuno yeglmere ta ama paikrambuka.
41013020	Ba Yaglkande okuna kana enge i ta simbiglkidi ake i-sungunagle endekruma daglma, yomba suwarata kor-moglkriko, ba ye yomba pinde i-kondungwa ipre ere, enge i ake bange sungunagle endungwa.
41013021	Ana enge igle yomba ta ene yegl ditenambuka, ‘Kaniyo, Mesaia moglkwa ya!’ Mo, ‘Kaniyo, ye koglo moglkwa imbo.’ Ene i pirngidi tekriyo.
41013022	Mesaia kakimbi wagle ya te propet kakimbi wagle plau dindre ana ye diu ya kimagl kanekane ere ana God pinde yungwa yomba nomano si du ende tenaglkwa. Ba ye pra kuno eran yegl eraglkwa.
41013023	Yeglpre ene sugl wakai molo, na okuna kana taragl plau dinambuka i prapra ene dite kondinga.
41013024	“Ana enge i yumbun kande plau dinan mokomugl “‘ande akemim erambuka, te ba ambuglangemo dekrambuka.
41013025	Te kugl-kuri kamun mitna yange atne simbi, ana kamun mitna suna kra wau yomara taragl gigle dungwa paingwa i prapra pingakar dinaglkwa.’
41013026	“Ana enge igle Yomba Wam kamun kua mina sunakra yombuglomo kande ya ambuglangemo bogl unan ana yomba kanaglkwa.
41013027	Ana ye angelomo endpi makan uglomugl koglkoglo God yomba pinde i-pere endungwa meglkwa i indre, ana pi makan uglo yei dundumara i ya kamun mitna uglomugl pra imakai sinaglkwa.
41013028	“Endi kogla mambunomo i beke piryo, yongagle nuglo mogl ana muno numbun mogl poko ende yaundo wakai sungo ana ene ande akan panambuka enge magl orkwa pamiwodi pirkwa.
41013029	Kuno yeglmere, ene taragl i prapra kanaglkwa enge ene piraglkwa, enge magl orko Yomba Wam ende unagledi akekun ere yungu dra mina moglkwa.
41013030	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba epigl erme meglkwa i prapra goglkrimbi taragl i prapra plau dinambuka.
41013031	Kamun mitna ya makan okuwo wau borambrika. Ba na kanna prapra ta wau boglkrambuka.
41013032	“Yomba suwarata ande enge ya ande kuiya pirkrikwa. Sragl i enge aunake plau dinambuka, i angelo heven suna meglkwa, mo Wam akiye pirkrukwa. Ba Nem suwara prukwa.
41013033	Ene ugl paikre sugl wakai molo, sraglpre enge i aunake unambuka ene pirpogl sikrikwa.
41013034	I yagl ta ende eglkekuri enagledi ormere yegl, yene yungumo kondo ana kongunmo yomba sugl moraglmedi suwara suwarandi konguno eraglkwa pre yumbu sitendre, ana yungu dra mina sugl moglkwa yagle i sugl aimande kanmoglo ditongwa.
41013035	“Yeglpre ene ama sugl wakai molo, sraglpre, ene pirkre moraglkwa enge ana yungu nemyagl ende ikine unambuka. Ana ye kamun pokndinan unambuka mo, enduwer suna unambuka mo, konduwagle kumugl wi sinan mo, tangina kinde mo, ande koragle sinan unambuka, i ene ta pirkrikwa.
41013036	Ye oglandi kaima ta unan, ene ugl pai meglmbi kan-dinambiwo.
41013037	Na ka i ene diteinga, kamo i na yomba prapra diteinga, ‘Sugl wakai molo!’”
41014001	Pasova enge kande bret yis paikrukwa keunde bir ninaglkwa ana enge suwo yoko pango ana pris kande wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba Yesus kanesi sigoramnedi kimbi koglo ere teke yeingwa.
41014002	Ba ye dingwa, “Nono enge kade mina yegl erekramga, yegl oun kade yomba deno kumbro kunda boraglkwa.”
41014003	Betani kamun Saimon kaglande sungwa yagle kei pamara Yesus pi yungugl mogl kaiya mokna ne moglko ana ambu ta yungugl ungwa. Ye mingi giglendi ta kungo demine orkwa kausi moglko yungwa, i topo kande boglkwa, ana ambumo i mingi siblendi ana kungo toindi Yesus bre mina endungwa.
41014004	Yomba tau igle meglkwa deno kumbruko ye yene di imboriya ende dingwa, “Sragl mem pango kungo demine orkwa i yoko yu akesume?
41014005	I topo bogl yumuna daglma 300 kina pai ende mina oma indre ana moni ipi gonduglme yomba tomgo.” A na ambumo i ye kenaglmo singwa.
41014006	Ba Yesus dungwa, “Kanwinge eriyo, ene sraglpre ambu i mir inambedi pre dime? Ambu i sragl wakai kaima pamara na ere narkwa.
41014007	Kiuglgiunde yomba engenge ene bogl akiye moraglkwa. Ana enge tau ene akeple dinagledi pitn kade ene akepledi to. Ba na ene bogl engenge ta moglkramga.
41014008	Ambu i taragl erambuka pamara orkwa. Ambu kungo demine orkwa toindi nangina mina endungwa i na maugl mina panaglka pre komuno kana akekun orkwa.
41014009	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, makan uglomugl koglkoglo prapra kamambuno wakai dipene ende diwaidi enaglmara, ambu taragl orkwa i akiye ditembi, ye orkwa i pir moraglkwa.”
41014010	Ana Yesus disaipelmo 12 mina suwarata Judas Iskariot, ye ende pris kande wagle meglmara pindre Yesus i-pene ende kunda ikine tenagledi pre ongwa.
41014011	Ye gunyei sragl ka dinambuka i pirtre ana ye moni tenamnedi pre ka dipandigl dingwa. Yeglpre Judas mambuno bogl enge wakai ta yenan, Yesus i tekoglo endinagledi pre kuie kanmoglkwa.
41014012	Bret yis paikruko neingwa enge yongo ana komnaiye ye mambunono pangwa i, sipsip nangigle kombuglange gagl Pasova enge ama kaiya mokna ninaglkwa pre disaipel wagle krapogl Yesus teingwa, “No pi aglokra Pasova enge kaiya mokna akekun ere yomun ana ene ninagledi pitne?”
41014013	Yeglpre Yesus disaipelmo suwo dimenda ende ditongwa, “Ene siti suna piro. Ana yagl ta nigl mingi kake indre wu ene tengigl yenambuka, ana ye enambara i piro.
41014014	Ye ta yungugl enambara i ene pindre yungu nemyagl diteiro, ‘Beke norkwa yagle krapoglkwa: Na yungu kula aglo kra? Na disaipelna wagle bogl Pasova kaiya mokna ninamne.’
41014015	Ye yungugl kugl kar tembe mundu ene ombuno ditenambuka, kaiya mokna tembe yei ninaglkwa bogl ya, amedi moraglkwa endi egle akiye akekun ere kondingwa. Nono kaiya ninamga pre igle ene akekun eriro.”
41014016	Ana disaipel suwo ende siti suna pindre ana taragl prapra Yesus ditomere mere kan indre ana Pasova ninaglkwa pre akekun eurika.
41014017	Ana kamun mim kor pango, Yesus disaipelma 12 bogl wingwa.
41014018	Igle ye endi egle mina amedi kaiya mokna ne meglko Yesus dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ene mina suwarata na i-pene ende kunda ikine tenambuka, ye na bogl kaiya mokna akiye ne moglkwa.”
41014019	Disaipel wagle ye kinde kaima pirtre ana mambuno bogl suwara suwarandi krapogl teingwa, “Ene na pre kaima mendigl pandigl dino?”
41014020	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene 12 meglmara suna i suwarata, ye na bogl akiye bret i dis mina suna endumbuglka.
41014021	Yomba Wam gorambedi kamambuno pepa mina muno beglko pangwa pre ye kaima gorambuka. Ba Yomba Wam yaglkumba tongwa yomba i yumbun kande inambuka, mam okuna kugl yeikruma daglma i wakai kaima orko.”
41014022	Ye kaiya mokna ne meglko, Yesus bret indre kamange ere God diwakai yei ana bukondi yene disaipelma wagle tendre, yegl dungwa, “Ene iyo, i na nangina yongwa.”
41014023	Ana ye kap wain ta indre, God diwakai yei ana disaipelma wagle tongo, ye nigl mingi i mina prapra neingwa.
41014024	Yesus ditongwa, “I na bormaina kontrak kor yomba merkinde pre toindi yangungwa.
41014025	Na kaima ene diteinga, na wain nigl i aglketa nekre moglpi ana enge ta yenan wain kor God kingdomo mina suna i aglke ninaglka.”
41014026	Ana ye giglange suwarata dindre, ende menda pi Olip Kamun Muglo eingwa.
41014027	Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene prapra teke pindre ana na kondinaglkwa. Sraglpre, kamambuno mina muno yegl beglkwa pangwa: “‘Na sipsip sugl yomba sigoglmbo, ana sipsip prapra undupagl eraglkwa.’
41014028	Ba okuwo na andigl ukor pindre ana Galili kamun na ende okuna yei tenaglka.”
41014029	Pita di ikine endungwa, “Ana prapra yange sindre ene kinde kondimbi na ene ta kinde kondokraglka.”
41014030	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, enduwer konduwagle wi enge suwo sikran, ene enge suwota na Yesus kankrika we dinatnga.”
41014031	Ana Pita ka giglendi kaima di ikine endungwa, “Na ene kankrika we kaima ta dikraglka, na ene bogl akiye gorambuglka.” Ana disaipel wagle prapra kuno yegl keunde dingwa.
41014032	Ye endpi dumo ta kangiye Gesemani we dimara eingo ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Na kamange era eiwa. Ene igle amedi molo.”
41014033	Ana Pita ya Jems ya te Jon auro indre ana ye mambuno bogl dem munduwo kinde kaima orko ana yumbun kande wu ye mina bre kake orkwa.
41014034	Ana ye ditongwa, “Na kuiyana kinde kaima orko ana goraglka pai dungwa. Ene magl igle mogltre ana sugl aimande kan molo.”
41014035	Ana kurita ende eglke dagl pindre, yene yange makandle sindre ana giu i ye mina undinambedi pre kamange orkwa.
41014036	Ye kamange ere dungwa, “Aba, na Nina. Taragl prapra ene eratnga keunde pangwa. Geu mingi i na mina i-yeglke endo. Ba taragl na pirka mere i kondo ene pitnere ero.”
41014037	Okuwo ye ende ikine undre ana kango disaipel suwota ye uglpai meglkwa. Ana ye eremogl Pita ditongwa, “Saimon, ene uglpai meglmo? Ene ande kuiya suwarata sugl moglkraglmo?
41014038	Kamange ere sugl molo, baglnu mina yangesi dinaglmiwo. Spiritno pra eragledi prukwa, ba nangino yumbun dongwa.”
41014039	Ye aglke ende eglke pindre ana kamange ere, ka dumere yeglkra kuno dungwa.
41014040	Ye aglke ende ikine disaipel suwota meglmara undre ana kango ye ugl paingwa. Sraglpre, ye ongumutno yumbun dongo, ye sragl wedi Yesus tenaglkwa i ta pirkrikwa.
41014041	Aglke ende pindre ana ikine ungo enge suwota orko, ye disaipel suwota ikra ditongwa, “Ene ugl aimande paimogl ana mogl ir si pirmo? I kuno orkwa! Ande kuiya magl orkwa. Kaniyo, Yomba Wam erme tekoglo ende tandaglme yomba onguno mina yenaglkwa.
41014042	Ana andiglmbi ende omuno. Kaniyo, na ipi kunda ikine onguno mina yenambuka yagle magl ungwa!”
41014043	Yesus ka di moglko, ye disaipelmo 12, mina suwarata Judas ungwa, te yomba merkinde ye bogl dikumba prak ya kumba pond ake indre wingwa. Pris kande ya te lo beke teingwa yomba ya te ende okuna eingwa yomba diendingo wingwa.
41014044	Ana yaglkumba tongwa yaglmo ye diu ta erambere ditongwa, “Na ta kungro-bare eraglka yaglmo suwara i ye sikane sindre ana okuna okuwo ere akegidi yend piyo.”
41014045	Judas oglandi ende Yesus moglmara pindre ana dungwa, “Beke Notnga!” dindre kungro-bare orkwa.
41014046	Ana yomba Yesus ake gidindre sikane singwa.
41014047	Ba yomba meglmara suwarata andigl moglkwa, ye dikumba prakmo gundo indre sungo pris kande nigl kongunmo yomba ta kina simbiglkidi endungwa.
41014048	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene dikumba prak ya kumba pond indre na kunogl gogl yomba ta moglmedi na sikane sina pre wimo?
41014049	Ande enge yomere yomere na ene bogl akiye mogl God holi yungu toglmo sunakra ka beke teingra, ana ene ta na kane sikrikwa. Ba Kamambuno okuna muno beglkwa pangwa ikra kaima pai inambuka.”
41014050	Ana disaipelmo wagle prapra ye kindekondo undupagl ere teke ende perepere eingwa.
41014051	Yagl gakmugl suwarata gagl olto suwara ta ende pandigl, Yesus omara ongo ye sikane singwa.
41014052	Ba ye gaglmo olto gugl kindekondo yokoko teke endongwa.
41014053	Ana Yesus ipi pris kande mina ende okuna ongwa kei pamara eingo ana pris kande wagle prapra ya yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ya te lo beke teingwa yomba wu makai singwa.
41014054	Pita kurita eglke dagl Yesus omara mokomugl pindre ana endpi pris kande ende okuna ongwa yungumo togl suna ongwa. Igle ye kimbirnem sugl meglkwa bogl akiye amedi meglko ana ye ende gaglmara pir moglkwa.
41014055	Pris kande wagle ya kaunsol prapra Yesus ka ta di aglau eran i-pene ende sigora pre dokingwa, ba ye aglaumo ta doko kan ikrikwa.
41014056	Yomba merkinde kakimbi di Yesus nangiye dangingwa. Ba ye ka boglo kiglkwa i wu suwara pikrukwa.
41014057	Ana yomba tau andigltre ana kakimbi yegl di Yesus nangiye dangingwa,
41014058	“No punga ye yegl dungwa, ‘God holi yungumo yomba keingwa i na sigurndi atne ende, ana ande enge suwota mina aglke kei ikine endinaglka. I yomba onguno mina keikraglkwa.’”
41014059	Ba ye ka boglo singwa i wu perepere ongo ana kuno erekrukwa.
41014060	Pris kande mogl okuna endungwa, ye prapra meglmara gumanomugl andigl mogl ana ye krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Ka di ene nangin dangingwa i ta di ikine endinatnga paikrumo?”
41014061	Ba Yesus kiendi mogl ana ka suwarata di ikine endekrukwa. Ana aglke pris kande kor krapogl tongwa, “Ene Krais God ere wakai ere tongwa ikra Wam motno?”
41014062	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na moglka iwe. Ana ene prapra kanimbi Yomba Wam, God Yaglkande ongo wokra amedi mogl ana heven kamun kua kruwo bogl akiye unambuka.”
41014063	Ana pris kande yene gaglmo suna olto ake argla dindre ana dungwa, “Nono kawaiye eraglkwa aglketa pirkramga.
41014064	Ye God kenaglmo sungo pirkwa, ene sragl eramnedi pirme?” Ye drano prapra kakimbi di ye nangiye sidange ana ye pra sigolo dingwa.
41014065	Tau mambuno bogl eursi Yesus tendre ana ongumuglo tusi, onguno ake bukondi ere sindre ana dingwa, “Kankre dipoglo, ira ene sum?” Ana kimbirnem Yesus indre atndang singwa.
41014066	Pita togl suna yoglmbo kra mogl pango, pris kande nigl kongunmo ambai suwarata moglmara ungwa.
41014067	Enge igle ye kango Pita endi domara pir moglko ana ambai toro giglendi kandre dungwa, “Ene ama Yesus, Nasaret nem bogl akiye wanmiurkra.”
41014068	Ba Pita ditorwa ere dungwa, “Na ye ta kankrika, ene ka dinga i na ta pirpogl sikrika.” Ana Pita togl dra mina ende menda ongo, ana tambre konduwagle kumugl wi sungwa.
41014069	Ana nigl-kongun ambai i Pita eglire moglko kandre ana aglke yomba magl andigl meglkwa i ditongwa, “Ye ama akiye wanmeglkura.”
41014070	Ba Pita aglkekor ditorwa orkwa. Kurita meglko okuwo yomba magl andigl meglkwa i kordagl di Pita teingwa, “Kaima yene, ene ye bogl akiye waningura. Sraglpre, ene ama Galili nem kra.”
41014071	Ana Pita ka giglendi ditongwa, “Na ka kaima yene diga! Na kakimbi dimbo God na erekinde ere narambuka. Ene yaglmo dingwa i na ta kankrika.”
41014072	Yegl dungo ana oglandi konduwagle kumugl wi aglke sungo suwo orko, ana Pita eremogl Yesus ka okuna ditongwa ikra prukwa, “Konduwagle wi enge suwo sikran ene enge suwota na ye kankrika we dinatnga.” Ana ye yangesi oglmbugldi indre ana kai pond orkwa.
41015001	Tangina kinde kaima pris kande wagle ya, yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ya te lo beke teingwa yomba ya, kaunsol prapra makai sindre ana ye eraglmere oglandi ka dikeglkwa. Ye eremogl Yesus kanesi pandigl ana auro ipi Pailat Rom yagl kande orkwa ongo mina yeingwa.
41015002	Ana Pailat krapogl tongwa, “Ene Juda yomba kingno motno?” Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Enene yegl dinga.”
41015003	Ana pris kande wagle ka merkinde di Yesus nangiye dangingwa.
41015004	Yeglpre Pailat aglke krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Ene ka dingwa i ta di ikine ende tekratno? Kanno, ye ka merkinde di nangin dangingwa i pitno?”
41015005	Ba Yesus ama ka suwara kaima ta di ikine endekruko, ana Pailat kundugl goglkwa.
41015006	Pasova mokna bir neingwa enge kande yongo ana ye okuna mambunono yegl pangwa. Kane paingwa suwarata yomba ye kangiye daiglko, ana Pailat poko ende-ende orkwa.
41015007	Enge igle yagl ta kangiye Barabas we dingwa, ye okuna yongo yomba tau bogl gavman kunda bogl tendre yomba sigeglkwa pre ana ye kane yungu suna akiye paingwa.
41015008	Enge igle yomba merkinde ende wu makai sindre ana mambuno bogl Pailat krapogl teingwa. Ye okuna enge ta yongo ere tomere ikra ero dingwa.
41015009	Ana Pailat krapogl tongwa, “Ene Juda yomba kingno i kane poko ende norambedi ene pirmo?”
41015010	Pailat pirkan ere kondingwa. Pris kande wagle mirmogl tendre Yesus kanesi ye teingwa.
41015011	Ba pris kande wagle yomba merkinde di nusingwa, i ye Pailat krapogl tembi ana ye eremogl Yesus kane poko endinambere i kondo ana Barabas kane poko ye mina endinambuka.
41015012	Ana Pailat aglke yomba krapogl tongwa, “Ana ene Juda yomba kingno we dingwa yagle i na sragl ere tenambedi pirme?”
41015013	Ye muglkumdi di ikine endingwa, “Ye endi-prak mina siyo.”
41015014	Ana Pailat krapoglkwa, “Sraglpre? Ye sragl tandaglme orum?” Ba ye prapra kaglkane binan bogl kaima indre dingwa, “Ye endi-prak mina siyo!”
41015015	Ana Pailat prukwa yomba merkinde gun yenaglmedi pre, ana Barabas kane poko ye mina endungwa. Te ye dungo kimbirnem Yesus kumba wip singo ana ye endi-prak mina sinaglkwa pre tekoglo endungwa.
41015016	Kimbirnem Yesus auro ipi gavman yungu kande Pretorim we dimara pindre ana ye kongun akiye erikwa prapra aglendi makai singwa.
41015017	Ye gagl suna olto kum endungwa ta Yesus ende tendre ana kewan kangigle orkwa yongagle ake kumbro mawasi king bre gagl mereyegl ere, ana bre mina pandigl teingwa.
41015018	Ana ye mambuno bogl bakagl teingwa, “Etne wakai, Juda yomba kingno!”
41015019	Ye bre mina kumba aglke aglke sindre ana eur si nangiye mina endingwa. Te goglkuno bondugl ana bitno mangidi teingwa.
41015020	Ana ye okuna kana Yesus bakagl tekondo, ye gagl kum endungwa gugl ikine ende ana yene gaglmo ende ikine ende tendre, okuwo Yesus endi-prak mina sinaglkwa pre auro imenda eingwa.
41015021	Konbo bange yagl suwarata tengigl yeingwa, kangiye Saimon, ye Sairini kamun nem. Ye Aleksanda ya Rufus neno, ye ende dumo kande suna enagledi pre wongo ana Yesus endimo-prak kake yenambedi pre kimbirnem ake nusingwa.
41015022	Ye Yesus auro yendpi kamun ta kangiye Golgata we dimara eingwa. (I mambuno yegl, bitno yombuglo kamun.)
41015023	Ana igle ye nigl giu orkwa toindi wain mina suna sikugl ende Yesus teingwa. Ba ye nekrukwa.
41015024	Ana Yesus endi-prak mina si pandigl ana gaglmo prapra ye yene yumbu sindre, ana srambre ere suwara suwarandi inaglkwa ipre satu singwa.
41015025	Ana ye tangina kinde kana enge i 9 klok Yesus endi-prak mina singwa.
41015026	Ana ka di nangiye dange kot ere teingwa kamo ikra muno beglkwa, “Ye Juda Yomba Kingno.”
41015027	Ana kimbirnem ombugl kunogl gogl nembrika yagl suwo Yesus bogl akiye endi-prak mina singwa. Ta ye ongo wokra pango ana ta ongo kondakra pangwa.
41015028	I Kamambuno mina muno beglkwa pamere mere wu geundungwa. Ye kunogl gogl yomba bogl i-suwara endingwa.
41015029	Yomba konbauna wu ikine ikine pi ana bitno piya sindre Yesus bakaglte dingwa, “Aya, ene God holi yungumo sigurndindre, ana ande enge suwota mina kordagl kei ikine endinatngra.
41015030	Yeglpre erme endi-prak mina ende atne undre ana enene ere yo!”
41015031	Kuno yegl keunde pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba, Yesus bakagl tendre ana yene di imboriya ende dingwa, “Ye yomba tau ere-yungwa, ba ye yene ere-inambuka manga!
41015032	Nono kan mouno, Mesaia, i Israel yomba Kingno, ye endi-prak mina erme ende atne unan ana nono kandre ye pirngi dinamga.” Ana yagl suwo endi-prak mina Yesus bogl akiye singwa, i ama kenaglmo simbrika.
41015033	Ana ande kuiya 12 klok orko, makan koglkoglo mim waidi were kondungo pai endpi ande kuiya 3 klok orkwa.
41015034	Ana ande kuiya 3 klok mina Yesus kaglkane binan bogl orkwa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” I mambuno yegl, “Na Godna, na Godna, sraglpre ene na kinde kondine?”
41015035	Enge i yomba tau magl igle andigl meglkwa, ye Yesus dungwa i pirtre ye dingwa, “Piryo, ye Elaija pre agle dungwa.”
41015036	Ana yagl suwarata mukundi ende pindre ana giangin ta indre wain geu orkwa simbai buglo muglo mina bogl pandigl, Yesus bindi ninambedi pre tendre ana dungwa, “Erme ye kan winge eriyo, Elaija undre ye endi-prak mina i-atne endinan kanamna.”
41015037	Ana Yesus kaglkane pond indre mur iyenda ende gokandi goglkwa.
41015038	Ana God holi yungumo mina gagl alap olto keglkwa i mitna imbo yei arglandi endpi punduno poriya si wu koglkoglo ongwa.
41015039	Ana enge igle kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle, Yesus endi-prak mina pamara gumamugl igle andigl mogltre ana Yesus kaglkane yungo pirtre, te sraglmere ere goglkwa i kandre, dungwa, “Kaima, yagl i God Wam moglkwa.”
41015040	Igle ambu tau eglke dagl mogl kanmeglkwa. Meglmara suna igle Makdala kamun mam Maria ya, te Maria, Jems yagl gakmugl ya Joses mano ya, te Salume.
41015041	Ambumo i okuna ye Galili dumo suna Yesus omara pindre akepledi te-te erikwa. Te ambu tau mere Yesus bogl akiye ende Jerusalem wingwa ye ama akiye meglkwa.
41015042	Tangina Sabat yenambuka enge magl ungwa, yeglpre ana erme akekun eraglkwa ande gungutndi ake namdungwa.
41015043	Ana Josep Arimatia kamun nem, ye kaunsol yomba kande meglmara yagl wakai mogl gumamugl endungwa yagle ye ungwa. Ye ama God kingdomo pre sugl moglkwa yagle ye kundugl goglkre ana Pailat moglmara pindre, Yesus nangiye ina pre krapoglkwa.
41015044	Ana Pailat prukwa Yesus kande goglme dingo pirtre, ye wai kuglkwa. Ana kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagl agle dindre krapogl tongwa, “Yesus kaima goglmo?”
41015045	Enge igle kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle dungo Pailat prukwa kaima orko ana pra wedi, Yesus nangiye Josep yo dungwa.
41015046	Yeglpre Josep gagl alap kruwo kor ta topo ere indre ana Yesus nangiye endi-prak mina i atne ende, gagl alap yombugl tendre ana kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara ta waugl yeimara sunakra yongwa. Ana ye kombuglo kande ta egla pagl ipi dramugl sipegl dungwa.
41015047	Ana Makdala kamun mam Maria ya te Joses mam Maria, ye kanmogl Yesus nangiye pandiglmara dumo igle kanbrika.
41016001	Sabat enge dundungo, Maria Makdala kamun mam ya, te Maria Jems mam ya, te Salume ye kungo demine wakai orkwa ipi, Yesus nangiye mina kungo ere tenamnedi pre topo erikwa.
41016002	Ana Sande enge tangina kinde kaima ande koragle sungo, ye ende Yesus pandiglmara dumo enamunedi pindre,
41016003	ana ye yene krapogl imboriya endingwa, “Yomba ira kombuglo giglpene maugl dra mina kombuglo sipegl dingwa ikra egla pagl eglke endinambu da?”
41016004	Ba ye kan mitna ende kaningo, ana kombuglo kandekinde kaima maugl dra mina okuna kana egla pagl ikorugl endingwa pangwa.
41016005	Yeglpre ye ende kombuglo dra pandiglmara dumo suna pindre, igle ye kaningo yagl gakmugl suwarata gagl suna kruwo olto ta ende pandigl onguno wokra amedi moglko, ana ye waikiglkwa.
41016006	Ana ye ditongwa, “Waikuglkriyo, na pirka ene Yesus Nasaret kamun nem endi-prak mina singura i kanamnedi pre wingwa. Ye yawagle ta pai moglkrukwa. Ye okuna kana andigl ukor ongwa! Kaniyo, dumo igle okuna ye nangiye yengura.
41016007	Erme ene ende pindre disaipelmo wagle ya Pita akiye ka diteiyo. Ana erme ye ene pre okuna yeite ende Galili kamun ongwa. Igle ene ye kanaglkwa. Okuna ye ene dite kondungura.”
41016008	Yeglpre ye onguno katno si nomano sikugl endungo ana ye kombuglo dra kondo ende menda pindre, ana mukundi endpi yomba suwara ta ditekrikwa. Sraglpre ye kundugl geglkwa.
41016009	Yesus Sande enge tangina kinde kaima andigl ukor pindre, ye okuna kana Maria Makdala kamun mam moglmara plau dungwa, ambumo i okuna spirit kinde 7 suna meglko Yesus simenda endungura.
41016010	Ambumo i ende pi Yesus bogl akiye waningwa yomba kango, ye pre miriye gogl kaimo ere meglkwa.
41016011	Ana ambumo i Yesus kor-moglko kaniwo dungo ye pirtre ana ye ambu dungwa i pirngi dikrikwa.
41016012	Ana okuwo disaipel wagle ye mina suwo dumo kande enambugledi, konbauna ende pi miurko, konbauna bange Yesus wu kane ta pindre plaudi tongwa.
41016013	Ye ende ikine pindre ana disaipel wagle tau ditembrika. Ba ye ka i pirngi dikrikwa.
41016014	Okuwo Yesus disaipel 11 ye kaiya mokna ne meglmara plau dindre, ye ka-tongwa. Sraglpre, ye pirngino paikrukwa, te nomano sikugl endungo, ana yomba okuna kana Yesus kor-moglko kanmuniwo dingwa i ye pirngi dikrikwa.
41016015	Ana ye ditongwa, “Ene ende makan uglomugl koglkoglo pindre ana kamambuno wakai yomba kanekane prapra dipene ende teiyo.
41016016	Yomba ta ye pirngi dindre baptais eran, God ere-inambuka. Ba ye ta pirngi dikrambuka ye okuwo kot mina guglo kamun enambuka.
41016017	Pirngi dingwa yomba ye God yombuglomo tenan kimagl i eraglkwa. Na kangina mina ye spirit kinde simenda endinaglkwa. Te ye ka kor ungwa kanekane dinaglkwa.
41016018	Ana ye yomba sigoglkwa toki onguno mina ake yende, ana ne geglkwa nigl kinde kanekane nembi, i prapra ye ta sigoglkrambuka. Ye onguno duglosi kinde sungwa yomba mina tembe yei tembi ana ye kindeno argan erambuka.
41016019	Yaglkande Yesus eremogl disaipelmo 11 wagle ka dite kondungo, okuwo God auro yend imbo heven suna ongo ana ye God ongo wokra amedi moglkwa.
41016020	Ana disaipel wagle ende koglkoglo pindre kamambuno dipene endingo ana Yaglkande ye bogl kongun orko ana ye ka dingwa i kaima pango te ye kimagl erikwa i kamambuno dingwa bogl akiye wu suwara ongwa.
42001001	Yagl wakai Tiopilas, okuna yomba merkinde nono mina suna taragl plau dingwa i kamo boglo muno boramunedi yombuglo erikura.
42001002	Yomba komnaiye mambuno ere taragl plau dungo ongumutno mina kanigwa yomba, ana ye ka i akepledi nono ka boglo kugl normere ikra, ana kuno yene ere pepa muno beglkwa.
42001003	Ana yeglpre, na nana wakai yene ere taragl i prapra mambuno boglmara igle krapogl doko dipirka. I ama muno boraglka wakai pango ana pamere mere muno bogl ene Tiopilas tenaglka.
42001004	Na erika i yegl, ene kere piratnga, okuna yene ka ene beke teingwa i kuno kaima orkwa.
42001005	Herot, Judia kamun suna king moglkwa enge, pris ta igle moglkwa, kangiye Sekaraia. Ye ombugl Abiya pris kongun ormara i epiglmo ta moglkwa. Ye embiye kangiye Elisabet, ambumo i ama Aron gawamo ta moglkwa.
42001006	Ye suwo-akiye God ongumuglo mina wakai kaima mogltre ana Yaglkande lomo ya kamo pamere prapra sika simbrika. Ana ye aglau ta paikrukwa.
42001007	Ba ye gak ta kugl yeikiurika, sraglpre Elisabet kurpangwa pre ana ye suwo-akiye buglayungu olto yoko wakai mogl wu kindagl yembrika.
42001008	Enge suwarata Sekaraia epiglmo wagle pris kongun eriko, ye ama God ongumuglo mina pris kongun orkwa.
42001009	Satu sindre Sekaraia ye pinde ingwa i okuna pris mambunono pango ere-ere erimere ertre ana ye ende God holi yungumo yungugl pindre God altamo mina suna endi inge demine orkwa garaglmedi pre yegl erikwa.
42001010	Ana ye endi inge demine orkwa gaglkwa enge yongo, yomba prapra mendakra makaisi kamange ere meglkwa.
42001011	Ana God angelomo ta Sekaraia moglmara plau dindre ana endi inge demine orkwa gaglmara alta mina igle, ongo wokra koglo andigl moglkwa.
42001012	Sekaraia eremogl angelo kangwa enge, ye sipuglo dindre ana kundugl goglkwa.
42001013	Ba angelo di Sekaraia tongwa, “Ene kundugl goglkro, Sekaraia, ene kamange etnga God pir kondungwa. Ene embin Elisabet wam ta kugl tenambuka ana ene gakmo kangiye Jon we dinatnga.
42001014	Ene mundun wakai eran ana gun yenatnga, ana gak i morambuka enge, yomba merkinde gun yenaglkwa.
42001015	Sraglpre, Yaglkande ongumuglo mina ye kande morambuka. Ye wain mo nigl giglekui dungwa tau nekrambuka. Ye mam dane suna morambuka enge Holi Spirit kausi tenambuka.
42001016	Ana ye Israel yomba merkinde auro yend ikine Yaglkandeno God mina unambuka.
42001017	Ye Yaglkande okuna yei tenambuka i ana propet Elaija yombuglo ya kongun giglendi ormere yeglkra erambuka. Ye nema nangiglma nomano ake i-suwara endinambuka. Ye ka sendingwa yomba nomano yake tenan ana mambuno du-yene piraglkwa. Ye erewakai eran, Yaglkande unambuka pre yomba akekun eraglkwa.”
42001018	Sekaraia krapogl angelo tongwa, “Na sraglmere ene ka dinere yegl erambedi piragle? Na yagl kindagl moglko, ana embina ama kindagl yongwa.”
42001019	Ana angelo di ikine endungwa, “Na Gabriel, God gumamugl suna andigl moglka, na ka ene ditenaglka pre, ye na diendungo ana ka wakai iyu ene diteinga.
42001020	Ba ene erme na ka diga i pirngi dikitnga, ipre ene dran aketenan ka dikre, ana kiendi mogl emin, engemo ta yenan kade, na ene diteinga, i kaima plau dinambuka.”
42001021	Enge i yomba Sekaraia pre suglmo mogltre, ana sraglpre God holi yungumo yungugl kra ye enge olto kaima moglmedi kinano yongwa.
42001022	Sekaraia ende menda ungwa enge, ye yomba ka ditenambuka mere manga. Yomba pirkwa ye God holi yungu yungugl kra ongumuglo-mugl ta orko kanmedi pirkwa. Ana ye ongo keunde ariye ere ombuno ditongwa. Ba ka ta dikrukwa i aimande paimoglkwa.
42001023	Sekaraia God holi yungumo yungugl kongunmo orkwa dundungo, ye ende ikine yungumugl ongwa.
42001024	Engemo i mokomugl ye embiye Elisabet gak dane pango, ana ba 5 ye teke paimoglkwa.
42001025	Ana ye dungwa, “Erme Yaglkande na akepledi narkwa. Enge igle ye munduwo argan orkwa pre gak narukwa ombuno dinare ana yomba mina na angaina i eglke endungwa.”
42001026	Elisabet gak dane pango ba 6 orko ana God eremogl angelo Gabriel di Nasaret taun Galili dumo kande suna endungwa.
42001027	Angelo kakep yei ambai mor ta yagl Josep bogl inambe dingwa i ditena pre ongwa. Josep ye King Devit gawamo, ambai mor kangiye Maria.
42001028	Angelo Gabriel Maria moglmara pindre ana dungwa, “Enge wakai ene mina yongwa! God ene pir i mitna imbo endungwa. Yaglkande ene bogl moglkwa.”
42001029	Angelo ka dungwa i Maria kundugl pond gogltre ana ka dungwa i sraglmere panambedi kina gundungwa.
42001030	Ba angelo di ambai tongwa, “Maria, kundugl goglkro, God wakai kangwa ene mina yongwa.
42001031	Ene gak dan mogltre, ana wan ta kugl yenatnga, kangiye Yesus we dinatnga.
42001032	Ye okuwo yagl kande eran ana kangiye God Mitna Imbo Kaima Wam we dinaglkwa. Yaglkande God, yene eran king mogltre ana yagl awamo King Devit moglmere yegl morambuka.
42001033	Ana ye Jekop yungumo ombuno i king mogltre sugl aimande morambuka. Ye kingdomo i kaima ta dundikrambuka.”
42001034	Maria krapogl angelo tongwa, “Na ambai mor mogl painga, ana taragl i srambre ere plau dinambe?”
42001035	Angelo di ikine endungwa, “Holi Spirit ene mina unan ana God Mitna Imbo Kaima yombuglomo ya kuiyamo ene si yokonambuka. Yegl eran ene gak holi kugl yemin, ana ye kangiye God Wam we dinaglkwa.
42001036	Pro, ene ambu yongutn Elisabet moglkwa. Yomba dingwa, ye kur pai gak ta kugl yeikrukwa. Ba ye ambu kindagl kaima yomara erme gak dane moglko ba 6 orkwa.
42001037	God yombuglomo kande pangwa, ipre ye taragl prapra erambuka kuno orkwa.”
42001038	Ana Maria di ikine endungwa, “Na Yaglkande kongunmo ambai, ene dinmere na mina pra plau dinambuka.” Ana angelo ambai kindekondo endongwa.
42001039	Enge i Maria akekun ertre ana oglandi endpi taun ta Judia kamun muglo suna ongwa.
42001040	Ye Sekaraia yungumo mina yungugl pindre ana Elisabet diwakai yeitongwa.
42001041	Maria diwakai yongo Elisabet prukwa enge ana ye dane mina gak sumuntaglau orko, Holi Spirit Elisabet mina kau sungo,
42001042	ana kaglkane binan bogl indre, dungwa, “Ambu prapra meglmara suna i God ene wakai ere tongwa ene mina pangwa ana ene gak kuratnga i God wakai ere tongwa ye mina pangwa!
42001043	Sraglpre taragl kande i na mina plau dinambuka pre, ana Yaglkandena mam wu na kanme?
42001044	Ene diwakai yeinatngo, na kinana mina pirka enge ana gak dana mina suna moglkwa i gunyei sumuntaglau orkwa.
42001045	Yaglkande dumere ene ere gunyei pirngi dinga pre ene wakai ere tenan, ana ene mina kaima pai inambuka.”
42001046	Ana Maria dungwa, “Na kuiyana mina Yaglkande dembiyesi mitna imbo endinga.
42001047	Na spiritna gunyei God tongwa, sraglpre, ye na akeple dungwa.
42001048	Sraglpre, ye na pre pir moglkwa, na mogl-atne ende Yaglkande kongunmo erika. Yeglpre erme ya okuwo imbor yomba prapra na God ere wakai ere tome dinaglkwa.
42001049	Sraglpre, God yombuglo pond pangwa taragl kande kaima na pre ere narkwa, ye kangiye holi pangwa.
42001050	Yomba ye wedi kunduglmo geglkwa i ye mitno gogl tongwa. Yeglpre, okuna kowano mina pai ende wu erme ya okuwo gawano mina panambuka.
42001051	Ye ongo kande duglosi kongun giglendi ere ana yomba no kanaglmedi erikwa yomba i si perepere endungwa.
42001052	Ye yomba kande king botno mina ake atne endungwa, ba yomba yene pre pir yangingwa yomba i ye akepledi mitna endungwa.
42001053	Kindan gogl meglkwa yomba ye taragl wakai merkinde tongo kau sungwa, ba taragl merkinde pai tongwa yomba ta tekre yoko diendungo endeingwa.
42001054	Ye kongunmo yomba Israel akeple dindre, okuna dumere mere ere mitno gogl tenambuka.
42001055	Ye nono yagl awano ditomere yegl: Abraham ya ye epiglmo mina mitno goglkwa i aimande pai enambuka.”
42001056	Maria ba suwota Elisabet bogl mogltre ana ende ikine yungumugl ongwa.
42001057	Elisabet gak kurambuka engemo ungo ana ye wam ta kugl yongwa.
42001058	Ye yene yombamo ya te yomba mangigl keipaingwa, Yaglkande ye Elisabet miriye kande gogl ombuno ditongwa i pirtre, ana ye Elisabet bogl gun yeingwa.
42001059	Ande enge 8 mina ye undre gak nangiye punduno bogltre ana ye nem kangiye yeite Sekaraia we dinamune dingwa.
42001060	Ba gak mam dungwa, “Taman, ye kangiye Jon we dinamga.”
42001061	Ana ye eremogl Elisabet diteingwa, “Ba ene yombano mina yomba kangiye yegl ta paikrukwa.”
42001062	Ana ye onguno keunde ariye ere nem Sekaraia krapogl teingwa. Ye gak kangiye ira we dinambuka i kana pre erikwa.
42001063	Sekaraia taragl ta narimbi muno boragledi pre ariye ere, ana gak kangiye muno boglkwa, “Gak kangiye Jon.” Ana yomba prapra kinano gundingwa.
42001064	Oglandi kaima Sekaraia dra ka dinambuka undungo te drambiye pirka sungwa ana ye ka aglke mambuno ere dindre ana ye God dembiye sungwa.
42001065	Yomba mangigl keipaingwa prapra kundugl geglkwa, Judia kamun muglo meglkwa yomba prapra kamo i diwai dingwa.
42001066	Yomba prapra ka i pirtre kinano yongo ana krapeglkwa, “Okuwo gak i sraglmere morambe?” I Yaglkande ongo ya yombuglomo i ye mina yongwa.
42001067	Jon nem Sekaraia Holi Spirit kau sitongo ana God kamo pai inambuka pre dungwa:
42001068	“Nono Yaglkande dembiyesi mitna imbo endinamga. Israel Godno, ye undre ana yene yombamo akepledi toposi ikine endinambuka.
42001069	Ye kongunmo yomba Devit yungumo ombuno mina. Yaglkande giglekui dungwa ta, Ye nono ere-inambuka pre i-pene endungwa.
42001070	Ye propetmo holi okuna koimbo ka ditomere orkwa.
42001071	Ye nono kundano ikine ya kinde pir norikwa yomba prapra onguno mina nono ere-inambuka.
42001072	I nono kowano wagle mitno goglkwa ombuno dindre. Ana ye lo holi eragle dungwa kontrak i aimande pir moglkwa.
42001073	Ye ka di giglendi nono yagl awano Abraham tongwa.
42001074	Ye nono kundano ikine onguno mina i-yeglke ende, ana ake wakai ere norkwa pre, nono kundugl goglkre, ye kongunmo eramunga.
42001075	Yeglpre nono tandaglme ta paikran ana God mambuglo mina mambuno du-yene pamere engenge eramga.
42001076	Ana ene na wana, ene kangin yei God Mogl Mitna Imbo endungwa, propetmo we dinaglkwa, sraglpre, ene Yaglkande konbaunamo akekun ere yeitenatnga.
42001077	Ye yombamo tandaglmeno kindekondo tendre ana nomano wakai tendre ere-inambuka.
42001078	Sraglpre, nono Godno mitno goglko windadi dindre ikine endinambuka pre, ana heven imbo ande koragle sumere yeglmere ende nono mina unambuka.
42001079	Ana yomba mim ormara suna meglkwa, ya te gounga mambuno kuiyamo atnekra meglkwa i ambuglangesi tendre, ana nono katno sugl mogl. Ana deno munduno winda dungwa konbo mina auro i suna enambuka.”
42001080	Ana gak yakindre nangiye ya spiritmo mina suna gigle dungo, makan waule suna mogl pindre ana engemo yongo, Israel yomba mina wu nongugl ongwa.
42002001	Enge igle gavman Sisa Ogastas ye Rom dumo kande moglkwa. Ye ka ta di makan kande koglkoglo endungwa, i yomba prapra epigl meglmere meglmere kangino pepa mina bogltre kere eraglmere dungwa.
42002002	Ana i komuno kaima mambuno bogl kangino epigl pepa mina beglkwa, i Korinias gavman kande Siria kamun moglkwa enge.
42002003	Ana yomba prapra kangino tenapre ende yene dumono bre yomere yomere eingwa.
42002004	Yeglpre Josep ama Nasaret taun Galili kamun kondo, ende, ana Judia kamun kande King Devit taunmo Betlehem suna ongwa. Sraglpre, Josep ye Devit gawamo ta moglkwa.
42002005	Ye Maria bogl akiye kangino tenapre ongwa. Ambumo i ka di kondo ye bogl inambre dingura ana ambaimo gak dane moglkwa.
42002006	Ana enge igle ye Betlehem miurko ana Maria gak kugl yenambuka engemo mangigl ungwa.
42002007	Ana Maria wam komuno kugl yendre, ye gakmo gagl alap ta were tendre ana bugla-kau kaiya mokna neimara baglkugl mina suna panduglkwa. Sraglpre, yomba eglke wu pai-pai erikwa yungu i kau sungo panambrika angai ta yeikrukwa.
42002008	Ana igle bugla-sipsip sugl meglkwa yomba tau dumo mangigl ta yomara, buglano sipsip enduwer sugl meglkwa.
42002009	Ana Yaglkande God angelomo ye meglmara plau ditongo ana Yaglkande ambuglangemo ambuglangesi ye meglmara were tongo ana ye kundugl pond geglkwa.
42002010	Ba angelo ye ditongwa, “Ene kundugl goglkriyo. Na ka wakai kaima ake i ene meglmara winga ene yomba prapra gun pond yenaglkwa.
42002011	Erme Devit taunmo suna yomba ere-inambuka yagle ene pre kugl yongwa. Ye Krais, Yaglkande.
42002012	Ana i kaima ene diu ta eran kanaglkwa. Gak kembra ta kanimbi, ye gagl alap were bugla-kau kaiya nemara baglkugl mina suna endingo paimoglkwa.”
42002013	Oglandi kaima heven angelo merkinde kaima wu plau dindre ana angelo suwarata ta okuna ungwa ikra bogl akiye giglange kaima dindre God dembiye yegl siteingwa,
42002014	“God dembiyesi mitna imbo kaima heven endiyo, Ana makandle yomba deno munduno pokndi yenano, God yomba kan wakai yeitongwa konbo i-pene endungwa.”
42002015	Enge igle angelo ye kinde kondo ende ikine heven suna eingo ana bugla-sipsip sugl yomba yene dipirkwa, “Nono ende Betlehem pindre sragl taragl plau dungwa i kanamga. Taragl i Yaglkande nono dinorkwa.”
42002016	Ana yeglpre ye oglandi ende pi Maria ya Josep kandre, ana gak kuglambu bugla-kau kaiya neimara baglkugl mina suna pandiglkwa paimoglko kaningwa.
42002017	Enge igle bugla-sipsip sugl yomba ye gak kuglambu kandre ana ye angelo gak ipre ka ditongwa ikra boglo kiglkwa.
42002018	Ana yomba prapra bugla-sipsip sugl yomba ka dingwa i pirtre ana waikiglkwa.
42002019	Ba Maria ka i prapra pirtre ana i pir nomane mina suna kra ende moglkwa.
42002020	Ana bugla-sipsip sugl yomba ende ikine pindre ana giglange ta di God dembiyesi mitna imbo kaima endingwa. Sraglpre, ye angelo okuna kana taragl prapra ditongo pirtre te kandre erikwa ikra kaima pangwa.
42002021	Wakan suwarata endongo, gak kembra engemo yongo ana nangiye punduno bogltre kangiye Yesus we dingwa. Kangiye yeingwa i angelo okuna kana Maria dite kondomere ikra erikwa.
42002022	Ana Josep ya Maria Moses lomo mina dumere ere wu wakai eingwa mambuno pamere mere ere kuno eurika. Yeglpre ye gak kembra God Yaglkande tenapre yend Jerusalem embrika.
42002023	I Yaglkande lomo mina muno beglko pangwa, “Yagl gak komuno kagle kiglkwa prapra te ikine ende Yaglkande tenaglkwa.”
42002024	Ye ama pindre Yaglkande lomo dumere mere ere kombuglange gagltre ofa tenapre, ana kua yumugl suwo mo kua tomb kowo suwo yenaglkwa.
42002025	Enge igle yagl ta Jerusalem suna moglkwa, ye kangiye Simeon we dingwa. Ye yagl du-yene mogltre ana kamambuno prukwa yagle. Ye Israel yomba ikine endinambuka yagle unambedi pre sugl moglkwa, Holi Spirit ye mina mogl tongwa.
42002026	Ana Holi Spirit okuna kana ye ombunodi te kondungwa. Ye ta goglkre mogl pi God Yaglkande yomba ikine endinambe dungwa ikra kanambuka.
42002027	Holi Spirit okuna yeitongo Simeon ende God holi yungumo mina yungugl ongwa. Ana gak kembra Yesus nem ya mam Moses lomo pamere pre ere i God holi yungumo mina wimbrika.
42002028	Simeon gak kembra kungro i komba mina ende ana God dembiyesi tendre dungwa,
42002029	“Yaglkande, enene ka di giglendi panditnere. Erme enene kongun yomba kanwinge etn ana dem munduwo pokndi yenan endeinambuka.
42002030	Ana nana ongumutna mina yomba ere-inatnga i kaninga.
42002031	I ene yomba prapra ongumutno mina akekun ere kondinga i kanaglkwa.
42002032	Ambuglange wakai si Yomba Bina nomano mina ende tendre ana enene yombanma Israel kangino kande tenga.”
42002033	Ana gakmo ye pre Simeon ka dungwa i nem mam suwo pir sipuglo dimbrika.
42002034	Simeon gak nem mam bogl ere wakai ere tendre ana yegl di gak mam Maria tongwa, “God gak kembra i pinde i kondungwa. Ana Israel yomba mina suna eran mere yange guglo kamun simbi, te tau eran mere ukor enaglkwa. Ye God konbaunamo mereyegl moran, yomba mere ka kinde di tenaglkwa.
42002035	Ana yeglpre yomba merkinde nomano teke pangwa i ombunodi nongugl endinambuka. Ana dikumba prak muglo nongwa ta ene nangin mina ninambere mereyegl, mundun mina giu kinde goratnga.”
42002036	Igle ambu ta propet moglkwa kangiye Anna. Ye Panuel ambuglo, ana Aser yungumo ombuno ta moglkwa. Ye ambu kindagl kaima yongwa. Ambumo ye wiye bogl, bogl imbrika enge mogl wimbrika buglayungu 7 orko.
42002037	Ana ye wiye goglko, ana ambu werai mogl ungwa buglayungu 84 yongwa. Ambumo ye God holi yungu mina kondokre etne ya enduwer akiye God dembiye karaugl ere tendre, kaiya mokna mawagl ere ana kamange ere-ere orkwa.
42002038	Enge suwara i keunde ambumo wu plau dindre, God diwakai yei tendre, ana gak i pre dungwa, “Jerusalem yomba prapra God pre sugl kan meglkwa topo si i-ikine endinambuka.”
42002039	Enge igle Josep ya Maria Yaglkande lomo dungo pamere okuna kana taragl prapra ere kondo ye ende ikine Galili taun ye yene kamuno Nasaret eingwa.
42002040	Ana gak yake wu kande pi gigle dungwa. Ye nomanemo wakai kau sungo ana God wakaimo ye mina yongwa.
42002041	Buglayungu yomere yomere Yesus nem ya mam Pasova kaiya mokna bir nina pre ende Jerusalem embrika.
42002042	Yesus buglayungumo 12 nongwa enge, ye nem ya mam bogl ende kaiya mokna bir nemara eingwa. I ye kowano awano mambunono pamere mere erikwa.
42002043	Kaiya mokna bir neingo dundungwa enge, ye nem mam ende ikine yungunomugl embrika, ba yagl gak Yesus Jerusalem suna mogl pangwa. Ba nem ya mam suwo ye aglokra moglkwa i ta pirkiurka.
42002044	Ye pirmbrika Yesus yomba akiye wingwa i bogl ende eimedi pirtre ana ye ande enge ta mundu konbauna ende embrika. Ana ye mambuno bogl ye yene yombano mina ya te yomba yei nembrika mina suna Yesus pre dokimbrika.
42002045	Ba ye Yesus kan i-kiurka, yeglpre ye ende ikine Jerusalem pindre ana Yesus pre dokimbrika.
42002046	Ana ande enge suwota orko ana ye kambrika Yesus God holi yungumo mina togl sunakra moglkwa. Ye ka beke teingwa yomba bogl akiye amedi mogl, ka dingwa pirtre ana krapogl tongwa.
42002047	Yomba prapra Yesus kamo pirtre sipuglo dingwa, ye taragl pirpogl sindre ana ye ka mongo di ikine endungwa.
42002048	Nem ya mam suwo ye moglko kambrika enge. Ye waikugltre ana mam yegl ditongwa, “Wana, ene sraglpre yegl ere notne? Ene pre nen ya na mitn pond gogltre ana ene dokumbuglka.”
42002049	Ye di ikine ende tongwa, “Sraglpre ene na dokimbre? Na, Nina yungumo mina yungugl moraglka i ene pirpogl sikiuro?”
42002050	Ba nem mam suwo, ye ka dungwa i mambuno pirpogl sikiurka.
42002051	Ana Yesus nem ya mam bogl akiye ende ikine Nasaret eingwa. Igle ye nem ya mam kanno pinande orkwa. Ba yene mam ka i prapra i nomano suna ende pir moglkwa.
42002052	Ana Yesus nangiye ya nomanemo suna akiye yakungo, ana God wakai kangwa te yomba akiye wakai kanigwa.
42003001	Taiberias Sisa buglayungu 15 Rom kamun king moglkwa enge, Pontias Pailat ye Judia kamun gavman moglkwa, te Herot Galili kamun king moglkwa. Ye yene angigle Pilip Ituraia kamun ya te Trakonitis kamun king moglkwa, te Lisanias ye Abilini kamun king moglkwa.
42003002	Ana Anas ya Kaiapas pris kande miurka, enge igle Sekaraia wam Jon makan waule suna moglmara God kamo ende ye mina ungwa.
42003003	Ana Jon endpi Jodan Nigle dumo koglkoglo yei omara i pindre dipene ende tongwa, “Ene nomano yake tendre baptais erimbi, God ene tandaglmeno koko ende tenambuka.”
42003004	Propet Aisaia ka muno yegl boglko pangwa: “Makan waule suna yomba ta wiyau endungwa, ‘Yaglkande pre konbaunamo akekun eriyo. Ye unambuka pre konbo si-ake du endiyo.
42003005	Makan sunguno bengine ormara sikausi kondiyo, te makan muglo ya meglmbe prapra si-ake daudi kondiyo. Ana konbauna yewe-mawe yenambuka si-ake du ende kondiyo. Te konbauna kinde ormara i si-ake wakai eriyo.
42003006	Ana yomba kanekane God ere-inagledi orkwa i mambuno kanaglkwa.’”
42003007	Yomba merkinde kaima ende menda wu Jon moglmara baptais ere norambedi pre wingwa. Ana ye ditongwa, “Ene toki kinde wagle, God dem kumbrukwa ene mina una orkwa. Ira ene dite teke enaglkwa kuno orme dume?
42003008	Sragl yegl prapra ene kinde kondimbi, embriyeno wakai ombuno dinan, i ene kaima tandaglme kindekondo nomano yake teingwa. Ana enene mina suna mambuno bogl Abraham no kowano awano moglme dikraglkwa. Na ene yegl diteinga, God pra we dinan ana kombuglo i Abraham gawamo plau dinaglkwa.
42003009	Dimaima endi prapra mambuno mina yeikondungwa. Ende prapra ta mongo wakai koglkrambuka okuwo boro gundi atne ende ana piyasi donga mina endinambuka.”
42003010	Ana yomba krapogl Jon teingwa, “Ana no sragl eramne?”
42003011	Jon yegl di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta ye gaglsuna suwo ake ninan ta gugl yomba ta ake-nekrukwa tenambuka, te yomba ta kaiya mokna ta yenan ama yumbu suwondo.”
42003012	Takis ingwa yomba tau ama baptais era pre undre, ye krapeglkwa, “Beke Notnga, no sragl eramne?”
42003013	Ye yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene takis merkinde i kawa tekriyo, gavman ditomere kuno ere i yo.”
42003014	Te kimbirnem tau ama undre krapogl ye teingwa, “Ana no sragl eramne?” Ye yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene yomba monino yombuglo ere wausi inamunedi erekriyo, mo yomba kakimbi dite ka-tange tekriyo. Ene topono ingwa i pra kuno orkwa.”
42003015	Ana yomba prapra nomano poglodi pirkwa anduglko, ye mambuno bogl nomano suwo yongo, kinano gundo endingwa yongo, “Jon Mesaia moglmedi pirkwa.”
42003016	Yeglpre Jon yomba prapra ditongwa, “Na nigl mina ene baptais ereteinga. Ba okuwo yomba ta unambuka i yombuglomo pai mitna ende na yombura i engrukwa. Na yomba wakai ta moglmbo kade ye kagle towo mina kan tonguma pangwa i na ta pirka sinaglka kuno erekrukwa. Ye ene Holi Spirit ya te donga mina ene baptais ere tenambuka.
42003017	Ye ikanmo sawol ake indre ungwa. Ye wit sundina prapra siplendi menda ende ana wit mongo gande i yene kaiya moknamo yungu yungugl endinambuka. Ba sundina mongo paikrambuka ye donga gongokre aimande depamara gagltenge erambuka.”
42003018	Ana Jon eremogl yomba nomano mina borambedi pre kamambuno wakai tau kanekane dipene ende tongwa.
42003019	Ba Jon eremogl gavman Herot ka-tongwa, sraglpre okuna yene angigle embiye Herodias wike indre ana mambuno kinde tau mere ama orkwa.
42003020	Ana Herot sragl kinde orkwa pamara ikra aine pandigl Jon sikane yungu suna endungwa.
42003021	Yomba prapra baptais ere kondingo, okuwo Yesus ama baptais orkwa. Ye kamange ere moglko, heven audungo,
42003022	Holi Spirit kua yumugl mereyegl ende atne ye moglmara ungwa. Ana heven imbo ka ta yegl dungwa, “Ene nana Wana, na ene wakai kandre nomana wakai ene teinga.”
42003023	Yesus yene buglayungumo 30 orko, ana yomba ere-inambuka kongun mambuno bogl orkwa. Ye yagl gak moglkwa, yeglpre yomba Josep wam wedi pirkwa, te Josep Heli wam,
42003024	te Heli Matat wam, te Matat Levai wam, te Levai Melki wam, te Melki Janai wam, te Janai Josep wam,
42003025	te Josep Matatias wam, te Matatias Amos wam, te Amos Nahum wam, te Nahum Esli wam, te Esli Nagai wam,
42003026	te Nagai Mat wam, te Mat Matatias wam, te Matatias Semen wam, te Semen Josek wam, te Josek Joda wam,
42003027	te Joda Joanan wam, te Joanan Resa wam, te Resa Serubabel wam, te Serubabel Sialtiel wam, te Sialtiel Neri wam,
42003028	te Neri Melki wam, te Melki Adi wam, te Adi Kosam wam, te Kosam Elmadam wam, te Elmadam Er wam,
42003029	te Er Josua wam, te Josua Eliser wam, te Eliser Jorim wam, te Jorim Matat wam, te Matat Levai wam,
42003030	te Levai Simeon wam, te Simeon Juda wam, te Juda Josep wam, te Josep Jonam wam, te Jonam Eliakim wam,
42003031	te Eliakim Melea wam, te Melea Mena wam, te Mena Matata wam, te Matata Natan wam, te Natan Devit wam,
42003032	te Devit Jesi wam, te Jesi Obet wam, te Obet Boas wam, te Boas Salmon wam, te Salmon Nason wam,
42003033	te Nason Aminadap wam, te Aminadap Atmin wam, te Atmin Arni wam, te Arni Hesron wam, te Hesron Peres wam, te Peres Juda wam,
42003034	te Juda Jekop wam, te Jekop Aisak wam, te Aisak Abraham wam, te Abraham Tera wam, te Tera Nahor wam,
42003035	te Nahor Serak wam, te Serak Reu wam, te Reu Pelek wam, te Pelek Eber wam, te Eber Sela wam,
42003036	te Sela Kainan wam, te Kainan Arpaksat wam, te Arpaksat Siem wam, te Siem Noa wam, te Noa Lamek wam,
42003037	te Lamek Metusela wam, te Metusela Inok wam, te Inok Jaret wam, te Jaret Mahalalel wam, te Mahalalel Kenan wam,
42003038	te Kenan Inos wam, te Inos Set wam, te Set Adam wam, te Adam God wam.
42004001	Holi Spirit Yesus kau sitongo, Jodan Nigle ende ikine undre ana ye Spirit okuna yeitongo, ende dumo waule suna ongwa.
42004002	Igle ande enge 40 orko Yesus yange sinambedi Satan bagl nusungwa. Sraglpre ye engemo i mundu kaiya mokna kaima ta nekre ana kindan goglkwa.
42004003	Ana Satan di Yesus tongwa, “Ene God Wam motn kade kombuglo i dimin yakete wu bret enano.”
42004004	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Kamambuno pepa mina muno beglko pangwa, ‘Yomba bret keunde ta nendre kor aimande moglkraglkwa.’”
42004005	Ana Satan eremogl ye auro yend kamun muglo ta egli pindre ana ye oglandi dumo kande koglkoglo mundu ombunodi Yesus tendre,
42004006	yegl ditongwa, “Taragl i gigledi prapra ya bumbunomo i ene mundu tekondinaglka, taragl i prapra okuna na nare kondungwa. Ana na yomba ta tenagledi piraglmere tenaglka.
42004007	Yeglpre ene na goglkun bondugl dembina karaugl ere natn ana taragl i prapra ene sratnen yenambuka.”
42004008	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Kamambuno pepa muno yegl beglko pangwa, ‘Yaglkande ene Godnen suwara dembiye karaugl ere tendre ana ye suwara kongunmo eratnga.’”
42004009	Ana Satan eremogl Yesus auro i Jerusalem pindre God holi yungumo moko miniye kaima endungwa moglko ana ditongwa, “Ene God Wam kaima motn kade enene igle oglosi ende atne po.
42004010	Kamambuno pepa mina yegl muno beglko pangwa, “‘God ene pre ere angelomo wagle yegl eriyo di endinan, ana wakai ere ene kan sugl moraglkwa.
42004011	Ana ye onguno mina ene boglo ere mitna endinaglkwa. Yegl erimbi ene yange kombuglo suwarata katn boglkrambuka.’”
42004012	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Kamambuno pepa mina yegl dungwa, ‘Yaglkande ene Godnen ye ta eran kanagledi erekro.’”
42004013	Ana Satan bagl nusi kra kanekane pogl Yesus tekondo ana okuwo ye enge wakai ta yenan wedi Yesus kinde kondungwa.
42004014	Holi Spirit yombuglomo tongo ana Yesus ende ikine Galili ongwa. Ana ye kamo boglo i prapra kamun igle mundu waidi ende menda koglkoglo ongwa.
42004015	Ana ye makai yungu prapra yungugl kra Yesus ka beke tongo ana yomba prapra ye dembiye singwa.
42004016	Yesus ende Nasaret ongwa, igle ye mogl yakumara dumo. Ana Sabat enge ye ende makai yungu yungugl pipi ormere mere ertre ana ye God kamo kera pre anduglkwa.
42004017	Ana propet Aisaia kamambuno pepa muno boglkwa i ye teingwa. Yesus kamambuno diglmbi ake pigla dindre, ana ka i boglko pamara igle kangwa,
42004018	“Yaglkande Spiritmo na mina moglkwa. Sraglpre, kiuglgiunde yomba kamambuno dipene ende tenaglka pre ye na pinde yungwa. Na dipene endimbo yomba kane paingwa kondo yoko meglmbi, te ongumutno kin yongwa aglke kanimbi, te yomba mina yumbun i waningwa i yendinaglka pre ye na diendungwa.
42004019	Ana Yaglkande yombamo ere-inambuka buglayungumo i unambuka enge i na dipene endinaglka.”
42004020	Ana Yesus kamambuno diglmbi akepere suna endindre, te ikine sugl meglkwa yomba tendre ana amedungwa. Yomba prapra makai yungu yungugl meglkwa ye ongumutno kan Yesus moglmara keunde endingwa.
42004021	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Erme kamambuno kerika pirkwa i okuna muno beglko pangura i kaima paiyungwa.”
42004022	Yomba prapra Yesus kangiye diwakai yeitengwa. Ana ka wakai wakai dra mina ungwa ipre ye sipuglo dindre, krapeglkwa, “Ye Josep wam moglkrum kana.”
42004023	Yesus di ye tongwa, “Na pirka ene na pre kaima ka yegl dinaglkwa, ‘Dokta, enene kinden erewakai ero! No punga ene Kaperneam kamun suna etnere ikra mere kuno yegl ama enene kamun kande mangigl igle ero dinaglkwa.’”
42004024	Ye ka di paimoglkwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, propet ta yene yungumugl diwakai yei i suna endekrikwa.
42004025	Piryo, na kaima ene ditenga. Elaija moglkwa enge i ambu werai merkinde Israel dumo suna meglkwa, ana buglayungu suwota ya te ba 6 kamun sikruko, te Israel makan koglkoglo kindan pond yongwa.
42004026	Ana Elaija di Israel ambu werai meglmara suna i ta endekrukwa. Ba ambu werai suwarata Sarapat kamun mam Saidon dumo kande suna moglmara igle ongwa.
42004027	Ana propet Elaisa moglkwa enge i yomba merkinde kaglande singwa Israel kamun suna meglkwa. Ye suwarata erikwa winge dikrikwa, ba Siria kamun nem Neman suwara winge dungwa.”
42004028	Yomba prapra makai yungu yungugl kra meglkwa ka i pirkwa enge deno pond kumbrukwa.
42004029	Ana yomba andigltre, Yesus taun suna gundo yend menda pindre ana ye auro yend kamun muglo ta guglo yomara pindre, ana igle piyasi guglo endinamnedi erikwa,
42004030	ba yomba merkinde meglmara sunawom konbo endpi endongwa.
42004031	Ana Yesus end-ime Kaperneam kamun Galili taun suna pindre, igle Sabat enge mambuno ere yomba ka beke tongwa.
42004032	Ye prapra pir sipuglo dingwa, sraglpre Yesus ka beke tongwa i yombuglomo pond pangwa.
42004033	Yagl ta spirit kinde ye mina suna moglko ana makai yungu yungugl moglkwa. Yaglmo kaglkane binan bogl yungwa.
42004034	“Aya Yesus Nasaret nem, ene no sragl ere noratn? Ene igle no si pindigl pandigl era pre un kana? Ene ira motnga i na pirkan erika. Ene yomba du-wakai, God yomba holi motnga.”
42004035	Yesus ka giglendi di spirit kinde tongwa, “Ene dran simundo ana yagl i mina kindekondo ende menda wo.” Ana yomba prapra meglmara gumanomugl spirit kinde yaglmo ake piyasi makandle ende ana ye mina kiendi ende menda pindre ere kinde ta ere tekrukwa.
42004036	Yomba prapra sipuglo dindre, ana yene di imboriya endingwa, “Ka i sraglmere dume? Yesus ka yombuglo gigledi dungo ana ditomere spirit kinde ende menda wingwa.”
42004037	Ana Yesus taragl orkwa i ka boglo waidi ende dumo suna igle koglkoglo ongwa.
42004038	Yesus makai yungu kondo ana ende Saimon keipamara ongwa. Ana Saimon ambu imakiye nangiye ninga pond dungo ana Yesus ambumo i akeple dinambedi pre krapogl teingwa.
42004039	Ye pindre ana ambumo i pamara bina andigl mogltre, ana nangiye ninga dungwa i ka tongo, ana nangiye ninga dungwa ikra dundungwa. Ana ambumo oglandi andigl mambuno bogl kaiya moknano ere tongwa.
42004040	Ana ande gungugl dungo okuwo yomba prapra yombano kinde kanekane singwa auro i Yesus moglmara wingo ana kinde singwa yomba prapra mina ye ongo tembe yei tendre ana erewakai eretongwa.
42004041	Spirit kinde wagle ana yomba merkinde mina ende menda pindre, kaglkane ingwa, “Ene God Wam!” Ba spirit kinde wagle ka di dinaglmedi pre Yesus ka tendre mane dungwa. Sraglpre spirit kinde wagle pirkwa ye Krais moglkwa.
42004042	Kamun tangungo Yesus dumo igle kindekondo ende dumo waule ta ongwa. Yomba ye pre doko pi, Yesus moglmara doko kan indre ana ye no kondo ende pikrambedi pirkwa.
42004043	Ba Yesus yomba ditongwa, “Na God kingdom kamo mambuno wakai ama taun tau ama dipene ende tenaglka. Sraglpre, na kongun i eraglka pre God diendungo winga.”
42004044	Ana ye Judia kamun koglkoglo makai yungu yomara yungugl ka aimande dipene ende te wanmoglkwa.
42005001	Ande enge suwarata Yesus eremogl Genesaret niglmong okupole andigl moglko, yomba merkinde ye moglmara mogl winambo dindre ana God kamo pirkwa.
42005002	Ana ye kango bot suwo gundo iyu nigle bina endingo paimiurka. Fis eresingwa yomba bot igle pandigl ana fis eresingwa gatno nigl keglkwa.
42005003	Yesus bot ta mina ende suna ongwa, botmo i Saimon botmo. Ana kurita ake nusi niglmong suna endinambedi krapoglkwa. Ye bot mina suna amedi mogl ana yomba ka beke tongwa.
42005004	Ye ka dikondo ana Saimon ditongwa, “Bot ake nusi i niglmur yomara suna pindre ana ene yomba akiye waningwa bogl fis singwa gatno fis sinaglkwa pre ende nigle atne endiyo.”
42005005	Saimon di ikine ende tongwa, “Yaglkande, no enduwer mundu yombuglo ere fis gagl nigle ende wanmounga. Ba taragl ta sikunga. Ene yegl dinga pre prawa na fis gagl prapra nigle atne endinagla.”
42005006	Ye fis gagl nigl atne ende, fis mambuno ta singo gagl biglki dinamunedi erikwa.
42005007	Yegl orko, akiye waningwa yomba bot ta mina meglkwa ye onguno ariye ere teingwa ana ye undre akeple dinaglkwa. Ana ye wingo fis yumbusi bot suwo-akiye mina suna endingwa kau sindre ana bot mambuno bogl ende nigle atne enambugledi eurika.
42005008	Ana Saimon Pita i kandre ye yange Yesus kagle mina goglko bondugltre ana dungwa, “Yaglkande na mina ende eglke po, na tandaglme erika yagle!”
42005009	Pita ya ye akiye waningwa yomba prapra fis merkinde kaima singwa i pre ye kundugl geglkwa.
42005010	Saimon bogl akiye waningwa suwo Jems ya Jon, ye Sebedi wam suwo. Ana Yesus di Saimon tongwa, “Kundugl goglkro. Erme ene mambuno bogl yomba di-inatnga.”
42005011	Ye botno gundo yend bina wu pandigltre, taragl prapra kinde kondo, ana Yesus omara mokomugl eingwa.
42005012	Enge suwarata Yesus taun ta suna moglko, igle yagl kaglande sungwa ta ungwa. Yaglmo Yesus kandre, ye yange makan mina guma sikirte pai ana yanadi Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, ene na erewakai ere naraglendi pitn kade, ene erewakai ere naro.”
42005013	Yesus ongo duglosi yaglmo akindre dungwa, “Na pirka, ene kinden pra wakai erambiwo.” Ana oglandi kaima yaglmo kaglande sungwa ikra dundungwa.
42005014	Ana Yesus ka giglendi di yaglmo i tongwa, “Ene yomba suwarata ditekratnga, ba ene du ende pris moglmara pindre ana nangin ombuno dimin. Ye ene kanan, yomba prapra ene kaglande singa winge dungwa i kanaglkwa, Moses dumere ere ana ofa garatnga.”
42005015	Ba Yesus kamo boglo i mundu waidi ende koglkoglo ongo, yomba merkinde kamo pirtre, te kindeno erewakai erambedi pre wingwa.
42005016	Ba Yesus enge mere ende dumo waule yomba moglkrimara pindre ana igle ye kamange ere-ere orkwa.
42005017	Ande enge suwarata Yesus ka bekete moglko, Parisi wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba ye Galili dumo kande prapra ya Judia te Jerusalem ye wu igle amedi meglkwa. Ana Yesus yomba kinde sungwa erewakai erambuka pre Yaglkande yombuglo tongwa.
42005018	Yagl tau yagl mau sungwa ta gagle ere kake i wingwa ana ye yombuglo ere kake yend yungugl Yesus moglmara gumamugl yenamnedi erikwa.
42005019	Ana ye konbauna ta yenan ere i yungugl enaglkwa mere manga. Sraglpre, yomba merkinde kau-kau erikwa. Yeglpre ye kake yend yungu moko tembe pindre, yungu terke kenge gundo ende ana yaglmo gaglebogl ende atne yomba meglmara sunawom Yesus moglmara guma mina endingwa.
42005020	Yesus eremogl ye pirngino kaima pangwa i kandre ana yagl mau sungwa ikra ditongwa. “Yeinombuglka, ene tandaglmen prapra koko endiga.”
42005021	Lo beke teingwa yomba ya Parisi wagle ye mambuno bogl ye yene nomane mina pirkwa, “Yagl i irane? Ye ka yegl mere di God kenaglmo sungwa. Yomba tandaglme ta koko endekraglkwa, ba God suwara tandaglme koko endinambuka.”
42005022	Yesus ye pirkwa i kan kondo ana ye krapogl tongwa, “Sraglpre ene nomano mina suna ka yegl pirme?
42005023	Sragl ka undungwa i na dinagle, ‘Ene tandaglmen kinde kondo teiye’ dinaglo mo ‘Andigl endpo’ dinagle?
42005024	Ba i ene piraglkwa, Yomba Wam ye yombuglo kande pangwa pre, makandle tandaglmeno prapra koko ende tenambuka.” Yeglpre ye mau sungwa yagle ditongwa, “Na ene diteinga, ene andigl kungutn indre ende yungun po.”
42005025	Oglandi kaima yaglmo andigltre yomba prapra meglmara gumanomugl taragl kugl pangwa ikra indre ana ende yungumugl pi God dembiye sitongwa.
42005026	Yomba prapra sipuglodi kundugl gogl ana God dembiye sindre dingwa, “Nono erme taragl wakai kaneta kamga.”
42005027	Okuwo Yesus ende menda pindre ana kango takis yungwa yagl ta kangiye Levai, yene takis yumara dumo yungugl kra amedi moglko, Yesus ditongwa, “Na mokonamugl wo.”
42005028	Ana Levai andigltre, taragl prapra kindekondo ana Yesus omara mokomugl ongwa.
42005029	Ana Levai kei pamara yungugl Yesus pre kaiya mokna pond akekun orko, ana takis ingwa yomba merkinde yeingo te yomba tau ama yeingo akiye kaiya mokna neingwa.
42005030	Ana Parisi wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba Yesus disaipelma wagle meglmara undre kumga sindre, krapeglkwa, “Sraglpre ene takis ingwa ya te tandaglme erikwa yomba bogl akiye kaiya mokna ya nigl neime?”
42005031	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Yomba du-wakai meglkwa ye dokta pre ta dokokrikwa. Ba kinde sungwa yomba keunde dokta moglmara eingwa.
42005032	Na yomba du-yene aglendi inagledi pre ta ukrika. Ba tandaglme erikwa yomba nomano yake tenaglmedi pre winga.”
42005033	Yomba tau Yesus diteingwa, “Jon disaipelma wagle kaiya mokna mawagl mogl ana kamange ere-ere erikwa te Parisi wagle disaipelno ama kuno yegl erikwa. Ba ene disaipelma wagle nigl ya kaiya mokna ne paimeglkwa.”
42005034	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ambu inambuka yagle ye digaglko wingwa yomba, ye bogl akiye meglmbi ana ene pra bogl ingwa kaiya mokna mawagl molo dinaglmo?
42005035	Ba enge ta yenambuka enge ambu wiye ye mina i korugl endimbi ana enge igle ye pra kaiya mokna mawagl eraglkwa.”
42005036	Yesus ka i ama di simbogl yomba ditongwa, “Yomba ta gagl suna kor ta bagladi indre ana gaglsuna goglo mina ta simboglkrambuka. Ye yegl ta eran ana gaglsuna i kor ere kinde orkwa. Ana gaglsuna kor ya gaglsuna goglo simbogl i suwarata endimbi kuno erekrambuka.
42005037	Ye yegl eran ana wain meme nangiye sibagla dinan ana wain ya meme nangiye akiye kinde erambrika.
42005038	Tamanga! Wain nuglo kor toindi meme nangiye gagl kor mina suna endinaglkwa!
42005039	Ana yomba ta wain nuglo goglo ta ne kondo, wain kor ta ninagle dikrambuka. Ye yegl dinambuka, ‘Wain goglo nuglo i wakai orkwa.’”
42006001	Sabat enge suwarata wit yaglko moglmara Yesus suna ongo ana ye disaipelma wagle mambuno bogl wit mongo uglo sindre onguno mina ake kuwagl pagl ana mongo suna i neingwa.
42006002	Parisi wagle tau krapeglkwa, “Ene sraglpre Sabat enge nono lono mane dumara yegl erime?”
42006003	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Devit yombama bogl kindan gogltre ana sragl erikwa i ene kere kankrimo?
42006004	Ye God yungumo mina ende yungugl pindre, God pre bretmo akekun ere yeiteingwa i indre nongwa, te tau ama indre yene yombama tongwa. I nono lono erekriyo dungwa i ye orkwa, i pris keunde ninaglkwa pangwa.”
42006005	Ana Yesus di ye tongwa, “Yomba Wam ye Sabat i nemyagl moglkwa.”
42006006	Sabat aglketa Yesus ende makai yungu yungugl pindre ana yomba ka beke tongwa. Ana igle yagl ta moglkwa ye ongo wokra mau sungwa.
42006007	Ana lo beke teingwa yomba ya te Parisi wagle tau ye Yesus aglau ta eran kandre ka di nangiye dangina pre dokingwa. Yeglpre ye mangigl kaima sugl mogltre Yesus Sabat enge yomba kinde sungwa erewakai erambo mo erekrambedi kanmeglkwa.
42006008	Ba ye sragl pirkwa i Yesus kan kondo pandigl ana yagl ongo mau sungwa i ka ditongwa, “Andigltre ana ende gumanomugl ya wo.” Ana yaglmo andigltre ana meglmara igle andigl moglkwa.
42006009	Ana Yesus di yomba tongwa, “Na ene krapoglka, nono lono Sabat enge sragl eriyo dume? Ere-iyo dumo mo kan winge eriyo dume? Yomba kor-moraglkwa pre ere-iyo dumo mo, ere kinde eriyo dume?”
42006010	Ye kan winambo di prapra meglkwa kandre ana ye yaglmo ditongwa, “Ene ongun duglo suwo.” Ye yegl orko ana oglandi ye ongo wakai kaima yongwa.
42006011	Ba ye deno kumbruko ana mambuno bogl ka ye yene mina di imboriya ende ana ye Yesus sragl ere tenamne dingwa.
42006012	Enge igle mina ande enge suwarata Yesus kamange eragledi pre ende kamun muglo ta ongwa. Ana igle enduwer enge mundu kamange ere God tongwa.
42006013	Ana tangina kana ye disaipelma wagle prapra aglendi yene moglmara ende ana ye mina 12 pinde indre ye kangino aposel yeitongwa.
42006014	Saimon, Yesus kangiye Pita wedi tongwa, ana ye angigle Andru. Jems ya Jon te Pilip ya Batolomiu.
42006015	Matyu ya Tomas, Alfias wam Jems, ana Saimon ye Selot yungu ombuno mina ta moglkwa.
42006016	Jems wam Juda ya te Judas Iskariot, ye Yomba Wam ipi kunda ikine onguno mina yenambuka yagle.
42006017	Yesus eremogl aposelmo bogl kamun muglo kondo ende atne undre, angai anduno ta yomara igle ye disaipelma wagle merkinde kaima akiye andigl meglkwa. Ana yomba pond kaima ye Judia kamun nem ya Jerusalem ya ana mundi nigle bina Taia ya Saidon yomba prapra akiye igle meglkwa.
42006018	Ye Yesus kamo pirtre ana ye kindeno argan erambedi pre wingwa. Yomba tau spirit kinde erekinde eretongwa ama wingo ana erewakai orkwa.
42006019	Ana yomba prapra ye akenamunedi pre yombuglo erikwa. Sraglpre, okuna akingwa yomba ye yombuglomo ende menda undre ana ye kindeno prapra erewakai orkwa.
42006020	Yesus yene disaipelma wagle kandre ana dungwa, “Kiuglgiunde yomba God eran ene gun yenaglkwa, God kingdomo ene pre yongwa.
42006021	Yomba erme kindan geglkwa God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, okuwo ene nembi kau sinambuka. Yomba erme kai erikwa. God eran ye gun yenaglkwa, okuwo ene gaugl eraglkwa.
42006022	Yomba ta ene kankinde yeimbi God eran ene gun yenaglkwa, ene mane ditendre ka kinde dite, ana ene yomba kinde we dinaglkwa enge God eran ene gun yenaglkwa. Sraglpre i prapra Yomba Wam pre erikwa.
42006023	“Yeglmere ta plau dinan ene gunyei katno engriyo. Sraglpre topono kande heven suna ene pre yei-pangwa. Kowano awano okuna kuno yegl ere propet wagle teingwa.
42006024	“Ba diminge mere paitongwa yomba ene yumbun pond inaglkwa, ene okuna kana wakai moglpai erikwa.
42006025	Erme ene kaiya mokna ne kau singwa, ene yumbun pond inaglkwa. Okuwo ene kindan goraglkwa. Te erme gaugl erikwa yomba ene yumbun pond inaglkwa, okuwo ene mitno gogl kai pond eraglkwa.
42006026	Yomba prapra ene pre dembinosi mitna endinaglkwa enge ene yumbun pond inaglkwa, ye kowano awano propet kakimbi yomba kuno yegl ere teimere erikwa.
42006027	“Ba na kanna pirkwa yomba ene diteinga, ene kundano ikine kan wakai yendre, deno kumbro ene teingwa yomba ye ene erewakai ere teiyo.
42006028	Yomba ta ene mangaglsi tembi, ene wakai ere ye teiyo. Te yomba ta ene kinde eretembi ene ye pre kamange ere teiyo.
42006029	Yomba ta paunan koglo atndang sinan, koglo ama temin atndang sinano. Yomba ta ene gatn suna kande inan, ene kanwinge etn gatn suna kembra akiye inano.
42006030	Yomba taragl ta pre kraporambuka, i prapra to. Ana yomba ene taragl ake-nenga ta imbi, ene i-ikine endinagledi krapoglkro.
42006031	Ene yomba taragl ere naraglmedi pitnere yeglmere ene yomba ere to.
42006032	“Ba yomba ene wakai kanigwa, i keunde wakai kanimbi, ene sraglmere God taraglmo wakai inaglme? Tandaglme erikwa yomba, yomba ta ye wakai kanigwa, yomba i ye ama wakai kanigwa.
42006033	Ene yomba wakai ere tenaglkwa i keunde ene wakai ere tembi, ene sraglmere God taraglmo wakai inaglme, tandaglme yomba ama yegl erikwa!
42006034	Ana ene taragl yomba nare ikine endinaglmedi poglodi pirtre tembi, sraglmere ene God taraglmo wakai inaglme? Tandaglme erikwa yomba yegl ere tandaglme erikwa yomba taragl teingwa, taragl kuno yegl i-ikine endinamnedi pirtre erikwa.
42006035	Ba ene kunda ikine kan wakai yei ana wakai ere tendre ana ene taragl kanekane i-ikine endekragledi pirtre teiyo. Ana okuwo ene topo pond i-ikine endindre ana ene God mitna imbo kaima nangiglma moraglkwa. Sraglpre yomba ye dembiye sitekriwa ana mitno gogl te yomba mambuno kinde erikwa ye wakai ere tongwa.
42006036	Ene Neno yomba pre mitno goglmere yegl ene ama yomba pre mitno golo.
42006037	“Ene yomba mambunono yumbu sikrimbi ana God ene mambunono ta yumbu sikrambuka. Ene yomba kankinde yeikrimbi ana God ene kankinde yeikrambuka. Ene yomba tandaglmeno kindekondo teimbi ana God ene tandaglmeno kindekondo tenambuka.
42006038	Ene taragl yomba temin ana God ene tenambuka, ye yumbu wakai sindre ake pirir ere atne endinan ana toindinagledi eran tenambuka. Ene yomba ere tenaglkwa yeglmere God ama ene ere tenambuka.”
42006039	Ana Yesus ka i di simbogl ditongwa, “Ongumuglo kin yongwa ta ongumuglo kin yenambuka ta konbo okuna yei tenan, ye suwo-akiye yange maugl mina atne sikrambro?
42006040	Skul gak ta ye mogl-mitna ende ka beke tongwa yomba engrekrukwa, ba ye skul prapra beke i kondo pandigl ana ye ka beke tongwa yomba moglmere kuno yegl morambuka.
42006041	“Sraglpre ene angitn ongumuglo mina endi surmane yongwa kandre, enene ongumutn mina endi bange pangwa i pir kankitn?
42006042	Ene sragl wedi angitn tenatne, ‘Angramo, ene kanwinge etn na ongumutn mina endi surmane moglkwa imenda ende tenaglka.’ Ana ene enene ongumutn mina suna endi bange pond pangwa i kankitno? Ene kakimbi yomba, okuna kana endi bange enene ongumutn mina pangwa imenda ende ana okuwo ene kanpogl sindre ana angitn ongumuglo mina endi surmane yongwa i ere i-endinatnga.
42006043	“Endi wakai mongo kinde ta koglkrukwa, te endi kinde mongo wakai ta koglkrukwa.
42006044	Endi prapra yene mongono keglmbi yomba kanaglkwa. Yomba endi kogla mongo kombugl-kanemail mina kogl panan urokraglkwa, te wain mongo kewan mina ta koglkrambuka.
42006045	Yomba wakai ye nomanemo mina suna taragl wakai kausi yongwa i dimenda endungwa, ana yomba kinde taragl kinde nomanemo mina kausi yongwa i dimenda endungwa, yeglpre ye nomanemo suna kausi yomere pre dra mina dimenda endungwa.
42006046	“Ene sraglpre na kangina dagl, Yaglkande, Yaglkande dindre ana na sragl ero diteimere erekitne?
42006047	Yomba ta ende na moglmara undre, na kanna pirtre ana dimere kongunmo eran, ana ye sraglmere moglkwa i ene ombuno ditenaglka.
42006048	Ana yomba ta yene yungumo nigle dangine keingwa mereyegl, ye maugl pere ende atne ime pindre ana kombuglo kande bolamugl kauglange bonduglkwa. Ana nigl wau pond undre yungu i sungwa, ba yungumo ta pingakar dikrukwa. Sraglpre yungumo i wakai kaima ere keingwa.
42006049	Ba yomba ta na kanna pirtre ana sikasi kongunmo erekran, ye yungu makan bolamugl kauglange sikre yoko keingwa yeglmere. Ana nigl wau undre yungumo i sungwa enge ana ukandi yangesi deruwagl ere kondungwa.”
42007001	Yesus ka i prapra dungo, yomba pirkondingo ana ye ende Kaperneam suna ongwa.
42007002	Igle Rom kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle, niglmo kongunmo yomba ta, ye wakai kaima kangwa. Ana yaglmo i kinde sungwa gorambuka mere pangwa.
42007003	Ana kimbirnem sutno yomba Yesus moglme digo pirtre ana Juda yomba mina ende okuna eingwa tau di endungo ye Yesus krapogl tembi undre ana eran kongunmo yomba argan erambuka pre.
42007004	Ana ye Yesus moglmara undre, ye wakai ere yana di Yesus teingwa, “Yagl i yagl wakai, ene kaima akepledi tenatnga.
42007005	Sraglpre yaglmo i no yomba kanwakai yendre ana yene makai yungu no kei norkwa.”
42007006	Yeglpre Yesus ye bogl akiye ende eingwa. Ana Yesus ende yungu yomara mangigl ungwa enge, kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle yombamo tau Yesus ditenaglmedi pre diendungo konbo bange eingwa. “Yaglkande, na yomba wakai ta moglkrika, ipre na yungunamugl ta ukratniwo.
42007007	Yeglpre na nana pirka na ta wakai moglmbo kade ene guman mina ukraglka! Ba ene ka keme dimin ana na konguna yomba argan erambuka.
42007008	Na yombanma kande meglmara atnekra moglka. Te na moglmara atnekra kimbirna nem meglkwa. Na ta endpo digo ye endongwa. Te ta wo digo ye ungwa, te nigl konguna yomba ta ene kongun i ero digo, ye orkwa.”
42007009	Enge igle ye ka dungwa i Yesus pir sipuglo dindre ana ye kan akete yomba merkinde mokomugl wingwa i ditongwa, “Na kaima ene diteinga, Israel yomba meglmara suna i na yomba pirngino kande yegl ta pango kankrika.”
42007010	Ana yomba kakep diendungo eingwa ikra ende ikine kimbirnem sugl yomba keipamara undre ana kaningo, ye kongunmo yomba argan orkwa.
42007011	Kuri ta mogltre okuwo Yesus endpi taun ta kangiye Nein we dimara ongo ana yene disaipelma wagle ya te yomba merkinde ye bogl akiye eingwa.
42007012	Yesus taun togl dra yomara mangigl ungo, yomba goglkwa ta kake i menda wingwa. Yagl goglkwa i ambu ta wam suwara kaima, ye mam ambu werai. Ana taun suna i yomba mere ambumo i bogl akiye meglkwa.
42007013	Yaglkande ambu i kandre ye miriye pond gogl tendre ana ambumo ditongwa, “Ene kai erekro.”
42007014	Ana Yesus ende mangigl pindre, yomba goglkwa suna pandiglkwa endimo bokis i akungo ana yomba kake i wingwa prapra andigl diglkindi meglko ana Yesus dungwa, “Yagl gakmugl, na ene diteinga, andiglo.”
42007015	Ana yombamo goglkwa ikra andigl amedi mogltre, mambuno ere ka dungo ana Yesus te ikine ende mam tongwa.
42007016	Ana yomba prapra kundutndi, God dembiye siteingwa. Ana ye dingwa, “Propet kande kaima ta nono mina suna plau dungwa. God undre yene yombamo akepledi tenapre ungwa.”
42007017	Ana Yesus kamo boglo i waidi ende Judia kamun pindre te dumo tau mangigl koglkoglo yomara ongwa.
42007018	Jon disaipelma wagle ka i prapra ye dite kondingo, ana ye disaipelmo yomba suwo agle dindre.
42007019	Ana ye suwo pi Yaglkande moglmara kra yegl porambrika pre diendungwa, “Yomba ta unambe dingwa ikra ene uno mo manan no yomba ta unambuka pre suglmo moramno?”
42007020	Ye Yesus moglmara undre dimbrika, “Jon Baptais ene krapogl teiro diendungo no umbuglka, ‘Ene yomba ta unambe dingwa ikra ene uno mo manan no yomba ta unambuka pre sugl moramno?’”
42007021	Enge igle keunde Yesus eremogl yomba mere kinde imbo ya kinde kanekane sungo meglkwa i erewakai ere tendre te spirit kinde simenda ende te ongumutno kin yongwa yomba merkinde ere endungo kanigwa.
42007022	Ana Yesus di ikine ende kakep yembrika yagl suwo ikra ditongwa, “Ene ende ikine pindre ana taragl pirtre te kandre eurika i Jon diteiro. Ongumutno kin yongwa kaningo te katno kinde orkwa konbauna ende eingo, te kaglande singwa wu wakai eingo te kinano gidungwa ka pirko te yomba geglkwa andigl ukor eingo ana kiuglgiunde yomba kamambuno wakai dipene ende teingo pirkwa.
42007023	Yomba ta na pre pirngi dingwa gugl sikrukwa i God eran ye gun yenaglkwa.”
42007024	Jon ka kepmo yomba suwo ende ikine embriko, Yesus mambuno ere, yomba merkinde ka ditongwa, “Ene makan waule suna Jon moglmara eingwa i sragl taragl kanamnedi eindune? Ken buglo ta ir mange kuraura ere pango kana pre einduno?
42007025	Tamanan, sragl taragl kana pre ende menda eindune? Yagl ta gagl wakai ende moglko kana pre einduno? Taman, yomba gagl topo pond boglkwa endungwa i ana ye king yungumugl sragl wakai kanekane yomara suna gunyei meglkwa.
42007026	Ba ene sragl kana pre endune, dinariyo? Propet ta kanapre enduno? Owo kaima, na ene diteinga, ene kanigwa i propet tau engrukwa.
42007027	Yaglmo ye pre kamambuno mina muno yegl beglko pangwa, “‘Na kakepna yomba di endimbo ene okuna yei tenambuka, te ye ene pre konbaunan si akekun ere yei tenambuka.’
42007028	Na ene diteinga, ambu yomba kugl yeingwa i suwarata mogl-mitna ende Jon engrekrikwa. Ba yomba ta God kingdomo mina mogl-atne endingwa i ana mogl-mitna ende Jon engrikwa.”
42007029	Yomba prapra ya te takis ingwa yomba, enge igle Yesus ka dungwa i pirtre God konbaunamo i pirpogl singwa. Sraglpre ye prapra okuna kana Jon mina baptais erikwa.
