42007030	Ba Parisi wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba yene pre ere God mambunomo wakai kinde kondingwa. Sraglpre ye okuna kana Jon mina baptais erekrikwa.
42007031	“Yomba epigl erme i na sragl taragl siye yei diboragle? Ye sragl yomba meglme?
42007032	Ye gak kembra mereyegl kaiya mokna maket ere nemara dumo suna makaisi mogl ana aglendi imboriya ende meglkwa: “‘No ene pre puming sitomgo, ana ene katno engrekrikwa. No muntawa giglange dumgo, ene kai erekrikwa.’
42007033	Jon Baptais undre kaiya mokna ya te wain nuglo nekruko, ana ene yegl dingwa, ‘Ye mina spirit kinde suna moglkwa.’
42007034	Erme Yomba Wam undre ana kaiya mokna ya nigl nongo ana ene dingwa, ‘Yagl i kaniyo! Ye kaiya mokna ya wain depigl nendre ana ye takis ingwa yomba ya tandaglme erikwa yomba bogl akiye wanmeglkwa.’
42007035	Ba God nomanemo wakai ingwa yomba ye nono ombuno di norikwa i taragl kaima.”
42007036	Parisi ta Yesus di yei, ye yungunamugl enduwer kaiya mokna akiye ninambugle dungwa. Yeglpre Yesus ende ye keipamara pindre ana kaiya mokna nina pre bogl mina amedi moglkwa.
42007037	Taun suna igle ambu ta tandaglme bogl moglkwa. Enge igle Yesus wu Parisi ta yungumo mina kaiya mokna ne moglme digo pirtre ana ambumo i kombuglo mingi ta kungo demine orkwa kausi moglko indre ungwa.
42007038	Ana Yesus moglmara mokomugl andigl mogltre kai orkwa. Ye kaimo nuglo mina Yesus kagle sikugl tendre ana bre yungo pagl Yesus kagle koko ende tendre ana kagle si nendre, te kungo demine orkwa toindi kagle bolamugl endungwa.
42007039	Parisi ikra ambu taragl orkwa i kandre ye yene yegl prukwa, “Yagl i propet kaima ta moran, ambu ye nangiye akungwa i pirkan erambuka te ambu i tandaglme sraglmere orkwa i ye pirkan erambuka.”
42007040	Ana Yesus ka di ikine ende tongwa, “Saimon, na ka ta pirka ene ditenaglka.” Ana Saimon dungwa, “Beke Notnga dinaro.”
42007041	“Yagl suwarata monimo yagl suwo kur i wanambrika pre tongwa. Ana yagl ta K5,000 tendre te yagl ta K500 tendre orkwa.
42007042	Ana yaglmo suwo ye monino ta yenan te ikine endinambrika manga. Yeglpre, moni tongwa yagle ye yagl suwo-akiye mane ditongwa. Yegl erikwa i yaglmo suwo i mina ira wakai kaima pir moni tongwa yagle tenambe?”
42007043	Saimon di ikine endungwa, “Na pirka yagl ta K5,000 yungwa ikra gun pond kaima yongwa.” Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene kuno ere dinga.”
42007044	Ana ye kan akete ambumo kandre ana di Saimon tongwa, “Ene ambu i kano? Na ene yungun mina yungugl winga, ba ene katna nigl koraglka pre nigl narekitngra. Ba ambu i kaimo nuglo mina na katna nigl kogltre ana ye bre yungo pagl koko endungwa.
42007045	Ene na diwakai yei paunana sinekitngra. Ba ambu i na ende yungugl winga enge ikra katna kinde kondokre aimande sinongwa.
42007046	Ene olip nuglo kungo ta toindi na bitna mina endekitnga. Ba ambumo i kungo demine orkwa toindi na katna mina endungwa.
42007047	Yeglpre ene diteinga, ye tandaglmemo merkinde na kondo teingwa. Yeglpre ye na wakai kaima kangwa. Ba yomba ta tandaglmeno kurita kindekondo teingwa, i wakai kurita kanigwa.”
42007048	Ana Yesus ambumo ditongwa, “Ene tandaglmen prapra na kindekondo teinga.”
42007049	Ana yomba tau bogl mina amedi meglkwa ikra yene mambuno bogl dipirkwa, “Yomba i ira mogl tandaglme koko endume?”
42007050	Ba Yesus ambumo ditongwa, “Ene pirngi dinga i enene ere-yungwa, noman pokndi yenan endpo.”
42008001	Enge tau okuwo Yesus ende taun tau ya yungu epigl tau pindre, ana kamambuno wakai God kingdomo pre dipene endungwa. Disaipelma 12 ye bogl akiye eingo,
42008002	ana ambu tau akiye eingwa. Ambumo i okuna spirit kinde moglkwa ya te kinde imbo kanekane pango erewakai ere tongwa. Ta Maria (ye Makdala kamun mam we dingwa) ambumo ye mina okuna spirit kinde 7 meglko simenda endungwa.
42008003	Kusa ye Herot yungumo sugl moglkwa yagle ye embiye Joana. Te Susana ya ambu tau merkinde taragl kan-neingwa indre Yesus ya disaipelma wagle bogl akepledi teingwa.
42008004	Taun bange bange yomba, Yesus moglmara ende wu meglko, ana yomba merkinde kaima yene makai singwa enge, Yesus ka i di simbogl dungwa,
42008005	“Yagl suwarata moknamo mongo sundra pre ende menda ongwa. Ye mokna mongo kongunmo mina suna sundugl ongo, mongo tau yange konbauna bange singwa, igle yomba bolamugl engriko, te kua wu neingwa.
42008006	Mongo tau yange makan kombuglo moglmara sindre ana pare wi singwa enge ye makan nuglo moglkrukwa pre gigle gogl kaglmbugl dingwa.
42008007	Mongo tau yange kugl kangigle orkwa mina suna singwa. Ana kugl kangigle orkwa bogl ende wu egli pindre ana mokna yatne endungwa.
42008008	Ana mongo tau yange makan wakaile suna singwa, ana mokna bogltre mongo keglkwa ana suwarandi mongo 100,100 keglkwa.” Ana Yesus ka di uglo yongwa, “Ene kinano panan ana ka i piryo.”
42008009	Ana disaipelma wagle Yesus krapogl teingwa, “Ka di simbogl dinga i mambuno sraglmere.”
42008010	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “God kingdomo teke pangwa i ene piraglkwa pre ditongwa, ba yomba tau pre na ka i di simbogl diteinga, yegl pre, “‘ye kanaglkwa, ba kan dime dikraglkwa, te piraglkwa, ba mambuno pir dime dikraglkwa.’
42008011	“Ka di simbogl diga i mambuno yegl, mokna mongo iwe God kamo.
42008012	Mokna mongo tau yange konbauna singwa, i yomba ka pirkwa. Ba Satan undre ana ka nomano mina suna yongwa i wausi ikorugl endungwa. Ye God kamo pirngi dikrimbi ana God ere-ikrambedi pre orkwa.
42008013	Ana mokna mongo tau yange makan kombuglo moglmara bolamugl singwa i yomba ye ka wakai ere pirtre gunyei ingwa. Ba ye nomano mina ende suna pi duglo endekrukwa. Ye enge sungunagle ta pirngi dingwa, ba ka kra ungwa enge ye pirngi dingwa gugl sungwa.
42008014	Te mokna mongo tau yange kewan kangigle ormara suna singwa i yeglmere, yomba tau ka pirkwa, ba ye ende ikine pindre, nangino taragl pre nomano kande pango, ana bona gana ya moni te makandle taragl ne moglpai eraglkwa ipre gun yengwa. Ana taragl i ye nomano sikugl endungo, ana ye mongono wakai koglkrukwa.
42008015	Ba mongo tau yange makan wakaile burkono dumara singwa, yeglmere yomba tau embriyeno ya nomano wakai yongo ka pirkwa i aimande ake mogltre ana ye mongo keglkwa.
42008016	“Yomba ken-lam gagl ana baket mina atnekra teke yeikraglkwa, mo bogl atnekra yeikraglkwa. Taman, ye ken-lam gagl boglmo mina bolamugl yenaglkwa, ana yomba ende yungugl undre ye ken ambuglangemo kanaglkwa.
42008017	Taragl teke paingwa i wu pendigl enaglkwa. Ana taragl prapra tusi paingwa i ta paikrambuka, wu pene embi yomba kanaglkwa.
42008018	Yeglpre ene wakai ere pirtre kanpogl siyo, yomba ta taragl pai tenan tau ama tenambuka te ta ake-nekrambuka ye mina kembra ta ake-neyeindi pirambuka i God i-eglke endinambuka.”
42008019	Yesus mam ya angiglma wagle ye kana pre wingwa, ba igle ye moglmara mangigl enaglkwa mere manga, sraglpre yomba merkinde meglko angai yeikrukwa.
42008020	Yomba tau Yesus diteingwa, “Ene man ya angitnma wagle ene kanamnedi pre menda andigl meglkwa.”
42008021	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta God kamo pirtre pinande erikwa i ye na mana ya te na angrima wagle.”
42008022	Ande enge suwarata ta Yesus disaipelma wagle yegl ditongwa, “Nono niglmong sipraksi ende bina koglo imbo enamga.” Dungo ana ye ende suna bot mina mambuno bogl ende eingwa.
42008023	Ye prapra bot mina ende pi meglko, Yesus yange ugl pangwa. Ana ir yuwanga giglendi niglmong bolamugl ungo, ana nigl mambuno bogl wu bot mina kau sinagledi orkwa. Ana ye prapra goramnedi kundugl pond geglkwa.
42008024	Disaipelma wagle pi ana Yesus uglo yokondre dingwa, “Yaglkande, Yaglkande, nono goraunga!” Ana Yesus andigltre ir ya nigl pembigl ka tongo, ana ir ya nigl pembigl bu yembriko ana nigl wermane erekrukwa.
42008025	Ana ye disaipelma wagle krapogl tongwa, “Ene pirngi dingwa aglo pame?” Ba ye sipuglodi kundugl gogl, ye yene di ikine ikine endingwa, “Yagl i irane? Ye ir ya nigl pembigl ka ditongo ana ye dumere kamo pinande eurika.”
42008026	Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl bot mina ende pi Gerasa yomba kamuno eingwa, i Galili niglmong koglo imbo kra.
42008027	Enge igle Yesus bot pandigl ende okupole ongo ana taun yagl ta spirit kinde suna meglkwa ungo tengigl yembrika. Enge olto kaima yaglmo kungugl gagl endekre te yungugl paikrukwa, ba ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara i pai-pai orkwa.
42008028	Yaglmo i Yesus kangwa enge, ye kaglkane indre ana yange Yesus kagle mina sindre ana kaglkane binan bogl yungwa, “Yesus God mitna imbo kaima Wam, ene na sragl ere naraglendi pitne? Na ene yana diteinga, ene giu ere narekro!”
42008029	Ye dungwa i sraglpre, Yesus ka giglendi spirit kinde ditendre yaglmo i mina kondo ende menda po dungwa. Enge mere spirit kinde yagle i auro i wanmoglko, ana ye ongo kagle sen kogl sugl meglko, ye sen simbiglki dungo ana spirit kinde ye auro yendpi makan waule ta yomara suna pipi orkwa.
42008030	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene kangin irane?” Ye di ikine endungwa, “Na kangina Ami.” Sraglpre, okuna spirit kinde merkinde ende ye mina suna eingwa.
42008031	Ana spirit kinde yanadi Yesus tendre, no di maugl beiye yeikrumara suna endekro dingwa.
42008032	Bugla merkinde meglmbe akete yumun ne meglkwa. Yeglpre spirit kinde wagle Yesus no diendinan ende bugla mina suna enamunedi yana digo ana Yesus prawedi spirit kinde wagle tongwa.
42008033	Ana spirit kinde yagl mina kondo ende menda pindre, ana ye ende bugla mina suna eingo ana bugla prapra sinoglundi dangine ende atne pi nigl numbun mina ende atne pi, geglkwa.
42008034	Ana bugla sugl yomba tau sragl plau dungwa i kandre, ana ye mukundi endpi taun suna ya te dumo bina dangine akiye ka i yomba boglo kugl teingwa.
42008035	Ana yomba ende bina pi sragl taragl plau dungwa i kana pre eingwa. Ye Yesus moglmara undre kanigo, spirit kinde yaglmo kondo ende menda eingwa ikra Yesus kagle mina amedi mogltre, ana kungugl gagl ere nomanmo wakai pango ana yomba prapra kandre kundugl geglkwa.
42008036	Yagl ta mina spirit kinde meglko Yesus erewakai orko kanigwa ikra yomba diteingwa.
42008037	Ana Gerasa kamun yomba prapra Yesus no kamunomugl kondo ende enambedi pre krapogl teingwa, sraglpre ye kundugl pond geglkwa. Yeglpre Yesus disaipelma wagle botno mina ende suna pindre ana endongwa.
42008038	Ana spirit kinde yagl i mina okuna ye kondo ende menda wingwa yagle ikra Yesus bogl akiye enambugledi yana dungwa. Ba Yesus yaglmo diendindire, dungwa,
42008039	“Ende ikine yungunomugl pindre ana God diu ene mina eretongwa i yomba dito.” Yeglpre yaglmo endpi taun winambodi yomba prapra Yesus diu ye mina eretongwa ikra ditongwa.
42008040	Ana Yesus ende ikine niglmong koglo ongwa. Ana yomba merkinde ye diwakai yeitengwa. Sraglpre ye prapra unambedi pre suglmo meglkwa.
42008041	Ana yagl ta kangiye Jairus ye makai yungu sugl moglkwa yomba kande, ye undre yange makandle Yesus kagle mina sindre ana Yesus ende ye yunguna enambedi pre yana dungwa.
42008042	Sraglpre ye nangiglma ta moglkrikwa ambuglo suwara kaima moglkwa, ambaimo i buglayungu 12 nongwa. Ambaimo gorambuka magl orkwa. Ana Yesus konbauna bange pi pango yomba merkinde kaima ye omara dakagl dakagl eingwa.
42008043	Ana ambu ta igle moglkwa, ye ba aimande kanmogl ongo buglayungu 12 orkwa. Ba yomba ta ambu i kindemo erewakai ere tenamnedi erikwa manga.
42008044	Ambumo yomba merkinde wimara suna Yesus mokomugl undre ana Yesus gaglmo suna olto punduno uglmange ere akungo ana ambumo ba kangwa ikra oglandi bu yongwa.
42008045	Ana Yesus krapoglkwa, “Ira na akume?” Ana ye prapra i uglmange erikwa ana Pita dungwa, “Yaglkande, yomba merkinde ene motnara winambo di dakagl dakagl meglkwa.”
42008046	Ba Yesus dungwa, “Yomba ta na akungwa. Sraglpre, na pirka na mina yombura ende menda ongwa.”
42008047	Ana ambumo prukwa ye sragl orkwa i sipoglkwa, yeglpre ambumo ongo kagle sungo uglmange erambuka mangwa, ana ye wu Yesus kagle mina yange sungwa. Igle yomba prapra meglmara, ye sraglpre Yesus gaglmo suna akungwa ya te sraglmere ye kindemo oglandi bu yongwa ikra di Yesus tongwa.
42008048	Ana Yesus di ambumo tongwa, “Na ambura, ene pirngi dinga i enene erewakai orkwa, noman pokndi yenan endpo.”
42008049	Yesus ka i di moglko, Jairus makai yungu sugl moglkwa yagl kande ye yungumugl kakepmo yomba ta undre, Jairus ditongwa, “Ene ambutn goglkwa, ka beke tongwa yagle yumbun wakane tekro.”
42008050	Yesus ka i pirtre ana di Jairus tongwa, “Ene kundugl goglkro, ene pirngi keunde do ana ambai kindemo argan erambuka.”
42008051	Ana Yesus pi Jairus keipamara plau dungwa enge, ye yomba mane ditongo ye bogl akiye yungugl ta pikrikwa, ba Pita ya Jon, Jems te gak nem ya mam bogl ende yungugl eingwa.
42008052	Ana yomba prapra igle meglkwa ye ambai pre kaimo ere kai giglange si meglko, ana Yesus dungwa, “Kai erekriyo, ambai goglkrukwa ye ugl keunde pangwa.”
42008053	Ye prapra Yesus bakagl gaugl ereteingwa sraglpre ye kanigwa ambai kaima goglkwa.
42008054	Ba Yesus eremogl ambai ongo akindre ana agle dungwa, “Ambai ya, ene andiglo.”
42008055	Ana ambai spiritmo ende ikine ungo, oglandi anduglko ana Yesus yomba ditongwa, ambai taragl ninambuka ta i teiyo dungwa.
42008056	Ambaimo nem ya mam sipuglo dimbrika, ba Yesus sragl plau dungwa i yomba ta dite dinaglmedi pre manedi gigle dungwa.
42009001	Yesus disaipelma wagle 12 aglendi makai sindre, ana ye spirit kinde prapra simenda ende te kinde imbo kanekane pra kuno eran erewakai eraglmedi pre yombuglo gigledi tongwa.
42009002	Ana ye aposel wagle dimenda endungwa, God kingdom pre kamo dipene endindre ana kinde sinambuka erewakai eraglkwa.
42009003	Ye ditongwa, “Ene konbo eglke enaglmara buglo muglmbo ikre, gagl kamban ikre, kaiya ikre, minge moni ikre, te gaglsuna kawate ta indre pikriyo.
42009004	Ene yungu ta ende yungugl eimbi, igle keunde moglpi ana ende enaglkwa enge taun i kondinaglkwa.
42009005	Yomba ene diwakai yeikrimbi, ene ye dumono i oglandi kinde kondo ana katno kungane tama bagl endiyo. Yegl eraglkwa i yomba mambunono kinde yoko paimoglkwa i pirkan eraglkwa.”
42009006	Yeglpre ye kondo ende yungu epigl bange bange kamambuno wakai dipene endindre ana yomba koglkoglo kinde singwa erewakai erikwa.
42009007	Herot, Galili yaglkande moglkwa enge taragl kanekane plau dingwa i pirpogl sikrukwa. Sraglpre, yomba tau Jon Baptais andigl ukor ome digo,
42009008	tau Elaija plau dumiwo digo, ana tau propet okuna imbo ta ukor ome dingwa.
42009009	Ba Herot dungwa, “Na okuna Jon nungo gare kondingra. Yagl ira pre ka i digo na pirye?” Ana ye Yesus kanagledi pre ningadi prukwa.
42009010	Aposel wagle ende ikine undre ana ye taragl prapra erimere i Yesus diteingwa. Ye aposel keunde auro yungo, ye yene ende taun ta kangiye Betsaida we dimara mangigl eingwa.
42009011	Ba yomba merkinde ka i pirtre, Yesus omara mokomugl eingwa. Ana ye yomba diwakai yei tendre, God kingdomo pre dite ana yomba kinde singwa erewakai ere norambedi pirkwa mere erewakai eretongwa.
42009012	Ana kamun pokndi ande beinagledi orko, disaipel 12 ye moglmara undre, ana dingwa, “Yomba prapra diendo, sraglpre ye yungu epigl mangigl yeimara igle pindre ana yungu panaglkwa ya kaiya mokna doko topo eraglkwa, sraglpre, yawagle nono dumo waule suna mounga.”
42009013	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ye sragl ninaglkwa pre enene ta i teiyo.” Ye di ikine endingwa, “No bret 5 keunde yongo ana fis suwo yongwa. Ene pitnga no pindre yomba i prapra kaiya moknano topo eramuno?”
42009014	Igle yagl 5,000 meglkwa. Ba ye disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ditembi yomba 50, 50 dimakaisi amedi molondo.”
42009015	Disaipelma wagle yegl eriko ana yomba prapra amedingwa.
42009016	Yesus bret 5 ya te fis suwo ikra indre ana kan imbo heven ende God diwakai yei ana bret ya fis bukondi ana disaipel wagle tongo ye yumbusi yomba teingwa.
42009017	Ye prapra neingwa kuno orko ana disaipel wagle bukondi diure kawa tongwa wakai ere gande basket 12 gre kau singwa.
42009018	Enge suwarata Yesus yene mundu mogltre kamange ere moglko, disaipelma wagle ye moglmara wingo ana ye krapogl tongwa, “Yomba merkinde ye na pre ira we dime?”
42009019	Ye di ikine endingwa, “Tau ene pre Jon Baptais we digo te tau ene pre, Elaija we digo, te tau ama propet okuna imbo ta andigl ukor omedingwa.”
42009020	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene sragl wedi pirme? Ene na pre ira we dim?” Pita di ikine endungwa, “Ene Krais God pinde i-pere ende Israel yomba i-ikine endinatne dungwa.”
42009021	Yesus ka giglendi ditendre, i yomba suwarata ditekriyo dungwa.
42009022	Ana ye yegl dungwa, “Yomba Wam giu merkinde goran ana ende okuna eingwa yomba ya pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba mokono tembi ana ye sigoraglkwa. Ba ande enge suwota yenan andigl ukor enambuka.”
42009023	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle prapra ditongwa, “Yomba suwarata na bogl unagledi pirambuka, ye yene pre pirkre ana endimo-prak kake indre, ana na wimara wondo.
42009024	Sraglpre yomba ta yene kor-morambuka ere-inagledi eran, okuwo kor-moglkwa i wau borambuka. Ba, ta ye na pre ere kor-moglkwa i kinde kondinan ana yene kor-moglkwa okuwo ere-inambuka.
42009025	Yagl ta makan koglkoglo taragl prapra imakaisi kuno erambuka, ba yene erekinde ere yanginambuka ana taraglmo i sraglmere ere yene akeple ditenambe?
42009026	Yomba ta na ya te na kanna pre angai goran, okuwo Yomba Wam yene ambuglangemo mina ya te, Nem ambuglangemo mina suna ya te angelo holi bogl unaglkwa enge ana ye pre angaino gogl tenambuka.
42009027	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba tau mangigl andigl meglkwa ya, ye goglkre kor-moglpai ana God kingdom kanaglkwa.”
42009028	Yesus ka i dungwa ande enge 8 dundungo, ye kamange era pre Pita ya Jon te Jems auro yungo ana kamun muglo ta ende egli eingwa.
42009029	Igle Yesus kamange eremoglko, ye gumadra i-yakete wu kaneta ongo, ana ye gaglmo kamun pogl dungwa mereyegl ambuglangesi kruwo kaima ongwa.
42009030	Ana oglandi kaima yagl suwo Yesus bogl ka dingwa, ye Moses ya Elaija.
42009031	Ye heven ambuglange mina suna plau dimbriko ana Yesus ende Jerusalem enan God dumere mere pai inan gorambuka pre ye ka dingwa.
42009032	Pita ya yagl suwo-akiye eingwa ikra bogl ugl paingwa, ba ye andigl ana Yesus ambuglangemo kanigo ana yagl suwo Yesus bogl akiye igle andigl meglkwa.
42009033	Yagl suwo Yesus kondo ende enambrika enge magl orko, ana Pita di Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, nono mangigl igle moramga wakai pangwa. No yungu akrika suwota sinamga, ta ene pre, ta Moses pre, te ta Elaija pre.” (Ye sragl ka dungwa i yene ta pirpogl sikrukwa.)
42009034	Ye ka ama dimoglko, kamun kuakawa ta plaudi, ye were isuna endindre, ana kamun kuakawa ye meglmara waidi ye isuna endungo, ana kundugl geglkwa.
42009035	Ana ka ta kamun kuakawa mina dungwa, “I na Wana, ye na pinde i kondiga, ye kamo piryo.”
42009036	Ka i di kondungo, ana ye kanigwa Yesus yene mundu moglkwa. Disaipelma wagle ka i yene keunde pirtre ana kiendi mogl, ye taragl kanigwa ikra yomba ditekrikwa.
42009037	Ana tangina ye kamun muglo ende atne wingo, ana yomba merkinde wu Yesus tengigl yeingwa.
42009038	Yagl ta yomba merkinde meglmara suna, agle binan bogl dungwa, “Beke Notnga! Ene yana diteinga, ene na wana kano; sraglpre ye na wana suwara kaima moglkwa!
42009039	Ye spirit kinde ta kane sungwa, ana ye oglandi ongo kagle duglosi gigle dungo, spirit kinde gak piyasi endungo goragledi ere, ana ake pur-di dra euriye sungwa. Ana aimande erekinde eretongwa ana ye kondo ende enambuka mere manga.
42009040	Na ene disaipelma wagle simenda endinaglmedi pre yana diga, ba ye simenda endinaglkwa mere manga.”
42009041	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene pirngi dikrikwa yomba epitno. Enge sramuna na ene bogl moragle? Enge sramuna na ene akeple dinagle? Ene wan imangigl yawo.”
42009042	Ana yagl gakmo ungo, ana spirit kinde gak si makandle ende, ana piyasi endungwa goragledi orkwa. Ba Yesus ka giglendi di spirit kinde tendre, ana gak erewakai ere tendre, ana te ikine ende yene nem tongwa.
42009043	Ana yomba prapra God yombuglomo pond i kandre, sipuglo dingwa. Yomba prapra Yesus taragl kor orkwa i kan kinano gundo meglko, ana yene disaipelma wagle ditongwa,
42009044	“Kinano yei wakai ere piryo, na ka ta ene ditenaglka. Yomba Wam ye indre yaglkumba onguno mina yenambuka.”
42009045	Ba ye ka i mambuno sraglmere pangwa i pirpogl sikrikwa. Ka i ye mina torwa orkwa, yeglpre ye pirpogl sikre, ana ye ka i krapogl tenamnedi pirkwa ba kundugl geglkwa.
42009046	Disaipelma wagle mambuno bogl yene mina ira kande kaima morambedi tengramo dingwa.
42009047	Ana ye ka pirkwa i Yesus kandre ana gak kembra ta indre ana yene moglmara koglokra endungo andigl moglkwa.
42009048	Ana ye disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yomba ta na kangina mina gak kembra i di-inan na diyungwa, ana yomba ta na di-inan ye ama na diendungwa yagle diyungwa. Yeglpre ene prapra mina yomba ta mogl-atne endungwa i ye kande kaima moglkwa.”
42009049	Jon dungwa, “Yomba kande, no kamga yagl ta ene kangin mina spirit kinde simenda endungo, ana no mane ditomga. Sraglpre ye nono epitno mina ta moglkrukwa.”
42009050	Yesus dungwa, “Ye mane ditekriyo, sraglpre yomba ta ene dikinde yeikran, ye ene yombano moglkwa.”
42009051	God eremogl Yesus auro yend imbo heven enambuka enge mangigl orko, ana Yesus ende Jerusalem enagledi poglodi prukwa.
42009052	Ana ye kakep yomba di endungo ende okuna eingwa. Ye ende Samaria yomba yungunomugl pindre, taragl prapra ake wakai ere yeitenaglkwa.
42009053	Ba dumo igle yomba ye unambe dikrikwa. Sraglpre ye pirkwa Yesus yene ende Jerusalem enambukra wedi pirkwa.
42009054	Ana disaipelma suwo Jems ya Jon i kandre, ye kra peurka, “Yaglkande, ene pra wedi pitn, no dumbugl donga heven ende atne undre ana yomba erekinde ere tenambo?”
42009055	Ba Yesus kan aketendre ana ka-tongo,
42009056	ana ye ende yungu epigl bange ta eingwa.
42009057	Ye konbauna bange endpi paingo, yagl ta di Yesus tongwa, “Ene kamun koglkoglo enatnara na mokonomugl enaglka.”
42009058	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Agl are yungumo kombuglo mur yongo, te kua ye yungumo yongwa, ba Yomba Wam ye yungumo toglmo ta yeikrukwa.”
42009059	Ye di tongwa, “Ene na mokonamugl wo!” Ba yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande, komnaiye kana na kanwinge etn pindre ana nina maugl sinaglka.”
42009060	Yesus ditongwa, “Kanwinge etn geglkwa yene geglkwa yomba maugl sinaglkwa, ba ene ende pindre God kingdom pre dipene endo.”
42009061	Yagl ta ama dungwa, “Yaglkande, na ene mokon mina unaglka, ba komnaiye kanwinge etn na ende ikine pindre, ana yombana wakai molo ditenaglka.”
42009062	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba suwarata makan wakungwa taragl guma akindre, makan wake, ana kan ikine endinan, ana God kingdomo mina suna kongun erambuka kuno erekrukwa.”
42010001	Enge igle mokomugl Yesus yomba 72 kor dagl pinde indre ana ye suwo suwondi di taun kande ya kembra prapra aglokra yene enagledi prumara igle okuna kana piyo di endungwa.
42010002	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Kaiya mokna merkinde mongo de bogl yei kondungwa, ba kongun yomba mere mogl simakai sinaglkwa manga. Yeglpre, Yaglkande kongun nemyagl kamange ere teimbi, ye kongunmo yomba di endinan ana yene kaiya moknamo mongo simakai sinaglkwa.
42010003	Ende piyo! Ene sipsip mereyegl na di agl koglma meglmara suna endiga.
42010004	Ene moni paus ya gagl kamban ya katno towo ta ikriyo, te konbo bange yomba ta koglkare ditekriyo.
42010005	“Ene yungu ta yungugl enaglkwa enge, komnaiye kana yegl dinaglkwa. Yungu igle yomba nomano pokndi yenano.
42010006	Ana yungu igle yomba ene kanwakai yei nomane wakai pangwa ta moran, ene nomano pokndi yei koglkare dingwa i ye mina panambuka. Ta manan, nomano pokndi ya koglkare dingwa i ende ikine enene mina unambuka.
42010007	Yungu suwarata yungugl enaglmara i keunde mogltre, ana ye nigl kaiya mokna taragl ta ene tenaglkwa i keunde neiyo, sraglpre kongun yomba ye topomo inambuka, ene winambo di ende yungu ta ta pikriyo.
42010008	“Ene ende taun ta suna eimbi ana yomba ene diwakai yeitendre, ene pre kaiya mokna ta akekun ere yei tembi neiyo.
42010009	Ene dumo kande igle yomba kinde sungwa erewakai ere tendre, ana yomba igle yegl diteiyo, ‘God kingdomo ene mina mangigl wu kondungwa.’
42010010	Ba ene ende taun ta suna eimbi, ana ye eremogl ene ta di yungugl endekrimbi, ene ende dumo kande suna konbauna yeimara igle pindre ana diyo.
42010011	Ene tauno igle kunganemo no katno mina sidange meglko, ana no tamasi ikine enene mina endumga. Ba i pirpogl siyo, God kingdomo ene mina mangigl ungwa.
42010012	Na ene diteinga, God ka-tange tenambuka enge kande mina Sodom yomba mitno pond gogl tendre ana taun igle ka-tange tenambuka.
42010013	“Korasin yomba, yumbun kande ene mina plau dinambuka. Betsaida yomba, ene mina yumbun akiye plau dinambuka. Ene mina suna kimagl gaglebogl erimere i Taia ya te Saidon ye mina ta oruma daglma, ye yene tambre kana tandaglmeno pre kundugl gogl ana yange amedi weraisi, yungum gamba mai indre, ana ye okuna imbo nomano yake tomnedi ombuno digo.
42010014	Ba enge kande mina God ka-tange yomba tenambuka enge, Taia ya Saidon ye mitno pond gogl tendre, ene mitno kurita gorambuka.
42010015	Ana ene Kaperneam yomba enene akepledi yend mitna imbo heven enaglmo? Tamanga, ene piyasi geglkwa dumo atne endinaglkwa.”
42010016	Yesus yene disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yomba ta ene kanno piraglkwa, i na kanna pirkwa, te yomba ta ene kanno sendimbi, i na kanna sendingwa. Te yomba ta na kanna sendimbi, ana na diendungwa yagle ye kamo sendingwa.”
42010017	Yagl 72 ikra gun argan bogl ende ikine undre ana dingwa, “Yaglkande, no ene kangin mina ka giglendi dumgo ana spirit kinde wagle no kanno pinande erikwa!”
42010018	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na kaninga Satan kamun pogl dungwa mereyegl heven imbo yange atne sungwa.
42010019	Piryo, na ene yombura teinga, yeglpre ene toki meglmara tembe engre ende pindre, ana toki gaimbande ya kunda ikine Satan yombuglomo pangwa i prapra engre atne endimbi ana i ene ta erekinde ere tekrambuka.
42010020	Ba spirit kinde ene kanno pinande erikwa ipre ene gun yeikraglkwa. Ba ene gun yeiyo; sraglpre, ene kangino heven suna pepa mina pangwa.”
42010021	Ana enge igle Holi Spirit Yesus mina kau sungo gun yendre ana dungwa, “Nina, ene heven ya makandle, Yaglkande. Na ene dembinsi teiga. Sraglpre, ene eremogl yomba pirpogl singwa taragl aketeke yei tendre ana yomba taragl beke pirkrikwa ene gak kembra mere ombuno ditenga. Kaima, Nina, taragl ene pitnere mere plau dungwa.
42010022	“Na Nina taragl prapra nare kondungwa, yomba suwarata ta Wam ira moglkwa i ta kanpogl sikrikwa. Nem keunde kangwa, ana yomba suwarata ta nem ira moglkwa i ta kankrikwa. Wam keunde kangwa, ana Wam ye yomba pinde yungwa i ombuno dungo ye Nem kanigwa.”
42010023	Ana Yesus kan akete disaipelma wagle kandre, ana ye keunde ditongwa, “Ene kanigwa, taragl i yomba pra ongumutno mina kanigwa pre God eran ye gun yenaglkwa.
42010024	Yeglpre na ene diteinga, propet merkinde ya te king merkinde ene taragl kanigwa i ye okuna kanamnedi erikwa, ba ye ta kankrikwa. Te ene ka pirkwa i ye piramnedi pirkwa, ba ye ta pirkrikwa.”
42010025	Lo beke tongwa yagl ta undre ana Yesus dipiragledi pre krapoglkwa, “Beke Notnga, na sragl ere kor aimande moraglka inagle?”
42010026	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Moses lomo pepa mina suna sragl wedi muno beglko pame? Ene sraglmere ere ketne?”
42010027	Yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande ene Godnen, noman mina mundu wakai kandre, ana kuiyan mina mundu ya te yombutn prapra ya te, poglodi pitnga prapra akiye. Ana enene pre wakai kanere yeglmere, yomba mangigl meglkwa i wakai kano.”
42010028	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene pamere dinga, yegl ertre ana ene kor-moratnga.”
42010029	Ba lo beke tongwa yomba ye yene yomba du-wakai moledi prukwa, yeglpre ye krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Yomba i ira mere na kanwakai yenagle?”
42010030	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ta Jerusalem kamun kondo end-ime Jeriko enapre ongwa, ana kunogl gogl yomba ake gidi mogl, kunguglmo gaglmo ake argla dindre, ere singo gorambuka mere pango ana teke ende eingwa.
42010031	Ana pris ta konbauna suwara i keunde end-ime pindre ana yaglmo ikra kandre ana kindekondo konbauna koglokra endongwa.
42010032	Kuno yegl keunde, Levai yomba suwarata ama igle wu ana yaglmo i kandre, ombugl konbauna koglokra endongwa.
42010033	Ba Samaria yagl suwarata konbauna embirara igle undre yaglmo paimoglko kandre ana ye miriye pond goglkwa.
42010034	Ye yaglmo pamara pindre ana ende nuglo kungo ya wain nuglo toindi boglmara ende, ana tu kogl tongwa. Te ye yaglmo i boglo ere yene dongimo mina bolamugl ende yendpi yomba eglke wu pai-pai erimara yungu pandigl ana igle ye suglmo wakai moglkwa.
42010035	Tangina ta ye yungu sugl meglkwa yomba moni mongo suwo i menda ende tendre, ana dungwa, ‘Ye suglmo wakai molo. Na konbauna igle ende ikine unaglka enge, yaglmo ipre ene taragl ta ere tenatnere mere na ene topo te ikine endinaglka.’
42010036	“Ana yomba suwota i ye mina ene pitn kade iramere kunogl gogl yomba eresigura i kan ere wakai ere tome?”
42010037	Lo beke tongwa yagle i di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ta miriye gogl wakai ere tongwa yagle ikra.” Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene ende pindre ana ormere yeglmere ero.”
42010038	Yesus yene disaipelma wagle bogl konbauna ende wingo, ye ende yungu epigl ta yomara ungwa, igle ambu ta kangiye Marta, ye eremogl Yesus diwakai yei auro yend yungumo mina ongwa.
42010039	Marta ambauglo ta moglkwa kangiye Maria, ye Yaglkande moglmara kagle mina amedi mogltre ana ye ka dungo pir moglkwa.
42010040	Ba Marta ye kaiya mokna prapra ake wakai ere tenagledi pitnbogl ere nomano kinde pirtre ana ye Yesus moglmara undre krapogl tongwa, “Yaglkande, ambara na kinde kondungo, nana kongun prapra erika i ene kankitno? Ye ditemin wu na akeple dinarano.”
42010041	Ana Yaglkande di ikine ende Marta tongwa, “Marta, Marta, ene taragl merkinde pre pitngo ana nomanen kinde orkwa
42010042	ba taragl suwarata inatnga pai moglkwa. Maria sragl wakai kaima pinde yungwa ana taragl i ye mina ta i eglke endekraglkwa.”
42011001	Ande enge suwarata Yesus dumo bangeta kamange ere moglkwa. Ana ye kamange ere kondungo, yene disaipelmo suwarata Yesus ditongwa, “Yaglkande, no kamange eramunere beke noro. Okuna Jon Baptais disaipelma wagle beke tomere yeglkra.”
42011002	Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene kamange eraglkwa enge, yegl dinaglkwa: “‘Nina, ene kangin holi panambiwo, ene kingdomnen unano.
42011003	Ande enge yomere yomere kaiya mokna no ninamnere noro.
42011004	No tandaglmeno kinde kondo noro, yeglmere yomba aglau erenorkwa i ama kinde kondo tomga. Ana bagl nusi mina no auro i suna pikro.’”
42011005	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene mina suwarata yomba ta yeininan ana ye enduwer suna ende moglmara pindre ana ditenambuka, ‘Yeinombuglka, na bret suwota kur inaglka.
42011006	Sraglpre na yomba yeineinga ta konbauna eglkekuri wan wu na yungunamugl ungwa. Ana na kaiya mokna ye tenaglka ta yeikrukwa.’
42011007	“Ana yomba yungugl moglkwa ikra yegl di ikine endinambuka, ‘Ene na yumbun narekro; yungu dra kande yongugl kondiga, ana na nangrima akiye bogl mina ugl pamga, na andigl taragl kanekane ene ta i tekraglka.’
42011008	Na ene diteinga, yungu nemyagl ene yeinembrika ipre andigl bret ta i tekrambuka. Ba ene angai goglkre kra ningadi potnga pre ye andrakrumara andigl ana taragl prapra inagledi dinga mere i-tenambuka.
42011009	“Yeglpre na ene diteinga, krapotn ana God ene tenambuka, dokun ana ene kanatnga. Sigiu dimin ana yungu dra yauro ende tenambuka.
42011010	Yeglpre yomba prapra God krapogltre, inaglkwa; te ye dokindre kanaglkwa. Te ye sigiu dimbi, yungu dra yauro ende tenambuka.
42011011	“Ene yagl gak ta nem motn, wan fis ta pre kra poran, ene toki ta i-tenatno?
42011012	Mo ye kua muglo pre kra poran, ene toki kinde gaimbande ta i tenatno?
42011013	Ene yomba kinde meglkwa ba pirpogl si, nangro taragl wakai teingwa. Yeglmere Neno heven suna moglkwa, yomba krapeglkwa mere ye Holi Spirit tenambuka.”
42011014	Spirit kinde yagl ta mina moglko ka dikrukwa, Yesus simenda endungwa. Ana enge i spirit kinde ende menda ongo ana yagl ka dikrukwa ikra mambuno bogl ka dungo ana yomba merkinde kaima kan sipuglo dingwa.
42011015	Ba yomba tau dingwa, “Ye spirit kinde wagle sutno yomba kande Belsebul yombuglomo tongo kade ye spirit kinde simenda endungwa.”
42011016	Ana yomba tau Yesus ta eran kanamnedi krapogl, ye heven kimagl ta ero dingwa.
42011017	Ba Yesus ye nomano mina pirkwa i kangwa, yeglpre ye ditongwa, “Dumo kande tau yomba yene yumbusi epigl mere ende ana ye yene kunda beglmbi ana dumo kande i kinde ere kondinambuka. Te yomba komuno okuwo epigl suwarata yumbusi kunda beglmbi ama yene yangesi wu perepere enaglkwa.
42011018	Yeglpre, Satan kingdomo yumbusi wu epigl mere pindre yene kunda beglmbi, ye kingdom i sraglmere andigl giglendi panambe? Na ka diga i sraglpre ene eremogl Belsebul yombuglo narko spirit wagle simenda endume dingwa.
42011019	Na erme Belsebul mina spirit kinde wagle simenda endiga panan, ene mokonomugl wingwa yomba ye ira mina spirit kinde wagle simenda end-ime? Yegl eran enene mokonomugl wingwa ye ene kanno yumbu singwa i aglau erikwa.
42011020	Ba na God yombuglomo mina spirit kinde wagle simenda endiga panan ana i kuno kaima orkwa, God kingdomo ene mina wu kondungwa.
42011021	“Ana yagl giglekui dungwa ta ye kunda taraglmo prapra indre akekun ere, yene yungumugl sugl wakai moran, ana yene bonamo prapra yomere yenambuka.
42011022	Ba yagl giglekui dungwa ta yungu nemyagl ikra kunda bogl tendre ana yombuglo ertre ye kunda sragl akeple dungwa yomara ikra wausi yend pindre ana yomba yumbusi tongwa.
42011023	“Yomba ta na yombana moglkrukwa, ye na kundana ikine erenarikwa. Yomba na akeple dindre imakai sikrukwa, ye kaima yomba si perepere endungwa.
42011024	“Spirit kinde yagl ta mina ende menda unambuka enge, ye endpi dumo kugla dumara ta mogl ir sinambuka ba dumo i ta doko kan ikran ana yene yegl dinambuka, ‘Na ende ikine yungu okuna kondimara igle enaglka.’
42011025	Ye ende ikine pi kango ana yungu wiglki kuro ende ake wakai kaima ere endigo yongwa.
42011026	Ana ye ende ikine pi spirit kinde 7 yene mereyegl manga, ye kinde kaima meglkwa auro ipi yungu yungugl igle suna ongo meglkwa. Ana yombamo i okuna kurita wu kinde ongwa ba erme ye wu kinde kaima enambuka.”
42011027	Yesus ka i di moglko, ambu ta yomba merkinde kaima meglmara suna kra agle dindre ana ditongwa, “Ambu ta ene kugl yei ana am tongwa ambumo i ye gun yenambuka.”
42011028	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta God kamo pirtre ana dumere pinande erikwa, ye gun yenaglkwa.”
42011029	Yomba merkinde kaima wu Yesus moglmara mogl winambo dingo, ana ye dungwa, “Yomba prapra epigl erme meglkwa i kinde kaima! Ye kimagl pre krapeglkwa. I na ta ombuno di tekraglka. Ba propet Jona diumo i keunde kanaglkwa.
42011030	Jona diu ta ere Niniwe yomba ombuno ditongwa, kuno yeglmere Yomba Wam ye mina diu i plau dinambuka i yomba epigl erme i kanaglkwa.
42011031	God yomba ka-tange tenambuka enge, Ambu Kuwin Makan Yoglmbo kra moglkwa ye andigltre ana yomba epigl erme i ka-tange tenambuka. Sraglpre King Solomon nomane pai pogl sungwa kamo piragledi pre makan uglomugl yei ende ungwa. Ana yomba ta erme mangigl igle moglkwa, ye mogl-mitna ende Solomon engrukwa.
42011032	God yomba ka-tange tenambuka enge, Niniwe yomba andigltre ene mambunono kinde diporaglkwa. Sraglpre ye Jona kamambuno dipene endungo pirtre nomano kinde yake teingwa. Ana na ene diteinga, erme yomba ta mangigl igle moglkwa ye mogl-mitna ende Jona engrukwa.
42011033	“Yomba ta ken-lam gagltre, ana dumo siyokumara ya baket mina atnekra yeikraglkwa. Taman, ye ipi ken-lam boglmo mina bolamugl yeingwa. Yegl erikwa i yomba ende yungugl undre ambuglange i kanaglkwa.
42011034	Ene ongumutn i nangin ken-lam. Ene ongumutn wakai panan, ene nangin mundu ambuglange sinambuka. Ba ene ongumutn kinde eran, ene nangin mundu mim bongond erambuka.
42011035	Yeglpre, sugl wakai motn ana ene mina suna ambuglangen i mim erekrambuka.
42011036	Yeglpre ene nangin mundu ambuglange kau sindre ana nangin kurita mim suna paikran ana ene nangin mundu potndinambuka, ken-lam ambuglangemo ambuglangesi ene mina endumere yeglmere.”
42011037	Yesus ka dikondungo, ana Parisi ta ye bogl kaiya mokna ninambugledi pre digaglkwa, yeglpre ye ende yungugl pi ana kaiya mokna nena pre bogl mina amedungwa.
42011038	Ana Parisi sipuglo dungwa, ye kango Yesus komnaiye ongo nigl koglkre kaiya mokna ake nongwa.
42011039	Yeglpre, Yaglkande ye ditongwa, “Erme Parisi wagle ene nigl kap ya pletno nangiye tembe nigl endigo winge di yongwa, ba ene mina sunakra nana wedi pirkwa ya nomano kinde kau sungwa.
42011040	Ene yomba du erikwa, God mendakra ere yendre ana sunakra ama ere yeikrumo?
42011041	Ba ene kapno ya pletno mina sunakra taragl yongwa i kiuglgiunde yomba tembi ana ene mina taragl prapra deglmbi yeikrambuka.
42011042	“Parisi wagle ene kankun eriyo, yumbun kande ene mina plau dinambuka. Sraglpre ene kaiya mokna kanekane imakaisi bogl yeingwa enge ana karaugl yaundo ya gene tondua demine orkwa ere 10 mina suwarata God teingwa. Ba ene embriye du-wakai ya God wakai kangwa mambuno i kinde kondingwa. Ene i prapra ertre ana tau kondokrimbi wakai.
42011043	“Parisi wagle ene kankun eriyo, yumbun kande ene mina plau dinambuka. Sraglpre ene makai yungu yungugl kra bogl gumamugl amedi mogltre ana maket dumo suna no diwakai yei noro dembino sinaglmedi erikwa yomba.
42011044	“Yumbun kande ene mina plau dinambuka. Sraglpre ene yomba geglko maugl simara dumo buro paikruko ana i yomba kankre konbauna bolamugl waningwa mereyegl ene meglkwa.”
42011045	Lo beke teingwa yomba suwarata, Yesus ditongwa, “Beke Notnga, ene ka yegl di Parisi wagle tenga, i ene no pre akiye dikinde yenga.”
42011046	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Lo pirpogl singwa yomba ene mina ama yumbun kinde kaima plau dinambuka. Sraglpre ene yomba yumbun pond teingo ye kake yenaglkwa yumbun orkwa. Ba enene onguno mongo suwarata ta duglosi yumbun ye kake yeingwa i ta akeple dikrikwa.
42011047	“Yumbun kande ene mina plau dinambuka, sraglpre ene propet wagle kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara dumo i ekin te erewakai erikwa. I ene kowano awano eremogl propet sigeglkwa.
42011048	Yegl erikwa i enene dipeglkwa, kowano awano okuna sragl erikwa i kuno orme dingwa. Ye okuna propet sigeglko ana pandiglmara dumo ene ekin wakai teingwa.
42011049	Mambuno ipre God nomanemo wakai mina dungwa, ‘Na propet ya aposel di ye mina endimbo, ye tau sigogltre ana tau eresi tenaglkwa.’
42011050	Yeglpre yomba enge erme meglkwa yumbun inaglkwa, i ye propet sigogl wingwa i God mambuno bogl kamun makan ere yongwa enge pai ende wu erme mangigl i ungwa.
42011051	Abel mina mambuno bogl ere sigogl ende wu erme Sekaraia mina wingwa. Ye eremogl alta mina ya te God dumomo holi mina sunawom sigeglkwa i ye mina prapra yumbun inaglkwa.
42011052	“Lo pirpogl singwa yomba ene mina yumbun kande plau dinambuka. Ene nomano wakai bekingwa yungumo dra yaurikwa i ki ene ake meglkwa, ba enene ende yungugl pikrikwa. Ana yomba tau ende suna enamunedi yombuglo kinde erikwa, i ene mane diteingwa.”
42011053	Yesus dumo igle kinde kondungwa enge, lo beke teingwa yomba ya te Parisi wagle deno kumbro tendre ana ye ka kra kanekane pogl teingwa.
42011054	Ye ka ta di aglau eran si-ake enamunedi pre sugl kanmeglkwa.
42012001	Enge i yomba tausen merkinde makai singwa, yeglpre, ye nangino kitne ere katno bolamugl ikine ikine engre meglko, Yesus mambuno bogl yene disaipelma wagle okuna kana ditongwa, “Parisi wagle yisno pre ene kankun eriyo ye kakimbi dingwa pre na dinga.
42012002	Taragl tusungwa, okuwo tusi paikrambuka. Ana taragl prapra teke pangwa i okuwo wu pene embi kanaglkwa.
42012003	Ene ka ta mim ormara suna dingwa i okuwo ande ambuglange mina suna yomba piraglkwa. Ana yungu kiule kra konbo yongugl getndi pandigl ninudi kinano mina dingwa i okuwo yungu indaule mogl ka kande dipene endinaglkwa.
42012004	“Na ene diteinga, yeinomga wagle ene yomba nangino sigoraglkwa pre kundugl goglkraglkwa, ba okuwo taragl kinde yegl ta erekraglkwa.
42012005	Ba ene kunduglmo goraglkwa yomba na ombuno ditenaglka. God suwara kunduglmo golo, nangino sigogltre, okuwo ene piyasi guglo kamun suna endinambuka i yombuglomo pra kuno orkwa. Kaima, na ene diteinga, ye suwara kunduglmo golo.
42012006	Kua inawa 5 i-suwara ende topo 2 toya bogl ingwa. Kua inawa i suwara suwarandi God pir kanpogl sungwa.
42012007	Kaima yene, ene bitn yungo prapra kere kondungwa. Yeglpre ene kundugl goglkriyo, ene topono pond pai mitna imbo ende kua inawa merkinde engrikwa.
42012008	“Na ene diteinga, yomba ta yomba mere moraglmara na Yesus yombamo mole dipene endinan ana Yomba Wam kuno yegl ere God angelomo meglmara mambro mina ye kangiye dipene endinambuka.
42012009	Ba yomba ta ye yomba mambro mina na kaima ditorwa eran, Yomba Wam ama God angelomo mambro mina ye ditorwa erambuka.
42012010	Ana yomba ta ka kinde di Yomba Wam tenaglkwa, i God tandaglmeno koko ende tenambuka. Ba yomba ta Holi Spirit kenaglmo sinaglkwa, God tandaglmeno ta koko ende tekrambuka.
42012011	“Yomba ene auro ipi makai yungu sugl meglkwa yomba gavman ya yomba kande gumanomugl enaglkwa enge, enene akeple dinaglkwa mo, sragl ka dinaglkwa ipre kundugl goglkriyo.
42012012	Enge igle Holi Spirit sragl ka ene dinaglkwa i ene beke tenambuka.”
42012013	Yagl ta yomba merkinde meglmara suna di Yesus tongwa, “Beke Notnga, na angra ditemin ye na bogl neno bonamo, no pre yongwa i yumbusi norambuka.”
42012014	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Yagl ya, yomba ira eremogl na pinde indre pra yumbu sinatne dume, mo ene suwo mina suna bona yumbusi to dume?”
42012015	Ana ye yomba prapra ditongwa, “Kankun eriyo! Ana taragl kanekane pre bumbuno geglkwa i enene mina sutno wakai molo. Sraglpre, yomba kor-morambuka taragl kanekane ake nongwa ipre ta manga, ye taragl mere paitongwa i taragl yoko.”
42012016	Ana Yesus ka di simbogl ye ditongwa, “Yagl ta taragl merkinde paitongwa yagle, makanmo mina mokna mongo wakai koglkwa.
42012017	Ye yene poglodi prukwa, ‘Na sragl eragl da? Na mokna mongo angai ta yenan prapra yenaglka manga.’
42012018	“Ana ye dungwa, ‘Na yegl eraglka, na kaiya mokna yeinga yungu i prapra siterke atne ende ana yungu pond keindre, ana igle mokna mongo ya bona ganana prapra yenaglka.
42012019	Ana na nana nomana mina yegl dinaglka, “Yagl kinde moglka, na buglayungu merkinde taragl wakai prapra inga i yeinga yongwa. Ipre moglpai eraglka undinan, nigl ya kaiya mokna nendre ana na nana gun yenaglka.” ’
42012020	“Ba God ditongwa, ‘Ene du etnga! Erme enduwer i keunde ene goratnga, ana ene taragl prapra enene pre akekun ere yenga i ira inambe?’”
42012021	Yesus dungwa, “I yeglmere yomba yene pre taragl merkinde i bir singwa. Ba God mina ye kiuglgiunde meglkwa.”
42012022	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yeglpre na ene diteinga, ene sragl taragl nendre kor-moraglkwa ya nangino mina sragl gagl endinaglkwa ipre ene ta pirkriyo.
42012023	Kor meglkwa i pai mitna ende kaiya mokna engrukwa, te nangino pai mitna ende kungugl gagl engrukwa.
42012024	Kua meglkwa i ene kaniyo, ye mokna mongo ta sunduglkre, te simakai sikrikwa, te kaiya mokna yungu mo taragl yenaglkwa yungumo ta yeikrukwa. God yene kaiya moknamo tongwa ana ene mogl mitna kaima ende kua engrikwa.
42012025	Mo ene yomburo ta pra panan kor-moglpai eraglkwa i pre enene engeno ta pra ake olto endinaglmo?
42012026	Ene taragl kembra kinde yeglmere ta sugl moglkitn sraglpre ene taragl tau pre nomano kande pame?
42012027	“Taragl kuiye tekendile bogl pangwa i kanigwa, ye konguno ta erekrikwa, yene kungutno gatno ta bekekrikwa. Ba na ene diteinga, okuna King Solomon ye ekin nogl gagl wangwa, ba ye taragl kuiye wakai yeglmere ta ekin gagl i-wankrukwa.
42012028	Ana akindile endikan kuiye yeglmere, etne plaudi pangwa, te tangina mereyegl puro gagltenge eraglkwa, iwe God yene embriye wakai yeglmere panambedi prukwa pre plaudi pangwa. Yeglmere ene kungutno gatno pra i-pene ende tekrambo? Ene pirngi dingwa kembra pangwa!
42012029	Ipre ene nomano kinde erekrano, kaiya ya nigl sragl ere ninamnedi ningadi pirkriyo.
42012030	Yomba kane kane makan koglkoglo taragl i prapra pre sika singwa. Ana ene Neno Kande taragl inamunedi pirkwa i ye kan kondungwa.
42012031	Ba ye kingdomo ene komnaiye dokimbi ana ye taragl i prapra ene tenambuka.
42012032	“Sipsip kuri meglkwa ene kundugl goglkriyo. Sraglpre Neno kingdom ene tenagledi munduwo pangwa.
42012033	Ene bonano prapra topo bogl indre ana moni i kiuglgiunde yomba teiyo. Moni gagl kamban biglki dikrambuka i enene pre imakai siyo, ene taragl mere heven suna paitenambuka pre gande makai siyo. Sraglpre igle taragl ta wau boglkrambuka, te kunogl gogl ta ikraglkwa, mo gunange ta bagl erekinde erekrambuka.
42012034	Yeglpre, bona ganan wakai yomara dumo igle ene nomano ombugl igle yenambuka.
42012035	“Ene gatno ende kumatno de gidindre ana taragl plau dinambuka ipre akekun erimbi ana ken-lamno aimande depanambuka.
42012036	Yeglmere kongun yomba yagl kandeno bogl ingwa kaiya mokna bir neimara ende ikine unambuka pre suglmo meglkwa, yegl erimbi ye ende ikine undre ana yungu dra sigiu dinan, ye oglandi konbo yauro ende tenaglkwa.
42012037	Kongun yomba yeglmere gun yeiyondo, sraglpre yagl kandeno ende ikine wu kango ye pre suglmo meglkwa. Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yene ekin gagl kumagl de gidi ana diendinan amedi meglmbi ye undre kaiya mokna tenambuka.
42012038	Ana yagl kandemo enduwer suna mo konduwagle wi sinambuka enge wu ye kanan ana kongun yomba akekun eremeglkwa pre ye gun yenaglkwa.
42012039	Ana i pirpogl siyo. Yungu nemyagl ye kunogl gogl yomba unaglkwa enge i ta piran ana ye ta kanwinge eran yungumo si anda bogl ta ende yungugl pirkraglkwa.
42012040	Ene engenge akekun ere moraglkwa. Sraglpre, Yomba Wam unambedi ene pirkre moraglkwa enge ye unambuka.”
42012041	Pita krapoglkwa, “Yaglkande, ene ka di simbogl dinga i no pre dinotno mo, yomba prapra pre dine?”
42012042	Ana Yaglkande ka mongo dungwa, “Kongun sugl yomba ira nomano wakai pango kongun pamere orme? Ye yagl kande kongunmo yomba sugl moglo diendinan ana ye kaiya moknano enge pamere yumbusi kongun yomba tau tenambuka.
42012043	Yombamo kande ende ikine wu kongunmo yomba kanan ana ye kongun wakai eremoglkwa pre gun yenambuka.
42012044	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ye yombamo kande eremogl kongunmo yomba i bonana, prapra sugl kan moglo dinambuka.
42012045	Ba kongun yomba yene yegl diporambuka, ‘Na yombana kande tambre ende ikine ukrambuka pangwa.’ Ana ye mambuno bogl kongun yaglambu eresindre kaiya mokna ya wain gigle dungwa nendre ana nomano kuno paikrukwa.
42012046	Kongun yomba i yombano kande aunake unambuka ande enge mo ande kuiya ta pirkre morambuka enge unambuka. Ana ye undre kongunmo yomba i kondokre sibiglki baglki di ana ipi pirngi dikrikwa yomba meglmara endinambuka.
42012047	“Kongun yomba i yombamo kande nomane pangwa i pir kondindre, ana akekun erekre mogl ana yombamo kande taragl erambedi prumere erekrukwa pre uglmbo kumba merkinde sinambuka.
42012048	Ba kongun yomba ta ye pirkre taragl ta eran ana kane enambuka panan ye kumba kuri ta borambuka. Yomba taragl merkinde inaglkwa ana taragl mere tenaglkwa. Yomba ta taragl merkinde tenaglkwa ye taragl mere ikine endinamne dinaglkwa.
42012049	“Na donga i makandle winga ana na munduna pangwa i donga oglandi mambuno bogl bauglo erambedi pirka.
42012050	Ba na baptais ta inaglka yoko pangwa, okuna imbo nomana yumbun dongwa i dundinambuka.
42012051	Ene pirmbi na nomano bipokndi yenambuka pre i makandle umedi pirmo? Taman. Na ene diteinga, ba wakai moraglkwa pre ta manga, si perepere endinaglka pre winga.
42012052	Erme mogl-enaglkwa i nem mam nangigle 5 meglmbi ana yene yumbusi epigl suwo enaglkwa suwota wu ikine pi suwo kunda ere tembi ana suwo wu ikine pi suwota kunda ere tenambrika.
42012053	Ye wu perepere enaglkwa, nem eremogl wam kunda bogl tenan te wam eremogl nem kunda bogl tenan te mam eremogl ambuglo kunda bogl tenan te ambuglo kunda bogl mam tenan, te koglo embiyamo ikine ikine ende kunda borambrika.”
42012054	Yesus ka di yomba merkinde tongwa, “Ene kaningo ande beimara iro kuakawa waidi ende egli ongwa enge, ene tambre kana yegl dingwa, ‘Erme kamun sinambuka pamiwo’ dingo? Kaima, kamun sungwa.
42012055	Ana nigl beiye kra ir mange inda endungwa enge ene dingwa, ‘Ande denambuka pamiwo’ dingo, ana kaima ande dongwa.
42012056	Ene kakimbi yomba ene makan ya kamun kua kandre ana enge yenambere dinongugl endingwa. Sraglpre ene mambuno kinde ya wakai erme yongwa i dipene ende pirkrime?
42012057	“Ene sraglpre enene mambuno wakai eraglkwa pangwa i yumbu sikrime?
42012058	Ene nonga dimbrika bogl ka tange teingwa yomba moglmara ena pre embir, ana ene konbo bange enambrara i tambre kana ka i di akedu endo. Yegl erekitn ene ipi ka tange teingwa yomba mina tenan ana ye tekoglo kimbirnem tembi ana kimbirnem ene piyasi kane yungu suna endinaglkwa.
42012059	Na ene diteinga, ene ende menda ukre kane paimogltre ana kot dumere mere topo prapra te kondinatnga.”
42013001	Enge i yomba tau igle meglkwa ye Galili yomba okuna Pailat dungo ye sigeglko bormaino yange ye kombuglange gaglkwa bormai mina sikugl endungwa i kra Yesus ditengwa.
42013002	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene pirkwa Galili yomba i tandaglme kinde kaima ere ana Galili yomba tau prapra engrikwa pre ye giu yegl imo?
42013003	Tamanga, na ene diteinga, tandaglme kindekondo nomano yake tekrimbi, ene akiye prapra ye geglmere yeglmere goraglkwa.
42013004	Mo Siloam kamun suna yungu oltokuri kei aine ende mitna imbo eingwa ana bukondi yange yomba 18 sindakaglko geglkwa. I ene pirmbi ye aglau pond ere Jerusalem yomba tau meglkwa i prapra engrimo?
42013005	Tamanga. Na ene diteinga, tandaglmeno kindekondo nomano yake tekrimbi, ene prapra ama ye geglmere yegl goraglkwa.”
42013006	Yesus ka i di simbogl ditongwa, “Yagl ta endi kogla wainmo togl mina suna yaglko pangwa, ye pi endi kogla mongo ta kogl pamedi pre doko kangwa, ba ta kogl pango kankrukwa.
42013007	Yeglpre ye wain togl sugl moglkwa yagle ditongwa, ‘Kano! Buglayungu suwota na igle wu, endi kogla i mongo ta kogl pamedi pre dokinga, ba na mongo ta kankrika. Boro atne endo! Sraglpre endi i makan nuglo yoko ne panambe?’
42013008	“Ba kongun yomba di ikine endungwa, ‘Yagl kande, buglayungu suwarata ama kanwinge etn, na mambunomugl makan wake winambodi ana moglo tau endinaglka.
42013009	Ana buglayungu ta mongo koran, wakai! Ta koglkran ana boro gundi atne endinatnga.’”
42013010	Sabat enge ta Yesus makai yungu yungugl ka bekete moglko,
42013011	ana ambu ta igle moglkwa ye spirit kinde ta suna mogl moko ake mawa sungwa, buglayungu 18 kinde i si pango ye goinge ere wandre ana du wanambuka mere manga.
42013012	Enge igle Yesus ambumo kandre ye agle di i mangigl ende ana ditongwa, “Ambu ya, ene kinden wakai eran ene yoko moratnga.”
42013013	Ana Yesus ongo koglkoglo ambumo nangiye mina tembe yongo ana oglandi kaima ambumo yene andigl mogl ana God dembiyesi mitna imbo endungwa.
42013014	Makai yungu sugl moglkwa yagle dem kumbrukwa, sraglpre Sabat enge ambu kinde sungwa, Yesus erewakai orkwa. Ipre ana yaglmo ka kande di yomba tongwa, “Ande enge 6 nono kongun eramga enge yongwa, yeglpre enge suna igle mina wimbi kinde erewakai eraglkwa. Ba Sabat enge ta erekraglkwa.”
42013015	Ana Yaglkande di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene kakimbi dingwa yomba! Sabat enge ene suwarata buglano kau mo buglano dongi kulano mina kanno poko i menda pi nigl tekrimo?
42013016	Ana ambumo i Abraham gawamo ta moglkwa ye buglayungu 18 Satan kane sungwa i Sabat enge ye ere endimbi yoko wakai moglkrambo?”
42013017	Ye ka di ikine endumara i kundamo ikine prapra angai geglkwa. Ba yomba eremogl Yesus taragl wakai prapra orkwa i kandre gun pond yeingwa.
42013018	Yesus krapoglkwa, “God kingdomo sraglmere yome? Na sragl taragl diboragle?
42013019	I mastet mongo mereyegl, yagl ta indre yene ereyagl nomara suna yaglko, ana pare wisindre yake wu endi koglo ongo, ana yongagle si koglkoglo endumara igle kua yunguno yeingwa.”
42013020	Aglke Yesus krapoglkwa, “Na God kingdomo i sragl taragl dibogltre dinagle?
42013021	I yis mereyegl, ambu ta indre dis mina plawa bogl i suna ende nokungo ana plawa mundu ake bei kondo poiya dungwa.”
42013022	Yesus ende Jerusalem enagledi pindre ana taun tau ya yungu epigl tau yomba ka beke tongwa.
42013023	Yomba tau krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Yaglkande, yomba suwomta pra ere-inan wakai moraglmo?” Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa,
42013024	“Ene yombuglo ere ende yungu dra kembra mina suna piyo. Sraglpre, na ene diteinga, yomba merkinde ende suna enamunedi eraglkwa, ba kuno erekrambuka.
42013025	Ana yungu nemyagl andigltre yungu dra yonguran ene wu menda andigl mogl dra sigiu dindre ana dinaglkwa, ‘Yagl kande, yungu dra yauro ende noro.’ “Ba ye di ikine endinambuka, ‘Ene dumo aglokra mogl wingwa. Na ene ta kanpogl sikrika.’
42013026	“Ana ene di ikine endinaglkwa, ‘No ene bogl kaiya ya nigl nomgo, ana ene eremogl no dumono kande suna ka beke notngra.’
42013027	“Ba ye aglke di ikine endinambuka, ‘Ene dumo aglokra mogl wingwa, na ene ta kanpogl sikrika. Na mina ende eglke piyo, ene prapra mambuno kinde erikwa yomba.’
42013028	“Enge i ene kanimbi, Abraham ya Aisak ya Jekop ya te propet wagle prapra God kingdomo mina suna moraglkwa. Ba ene piyasi menda endimbi, igle kai kaglkane ere singino gikir eraglkwa.
42013029	Ana yomba ande umara ya beimara te nigl bre ya beiye undre ana God kingdomo mina suna mokna bir ninaglmara dumono mina amedinaglkwa.
42013030	Ana yomba tau erme okuwo wingwa ende okuna wimbi, te yomba tau okuna wingwa ende okuwo unaglkwa.”
42013031	Enge igle Parisi wagle tau Yesus moglmara undre ana diteingwa, “Ene dumo igle kinde kondo ende bangeta po. Sraglpre, Herot ene sigoragledi prukwa.”
42013032	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Endpi agl koglma i diteiyo, ‘Na spirit kinde simenda endindre ana yomba kindeno erme ya tangina erewakai eraglka. Ana ande enge suwota mina na konguna ere dundinaglka.’
42013033	Yeglpre, na erme ya tangina ya te ande enge ta ama endpi paimoraglka. Kaima yene, propet ta dumo menda ta sigoglkraglkwa ba Jerusalem suna keunde sigoraglkwa.
42013034	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ene propet wagle sigogl ana God kakepmo yomba di ene mina endungo kombuglo sigeglkura. Enge sramuna na onguna duglosi ene yombanma prapra kombusi isuna endinagledi erika, i konduwagle mam nangiglma wagle imakai si koiye atnekra endumere yeglmere, ba ene na yegl erambedi kanwinge erekrikwa.
42013035	Kanno, na ene diteinga, ene yungunen kaima kinde erambuka. Enge aglketa na kankre moglpi ana dinaglkwa, ‘God wakai ere ye tenambuka, ye Yaglkande kangiye mina ungwa.’”
42014001	Sabat enge suwarata Yesus endpi Parisi yagl kande ta keipamara yungugl kaiya mokna nina pre ongo ana yomba tau Yesus ta erambere kanamnedi pre sugl wakai ere kanmeglkwa.
42014002	Igle yagl ta ongo kagle pond yakungwa, ye Yesus moglmara ungwa.
42014003	Ana Yesus krapogl Parisi wagle ya te lo pirpogl singwa yomba tongwa, “Lo mina yomba kinde sungwa Sabat enge, erewakai eriyo dumo mo dikrume?”
42014004	Ba ye ka ta dikre kiendi kaima meglkwa. Ana Yesus yaglmo di-indre erewakai erete ana diendungwa.
42014005	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene mina yomba suwarata wan mo buglan kau ta Sabat enge yange maugl atne sinan, ene oglandi kaima gundo i menda endekratno?”
42014006	Ana ye ka i ta di ikine endinaglkwa mere manga.
42014007	Yesus kangwa yomba kaiya mokna yumbusi neimara i, ye angai gumamugl inamunedi erikwa ipre ana ye ka i di simbogl ditongwa,
42014008	“Yagl ambu bogl ingwa kaiya mokna bir neimara ene ta wo dinan, ene emin ana ene bogl gumamugl ikro, sraglpre, yomba kande ta mogl-mitna ende ene engrukwa ye wo dungwa.
42014009	Ana yagl ta ene suwo-akiye dungo umbrika yagle i wu ene yegl ditenambuka, ‘Ene botnen yagl ta i to’ dinan. Ana ene angai gogltre endpi bogl mokonomugl amedinatnga.
42014010	Ba yomba ta ene wo dimbi ana ene pi angai mokomugl kaima i yo, yegl erimbi ene digaglkwa yagl undre ana ene yegl ditenambuka, ‘Yeinombuglka, ene ende wu angai wakaile inda po dumara ipre.’ Ana yomba prapra ene digaglko wu meglmara gumanomugl ene kangin kande inatnga.
42014011	Yeglpre, yomba yene ta kangiye akepledi mitna endinan God ye ake atne endinambuka ana yomba yene ta kangiye ake atne endinan, ye kangiye God akepledi mitna endinambuka.”
42014012	Ana Yesus eremogl digaglkwa yomba ditongwa, “Ene kaiya mokna ande mume dinan mo mim panan tenatnga enge, ene yeinenga mo angitnma mo bormai suwara mo moni bona mere paitongwa yomba mangigl meglkwa i ene digaglkro. Ene yegl etn, ye ama ene digagl ikine ende ana mongo pundo te ikine endinaglkwa.
42014013	Ba ene kaiya mokna bir tenatnga enge, ene kiuglgiunde ya, kaglande singwa ya, onguno katno kinde orkwa ya te ongumutno mim orkwa yomba digatn,
42014014	ana God eran ene gun yenatnga, sraglpre ye ene mongo pundo bagl te ikine endekraglkwa. Okuwo yomba du-yene geglkwa andraglkwa enge i God ene topo te ikine endinambuka.”
42014015	Yomba meglmara igle yagl ta Yesus bogl akiye bogl mina amedi miurka. Ye ka i pirtre, yegl di Yesus tongwa, “God kingdomo mina suna yomba ta bogl mina amedi kaiya mokna bir ne morambuka ye gun pond yenambuka.”
42014016	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta kaiya mokna bir kande ninaglkwa pre akekun ereyei ana yomba merkinde digaglkwa.
42014017	Ana kaiya mokna ninaglkwa enge yongo ye okuna wiyo digaglkwa yomba ikra di endimbi unaglkwa pre ye nigl kongunmo yomba diedungwa.
42014018	“Ba yomba prapra ye mambuno bogl konguno kanekane pame dingwa. Ana komnaiye yagl ta yegl di kongun yomba tongwa, ‘Na makan kor erme topo erika, ana na pindre makanmo i kanaglka. Na ta ukraglka pamiwo.’
42014019	“Ana ta dungwa, ‘Na erme keunde bugla-kau 10 kongun eraglkwa pre topo erika ana nana pindre ye kongun eraglmere ombuno dinaglka. Ene wakai dinga ba na ta ukragliwo.’
42014020	“Ta ama yegl dungwa, ‘Na ambu erme inga, yeglpre na ta ukraglka.’
42014021	“Ana kongun yomba ende ikine undre ana ye ka i boglo kugl yombamo kande tongwa. Ana yungu nemyagl dem kumbruko ana ye kongunmo yomba ditongwa, ‘Oglandi kaima ende taun suna pindre konbauna kande ya kembra prapra pi ana kiuglgiunde yomba ya mau singwa ya ongumutno mim orkwa ya te katno kinde orkwa ana auro yend suna wo.’
42014022	“Kongun yomba dungwa, ‘Yagl kande, ene taragl dinere ere kondiga ba yomba mere yungu kulano yoko yei pangwa.’
42014023	“Ana yagl kande di kongunmo yomba tongwa, ‘Ende menda pi makan kande konbauna prapra ya makai dumo ya konbauna pi sing yomara yomba ditemin, ye ende suna wiyondo. Yegl erimbi na yunguna kau sinambuka.
42014024	Na ene diteinga, yomba prapra okuna wiyo digaglka yomba ikra ye na kaiya mokna bir ninaglmara ye kuri kaima ta ne pirkraglkwa.’”
42014025	Ana yomba merkinde Yesus omara akiye eingo, ana ye kan aketendre ditongwa,
42014026	“Yomba suwarata na moglmara unambuka, ba yene mam ya yene embiye ya nangiglma ya yene angiglma ambaglma mo yene kor-moglkwa ipre kinde piran kade eran ye kaima na disaipelna moglkrambuka.
42014027	Ana yomba ta yene endimo-prak kake ikre, na mokonamugl unan, ana ye na disaipelna ta moglkrambuka.
42014028	“Ene mina yomba suwarata, yungu oltokuri ta kei ende mitna imbo enagledi piran, ye komnaiye amedi mogltre ana topo sramuna mere borambuka i kere kuno ere, ye moni sramuna pai tongwa i piran kuno eran ana ye yungu i kei kondinambuka.
42014029	Ipre ye yungu keinagledi mambuno ere keinambuka ba ye kei kondinambuka mere manan, ana yomba prapra i kandre kenaglmo sindre,
42014030	dinaglkwa, ‘Yagl i yungu mambuno bogl keingura, ba kei kondinambuka mere manga.’
42014031	“Mo king ta ende menda pi king ta kunda bogl tenagledi eran, ye komnaiye kana amedi mogl ana ye pir wakai eran yombuglomo kuno eran, ye kimbirmonem 10,000 bogl pi king ta kimbirmonem 20,000 bogl unan kunda bogl tenambuka.
42014032	Ye piran kunda bogl tenambuka kuno erekran, kakep yomba tau di endinan pi king ta konbauna bange wu panambara tengigl yendre dem munduwo bipokndi yenan kunda paikrambedi pre ka wakai ditenambuka.
42014033	Kuno yeglmere ene mina suwarata taragl kanekane ye kan ongwa i ta kinde kondokran, ye na disaipelna moglkrambuka.
42014034	“Mundi taragl wakai, ba druwomo dundinan ana sraglmere ere druwomo aglke ikine endinambe?
42014035	Mundi i wakai ta yenan makan mina endinaglkwa mo bugla-kau de yenambara i suwarata endinaglkwa manga. I piyasi menda endingwa. “Yomba ta ka pirambuka pre kina panan kade, ka i pirondo!”
42015001	Ande enge suwarata takis ingwa yomba ya tandaglme erikwa yomba Yesus kamo piramnedi pre ana prapra wu makaisi mogl winambo dingwa.
42015002	Ba Parisi wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba ye mambuno bogl tengramo dingwa, “Yagl i tandaglme erikwa yomba di-ingo ana kaiya mokna ye bogl akiye neingwa.”
42015003	Ana Yesus ka i di simbogl ditongwa,
42015004	“Ene mina yagl ta bugla-sipsip 100 kuran meglmbi, ana suwarata taya enan, ye sragl erambe, ana ye bugla-sipsip 99 endinan pendigl meglmbi ana suwarata taya ongwa ipre ye doko pi kan ikrambo?
42015005	Ana ye kan inambuka enge, yaglmo gun pond yei bugla-sipsip ikra i komba mina pandigl.
42015006	Ana kake yend ikine yungumo pindre ana ye yeinongwa ya yomba mangigl meglkwa aglendi suwara ende ana dungwa, ‘Na buglana sipsip taya ongwa ikra kaninga pre, nono akiye gauglne gun yeinamga.’
42015007	Na ene diteinga, kuno yeglmere, tandaglme yomba suwarata nomane yake tenan, ana heven suna gun pond kaima yeitenaglkwa. Yeglpre yomba 99 du-yene meglkwa ye nomano yake tenaglkwa ta paikrukwa.
42015008	“Ambu ta moni mongo 10 kan-nongwa ba suwarata ta ipi endinan, ana ambumo i sragl erambe? Ye ken-lam gagl, yungumo wiglki kuro ana wakai ere doko pi kan inambuka.
42015009	Ana kan yungwa enge ye yomba yeinongwa ya yungu mangigl keipaingwa akiye dimakai sindre ana ditenambuka, ‘Na gun pond yeinga, na monina mongo taya ongwa ikra kaninga pre nono akiye gauglne gun yeinamga!’
42015010	Na ene diteinga, kuno yegl keunde tandaglme yomba suwarata nomane yake tenan ana God angelomo gun pond kaima yeinaglkwa.”
42015011	Yesus ka ta ama yegl dungwa, “Yagl ta moglkwa ye wam suwo miurka.
42015012	Ana wam okuwo yegl di nem tongwa, ‘Nina, na bonana yenga i erme nana i naro.’ Yegl dungo neno bona ganamo yumbusi wam suwo tongwa.
42015013	“Ana wam okuwo enge sungunagle ta mogltre taraglmo prapra moni bogl indre ana yungumo kondo ende dumo eglke ta ongwa. Igle ye monimo guagua ere sidundindre, ende are ongwa.
42015014	Ye taraglmo prapra sidundi kondungo ana okuwo makan kande igle mundu kindan pond yongo, ye taragl ta pai tekruko ana dokungwa.
42015015	Yeglpre yene oglandi ende pi dumo igle makan nem ta moglmara kongun era pre ongo ana ye bugla kuglko meglmara kaiya tendre sugl morambedi pre diendungwa.
42015016	Ana ye bugla miugla nangiye nemara i ne kau kaima sinagledi prukwa. Ba yomba taragl ye ninambuka ta tekrikwa.
42015017	“Okuwo ye pir ikine ende nomane wakai indre ana dungwa, ‘Na nina yomba mere kongunmo eraglkwa yungo ana ye kaiya mokna ne kau singwa. Ana na mangigl igle kindan gogl yono moglka.
42015018	Yeglpre na ende ikine nina moglmara pindre, ana ye ditenaglka: Nina, na tandaglme ere God tendre ana ene tendre erika.
42015019	Na yomba wakai ta moglumbo kade, ene na wana we dikratnga. Ene na i kongun eraglmedi inga yomba yeglmere endo.’
42015020	Yegl dindre ana oglandi mambuno bogl ende ikine nem moglmara ongwa. “Ba ye eglke wu pango, nem ye kandre miriye gogl, mukundi ende wam umara pi ana ongo koglkoglo puglandi wam kungro bare ere yungwa.
42015021	“Ana wam ditongwa, ‘Nina, na tandaglme ere God ya ene akiye teinga. Na wakai ta moglmbo kade ene na wana we dikratnga.’
42015022	“Ba nem di nigl kongunmo yomba tongwa, ‘Tambre pi gagl suna olto wakai i ende tendre te bomgo pesungwa i ongo mongo mina ende tendre te kagle towo i kagle mina ende teiyo!
42015023	Ana ene pindre bugla-kau nangigle wam boglkwa yundre sikembi nono gauglne gun yenamuna.
42015024	Sraglpre na wana i goglkwa ba aglke ukor ongwa, ye taya ongwa ba ye kaninga.’ Ana ye mambuno ere mokna bir neingwa.
42015025	“Enge i wam komuno kongun ere yaglmara suna wanmoglkwa ana ende yungugl unagledi mangigl undre pruko pumingsi, giglange di, katno engre meglkwa.
42015026	Pirtre nigl-kongun yomba suwarata agle dindre ana krapoglkwa, ‘I sragl erme?’
42015027	Ana nigl-kongun yomba di ikine ende tongwa, ‘Ene angitn ende ikine yungumugl ungo ana nen bugla-kau nangigle wam boglkwa sikeingwa. Sraglpre wam wau boglkura ba wakai mogl ende ikine ungwa.’
42015028	“Ba angigle komuno ye dem pond kumbruko ana ye ende yungugl enakrukwa. Yeglpre nem ende menda undre ana ye ende yungugl unambedi pre ka wakai ditongwa.
42015029	Ba ye di ikine ende nem tongwa, ‘Kano! Buglayungu merkinde na ene kongun yoko erete moglka te ene kan ta sendekrika. Ba ene bugla-meme ta natngo na yombanma bogl sikei ne gun yeikungra.
42015030	Ba ene wan i ye moninen ya bona ganan ipi guagua ere ambu kunogl gundo tekondo ana ye ende ikine ungo, ana ene kau nangigle wam boglkwa ye pre sikenga.’
42015031	“Nem di tongwa, ‘Na wana ya, ene dangir dangir na bogl motnga ana taragl kanekane yeinga i ene yenga yongwa.
42015032	Ba nono kaiya mokna ere ne ana gun yeinamga, sraglpre, ene angitn i goglkwa ba erme aglke ukor ongwa, te ye wu taya ongwa ba kan yumga.’”
42016001	Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yagl ta moglkwa taragl merkinde ake nongwa, ana ye kongunmo yomba ta sugl moglko, ana yomba eremogl bona nemyagl diteingwa, ‘Ene bonan sugl moglkwa yagle guagua orme dingwa.’
42016002	Yegl dingo, ye kongun yomba agle di yungugl ende ana krapoglkwa, ‘Ene sraglmere etngo na ka i dingo pirye? Ene monina kongunmo etnga mere pepa muno bogl yenatnga inaro, sraglpre, ene na konguna sugl yomba ta mogl paikratnga.’
42016003	“Ana kongun sugl yomba yene poglodi prukwa, ‘Na erme sragl eragle? Na yombana kande konguna mina na simenda endungwa. Na yombura ta kuno eran makan waknaglka mere manga, te na taragl yana dinaglka i angai goglka.
42016004	Na erme sragl eraglmere i pirka, na konguna i yagl kande na sendinan, ana yomba yungu kei panaglmara na di yungugl endinaglkwa.’
42016005	“Yeglpre ye eremogl yombamo kande moni kur tongwa yomba i prapra aglendi isuna ende ana komuno kana kur tongwa yagle ikra diprukwa, ‘Ene moni kur sramuna na yombana kande mina inendi?’
42016006	“Ana ye di ikine endungwa, ‘Olip nuglo dram 100.’ “Ana kongun yomba kande di ye tongwa, ‘Ene kur inga pepa indre ana tambre amedi mogltre 50 boglo.’
42016007	“Ana mokomugl ungwa yagle ikra krapogl prukwa, ‘Ene kur sramuna inendi?’ “Ye di ikine endungwa, ‘Plawa bek 1,000.’ “Ana ye ditongwa, ‘Kur inga pepa indre bogl i 800 endo.’
42016008	“Taragl nemyagl eremogl kongun sugl yomba guagua orkwa ikra dembiye sungwa. Sraglpre, ye taragl orkwa i yomba nomano wakai pangwa mereyegl. Ana makan yomba koglkoglo pirpogl sindre nomano wakai pangwa mere kongun kanekane ere yomba tendre, ana yomba du-wakai ambuglange mina meglkwa i engrikwa.
42016009	Ana na ene diteinga, makandle moni ya bona gana yomba tenaglkwa i enene yei ninamnedi pre erikwa, taragl yegl dundinambuka enge, ene ende wu aimande kamun meglmara yungugl wo dinaglkwa.
42016010	“Yomba ta taragl kembra mina bonma ere sugl wakai morambuka, ye taragl merkinde akiye bonma ere sugl wakai morambuka, te yomba ta taragl kembra mina bonma erekre sugl wakai moglkran, ye taragl kande ama bonma erekre sugl wakai moglkrambuka.
42016011	Yeglpre, ene makandle minge moni i sugl wakai moglkrimbi, ana ira eremogl ene taragl kaima tendre pra sugl moraglmedi pirambe?
42016012	Ba ene yomba ta taraglmo bonma ere sugl wakai moglkitn ana enene taratn i yomba ira tenambe?
42016013	“Kongun yomba suwarata yagl kande suwo konguno erekrambuka, ye ta kan wakai yei, ana ta ekriye bogl tenambuka. Mo ta kamo pinande ere ana ta kamo sendinambuka. Ene eremogl God kongunmo ya minge moni kongun i-suwara ende erekraglkwa.”
42016014	Parisi wagle ka prapra dungwa i pirtre ana Yesus bakagl teingwa, sraglpre ye minge moni bumbuno geglkwa.
42016015	Yesus di Parisi wagle tongwa, “Ene yomba tau ongumutno wagle enene yomba du-wakai meglkwa mere erikwa, ba God ene nomano suna kangwa. Yeglpre, yomba nomano mina pirkwa taragl pond pai mitna endungwa, i God ongumuglo mina wu taragl yoko ongwa.
42016016	“Moses lomo ya propet kanno dipene ende wu Jon Baptais moglkwa enge igle ungo, ana God kingdomo ka wakai i dipene ende teingo, ana yomba prapra pirtre yene yombuglo ere ende kingdom suna enamunedi erikwa.
42016017	Ba kamun kua ya makan wau borambrika, ba God lomo pangwa i kembra suwara ta wau boglkrambuka.
42016018	“Yagl ta embiye sende ambu kor ta inan, ye ambu kunogl gundungwa, ana yagl ta eremogl yagl embiye okuwo sendungwa ikra inan, ye ambu kunogl gundungwa.
42016019	“Yagl ta moglkwa ye taragl merkinde paitongwa, kungugl gagl topo kande boglkwa ende ana yungu wakaile engenge moglpai orkwa.
42016020	Ye konbaunamo dra mina igle, kiuglgiunde yagl ta pai mogl-mogl orkwa. Ye kangiye Lasarus, nangiye mina num de poriya sungwa.
42016021	Ana ye kaiya mokna diurkwa yange bogl atne sungwa i ninagledi prukwa, te agl undre nangiye num domara i-pene dingwa.
42016022	“Yaglmo kiuglgiunde ikra goglko ana angelo boglo ere yendpi Abraham moglmara endingo miurka. Taragl merkinde ake-nongwa yagle ikra ombugl goglko ana maugl singwa.
42016023	Ye geglkwa dumo suna mogl giu pond indre ana kan mitna ende kango Abraham eglkekuri moglko te Lasarus ombugl Abraham bogl miurka.
42016024	Yeglpre, ye agle dungwa, ‘Nina Abraham, na mitna gogl nartre, ana Lasarus di endimin ye ongo mongo nigl mina simbai iyu na drambina simbanan bi yenambuka. Sraglpre, na donga mina suna mogl giu pond goglka.’
42016025	“Ba Abraham di ikine endungwa, ‘Wana, ene kor-mogl panga enge, taragl wakai prapra ingra i pitno, te Lasarus taragl kinde prapra yungura, ba ye erme yawagle gun pond yongwa, te ene giu pond gotnga.
42016026	Ana taragl ta ama yegl, drugl kogl kande no mina ya ene mina suna pangwa, yeglpre eglya mogl ende koglo ene motnara enaglkwa kuno erekrukwa, te ene motnara ende no mounara ya unaglkwa kuno erekrukwa.’
42016027	“Taragl merkinde paitongwa yagle ikra dungwa, ‘Nina, yegl eran na ene yana dinga, Lasarus di nina yungumo mina endo.
42016028	Sraglpre na angrima wagle 5 meglkwa, Lasarus di endimin pi ka giglendi ditenan, ye mambunono kinde akedu ende ana giu angai eglya ukraglkwa.’
42016029	“Ana Abraham di ikine endungwa, ‘Ene angitnma wagle eremogl ana Moses ya propet wagle kanno dingwa i ake meglkwa ana ene kanwinge etn ye ka dingwa i angitnma wagle piryondo.’
42016030	“Taragl merkinde paitongwa yagle di ikine endungwa, ‘Taman, Nina Abraham, yomba goglkwa andigltre ende ye meglmara enan ana ye pra nomano yake tenaglkwa.’
42016031	“Ba Abraham ditongwa, ‘Ye eremogl Moses ya propet wagle kanno pirkrimbi ana yomba goglkwa ta andigl ukor enan ye ama nomano ta yake tekraglkwa.’”
42017001	Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Taragl kanekane eran yomba tandaglme mina yange sinaglkwa pre plau dina erikwa, ba yomba tandaglme eraglmedi orkwa yombamo i yene yumbun pond inaglkwa.
42017002	Ye dumugl kombuglo kande ta ye nungo mina kane kogl pandigl ana piyasi mundi nigl atne endinaglkwa, i wakai kaima, sraglpre, ye gak kembra wagle tandaglme eraglmedi pre bagl nusungwa.
42017003	“Yeglpre enene kanpogl siyo, angitn tandaglme eran ene manedi akedu endo. Ana ye nomane yake tenan, ene tandaglme orkwa i kinde kondo to.
42017004	Ana ande enge suwarata mina ye tandaglme 7 ere ene tendre ana enge 7 ye erambere ende ikine ene motnara undre dinambuka, ‘Na nomana yake teiwo’ dinan, ene tandaglme orkwa i kindekondo to.”
42017005	Aposel wagle di Yaglkande teingwa, “No pirngi dumga etn wu kande enano!”
42017006	Yaglkande di ikine endungwa, “Ana ene pirngino kembra mastet mongo mereyegl panan, ene endi noglkun i di tenaglkwa, ‘Ene duglon bogl puro indre ana enene endpi mundi nigl suna bogl paiyo’ dimbi ana ene dimere mere erambuka.
42017007	“Ana ene mina suwarata kongunmo yomba ta makan wakungwa mo sipsip sugl moglkwa, ye kongunmo dundungo ende yungugl ungwa enge. Ene eremogl, oglandi wu amedi kaiya mokna no, diteno?
42017008	Ana yegl ta manambuka, kongun sugl moglkwa yagle dungwa, ‘Na kaiya mokna akekun ere, ene gatn alap wertre ana kaiyana iyu suro naro ana na kaiya mokna ya nigl komnaiye neimbo ana ene okuwo kaiya ya nigl ninatna.’
42017009	Ana kongun yomba dumere orkwa pre ye diwakai yei tenambo? Tamanga.
42017010	Ene ama kuno yegl kongun ero ditomere prapra ere kondo ana diyo, ‘No kongun yomba yoko nono konguno pamara ounga.’”
42017011	Yesus ende Jerusalem ena pre ana ye Samaria ya Galili makan numamugl sunawom ongwa.
42017012	Ye ende yungu epigl ta suna ongwa enge, yagl 10 kaglande singwa wu Yesus tengigl yendre ana ye tau eglke andigl mogl,
42017013	ana agle binan bogl dingwa, “Yesus Yaglkande, no mitno goglo.”
42017014	Yesus kandre ana ye ditongwa, “Ene ende pindre enene nangino pris wagle ombunodi teiyo.” Ana ye endingo konbauna bange nangino wu wakai ongwa.
42017015	Ana ye mina suwarata kangwa nangiye wu wakai ongo ana ende ikine undre, ka kande dindre God dembiyesi mitna imbo endungwa.
42017016	Yene yange Yesus moglmara kagle mina sindre ana diwakai yeitongwa. Yaglmo i Samaria kamun nem.
42017017	Yesus krapoglkwa, “Yomba 10 prapra wu wakai engura, ana 9 ikra aglo meglme?
42017018	Ana yomba ta ende ikine undre God dembiyesi mitna imbo endinaglkwa mango, ana kamun bangeta nem i suwarata moglm kana?”
42017019	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Andigltre, ana endpo, ene pirngi dinga pre kinden wakai orkwa.”
42017020	Parisi wagle God kingdomo enge aunake unambedi krapogl Yesus teingo, ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “God kingdomo pendigl ta unan yomba ongumutno mina ta kankraglkwa.
42017021	Yomba suwarata yegl dikraglkwa, ‘Kaniyo. Magl igle moglkwa,’ mo ‘Koglo imbo moglkwa.’ Sraglpre, God kingdomo ene mina suna yongwa.”
42017022	Ana ye disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Okuwo enge ta yenan ana ene Yomba Wam ande enge suwarata kanamnedi piraglkwa, ba ene ta kankraglkwa.
42017023	Yomba eremogl ene ditenaglkwa, ‘Kaniyo, ye koglo imbo moglkwa,’ mo ‘Ye mangigl moglkwa ya.’ Ana ye enaglmara ene pi dokokriyo.
42017024	Yomba Wam engemo yenambuka enge, i kamun potndumere yeglmere, kamun kua mina pogl dungo ana ambuglange mundu si poriya ormere yegl erambuka.
42017025	Ba okuna kana ye giu merkinde piran ana yomba epigl erme meglkwa i ye mokono tenaglkwa.
42017026	“Noa engemo embriye erimere yeglmere ana Yomba Wam engemo yenan kuno yegl eraglkwa.
42017027	Yomba kaiya mokna ne, nigl ne, yagl eremogl ambu ingo te ambu yagl eingo, yegl ere meglkwa enge, ana Noa ende sip mina yungugl ongo, okuwo ana nigl pond undre yomba prapra sigoglkwa.
42017028	“Lot engemo i ama kuno yegl. Yomba kaiya mokna ne, nigl ne, ana taragl topo ere, te topo bogl indre, ana kaiya mokna ereyagltre te yungu togl eremeglkwa.
42017029	Ba Lot eremogl Sodom kamun kondo endongo, ana donga ya kombuglo salpa de moglkwa kamun sumere yegl, heven ende atne undre ana yomba prapra sigoglkwa.
42017030	“Yomba Wam ombunodi unongugl enambuka enge, mambuno kuno yeglmere eraglkwa.
42017031	Enge igle yomba ta yungu indaule mogltre ana ende atne pi bona ganamo yungugl yongwa ikrambuka, kuno yeglmere yomba ta kongun mina suna wanmorambuka ye ende ikine yungugl pikrambuka.
42017032	Lot embiye mina sragl orkwa i pirmeglmo!
42017033	Yomba ta yene kor-morambuka pre akegidi moran, ana wau borambuka, te yomba ta kor-moglkwa kinde kondinan ana kor aimande morambuka inambuka.
42017034	Na ene diteinga, enge igle enduwer yomba suwo bogl suwarata mina ugl panambrika, ana ta indre ta kondinambuka.
42017035	Ambu suwo plawa akiye noko miur ana ta indre ta kondinambuka.
42017036	Yagl suwo kongun ere miur ana i ta indre ta kondinambuka.”
42017037	Ana disaipelma wagle krapeglkwa, “Yaglkande, aglo ne?” Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba geglkwa nangino ta yenambara igle kua keglmba wu makai sinaglkwa.”
42018001	Yesus ka suwarata di simbogl disaipelma wagle bekete, te ye kamange engenge ertre ana oglka erekraglkwa pre ombuno ditongwa.
42018002	Ye dungwa, “Taun suna ka tange teingwa yomba ta moglkwa, ye God kunduglmo goglkre ana yomba kanwakai yeikrukwa.
42018003	Ana ambu werai ta taun suna igle moglkwa ye eremogl ka tange teingwa yomba moglmara engenge undre, akeple dinambedi pre dungwa, ‘Na kundana ikine erekinde ere nara erikwa, ana ene kot mina na akepledo.’
42018004	“Enge olto ka tange teingwa yomba akeple ditenakrukwa ba okuwo kaima yene nomane siprukwa, ‘Na God kunduglmo goglkre ana yomba kanwakai yeikrika.
42018005	Ba ambu werai i yumbun engenge narkwa pre na kot mina akeple ditenaglka. Ana ye engenge wu moran okuwo na oglka ere dinaglka.’”
42018006	Ana Yaglkande dungwa, “Ene eremogl ka tange teingwa yomba kinde ka dungwa i piryo.
42018007	God pinde yungwa yomba ermine ya enduwer engenge kai erete meglmbi ana ye akeple dikrambo? Ana God aimande ye kanwinge erambo?
42018008	Na ene diteinga, ye eraglkwa i kandre tambre akeple dinambuka. Ba Yomba Wam unambuka enge, makandle yomba pirngi dimo mo dikrikwa i ye kanambo?”
42018009	Yomba tau yene pre yomba du-yene mounedi pirtre ana yomba prapra kan i taragl yoko mere endingwa. Erikwa ipre Yesus ka i di simbogl dungwa,
42018010	“Yagl suwo kamange era pre ende yenda God holi yungumo mina embrika, ta Parisi te ta takis yungwa yomba.
42018011	Ana Parisi andigltre, yene pre kamange orkwa, ‘God, na ene diwakai yeinga, sraglpre na yomba tau meglmere yeglmere na ta moglkrika. Kunogl ne, embriye kinde ere, ambu kunogl gundo, te takis yungwa yagle moglmere yegl na ta moglkrika.
42018012	Na wakan suwarata mina ande enge suwondi kaiya mokna mawagl ertre, te na taragl prapra inga i yumbu sindre 10 mina suwarata God teinga.’
42018013	“Ba takis yungwa yagle eglke dagl andigl mogltre, ana ye kan mina heven endinambuka mere mango, ye piuriye tagla sindre ana dungwa, ‘God, na mitna goglo, na tandaglme erika yomba.’
42018014	“Na ene diteinga, yagl takis yungwa i ye ende ikine yungumugl enan, ana ye God ongumuglo mina yomba du-wakai morambuka, te yomba prapra yene kangino ake mitna endingwa i God ake atne endinambuka, ana yomba ta yene kangiye ake atne ende wangwa i God ake mitna imbo endinambuka.”
42018015	Yesus eremogl gak kembra God wakai ere tenambedi dungwa pre yomba auro i yu ye moglmara wingwa. Ba disaipelma wagle i kandre, ye yomba ka-teingwa.
42018016	Ba Yesus gak kembra aglendi ye moglmara ende ana dungwa, “Ene kan winge erimbi gak kembra na moglmara wiyondo, ana ene ye i-teke pandiglkriyo. Sraglpre, God kingdom imbo gak kembra yeglmere moraglkwa ye pre yongwa.
42018017	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta God kingdomo gak kembra yeglmere ta ikran ana ye suna i kaima ta pikrambuka.”
42018018	Juda yagl kande suwarata krapogl Yesus te yegl dungwa, “Beke Notnga wakai, na sragl ere kor aimande moraglka inagle?”
42018019	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Sraglpre ene na wakai we dine? Yomba wakai ta moglkrikwa, ba God suwara wakai moglkwa.
42018020	Ene ka lo prapra pitnga, ambu kunogl gundokro, yomba ta sigoglkro, kunogl gogl nekro, kakimbi dikro, ana nen ya man dinambrere ero.”
42018021	Ana ye di ikine endungwa, “Na yagl gak kembra moglka enge lo i prapra sika singa.”
42018022	Yesus ka i pirtre ana yagle i ditongwa, “Ene taragl suwara kaima ta ama eratnga yoko pangwa. Taragl kan nenga prapra topo bogl indre, ana moni ipi kiuglgiunde yomba to. Ana ene heven suna taragl wakai mere paitenambuka, yegl ertre ana okuwo na wimara wo.”
42018023	Ye ka i pirtre ana kinde kaima prukwa, sraglpre, ye taragl pond ake-nongwa yagle.
42018024	Yesus kango yagle i kinde pruko ana ye dungwa, “Yomba taragl merkinde paitongwa ye yombuglo ere ende God kingdomo mina suna enamunedi erimbi manambuka.
42018025	Kaima, bugla-kamel kar kuiye mina ende suna enan kuno erambuka, ba yomba taragl mere paitongwa ende God kingdomo mina suna enamunedi erimbi manambuka.”
42018026	Yomba tau ka i pirtre krapeglkwa, “Okuwo ira kor aimande moraglkwa inambe?”
42018027	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Taragl yomba eraglkwa kuno erekrukwa i God erambuka kuno orkwa.”
42018028	Pita di Yesus tongwa, “Kano! No taratno prapra kindekondo ene unara umga.”
42018029	Yesus di ye tongwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba suwarata yungumo mo, embiye mo, angiglma mo, nem mam mo, nangiglma, i God kingdomo pre ere kinde kondinan,
42018030	ana God taragl merkinde kaima erme tenan indre ana okuwo enge ta unambuka enge ye kor aimande morambuka inambuka.”
42018031	Yesus disaipelma wagle 12 ikoglo ende ana prapra ditongwa, “Piryo, nono ende yenda Jerusalem enamga. Ana igle Yomba Wam pre, propet wagle ka muno beglkwa pangwa i pai inambuka.
42018032	Ye tekoglo Yomba Bina meglmara endinaglkwa. Ana ye bakagl tendre, kinde ere tendre, kimbi ditendre, eursi tendre, uglmbo kumba sindre, ana sigoraglkwa.
42018033	Ba ande enge suwota mina aglke andigl ukor enambuka.”
42018034	Ana disaipelma wagle ye ka dungwa i ta pirpogl sikrikwa, ka dungwa i mambunomo ye mina wu pene pikrukwa. Ana ye sraglpre ka dungwa i disaipelma wagle ta pirpogl sikrikwa.
