42018035	Yesus ende Jeriko mangigl ungo, yagl suwarata ongumuglo kin yongwa konbauna menda kra amedi mogl taragl yana di moglkwa.
42018036	Enge igle ye prukwa yomba merkinde ende wopi dingo pre ye sragl orumda di krapoglkwa.
42018037	Ana yomba eremogl ye ditengwa, “Yesus Nasaret nem mangigl ende wongwa ya.”
42018038	Ana yagle i agle binan bogl dungwa, “Yesus, Devit Wam, ene na mitna goglo!”
42018039	Ana yomba tau okuna kana wingwa ka-tendre, ana kiendi moglo diteingwa ba yagle agle binan bogl di paimoglkwa, “Devit Wam, ene na mitna goglo!”
42018040	Ana Yesus andigl mogltre, ana yomba dite yagle i auro yu ye moglmara ya wiyo dungwa. Ye ende mangigl ungo, ana Yesus krapogl tongwa,
42018041	“Ene na sragl ere narambedi pitne?” Ye di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande na ongumutna kanagledi pirka.”
42018042	Yesus di ye tongwa, “Ene ongumutn pinedi kano. Ene pirngi dinara enene ongumutn wakai orkwa.”
42018043	Oglandi kaima ye ongumuglo pinedi kandre, ana Yesus omara pindre God dembiye sungwa. Ana yomba prapra i kandre, ye ama God dembiye singwa.
42019001	Ana Yesus Jeriko kamun suna pindre igle konbauna du yene endongwa.
42019002	Yagl suwarata igle moglkwa ye kangiye Sakias, ye takis ingwa yomba mina yagl kande moglkwa. Ye taragl merkinde paitongwa.
42019003	Ye eremogl Yesus ira moglmedi kanagledi yombuglo orkwa, ba ye yagl sungunagle moglkwa pre kanambuka mere manga, sraglpre, yomba merkinde kaima meglkwa.
42019004	Yeglpre ye mukundi ende okuna pindre, Yesus konbo igle unan kanagledi pre, endi kogla ta mongo ende egli ongwa.
42019005	Ana Yesus ende magl angai dumo igle undre, kan mitna ende ana yegl di Sakias tongwa, “Ene oglandi ende atne wo, na erme ene yungun mina moraglka.”
42019006	Sakias tambre kaima ende atne undre, ana gun argan bogl diwakai yei Yesus auro yend yungumugl ongwa.
42019007	Yomba prapra i kandre, ana mambuno bogl ninubenu di, nonga sindre dingwa, “Ana yagl i pi tandaglme orkwa yagl ikra yungumo mina moglkwa.”
42019008	Ba Sakias andigltre, ana di Yaglkande tongwa, “Kano! Yaglkande, erme enge igle na taragl ake-neinga sunawom yumbusi ikine kiuglgiunde yomba tenaglka, ana yomba taratno na kakimbi dite kunogl inga panan ana kuiya 4 pandigl tembe ende te ikine endinaglka.”
42019009	Yesus eremogl Sakias ditongwa, “Erme yomba yungugl igle meglkwa God ere-yungwa, sraglpre yagl i ama Abraham wam moglkwa.
42019010	Ana Yomba Wam yomba taya eingwa i dokindre ana ere-ina pre ungwa.”
42019011	Yomba ka i pir meglkwa enge, Yesus ama ka aine di simbogl suwarata di ye tongwa. Sraglpre, ye Jerusalem mangigl ongo ana yomba eremogl God kingdomo oglandi plau dinambedi pirkwa.
42019012	Ye dungwa, “Yagl kande ta igle moglkwa ye ende kamun kande eglke ta pindre, ana king mogltre, ana okuwo ende ikine yungumugl unambuka.
42019013	Yeglpre ye kongunmo yomba 10 aglendi indre ana yomba suwarandi moni mongo tendre, ana ditongwa, ‘Moni i ene kongunmo ere kuiya ere meglmbi ana na ende ikine unaglka.’
42019014	“Ba yene kamunmo mina yomba kumbro tendre, ana ka kep yomba tau ye ka yegl yomba ditenaglmedi pre ye omara okuwo diendingwa, ‘No yagl i kingno ta morambedi pirkunga.’
42019015	“Ba king kangiye yeingo, ana ye ende ikine kamunmo mina ungwa. Ana ye oglandi yomba diende kongun yomba moni tongwa ikra kongun ere moni kuiya imere kanagledi pre ditembi wiyondo dungwa.
42019016	“Yagl ta okuna kana moni kur yungwa ikra undre yegl dungwa, ‘Yagl kande, ene moni mongo natnga i na kongun ertre ana moni mongo 10 ta ama isuna endinga.’
42019017	“Yagl kande di ikine endungwa, ‘Na konguna yomba wakai, ene kongun wakai kaima etnga, ene diendimbo dumo kande 10 sugl moratnga, sraglpre, ene kongun kembra i mina sugl wakai motnga.’
42019018	“Mokomugl yagl ta moni kur yungwa ikra undre ana dungwa, ‘Yaglkande, ene moni natngra i na kongun ertre ana moni mongo 5 ama isuna endinga.’
42019019	“Ana yaglmo kande ditongwa, ‘Ene dumo kande 5 sugl moratnga.’
42019020	“Ana kongun yomba ta moni kur yungwa ikra undre dungwa, ‘Yaglkande, ene moninen yongwa yawe, na gagl alap kembra mina were teke yeinga.
42019021	Na ene kundutn goglka, sraglpre, ene yombuglo etnga yaglmo ene taragl enene ta yeikitnara indre te mokna mongo enene sunduglkitnara utnga.’
42019022	“Yombamo kande di ye tongwa, ‘Ene kongun yomba kinde, enene ka dinara i mina na ene ka tenaglka. Ene pitnga na yagl yombuglo erika, na taragl ta yeikrimara indre te na taragl yaglkrimara urtre erika.
42019023	Yegl panan, sraglpre ene na monina ipi benk endekitne? Ana okuwo na ikine undre moni kuiya panan akiye i-ikine endinaglka.’
42019024	“Ana ye eremogl yomba mangigl andigl meglkwa i ditongwa, ‘Moni mongo ye mina ikorugl ende, ana kongun yomba moni mongo 10 ake moglkwa yagle i teiyo.’
42019025	“Ye diteingwa, ‘Yaglkande, ye moni mongo 10 kande ake moglkwa.’
42019026	“Ye di ikine endungwa, ‘Na ene diteinga, yomba prapra taragl paitenambuka ye taragl mere tenaglka ba yomba taragl ta paitekrambuka ye mina taragl kuri ta paitongwa i, ikorugl endinaglka.
42019027	Ba na kundana ikine i, ye na kingno moglkrambedi pirkwa yomba auro imangigl ya undre, ana na gumanamugl ya sigolo.’”
42019028	Yesus ka di kondo okuwo ye ende Jerusalem ena pre okuna kana ende yenda ongwa.
42019029	Ye ende Betfasi ya Betani kamun muglo kangiye Olip we dimara igle mangigl pindre ana ye disaipelmo suwo di okuna ende yegl ditongwa,
42019030	“Ene ende yungu epigl nongagle yomara iro piro, ana ende suna pindre, kanambrika dongi kowo ta igle kane kogl pandiglkwa, buglamo dongi i yomba ta ausi i-wankrikwa. Ene kane poko ende i ya wiro.
42019031	Ana yomba ta ene krapoglte, ‘Ene sraglpre dongi kane pokimbre?’ dinan. Ye diteiro, ‘Dongi i Yaglkande kongunmo ta erambuka pangwa.’”
42019032	Yagl suwo diendungwa ikra pindre ana kanbriko taragl prapra ditomere mere pangwa.
42019033	Ye dongi kowo kane poko miurko ana kiglkwa yomba krapogl teingwa, “Ene sraglpre dongi kane poko endimbre?”
42019034	Ye di ikine endimbrika, “I Yaglkande kongunmo ta erambuka pangwa.”
42019035	Ye dongi iyu Yesus moglmara undre, ana ye gatno suna olto gugl dongi moko mina yendre, ana ye akeple dingo Yesus tembe igle amedungwa.
42019036	Ana ye dongi mina ausi mogl konbauna endongo, yomba gatno suna olto gugl konbauna ake waidi yeingwa.
42019037	Ye ende wu Olip Kamun Muglo konbauna ende atne omara mangigl ungo, ana disaipelmo merkinde kaima wingwa. I ye gun pond kaima yeingwa. Sraglpre, ye prapra kimagl mere okuna orko kanigwa pre, mangre sipu dindre, ana God dembiyesi mitna imbo kaima endingwa.
42019038	“God wakai ere king tongwa, Yaglkande kangiye mina ungwa!” “Heven suna bipokndi yenano, ana God dembiyesi mitna imbo kaima endiyo!”
42019039	Ana Parisi wagle tau yomba merkinde meglmara suna mogltre ana Yesus diteingwa, “Beke Notnga, ene disaipelma wagle ka-temin ye kiendi molondo.”
42019040	Yesus di ikine ende ana ditongwa, “Na ene diteinga, ye kiendi meglmbi, ana kombuglo yene kaglkane inaglkwa.”
42019041	Ana ye ende Jerusalem mangigl wu siti kandre, kaimo pond ere,
42019042	ana ye dungwa, “Jerusalem, ande enge erme i keunde nomano bipokndi yenambuka i ene pirpogl singa, ba taragl i erme ene ongumutn mina teke pangwa.
42019043	Enge tau yenan ene kundan ikine totn mina mogl winambodi mundu siget-dindre ana ene sina pre isuna ende kondinaglkwa.
42019044	Ye eremogl ene ya yomba totn suna meglkwa i ama akiye siderwagl baruwagl ere kondinaglkwa. Ana kombuglo suwarata kombuglo ta bolamugl yeikrambuka. Sraglpre, God ene ere-inambuka engemo ungo ene kanpogl sikitnga.”
42019045	Ana Yesus ende God holi yungumo mina togl suna pindre, yomba taragl topo eremeglko simenda endungwa.
42019046	Yesus eremogl yomba ditongwa, “Kamambuno mina muno beglko pangwa i God yegl dungwa, ‘Na yunguna i kamange yungu we dinaglkwa.’ Ba ene eriko, God holi yungumo yomba kunogl gogl ne wu kombuglo mur teke paimere yeglmere ongwa.”
42019047	Ande engenge Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo mina kamambuno beke yomba tongwa. Ba pris kande wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba ya te yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ye Yesus sigoramnedi pirkwa.
42019048	Ba ye konbo ta doko kan indre ere sinaglkwa mere manga, sraglpre, yomba prapra ye ka dumara i aimande yombugl i suna ende pir meglkwa.
42020001	Ande enge suwarata, Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo togl mina sunakra yomba ka beke tendre, ana kamambuno wakai dipene ende te moglko, pris kande wagle ya lo beke teingwa yomba ya te yomba mina ende okuna eingwa yomba, ye wu suwara pi Yesus moglmara undre,
42020002	ana dingwa, “Ene dinoro, sragl yombuglo gigledi mina ene taragl i etne? Ira yombuglo gigledi ene tome?”
42020003	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ombugl ene kra ta pogl teimbo ene dinariyo.
42020004	Jon, baptais tongwa i God mina umo mo yomba mina ume?”
42020005	Ye yene di pirpir ere ana dingwa, “Nono God mina ume dumun, ana ye krapogl norambuka, ‘Ene sraglpre ye pirngi dikrime?’
42020006	Ba nono yomba mina ume dumun, yomba merkinde mangigl meglkwa ya kombuglo no sinaglkwa. Sraglpre, Jon, propet kaima ta moglmedi pirkwa.”
42020007	Yeglpre ye di Yesus teingwa, “I aglokra umda no pirkunga.”
42020008	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na ira yombuglo gigledi indre taragl erika i ene ta ditekraglka.”
42020009	Yesus ka i di simbogl yomba ditongwa, “Yagl ta wain ere yagltre, ana yomba tau kongun ere moni indre ana na topo naraglmedi tendre ana ye ende kamun eglke kurita pindre kanana kinde wanmoglkwa.
42020010	Ana wain mongo bogl yongo uraglkwa engemo ungo, ye kongun yomba suwarata di wain sugl yomba meglmara ende wain togl mina suna i mongo tau tenaglkwa pre diendungwa. Ba wain togl mina sugl meglkwa yomba, ye ere sindre ana yoko di ikine endingwa.
42020011	Ye kongun yomba ta diendungwa ba i ombugl eresindre ana angai gorambedi erete, ana yoko di ikine endingwa.
42020012	Ana kongun yomba ta ama diendungwa ba ye pond kaima eresindre, ana ake menda endingwa.
42020013	“Ana wain togl nemyagl dungwa, ‘Na sragl eragle? Nana wana diendinaglka, ye na wakai kaima kaninga, ye dinambere pinande ere kaima eraglkwa.’
42020014	“Ba wain togl sugl meglkwa yomba, ye kandre ana ye yene dipirkwa, ‘I wain togl nemyagl wam kaima ungwa. Nono ye sigogltre, ana ye wain toglmo nono inamga.’
42020015	Yegl dindre, ye wain togl mina gundo imenda ende ana sigeglkwa. “Wain togl nemyagl wain togl sugl meglkwa yomba sragl ere tenambe?
42020016	Ye undre wain togl sugl yomba i prapra sigogltre ana wain togl i yomba pere tenambuka.” Ana yomba ka i pirtre, ye dingwa, “Yeglmere ta paikrambuka!”
42020017	Yesus toro mendigl pandigl yomba kandre ana krapoglkwa, “Ka yeglmere muno beglkwa pangwa i mambuno sraglmere pame? “‘Ana kamda wagle kombuglo i kinde wedi plendi menda endingwa. Ba kombuglomo wu kombuglo kauglange giglendi pangwa.’
42020018	Yomba prapra yange kombuglo igle bolamugl simbi ye bogl deruwagl eraglkwa, ba kombuglo i yange yomba ta sinan, bogl deruwagl ere surmane eraglkwa.”
42020019	Ana lo beke teingwa yomba ya pris kande wagle ye ka di simbogl dungwa i no erme keunde konbauna ta doko kan indre Yesus kane sinamnedi erikwa. Sraglpre, dumedi pre ana ye yomba kundutno geglkwa.
42020020	Ye eremogl Yesus suglmo mangigl wora aimande kanmogltre ana ka waiye yomba diendingwa. Ye kamo kaima pirkwa mereyegl ere ana kimbi-koglo krapeglmbi Yesus ka ta di aglau eran kandre, ana kanesi gavman kande tenaglkwa.
42020021	Yeglpre, kuie kana eingwa yomba i krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Beke Notnga, ka dinga ya beke notnga i kuno orkwa, no punga ene yomba kanno pamara dikitnga, ba God prumere ka kaima yomba beke tenga.
42020022	Dinoro, nono takis Sisa tenamuno mo tekramne?”
42020023	Yesus eremogl ye kakimbi kogl dingwa i kanpogl sindre ana ye ditongwa,
42020024	“Ene moni silva suwarata i na ombuno diyo, ira kuiya ya kangiye tembe pame?”
42020025	Ye di ikine endingwa, “Sisa pangwa.” Yesus di yomba tongwa, “Ana Sisa taraglmo Sisa teiyo, te God taraglmo God teiyo.”
42020026	Ye yomba merkinde meglmara ka yegl dungwa i si akenaglkwa mere mango. Ana ye singokondi, kiendi meglkwa.
42020027	Sadyusi wagle tau Yesus moglmara undre, krapeglkwa. Ye eremogl yomba geglkwa andiglkraglme dingwa yomba.
42020028	Ye dingwa, “Beke Notnga, Moses lomo i nono pre muno boglkwa: Yagl ta gogltre, embiye kondinambuka ba gak ta kugl yeikran, ana goglkwa yagle i angigle ombugl embiye werai inan, ana ye yagl goglkwa dumomugl i gak kugl suglo sinambirka.
42020029	Okuna imbo angiglma angiglma 7 meglkwa. Ana angro komuno ambu ta yungwa. Ba ye gak ta kugl yeikre goglkwa.
42020030	Angigle okuwo ambu werai ikra yungwa.
42020031	Ana angigle okuwo ta ama ambumo i yungwa, ana angiglma komuno okuwo 7 prapra ambumo suwara i keunde ingwa, ba gak ta kugl yeikre geglkwa.
42020032	Okuwo kaima ambumo i ama goglkwa.
42020033	Ana yomba geglkwa andraglkwa enge ambu i ira embiye morambe? Sraglpre, angiglma komuno okuwo 7 ambumo suwara i keunde ingwa.”
42020034	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene erme yagl ambu bogl ingwa.
42020035	Ba yagl ambu andigl ukor pindre, ana okuwo kor-moraglkwa enge yagl ambu ta bogl ikraglkwa.
42020036	Ye angelo meglmere yegl mogltre ana goglkraglkwa. Ye God nangiglma moraglkwa. Sraglpre, ye goglkwa ba God ere-ikor endungwa.
42020037	Ana Moses ombugl yomba geglkwa andigl ukor enaglkwa i ombunodi norkwa. I endi donga tekele dongwa kamo boglo i mina Moses yegl dungwa, ‘Yaglkande ye Abraham Godmo mogl, te Aisak Godmo mogl, ana Jekop Godmo moglkwa dungwa.’
42020038	God yomba geglkwa Godno tamanga, ba ye yomba kor-meglkwa Godno. Ye mina yomba prapra kor-meglkwa.”
42020039	Lo beke teingwa yomba tau di ikine endingwa, “Beke Notnga, ene ka wakai dinga!”
42020040	Ye kundugl gogltre aglke krapoglkrikwa.
42020041	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Yomba sraglpre Mesaia Devit Wam moglme dime?
42020042	Devit yene Buk Song mina dipendigl endungwa: “‘Yaglkande di na Yaglkandena tongwa, “Na onguna wokra amedi mogl emin,
42020043	ana na kundan ikine ene katn mina atnekra yenaglka.” ’
42020044	Devit eremogl ye pre ‘Yaglkande’ we dungwa, ana sraglmere Yaglkande i Devit wam morambe?”
42020045	Yomba prapra kinano gundo pir meglkwa enge, Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa,
42020046	“Lo beke teingwa yomba mambunono i kan kuno eriyo, ye gagl olto ende indre konbauna wanamnedi munduno pango, te maket dumo yomba no diwakai yenaglmedi pirtre, te makai yungu bogl wakai mina amedi mogltre, ana mokna bir nemara angai gumamugl mogl-mogl erikwa.
42020047	Ye ambu werai wagle bakaglte yunguno kunogl indre, ana kakimbi kogl yomba no kanaglmedi, kamange oltokuri erikwa. Yomba yegl ye giu kinde inaglkwa paimoglkwa.”
42021001	Yesus kan koglkoglo ende ana kangwa yomba moni mere paitongwa ye God holi yungumo mina ofa te-te erimara gagl mina monino ende suna endingwa.
42021002	Ye ama kangwa ambu werai kiuglgiunde ta moni mongo kembra suwo keunde endungwa.
42021003	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ambu werai kiuglgiunde i moni ende kawate yomba tau tongwa.
42021004	Yomba prapra moni mere paitongwa, ana ye kuri ta te menda endingwa, ba ambu i paitongwa mere mundu ende kondungwa. Ye okuwo ta yenan ere ninambuka manga.”
42021005	Disaipelma wagle tau God holi yungumo pre dingwa, “Kombuglo wakai kaima yene ya ofa teingwa i akiye God yungumo ekin teingwa.” Ba Yesus dungwa,
42021006	“Taragl prapra ene kanigwa i enge ta yenan ana kombuglo mangigl yeingwa i suwarata kombuglo ta mina tembe yei paikraglkwa, i prapra sigurndi atne endinaglkwa.”
42021007	Ye krapeglkwa, “Beke Notnga, taragl i enge aunake plau dinaglme? Ana sragl diu ere ombuno dinan kandre, ana enge ikra plau dina erimiwo dinamune?”
42021008	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene kanpogl siyo, yomba kakimbi ditenaglkwa. Sraglpre, yomba merkinde na kangina mina undre ana ‘Na ye’ we dindre, ana ‘Enge mangigl orumiwo’ dinaglkwa. Ba ye mokono mina pikriyo.
42021009	Ene pirmbi kunda mangigl boraglkwa mo kunda kande beglme dimbi ana ene kundugl goglkriyo, taragl yeglmere komnaiye plau dinaglkwa, ba enge kande oglandi ta yeikrambuka.”
42021010	Ana ye ditongwa, “Dumo kande ta yomba pi dumo kande ta kunda bogl tenaglkwa, king ta sugl moglmara yomba pi king ta sugl moglmara kunda bogl tenaglkwa.
42021011	Ana imem pond kaima dumo tau unan te kindan pond yenan ana kinde kanekane dumo koglkoglo sinan erambuka. Ana diu kande ya kundugl goraglkwa taragl kanekane kamun kua mina plau dinaglkwa.
42021012	“Taragl i prapra plau dikrimbi, yomba ene eresindre ana sikanesi ipi makai yungu pindre ana kane yungu endinaglkwa. Ye ene ipi king wagle ya gavman kande dumonomugl enaglkwa, ana i na kangina ene mina yongwa pre yegl eraglkwa.
42021013	I ene engeno ta yongwa, ipre kamambuno wakai yomba ditenaglkwa.
42021014	Ana ene komnaiye no sragl ka dinamunedi nomano mina pir epigl erekriyo.
42021015	Sraglpre, na ka yegl do ditendre, ana nomano wakai teimbo kade ene dimbi ana kundano ikine na ka tenaglkwa i mane dikre ana ake atne endekraglkwa.
42021016	Ene nen man ya angitnma wagle ya bormai suwara ya te yeinengwa ye ene ipi kunda ikine tembi ana ye eremogl ene tau sigoraglkwa.
42021017	Yomba prapra nomano kinde pir ene tenaglkwa, sraglpre, na kangina ene mina yongwa.
42021018	Ba ene bitno yungo suwara ta wau boglkrambuka.
42021019	Ana enene andigl giglendi mogl ana kor-moraglkwa ere-inaglkwa.
42021020	“Ene kanimbi kimbirnem undre Jerusalem mogl winambo dimbi ana ene piraglkwa, dumo kande kinde erambuka engemo mangigl ungwa.
42021021	Ana yomba Judia dumo meglkwa i teke ende kamun muglo enaglkwa, yomba Jerusalem suna meglkwa i kondo ende menda embi, ana yomba kamun kande bina meglkwa i ende siti suna pikraglkwa.
42021022	Enge i giugl engemo yenambuka, sraglpre, kamambuno pepa mina muno beglkwa pangwa i prapra pai inambuka.
42021023	Ambu gak dano meglkwa ya te ambu gak am temeglkwa, ye yumbun pond inaglkwa. Ande enge i yumbun kinde kaima makan igle plau dinambuka ana God dem kumbrukwa yomba i mina panambuka.
42021024	Ana tau dikumba prak mina sigoraglkwa, ana tau sikanesi yend dumo kande prapra enaglkwa, ana Yomba Bina wu Jerusalem sugl mogl eimbi ana ye engeno mina dundinambuka.
42021025	“Ana enge igle ande mina ya ba mina ya te kugl kuri mina diu kanekane plau dinaglkwa. Makandle yomba nomano kinde eran, ana mundi nigl mong sitombuno yakemakete yomba nomano sikugl endinan ana kundugl goraglkwa.
42021026	Makandle koglkoglo taragl plau dina orkwa ipre yomba ongumutno wanan kundugl goraglkwa, sraglpre, kamun mitna taragl prapra giglendi paingwa i pingakar dinaglkwa.
42021027	Enge igle yomba kanimbi Yomba Wam kuakawa mina suna unambuka i yombuglo ya ambuglangemo kande bogl akiye unambuka.
42021028	Taragl i mambuno bogl plau dinamunedi eraglkwa enge, ene andigltre ana bitno kanple diyo, sraglpre, God ene toposi ikine endinambuka engeno mangigl ungwa.”
42021029	Yesus ka i di simbogl yomba ditongwa, “Ene endi kogla ya endi tau i prapra kaniyo.
42021030	Ene kanimbi yaundo kor mambuno bogl sinamnedi erikwa enge, ana ene piraglkwa ande akan panambuka enge mangigl orume dinaglkwa.
42021031	Kuno yeglmere ana ene kanimbi taragl yeglmere plau dinaglkwa enge, ene God kingdomo unambuka mangigl ormedi piraglkwa.
42021032	“Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba epigl erme meglkwa i prapra goglkrimbi taragl i prapra plau dinambuka.
42021033	Kamun mitna ya makan okuwo wau borambrika. Ba na kanna prapra ta wau boglkrambuka.”
42021034	Yesus yegl dungwa, “Ene kankun eriyo. Ene wain gigle dungwa engenge nendre ana du erekraglkwa. Te nangino taragl pre egluwe ere pirkriyo, sraglpre, taragl yeglmere ene nomano sikugl endinan pirpogl sikre meglmbi, ana Yaglkande engemo tambre kana ene mina plau dinambuka.
42021035	Enge i kitn sumere yeglmere makan koglkoglo yomba prapra meglmara plau dinambuka.
42021036	Ene engenge kuie kanmogltre ana kamange ere God tembi, ana yombro panan kade taragl kinde plau dina orkwa i prapra ikorugl ende ana Yomba Wam guma mina andiglmbi kuno erambuka.”
42021037	Ande enge yomere yomere Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo yungugl ka bekete mogl ana akenam dungo ye ende egli Olip Kamun Muglo we dimara pindre enduwer igle moglpai orkwa.
42021038	Ana yomba prapra tangina kinde kana Yesus kamo piramnedi ende God holi yungumo wingwa.
42022001	Ana Bret Yis Paikrukwa ne-ne erikwa enge yongwa i yomba Pasova we dingwa i mangigl orko
42022002	ana lo beke teingwa yomba ya pris kande wagle ye yomba kundutno gogltre ana ye konbauna tau doko kan indre Yesus sigoramnedi pirkwa.
42022003	Ana Satan ende Judas mina suna ongwa. Ye kangiye Iskariot we dingwa, Yesus disaipelma 12 mina ye ta moglkwa.
42022004	Ana ye endpi pris kande wagle ya God holi yungumo mina kimbirnem sugl meglkwa yomba meglmara ongo, ana ye srambre ere Yesus tekoglo yaglkumba onguno mina endinambere pre ka dikeglkwa.
42022005	Ye gun yendre ana ka dikogl moni pra tenamniwo dingwa.
42022006	Judas i pra we dindre ana enge wakai ta yenan yomba i-wedi ta kankrimbi, ana Yesus tekoglo kunda ikine tenagledi sugl moglkwa.
42022007	Ana Bret Yis Paikrukwa ne-ne erikwa engemo ungo, ana sipsip nangigle kombuglange gagl ama Pasova kaiya mokna ne-ne erikwa.
42022008	Yesus eremogl Pita ya Jon diende dungwa, “Ene pindre nono Pasova kaiya mokna ninamga pre akekun ere yeiro.”
42022009	Ye krapogl Yesus tembrika, “Ene pitn no aglokra taragl i akekun ere yenambugle?”
42022010	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene ende siti suna embir ana yagl ta nigl mingi kake yundre ene tengigl yenambuka. Yagle i yungu ta yungugl enambara i ene pindre,
42022011	ana yungu nemyagl diteiro, ‘Beke Norkwa yagle ene pre krapoglkwa, “Yungu kula aglokra mere na disaipelna bogl Pasova ninamne?” ’
42022012	Ye yungu mundu i kula kande tembe kra bogl prapra yomara igle ene ombuno ditenambuka, ana igle ene akekun eriro.”
42022013	Ana ye endpi taragl prapra Yesus ditomere mere kan indre ana Pasova ninaglkwa pre akekun eurika.
42022014	Ana ande kuiya yongo, Yesus eremogl aposelmo wagle bogl akiye bogl mina amedungwa.
42022015	Yesus ditongwa, “Pasova i ninamnedi pirka mere nomuno ana okuwo na giu ya yumbun inaglka.
42022016	Ipre na ene diteinga, na aglketa kaiya mokna nekre mogl pi, ana okuwo taragl kaima God kingdomo suna wu pene enambuka.”
42022017	Okuwo Yesus kap wain indre, ana God diwakai yeite dungwa, “I indre enene mina yumbu siyo.
42022018	Yeglpre na ene diteinga, na erme wain nuglo i ta nekre mogl-eimbo God kingdomo unambuka.”
42022019	Okuwo ye bret indre God diwakai yei, bukondi ana ye tendre, dungwa, “I na nangina, i ene pre teinga, yeglmere ere na pre poglodi piryo.”
42022020	Kaiya mokna ne kondingo, kuno yegl keunde ere ye kap minge ta indre, dungwa, “Kap i God kontrakmo kor, i na bormaina, i ene pre toindi endiga.
42022021	Ba kaniyo, na ipi yaglkumba tenambuka yagle, ye no akiye bogl bolamugl mouglka.
42022022	Sraglpre, Yomba Wam gorambedi God dipanduglmara pai inambuka, ba yomba ta ipi kunda ikine tenambuka i yene yumbun pond inambuka.”
42022023	Ye yene mina krapogl imboriya endingwa, ira mere ye sragl i erambe.
42022024	Disaipelma wagle yene mina tengramodi ira yagl kande morambe dingwa.
42022025	Yesus ditongwa, “Yomba Bina kingno wagle ye mina yagl kande meglkwa. Ana ye mina yomba kande mogl-mitna endingwa i kangino ‘Yomba yeinongwa yagle’ we dingwa.
42022026	Ba ene mina yegl ta paikrano, ene mina kande ta morambuka i ye wu gak kembra mereyegl mogltre, ana kaungo yomba ye eremogl nigl-kongun yoko erikwa yomba mereyegl morambuka.
42022027	Ana ira yagl kande moglme, yomba bogl mina amedi mogl kaiya nongwa i kande moglmo mo kaiya mokna yumbu sungwa i kande moglme? Ta bogl mina amedungwa i kande moglkwa. Ba na ene mina suna nigl-kongun yoko yomba mereyegl moglka.
42022028	Ana na yumbuna kanekane iga enge ene na bogl akiye mogl wingura.
42022029	Ana na Nina kingdomo sugl moglo di narkwa, kuno yeglmere ene pra sugl molo ditenaglka.
42022030	Na kingdomna suna botna mina ene kaiya ya nigl nendre, ana bogl wakaile mina amedi mogltre, Israel yungu ombuno 12 sutno moraglkwa.
42022031	“Saimon, Saimon, pro! Ene prapra pirngino Satan ere kanagledi pre ka dikondungwa i wit ereyaglkwa yomba wit yumbusi, wakai ya kinde i-perepere endumere yeglmere endinambuka.
42022032	Ba na ene pre kamange ere kondinga, Saimon, ene pirngi dinga yange sikrambuka. Ana ene ende ikine na mina unatnga enge, ene angitnma wagle pirngino sigigledi to.”
42022033	Ana Pita di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande, na ene bogl akiye ende kane pindre ana ene bogl akiye gorambuglka pre akekun erika.”
42022034	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Pita, na ene diteinga, erme enduwer konduwagle wi sikran, ene enge suwota na ye kankrika we dinatnga.”
42022035	Ana Yesus disaipelma wagle krapogl tongwa, “Na ene dimenda endinga enge i moni paus ya gagl kamban ya te katno towo ta ikre yoko engura. Ene taragl ta dokindu no?” Ye di ikine endingwa, “Tamangra.”
42022036	Yesus dungwa, “Ba erme, yomba ta moni paus mo gagl kamban ta yenambuka i yondo. Ana yomba ta dikumba prak yeikrambuka ana gaglmo suna tembe moni bogl indre ana dikumba topo erambuka.
42022037	Ipre na ene diteinga, kamambuno muno beglmara yegl dungwa, ‘Ye kunogl gogl yomba ta moglme dingwa.’ I na mina pai inambuka, sraglpre na pre pepa muno beglkura i kaima paiyungwa.”
42022038	Ana disaipelma wagle dingwa, “Yaglkande, kano. Dikumba prak suwo mangigl ya yongwa.” Ye di ikine endungwa, “I pra kuno orkwa.”
42022039	Yesus dumo kande kondo ana ende Olip Kamun Muglo ye okuna pipi ormere ikra orko ana disaipelma wagle omara eingwa.
42022040	Ye ende dumo igle undre ana disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Baglnu mina ene yange sikraglkwa pre kamange eriyo.”
42022041	Ye meglmara igle kondo ende eglke pi, kombuglo singo pi eglke sing yomere yegl pindre ana goglko bondugl kamange orkwa,
42022042	“Nina ene prawedi pitn, nigl mingi na mina i korugl endo, na pirka mere i kondinatnga, ba ene piratnere mere eratnga.”
42022043	Ana angelo ta heven moglkwa ye moglmara plau dite ana yombuglo bogl tongwa.
42022044	Ana Yesus yumbun pond pirtre, ana kamange merkinde orkwa, ana ye pitnboglkwa i bormai mereyegl kuglosi yange makandle sungwa.
42022045	Ana kamange erekondo ye andigltre, ende ikine disaipelma wagle meglmara pindre, ana kango ye ugl paimeglkwa. Sraglpre, ye nomano yumbun dongo pre ugl paingwa.
42022046	Ana Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene sraglpre ugl paime? Andigltre ana kamange eriyo, ene baglnu mina yangesi dinaglkwa pre.”
42022047	Ana Yesus ka dimoglko yomba merkinde wingwa. Ye nangiglma 12 mina suwarata kangiye Judas we dingwa. Ye yomba auro indre okuna kana wu, ana Yesus moglmara kungro pauna mina sinongwa,
42022048	ba Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Judas, ene Yomba Wam kunda ikine tenapre kungro pauna mina sineno?”
42022049	Yesus mokomugl eingwa yomba taragl plau dina orkwa i kandre, ye dingwa, “Yaglkande, no pra dikumba prak mina ere sinamuno?”
42022050	Ana ye mina suna ta dikumba indre pris kande nigl kongunmo yomba ta kina wokra simbiglkidi endungwa.
42022051	Ba Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yeglmere ta erekriyo!” Ana Yesus yaglmo kina ake indre, ana pandigl ikine ende tongo wakai pangwa.
42022052	Ana Yesus pre pris kande wagle ya God holi yungumo sugl meglkwa ya te yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ye inamunedi wingo, ana ye ditongwa, “Ene pirkwa na kunda gogl koglkwa yomba ta moglmedi pre, ene dikumba prak ya kumba indre wimo?
42022053	Na ande engenge God holi yungumo togl suna ene bogl akiye moungra, ana ene onguno ta na nangina akekrikura. Ba ande kuiya erme i ene engeno yongo te mim yombuglomo wu pond pi yombuglo orkwa.”
42022054	Ana Yesus sikane sindre auro yend pris kande yungumugl eingwa. Ana Pita eremogl Yesus omara tau eglke dagl ongwa.
42022055	Ba togl sunakra kot pirmara igle ende donga gaglkwa dongo yomba makaisi amedi meglmara, ana Pita ombugl akiye meglkwa.
42022056	Ana nigl-kongun ambai suwarata kango donga ambuglange sumara iro Pita amedi moglkwa. Ambaimo pi mangigl kaima kandre ana dungwa, “Yagl i ama Yesus bogl akiye waningura!”
42022057	Ba Pita ditorwa ere dungwa, “Ambai ya, na ye kaima ta kankrika.”
42022058	Ana kurita meglko okuwo yagl ta Pita kandre ana dungwa, “Ene ama ye bogl akiye waningura!” Ana Pita di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ya, na ta mangra.”
42022059	Ana ande kuiya suwarata endongo, okuwo yagl ta undre ka giglendi dungwa, “Kaima, yagl i ye bogl akiye waningura, sraglpre, ye ama Galili yagl.”
42022060	Pita di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ya, ene ka dinga i na ta pirpogl sikrika.” Ye ka di moglko ana tambre kana konduwagle kumugl wi sungwa.
42022061	Ana Yesus kan akete toro mendigl pandigl Pita kango, ana Pita pir ikine ende Yesus ka yegl ditongwa ikra prukwa, “Erme konduwagle wi sikran, ene enge suwota na ye ta kankrika we dinatnga.”
42022062	Ana Pita ende menda pindre kai pond kaima orkwa.
42022063	Ana Yesus suglmo meglkwa yomba mambuno bogl bakagl tendre ana eresingwa.
42022064	Ana ye eremogl ongumuglo tusi te pandigl ana krapogl teingwa, “Ira ene sume, dipoglo!”
42022065	Ana ye ka kinde kanekane di Yesus teingwa.
42022066	Ana kamun tangungo ana Juda yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ya pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba wu suwara pindre, ana Yesus ipi yene kaunsolno meglmara eingwa.
42022067	Ana ye dingwa, “No dinoro, ene Mesaia motno?” Ye di ikine endungwa, “Na ene diteimbo ene na ta pirngi dikraglkwa.
42022068	Na ama ka kra ta pogl ene teimbo ana ene ka mongo ta di ikine endekraglkwa.
42022069	Ba enge erme yei ende imbor enambuka, Yomba Wam ye God yombuglo kande pangwa, ongo wokra amedi morambuka.”
42022070	Ye prapra dingwa, “Yeglpre ene God Wam kaima motn kana?” Ye di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene kuno ere dingwa, i na moglka.”
42022071	Ana ye dingwa, “No ka waiye kanekane eraglkwa i ta pirkramga, no nono ka i prapra yene dra mina dungo pir kondumga.”
42023001	Yomba makaisi meglkwa i prapra andigltre ana Yesus auro ipi Pailat moglmara eingwa.
42023002	Ana ye mambuno bogl kakimbi kogl di Yesus nangiye dangindre, ana dingwa, “No yagl i mambunomo kan kondumga. Ye eremogl no yombano bakagl tendre ana dumo kande kinde erambe dungwa te takis Sisa tekriyo dindre, ana yene pre Krais mogl, ana king mole dungwa.”
42023003	Ana yegl dingo Pailat krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Ene Juda yomba kingno motno?” Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Enene yegl dinga.”
42023004	Ana Pailat eremogl pris kande wagle ya te yomba prapra ditongwa, “Na yagl i kot ere tenaglka, i ye aglau ta orko kan ikrika.”
42023005	Ba yomba ka giglekuidi dingwa, “Ye Judia kamun koglkoglo i yomba prapra ka beke tomara i nomano erekinde eretongwa. Ye Galili kamun mambuno bogltre ana aimande ere ende wu erme mangigl igle ungwa.”
42023006	Pailat ka i pirtre ana Yesus Galili nem moglmo mo di krapoglkwa.
42023007	Ana Pailat pirkan orkwa i Yesus eremogl Herot kamun sugl moglmara suna igle moglkwa pango ana Pailat eremogl Yesus di Herot moglmara endungwa. Sraglpre, enge igle Herot ama Jerusalem moglkwa.
42023008	Herot eremogl Yesus kangwa enge, ana ye gun pond kaima yongwa. Sraglpre, Yesus taragl tau orkwa i dingo pirtre, ana ye enge olto kaima Yesus kanagledi pre sugl moglkwa. Ana Yesus kimagl tau eran kanagledi prukwa.
42023009	Yeglpre, Herot ka kra merkinde pogl Yesus tongwa. Ba Yesus ka suwarata di ikine endekrukwa.
42023010	Ana pris kande wagle ya te lo beke teingwa yomba wu mangigl andigl mogltre ana ka giglendi di Yesus nangiye dangingwa.
42023011	Ana Herot kimbirmo nem bogl Yesus bakagl tendre, ana erekinde erete, ana king gagl olto wakai ta ende tendre, ana di ikine Pailat moglmara endingwa.
42023012	Okuna Herot ya Pailat kunda ikine-ikine miurka, ba erme ye wu suwara pi yeinembrika.
42023013	Ana Pailat eremogl pris kande wagle ya yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ya te yomba mere aglendi imakai sindre,
42023014	ana ye ditongwa, “Ene yagl i auro i na moglmara undre ana ene yegl dingura, ‘Ye yomba bakagl tendre ana nomano erekinde eretongwa.’ Ipre na ene meglmara igle ye sragl aglau ta orme dingura i doko i-pene ende kot eretenagledi erika, ba kaima ta kan ikrika.
42023015	Herot ama Yesus aglaumo ta doko kan ikre, ana ye di ikine nono mounara endungwa. Ana enene kanigwa, ye gorambuka mereyegl aglau ta erekrukwa.
42023016	Yeglpre na kimbirnem dimbo kumba simbi, ana diendimbo endinambuka.”
42023017	Ana Pasova enge yomere yomere Pailat eremogl kane paingwa yomba suwarata dimenda ende-ende orkwa.
42023018	Ipre yaglambu prapra wu suwara pi kaglkane kande indre dingwa, “Yesus sigogltre, ana Barabas diendin ende no mounara unano.”
42023019	(Barabas siti gavman bogl kunda bogl tendre, te yomba sigoglkwa ana ipre ye kane singo pangwa.)
42023020	Ana Pailat eremogl Yesus dimenda endinagledi pre aglke kordagl kamo ikra yomba ditongwa.
42023021	Ba yomba aimande kaglkane i paimogl di ikine ende dingwa, “Yesus endi-prak mina siyo! Endi-prak mina siyo!”
42023022	Ana Pailat eremogl yomba ka ditomere ikra aglke ditongo enge suwota orkwa, “Sraglpre sinamune? Ye sragl aglau orum? Na doko kaninga ye aglau ta orko kankrika, ipre sigolo dinaglka paikrukwa. Yeglpre na uglmbo kumba sindre ana diendimbo yoko endinambuka.”
42023023	Ba yomba prapra kaglkane binan bogl indre dingwa, “Yesus endi-prak mina sigolo” dindre mangre kaglkane ingo ana Pailat kamo ende atne ongwa.
42023024	Yeglpre, Pailat eremogl yomba prapra Yesus sigolo dimere yegl prawe dinagledi prukwa.
42023025	Ana Pailat eremogl yagl gavman kunda bogl tendre, te yomba sigoglkwa pre kane singo pangwa, ikra dimenda endinambedi krapogl teimere pre di ye meglmara ende, ana Yesus taragl ta eretena dingwa i ere tenaglmedi pre, tekoglo kimbirnem tongwa.
42023026	Ana kimbirnem eremogl Yesus auro yend menda eingwa. Yagl ta kangiye Saimon we dingwa, Sairini kamun nem. Ye dumo menda moglkwa ende dumo kande suna enapre ungo, ana akegidi mogltre, endi-prak komba mina pandigl teingo kake indre, ana Yesus omara mokomugl ongwa.
42023027	Ana yomba merkinde kaima Yesus omara mokomugl eingwa. Ana eimara i ambu tau Yesus pre miriye gogl kai giglendi erikwa.
42023028	Yesus kan aketendre ana ye ditongwa, “Jerusalem ambu wagle, na pre kai erekriyo, enene pre ya nangro pre kaino eriyo.
42023029	Ana okuwo enge ta yenan yomba yegl dinaglkwa, ‘Ambu kur temine paingwa ya, te gak kuglkrikwa ya, te gak am tekrikwa God eran ye gun yenaglkwa!’
42023030	Enge igle, “‘yomba yegl di, makan muglo tenaglkwa, “Ukandi no sindakaglo!” te Makan meglmbe pre yegl dinaglkwa, “Wu no simbi do!” ’
42023031	Endi kor pangwa enge yomba taragl yegl eraglkwa, ana endimo i gorambuka enge sragl taragl plau dinambe dine?”
42023032	Ana kunogl gogl nembrika yagl suwo ombugl Yesus bogl akiye sigora pre auro imenda eingwa.
42023033	Enge igle ye ende wu, dumo ta kangiye “Bitno Yombuglo” we dimara undre ana igle Yesus endi-prak mina singwa. Te kunogl gogl nembrika yagl suwo ikra sindre, ana ta ye ongo wokra pandigl te ta ongo kondakra pandiglkwa.
42023034	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Nina, yomba taragl erikwa i ye pirpogl sikre erikwa. Ipre ye tandaglmeno kindekondo to.” Yegl dungo ana ye gaglmo yumbusi inamunedi pre satu singwa.
42023035	Yomba igle andigl kanmeglko ana Juda yomba mina ende okuna eingwa ye eremogl Yesus nangiye ka-singwa, “Ye yomba tau ere-yungura, ana God pinde yungwa yomba Mesaia kaima moran kade yene ere-yondo.”
42023036	Ana kimbirnem ombugl ende egli undre ana Yesus bakagl teingwa. Ye wain geu orkwa ninambuka pre tendre,
42023037	ana yegl dingwa, “Ene Juda yomba kingno kaima motn enene ere-yo!”
42023038	Ana ka i muno bogl Yesus endi-prak mina pamara bre mina egli pandiglkwa, “Yagl i Juda Yomba Kingno.”
42023039	Ana kunogl gogl nembrika yagl suwo endi-prak mina egli pambrika ikra ta Yesus ka-tongwa, “Ene Mesaia moglkitno? Ana enene ere indre, no akiye ere-yo.”
42023040	Ba kunogl gogl yagl ta eremogl angigle ta ka-tendre dungwa, “Ene God kunduglmo goglkitno? Nono prapra yumbun kuno yumga.
42023041	Ana nono yumbun yumbuglka i kuno orkwa, sraglpre, nono tandaglme ouglara pre yumbuglka. Ba yagl i aglau ta erekrukwa.”
42023042	Ana yagle i dungwa, “Yesus ene kingdomnen mina suna enatnga enge na wedi poglodi pro.”
42023043	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, erme ene na bogl akiye dumo wakaile suna moratnga.”
42023044	Ande kuiya 12 klok orko, ana makan koglkoglo mim waidi were kondungo pai endpi ande kuiya 3 klok orkwa.
42023045	Ana ande gongungo God holi yungumo mina gagl alap keglkwa sunawom yei arglandi wu koglkoglo ongwa.
42023046	Ana Yesus agle binan bogl dungwa, “Nina! Na spiritna ene ongun mina yeinga.” Enge igle ye yegl dindre, ana mur iyenda ende goglkwa.
42023047	Ana kimbirnem ende okuna ongwa yagle taragl plau dungwa i kandre, God dembiye sindre ana dungwa, “Kaima, yagl i du-yene mogl aglau ta erekrukwa.”
42023048	Yomba prapra kanapre igle makaisi meglkwa, ana taragl plau dungwa i kandre, ana kinde pir piutno tagla sindre, ana ende ikine yungunomugl eingwa.
42023049	Ba Yesus yeinongwa yomba prapra ya, te ambu wagle Galili yei mambuno bogl mokomugl wingwa ikra ana tau eglke dagl andigl mogltre, ana taragl prapra orkwa i kanmeglkwa.
42023050	Yagl ta kangiye Josep we dingwa. Ye kaunsol meglmara suna igle yagl du yene wakai ta moglkwa.
42023051	Ye Judia taun ta kangiye Arimatia we dimara igle mogltre ungwa. Ana ye eremogl kaunsol wagle nomano pir taragl ta eramne dingwa i ye prawe dikrukwa yagle. Ye God kingdomo unambuka pre sugl moglkwa yagle.
42023052	Ana ye ende Pailat moglmara pindre, Yesus nangiye pre krapoglko ana Pailat prawe dungwa.
42023053	Josep eremogl Yesus nangiye i-atne ende, ana gagl alap kruwo ta mina were tendre, ana ipi kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara kor ta waugl yeimara sunakra yongwa. Igle yomba ta geglko pandiglkrimara.
42023054	Sraglpre, Sabat enge mangigl ungo ana akekun eraglkwa enge yongwa.
42023055	Ana ambu wagle Yesus bogl akiye Galili yei wingwa ikra Josep bogl pindre, ana nangiye sraglmere ere kombuglo dra mina suna yongwa i kanigwa.
42023056	Ana ye ende ikine yungunomugl pindre, kungo wakai ya taragl demine orkwa akekun erikwa. Ba Sabat enge yongwa pre ye lo pamere pinande ere ana wakan meglkwa.
42024001	Sande enge tangina kinde kana ambu wagle taragl demine orkwa akekun ere yeingwa indre ana ende kombuglo dra Yesus pandiglmara dumo eingwa.
42024002	Ana ye kanigwa kombuglo dra mina kombuglo siget-dingwa ikra berandi eglke endingwa pango,
42024003	ana ye ende suna eingwa, ba Yaglkande Yesus nangiye briye pango kankrikwa.
42024004	Ye ipre kinano gundo igle andigl meglko ana oglandi kaima yagl suwo gatno suna kruwo mundu pango ye meglmara mangigl igle andigl miurka.
42024005	Ambu wagle kundugl pond gogl ana mangidi gumano kan makandle endingwa, ba yagl suwo i ditembrika, “Ene sraglpre yomba kor-moglkwa ye pre geglkwa mina dokime?
42024006	Ye yawagle ta pai moglkrukwa. Ye andigl ukor ongwa! Ye Galili kamun mogl pangwa enge, ka sragl we ditongwa, i ene piryo,
42024007	‘Yomba Wam tekoglo tandaglme erikwa yomba mina endimbi ana endi-prak mina sigoraglkwa, ana ande enge suwota eran andigl ukor enambuka.’”
42024008	Ana ambu wagle Yesus ka okuna dungwa ikra poglodi pirkwa.
42024009	Ana ye kombuglo dra kondo ende ikine pindre, ana taragl i prapra disaipelmo 11 wagle ya yomba tau akiye diteingwa.
42024010	Ana Maria Makdala kamun mam ya, Joana ya, Jems mam Maria ya, te ambu tau ye bogl akiye eingwa i ye taragl orko kanigwa i di aposel wagle teingwa.
42024011	Ba aposel wagle ambu ka dingwa i pir gidikrikwa. Sraglpre, ye kayoko dimedi pirkwa.
42024012	Ba Pita andigltre ana mukundi ende kombuglo dra ongwa. Ana ye goinge ere kan kombuglo dra endungwa igle gagl alap were teingwa i keunde yongo kangwa. Ana ye ende ikine yungugl pindre, ana taragl kangwa ikra pre nomane sungun prukwa.
42024013	Ana ande enge suwara i keunde disaipelmo mina yagl suwo ende yungu epigl kangiye Emeus we dimara igle embrika, ana Jerusalem yei ende dumo igle enaglkwa 11 kilomita yongwa.
42024014	Ana yaglmo suwo konbauna ende pindre, ana taragl prapra plau dungwa ikra pre yene dipir embrika.
42024015	Ye ka i di imboriya ende pir embriko, ana Yesus ye yene embirara wu suna ongo akiye eingwa.
42024016	Ba ye suwo ongumutno ake kumbugl kambugl orko ana Yesus umedi ta kanpogl sikiurka.
42024017	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene sragl taragl pre denbi di imbor ya ende umbre?” Ye andigl diglkindi miurko ana gumano drano wu kinde ongwa.
42024018	Ana yaglmo suwo i ta kangiye Kliopas we dingwa, ye krapogl tongwa, “Ene suwara yomba kor ta Jerusalem kamun suna ungwa. Ana enge igle taragl prapra egliro plau dungwa i ene kankitn kana?”
42024019	Ana ye krapogl tongwa, “Sragl taragl ne?” Ye di ikine endimbrika, “Yesus Nasaret kamun nem ye mina taragl plau dungwa. Ye propet ta moglkwa. Ana God ya yomba prapra ongumutno mina ka dungwa ya kongun orkwa i yombuglo pond pangwa.
42024020	Pris kande wagle ya nono kaungo yomba ye tekoglo endingo ana gavman pra gorambe dungo, ana Yesus endi-prak mina singwa.
42024021	Ana ye suwara Israel yomba toposi ikine endinambedi no okuna yegl punga, ba ka ta ama pangwa i taragl prapra plau dingura i erme ande enge suwota orkwa.
42024022	Ana no epitno mina ambu tau no sipuglo dinamga ka dingwa. Ana erme tangina kana kombuglo dra pandiglmara eingwa.
42024023	Ba Yesus nangiye briye pango kankrikwa, ye ende ikine undre dinerikwa, no ongumutno-mugl orko kamga angelo suwo yegl dimbrika, ‘Yesus andigl ukor ongwa.’
42024024	Ana no akiye nigle i wamga tau ende kombuglo dra pi doko kanigwa, ama ambu dimere yeglkra kuno orkwa, ba ye Yesus kankrikwa.”
42024025	Yesus di yagl suwo tongwa, “Ene du eur kana, propet okuna ka prapra dingwa i kra ene nomano mina suna paikruko, ana pirngidi kiurika!
42024026	Krais geu prapra goglkran ana okuwo ende God ambuglangemo mina suna enambuka kuno orumo?”
42024027	Ana ye mambuno bogl Moses ya propet wagle prapra ka okuna muno beglko pangwa i yene pre dipene ende yagl suwo tekondungwa.
42024028	Ana ye kamun ta enambugledi embirara igle ye mangigl eingo, Yesus ama konbauna tau ende eglke dagl ena mere orkwa.
42024029	Ba ye manedi akegi dindre, dimbrika, “Ene no bogl moramna, sraglpre, ande beingo mim era orkwa.” Ana ye bogl akiye moraglkwa pre ende yungugl ongwa.
42024030	Ana Yesus eremogl ye akiye bogl mina amedi meglko, ana bret indre God diwakai yeite, ana bukondi yagl suwo tongwa.
42024031	Ana ye ongumutno pirkam dungo, Yesus kanpogl simbriko ana oglandi ye ongumutno-mugl i-mimdaglkwa.
42024032	Ana ye yene di imboriya endimbrika, “Ye nono bogl konbauna akiye umgo, ana kamambuno okuna muno beglko pamara igle di yauro norko, ana nono nomano mina donga mereyegl dekrutuno?”
42024033	Ana ye tambre kana andigl ende ikine Jerusalem embrika. Eglire pindre ana kambriko disaipel 11 wagle ya yomba tau ye akiye waningwa bogl makaisi meglko,
42024034	ana dingwa, “I kaima! Yaglkande andigl ukor pindre, ana Saimon Pita moglmara wu nongugl pi tongwa.”
42024035	Ana yagl suwo konbauna bange taragl orkwa ikra ya, te ye bret buko dungwa enge i ye kanpogl simbrika ikra boglo kiurika.
42024036	Ana ye ka i boglo kugl miurko, ana Yesus yene disaipelma wagle meglmara suna igle andigl mogltre, ana ditongwa, “Nomano pokndi ene mina yenano.”
42024037	Ana ye sipuglo dindre, kundugl pond gogl ye gigl ta kanmunedi pirkwa.
42024038	Ba Yesus disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Ene sraglpre sipuglodi nomano suwo yeme?
42024039	Na onguna ya katna mina kaniyo. I na, nana! Na kandre ana ake piryo, na nangina pango ene kanigwa yeglmere, ana gigl ta nangino ya te yomburo ta panan kankraglkwa.”
42024040	Ana ye ka yegl dindre, ana ongo ya kagle ye ombuno ditongwa.
42024041	Ana ye gun kaima yeingwa ba nomano kugl ongo ana pirngidi dikrikwa. Yeglpre ye krapogl tongwa, “Ana taragl ninaglkwa ta igle yeimbi yomo?”
42024042	Ana ye fis gaiglko dongwa ikine ta i teingwa.
42024043	Ana ye pra indre kanmeglko nongwa.
42024044	Okuwo Yesus di ye tongwa, “Na ene bogl akiye wanmounga enge, ka i ene diteinga, na mina sragl i prapra wu giu dinambuka i Moses lomo mina ya propet wagle kanno mina ya te kamambuno giglange mina ka muno beglko pangwa.”
42024045	Ana kamambuno mina okuna muno beglko pangwa i ye pirpogl sinaglkwa pre, Yesus nomano ake audi tendre
42024046	ana ditongwa, “Kamambuno mina muno yegl beglko pangwa Krais giu gogltre, ana ande enge suwota eran andigl ukor enambuka.
42024047	Ana ye kangiye mina Jerusalem mambuno bogl kamambuno dipene ende dumo kamun koglkoglo embi ana yomba nomano yake tembi ana God tandaglmeno kindekondo tenambuka.
42024048	Ana ene taragl orkwa i prapra diwai dinaglkwa.
42024049	Ana na Nina okuna taragl ene tenagledi ka dipanduglkwa ikra na di ene mina endinaglka. Yeglpre ene siti sugl kan meglmbi kamun mitna yombuglo ende atne ene mina unambuka.”
42024050	Yesus eremogl dumo kande kondo disaipelma wagle auro yend Betani kamun mangigl pindre, ana igle yene ongo mitna ende ana ere wakai ere tongwa.
42024051	Ye ere wakai ere temoglko, ana God eremogl Yesus yend heven suna ongo ana disaipelma wagle kondungwa.
42024052	Ana ye dembiye karaugl ere tendre, gun argan bogl ende ikine Jerusalem eingwa.
42024053	Ye ende ikine Jerusalem pindre, ana God holi yungumo mina yungugl mogltre, God dembiye engenge site meglkwa.
43001001	Okuna imbo Ka i pai moglkwa. Ana Ka i God bogl moglkwa. Ana Ka i God moglkwa.
43001002	Ye okuna imbo God bogl moglkwa.
43001003	Ye mina taragl prapra God ere yongwa, taragl kanekane ere yongwa i ye moglko keunde ere yongwa.
43001004	Kor meglkwa ye mina yongwa ana kor-meglkwa i yomba ambuglangeno.
43001005	Ana ken i mim ormara suna ambuglange sungwa, ba mim i wu sigongonagledi orkwa manga.
43001006	Yagl ta wu pene pi moglkwa ye God diendungo ungwa, kangiye Jon.
43001007	Ye ken ambuglange kamo i dipene endinan ana ye mina yomba prapra pirngi dinaglkwa pre ye ka-singiye yomba ungwa.
43001008	Jon yene ken ambuglange ta moglkrukwa, ba ken ambuglange i kamo ana ye dipene endina pre ungwa.
43001009	Ana ken ambuglange kaima i ambuglangesi yomba makan uglo koglkoglo tenapre ungwa.
43001010	Ye makandle moglko ana ye mina God dumo makan koglkoglo ere yongwa ba makan yomba ye pirkanpogl sikrikwa.
43001011	Yene dumo makanmo mina ungwa. Ba yene yombama diwakai yeitekrikwa.
43001012	Yomba tau ye di-ingwa ana ye kangiye mina pirngi dingwa, yeglpre ye pra God nangiglma meglme dungwa.
43001013	God nangiglma i neno mano bormaino mina kugl yei kiurika te yomba ka dikogl erimere i manga te enene pirmere i manga ba God yene prumere ere i nangiglma endungwa.
43001014	Ana Ka wu yomba pindre nono mina suna moglkwa. No ye ambuglangemo kamga. Ana ambuglange i ye suwara, Nem diendungo ungwa. Yeglpre ye wakaimo ya Ka kaima ye mina kau sungwa. Ye God Wam kaima moglkwa.
43001015	Jon eremogl Yesus pre dinongugl endungwa, ye ka kande dindre dungwa, “Na yomba ipre dingra, na komnaiye winga ba yomba i na mokonamugl ungwa, ye okuna imbo mogltre ana mogl-mitna ende na engrukwa.”
43001016	Ye wakaimo kausi moglko i mina no prapra ere wakai ere mundu-mundu yumga.
43001017	God lomo Moses tongwa ba ye wakaimo ya ka kaima i Yesus Krais mina ungwa.
43001018	Yomba ta God kankrikwa, ba God Wam suwara ye Nem bogl akiye miurka pre ye mina Nem ombuno dipene endungwa.
43001019	Jerusalem dumo suna Juda yomba eremogl pris ya Levai wagle diende ana Jon ira moglmda krapogl piryo dingwa.
43001020	Ye uglmange erekre dinongugl ende dungwa, “Na Krais ta moglkrikwa.”
43001021	Ana ye krapeglkwa, “Ene irane? Ene Elaija motno?” Jon di ikine endungwa, “Na tamanga.” Ana ye dingwa, “Ene Propet ta motno?” Ye di ikine ende dungwa, “Na tamanga.”
43001022	Ana okuwo ye dingwa, “Ene irane? Dinotn no pi diendigo umga yomba ye ene ira motnga i ka mongo ditenamga.”
43001023	Jon eremogl propet Aisaia ka muno boglkwa i di ikine endungwa, “Makan waule suna yomba ta wiyau dungwa i na mina pai yungwa. Yaglkande pre konbo si-ake du endiyo.”
43001024	Parisi wagle yomba diendingo wingwa ikra
43001025	krapogl Jon teingwa, “Ene Krais mo Elaija, mo Propet ta moglkitn ana ene sraglpre yomba baptais tene?”
43001026	Jon di ikine ende yegl dungwa, “Na nigl mina baptais teinga, ba ene meglmara suna i yomba ta moglkwa ene pirkan erekrikwa.
43001027	Ye mokonamugl ungwa, na yomba wakai ta moglmbo kade ye kagle towo mina kan tonguma pangwa i na ta pirka sinaglka kuno erekrukwa.”
43001028	Taragl prapra plau dungwa i Jodan Nigle koglo imbo Betani makan Jon yomba baptais ere tomara igle.
43001029	Ana enge tangina Jon kango Yesus ende ye moglmara ungwa. Ana Jon yegl dungwa, “Kaniyo, Yomba i God Sipsipmo Nangigle makandle yomba tandaglmeno koko endina pre ungwa.
43001030	Na ka dinga ikra yomba ipre mendigl digra, ‘Yomba ta na mokonamugl ungwa i mogl-mitna ende na engrukwa. Sraglpre na moglkriko ye okuna imbo moglkwa.’
43001031	Na nana ye ira moglkwa i ta pir kanpogl sikrika, ba na mambuno ta pango wu nigl mina baptais teinga i Israel yomba meglmara igle wu pene enan kanaglkwa pre erika.”
43001032	Ana Jon yene mambunomo dipene ende tongwa, “Na kaninga Holi Spirit kua yumugl mereyegl heven imbo ende atne undre ye mina moglkwa.
43001033	Yomba i ira moglkwa, i ta pirkan erekrika, ba God na diende nigl mina baptais to dindre ana yegl dinarkwa, “Ene kanmin Holi Spirit ende atne wu yagl ta mina ake morambuka i ye yomba Holi Spirit mina baptais tenambuka.
43001034	Na i kandre, ana ye God Wam kaima moglme dinga.
43001035	Ana tangina Jon eremogl disaipelmo suwo bogl akiye aglke kordagl igle meglkwa.
43001036	Jon kango Yesus konbauna ende wongo ana ye dungwa, “Kaniro, i God Sipsipmo Nangigle.”
43001037	Ye disaipelmo suwo ka i dungo pirmbrika enge, ana Yesus omara mokomugl embrika.
43001038	Yesus kan ikine endungo yagl suwo i mokomugl embriko ana krapogl tongwa, “Ene aglokra moglpai etne?” Ye dimbrika, “Rabai” (i mambuno yegl, Beke Notnga), “Ene yungu aglokra motne?”
43001039	Ye di ikine endungwa, “Ene undre, ana kanambrika.” Yeglpre ye endpi moglmara igle kanbriko ana ande enge mundu ye akiye igle meglko ana ande kuiya 4 klok yongwa.
43001040	Ana Jon ka dungo pirtre, Yesus omara mokomugl embrika ikra ta Andru, ye Saimon Pita angigle.
43001041	Ana komnaiye Andru ta orkwa i, ye angigle Saimon doko kan indre ana ditongwa, “No Mesaia kan imbuglka.” (I mambuno Krais we dingwa.)
43001042	Ana Andru eremogl Saimon auro yu Yesus moglmara ungo ana ye Saimon kandre dungwa, “Ene Saimon, Jon wam. Ene kangin Sipas we dinaglkwa.” Sipas i Aram ka mina kangiye yeingwa, i Juda yomba kanno pangwa. Te Grik ka mina Pita.
43001043	Ana tangina Yesus ende Galili kamun enagledi orkwa. Ye pi Pilip kan indre yegl ditongwa, “Na wimara wo.”
43001044	Pilip, ye Betsaida taun nem, dumo igle ombugl Andru ya Pita ye kamuno yongwa.
43001045	Pilip eremogl Nataniel kandre yegl ditongwa, “Yomba ta pre Moses lo mina pepa muno boglko te propet wagle ye pre ama pepa beglko pangwa ikra no kan yumga. I Yesus ye Josep wam. Nasaret kamun nem.”
43001046	Ana Nataniel ye ka kra yegl pogl tongwa, “Taragl wakai ta Nasaret kamun plau dinambo?” Pilip ye di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene undre ana kano.”
43001047	Ana Yesus kango Nataniel ye moglmara ungo ana ye pre yegl dungwa, “Kaniyo, yagl i Israel yomba kaima, ye mina suna kakimbi ta paikrukwa.”
43001048	Nataniel kra yegl poglkwa, “Ene sraglmere na pirkan etne?” Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Okuna imbo Pilip ene aglendi ikrukwa enge ene endi kogla mambuno mina mogl panga enge ikra, ana na ene kan-kondinga.”
43001049	Nataniel di ikine endungwa, “Beke Notnga, ene God Wam, Israel yomba Kingno.”
43001050	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Ene endi kogla mambuno mina motngo, ene kaniye dinga ikra pre ene pirngi dinga ba kanere yeglmere okuwo taragl giglendi ama kanatnga.”
43001051	Yesus ka ta aine yegl dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, okuwo heven audinan ana Yomba Wam mina God angelomo ende mitna pi ende atne wu erimbi ene kanaglkwa.”
43002001	Ande enge suwo endongo ana enge ta mina Galili dumo kande Kena kamun suna igle yaglambu suwo bogl inambrika enge plau dungo, ana Yesus mam ombugl suna igle moglkwa.
43002002	Ana Yesus ya disaipelma wagle bogl ama wiyo dingo, ye wu yaglambu bogl imbrara igle meglkwa.
43002003	Enge igle wain neingwa dundungo, ana Yesus mam pi wam ditongwa, “Wain dundungo yomba ninaglkwa ta yeikrukwa.”
43002004	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ambu ya, na taragl yegl ero dikro, na engena ta magl ukrukwa.”
43002005	Ana Yesus mam eremogl nigl-kongun yomba ditongwa, “Ye taragl ta eriyo dinambere i ene pra eriyo.”
43002006	Ana makan singala 6 magl wora bondugl yeingwa, i we Juda yomba engeno kande yongwa enge nigl kogl yei pai-pai erikwa. I suwarandi nigl 80 ya 120 lita suna morambuka, te niglmo i-suwara endimbi yumbun murki dinambuka.
43002007	Ana Yesus yegl di nigl-kongun yomba tongwa, “Ene sin gala i prapra nigl kogl kau siyo.” Ana ye nigl kogl sin i prapra sikau singwa.
43002008	Ana ye ditongwa, “Nigl tau kogl ipi wain sugl moglkwa yagle moglmara piyo.” Ye dumere yegl eriko,
43002009	ana sugl moglkwa yagle nigl yoko ikra ne pruko wain kuglo wakai orkwa. Ana ye wain i aglokra i-wingwa i ta pirpogl sikrukwa, ba nigl-kongun yomba nigl toindingwa pre ye pirkan erikwa. Ana ye eremogl ambu inambuka yagle aglendi bina ende
43002010	ana dungwa, “Yomba prapra wain wakai komuno kana yumbu sindre ana ne du eriko kade okuwo wain kinde te-te erikwa. Ba ene wain wakai tawa teke yei pandigltre erme i-pene endingwa.”
43002011	Yesus kimagl koragle kaima Kena kamun Galili dumo kande suna igle orkwa, i ye yombuglomo ombuno dungo disaipelma wagle kandre ana Yesus pirngi dingwa.
43002012	Ana okuwo Yesus ya mam ya angiglma ya te disaipelma bogl akiye end-ime Kaperneam kamun eingwa. Ye ande enge suwomta igle meglkwa.
43002013	Juda yomba Pasova kaiya mokna bir ninaglkwa enge kande magl orko. Yesus ende imbo Jerusalem ongwa.
43002014	Ana ye kango God holi yungumo mina sunakra yomba eremogl bulmakau, ya sipsip ya te kua yumugl maket pandiglkwa. Ana yomba tau botno mina amedi mogl ye moni topo ere te imboriya ende meglkwa.
43002015	Yegl eriko ana ye baklain ta indre ake kumbuyambsi kumba ende, ana sipsip ya bulmakau te yomba ikra pra God holi yungumo mina simenda ende, ana yomba moni topo ere imboriya ende meglkwa ikra sitoindindre ana botno ake i-yake tongwa.
43002016	Ana ye ka giglendi di kua yumugl maket erikwa yomba tongwa, “Ene taragl kanekane i prapra imenda piyo! Na Nina yungumo i ene maket yungu mereyegl endekriyo!”
43002017	Yesus disaipelma wagle ye mambuno yegl orkwa i kandre, ana kamambuno pepa mina muno ta beglko pangwa ikra pirkwa. Ana ka i yegl: ‘Ene yungun holi na wakai kaima pirtre ana wakai yenambedi kongunmo erika i donga bauglo mereyegl na mina suna dongwa.’
43002018	Ana Juda yomba kande wagle krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Ene sragl kimagl ertre no ombuno dimin ana ene yombutn yegl pangwa pamiwodi no kanamne?”
43002019	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “God holi yungumo i ene siterke atne endimbi ana ande enge suwota mina na aglkekor kei bondraglka.”
43002020	Ana Juda yomba yegl di ikine endingwa, “Yawagle, God holi yungumo i kei eingo buglayungu 46 orko ana kei dundingwa, ba ene ande enge suwota mina yungu i kei bondragle dinga.”
43002021	Ba Yesus yene nangiye ipre God holi yungumo we dungwa.
43002022	Okuwo Yesus gogltre andigl ukor ongo, ye disaipelma wagle okuna kana ka ditongwa ikra poglodi pir ikine endingwa. Ana ye kamambuno pepa mina okuna beglko pangwa ikra ya Yesus ka okuna dungwa i pirngi dingwa.
43002023	Pasova enge kande mina, Yesus eremogl Jerusalem suna moglkwa, ana yomba merkinde Yesus kimagl orkwa i kandre ana ye kangiye pirngi dingwa.
43002024	Ba Yesus yene pirngidi yomba i tekrukwa, sraglpre ye eremogl yomba i mambunono kan-kondungwa.
43002025	Yeglpre yomba ta eremogl Yesus ditendre ye mambunono yegl we ta dikrambuka, sraglpre Yesus yene yomba nomano mina taragl suna yongwa i kan-kondungwa.
43003001	Juda yagl kande ta moglkwa kangiye Nikodimas, ye Parisi ta moglkwa.
43003002	Ye enduwer undre, Yesus moglmara yegl dungwa, “Beke Notnga, no pirkan ounga ene ka beke notnga ta God di endungo unga, ene kimagl etnere yegl yomba ta erekraglkwa, ba God eremogl yomba ta mina mogl tenan ye pra kimagl etnere yegl erambuka.”
43003003	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Na ka kaima ene di teinga, yomba ta ye kor kugl yeikrimbi ukor pikran ye God kingdomo ta kankrambuka.”
43003004	Nikodimas aglkekor Yesus diprukwa, “Yomba yake kondungwa sraglmere mam aglkekor kugl yenambe? Kaima yene ye ende ikine mam dane suna kra enan mam aglkekor ta kugl yeikrambuka!”
43003005	Yesus ka mongo ditongwa, “Na ka kaima diteinga, yomba ta nigl ya Holi Spirit mina ta kugl yeikrambuka, ye God kingdomo mina suna ta pikrambuka.
43003006	Yomba nangino mina kugl yeingwa i yomba yoko, ba Holi Spirit kugl yongwa i spirit.
43003007	Na ka yegl dimara i ene sipuglo dikro, ‘Ene kaima aglke kordagl kugl yenaglkwa.’
43003008	Ir yene mange ta ena prumere ongwa, kugla dungo ene pirkwa, ba mange umara mo omara i ene ta kankrikwa. Yomba prapra Holi Spirit mina kugl yongwa i ir ormere kuno yegl.”
43003009	Nikodimas krapoglkwa, “Taragl i srambre ere plau dinambe?”
43003010	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ene Israel yomba ka beke tenga yomba kande ta motnga, ba taragl i ene pirkitno?
43003011	Na ka kaima di ene teinga, no taragl punga pre dindre te taragl kamga i ditomga. Ba no ka dumga i ene kaima ta pir ina kiurikwa.
43003012	Makandle taragl na diteinga i ene ta pirngi dikrikwa, ana heven taragl i pre na dimbo ene sraglmere na pirngi dinaglme?
43003013	Ana yomba suwarata ende heven pikrikwa, ba Yomba Wam suwara ye heven mogltre ana ende atne ungwa.
43003014	Makan waule suna Moses eremogl toki ake mitna endungwa, kuno yeglmere Yomba Wam ake mitna endinaglkwa.
43003015	Yegl eran yomba prapra ye wedi pirngi dinaglkwa, ye kor aimande moraglkwa inaglkwa.
43003016	“God eremogl makan yomba prapra wakai-yene kangwa pre, ye Wam suwara kaima tongwa. Yomba ye wedi pirngi dinaglkwa ta goglkraglkwa, ba kor aimande moraglkwa inaglkwa.
43003017	God Wam di manginagle endungwa i yomba mambunono yumbu sinambuka pre ta manga, ba ye yomba ere-ina pre ungwa.
43003018	Yomba ta ye wedi pirngi dinambuka ye kot erekrambuka, ba ye wedi pirngi dikrambuka kot mina yange sungwa. Sraglpre God Wam suwara kaima kangiye mina ye wedi pirngi dikrikwa.
43003019	Ana kot eraglkwa mambuno i yegl, ambuglange ende makandle wu kondungwa, ba yomba ambuglange wakai kanamna payondi kondo mim wakai kanigwa, sraglpre ye mambuno kinde ere meglkwa.
43003020	Yomba prapra mambuno kinde erikwa, ye ken ambuglange kankinde yei, ana ye mambunono kinde wu pene pi dinambedi pre kundugl gogl ambuglange mina ukrikwa.
43003021	Ba yomba mambuno wakai kaima erikwa ye ken ambuglange mina ende suna wingwa, ana ambuglange i meglmara sinan, ye taragl erikura i ana God kamo dumere erikwa pre yomba kanaglkwa.”
43003022	I mokomugl Yesus ya disaipelma wagle ende pi Judia dumo kande pindre enge tau ye bogl igle mogltre, ana yomba baptais ere teingwa.
43003023	Ainon dumo i Selim kamun magl, igle nigl suwarata wongwa ba niglmo mere moglkwa pre, Jon ama yomba ye moglmara baptais era pre wingo ye baptais ere tongwa.
43003024	(Enge i Jon kane singo paikrukwa enge.)
43003025	Juda yagl ta yongo te Jon disaipelmo tau yeingo nigl pai wu wakai eingwa mambuno i pre tengramo dingwa.
43003026	Ana Jon disaipelma tau ende wu Jon moglmara yegl dingwa, “Beke Notnga, yagl ta ene bogl akiye Jodan Nigle koglo imbo miurko ana ene ye pre kamo dingra, yaglmo i eremogl yomba baptais erete moglko ana yomba merkinde ende ye moglmara eingwa.”
43003027	Ana Jon yegl di ikine endungwa, “Neno kande heven moglkwa imbo taragl ta yomba tekran ana yomba ye yene ta ikrambuka.
43003028	Na ka i okuna kana dinga ene pirkondingwa, ‘Na Krais ta manga. Ba God eremogl ye pre singiye po diendungo na okuna kana winga.’
43003029	Ba yagl ta ambu inan ana ambu i ye embiye moglkwa. Yaglmo i yomba ta yeinongwa ye magl mogltre ka dungwa i pirtre ana pir gun yongwa yeglmere na ama gun pond yeinga i pra kuno orkwa.
43003030	Ye kangiye pai mitna endinan ana na kangina wu atne enambuka.
43003031	“Ana yomba ta kamun mitna ende atne ungwa i ye mogl-mitna ende taragl prapra engrukwa. Yomba ta makandle moglkwa i makan yomba, ana ka dinambuka i makandle yomba ka dimere yegl dinambuka. Ana yomba ta heven unambuka i mogl-mitna ende taragl prapra engrukwa.
43003032	Ye taragl kangwa ya te prukwa i kra dipene ende tongwa, ba yomba eremogl ye kamo i pir ikrikwa.
43003033	Ba yomba ta Yesus kamo pir inan ana embriye igle mina ye pirngi dungwa, i yegl, ‘God ka kaima dungwa.’
43003034	Te God di endungwa yomba ta ungwa i ye God kamo dungwa, sraglpre God eremogl Holi Spirit tongo yomba i mina mogl kau sungwa.
43003035	Nem eremogl yene Wam kanwakai yendre, ana taragl prapra i Wam ongo mina yongwa.
43003036	Yomba ta God Wam pre pirngi dimbi, ana kor aimande moraglkwa i inaglkwa. Ba yomba ta God Wam kamo ta pirngi dikrimbi ana kor aimande moraglkwa kankraglkwa. Sraglpre God dem kumbrukwa yomba i mina pangwa.”
43004001	Parisi wagle yegl pirkwa: Yesus kongun ere ende okuna pindre disaipel mere baptais erete ana Jon orkwa i engrukwa.
43004002	Ba Yesus ye yene yomba ta kaima baptais ere tekrukwa, ye disaipelma wagle keunde yomba baptais ere teingwa.
43004003	Ana Yesus eremogl ye ka dingwa i pirtre, ye Judia makan kindekondo aglke ende ikine Galili enagledi pre ongwa.
43004004	Ba ye du ende pi Samaria dumo suna ongwa,
43004005	Samaria dumo angai ta Sikar we dimara igle ungwa. Ana igle Jekop okuna kana makan ikine wam Josep tongwa ikra Sikar kamun mangigl yongwa.
43004006	Ana Yesus konbauna eglke ungwa kinde orko ana ande kuiya 12 klok yongo Jekop niglmaugl pere yomara igle kra bina ye amedi mogl prukwa.
43004007	Ana Samaria ambu ta nigl koragledi pre ungo, ana Yesus eremogl yegl di ambumo i tongwa, “Ene nigl ta kogl natn ninaglo mo?”
43004008	(Yene disaipelma wagle kaiya mokna topo era pre ende taun suna eingwa.)
43004009	Ana Samaria ambu ikra di Yesus tongwa, “Ene Juda yagl ta motngo te na Samaria ambu pere moglka. Sraglpre ene nigl kogl naro ninagla dine? Ene pro, Juda yomba ya te Samaria yomba ye kaiya mokna yaundo suwara nekrikwa mambuno pangwa.”
43004010	Ana Yesus di ikine ende ambumo i tongwa, “Ana God wakai ere sragl tongwa i ene pirkan etn, ana yagl nigl pre krapoglkwa i ene pirkan eratnga, ana ene ye krapogl temin kade, ana nigl kor aimande meglkwa i ye ene tenambuka.”
43004011	Ana ambumo i dungwa, “Yagl kande, ene nigl koratnga baket ta ake moglkitnga, ana niglmaugl i mur atne ime yongwa. Ba ene niglkor aimande yange pangwa i aglokra koratne?
43004012	Ana no kowano Jekop niglmaugl i waugl no norkwa, ana ye yene ya, nangiglma ya, te sipsip, meme, bulmakau, ye niglmo suwara igle neingwa. Ana ene mogl-mitna ende Jekop engitn kana?”
43004013	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Yomba prapra nigl igle ninaglkwa, ye aglke kordagl nigl goraglkwa.
43004014	Ba yomba ta na nigl tenaglka i ninan ana nigl aglketa goglkrambuka. Tamanga. Na nigl tenaglka i ye mina suna aimande yange paimogl enan ana ye kor aimande meglkwa inambuka.”
43004015	Ana ambumo di Yesus tongwa, “Yagl kande, niglmo i na naro. Yegl etn na okuwo nigl pre ta goglkre ana aglke aglke wu koglkraglka.”
43004016	Ana Yesus yegl di ambumo tongwa, “Ene ende pi win agle di-indre ana ende ikine wo.”
43004017	Ana ambumo yegl di ikine endungwa, “Na wina ta moglkrukwa.” Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene wina ta moglkrume dinga i ka kaima dinga.
43004018	Ana ene okuna yagl 5 engra ana erme yagl ta bogl miurka i ene win kaima ta manga. I ene ka kaima dinatnga.”
43004019	Ana ambumo yegl dungwa, “Yagl kande, na kaninga ene propet ta motnga.
43004020	Na kowana awana Samaria yomba ye makan muglo igle God dembiye karaugl ere te-te erikwa, ba Juda yomba ene eremogl Jerusalem dumo suwara igle keunde God dembiye karaugl ere tenamniwo dingwa.”
43004021	Yesus yegl di ambumo tongwa, “Ambu ya, ene na ka dinga i pirngi do, okuwo enge ta plau dinan kade ana makan muglo i mo Jerusalem suna i keunde ta yomba ye nina dembiye karaugl ere te moglkraglkwa.
43004022	Ene Samaria yomba eremogl yomba ira dembiye karaugl ere teingwa i ene ta pirpogl sikrikwa. Ba no Juda wagle yomba ta dembiye karaugl ere tomga i no nono pirkan ounga. Sraglpre, yomba ere-ingwa mambuno i no Juda mina pangwa.
43004023	Ba enge ta plau dina orkwa ikra, ana erme wu pene ongwa. Yomba God dembiye kaima karaugl ere tenaglkwa engemo, ana ye Holi Spirit yombuglomo mina ya te mambuno wakai kaima mina nina dembiye sitembi, ana yomba yeglmere nina dembiye karaugl ere tenaglkwa, ye wakai pirambuka.
43004024	God ye Spirit moglkwa, yomba ye dembiye karaugl ere tenaglkwa i yene spiritmo mina ya mambuno kaima mina dembiye karaugl ere tenaglkwa.”
43004025	Ana ambumo yegl dungwa, “Na pirka Mesaia kangiye ta Krais we dingwa i unambuka, ana ye unambuka enge taragl prapra dipene ende norambuka.”
43004026	Ana Yesus dipene ende tongwa, “I na moglka, erme ene bogl ka dimoglkwa.”
43004027	Yegl dimiurko, ana disaipelma wagle ende ikine undre kaningo, ana ye ambu ta bogl ka denbi dimiurko ye kandre waikiglkwa. Ana ene sraglpre ambu i bogl denbi dine? Ye ka yegl ta di Yesus tekrikwa, te ambuno i ama ka ta ditekrikwa.
43004028	Ana ambumo nigl baket kindekondo ende ikine taun pindre ana ka yegl di yomba tongwa,
43004029	“Yagl ta na taragl prapra erika ikra dipene endungwa, ana ene kanaglma wiyo. Ye Krais ta moran pre wa?”
43004030	Yegl dungo ana ye taun kondo ende wu Yesus moglmara wingwa.
43004031	Enge igle disaipel wagle yegl di Yesus teingwa, “Beke Notnga, kaiya mokna ta no.”
43004032	Ba ye di ikine endungwa, “Na kaiya mokna ninaglka yongwa i ene ta pirkan erekrikwa.”
43004033	Yegl dungo, disaipel wagle yene di imboriya ende dingwa, “Yomba tau kaiya moknamo iteim kana?”
43004034	Ana Yesus eremogl disaipel wagle ditongwa, “Na kaiya moknana, i na diendungwa yagle prumere ertre, ana na kongunmo ero di narkwa i ere kondinaglka.
43004035	Ene kanno yegl dingwa, ‘No kaiya mokna sinamga i ba 4 pradinan.’ Ba na ene ditenaglka, kaiya mokna pamara dumo i ene wakai ere kandime diyo, ikra mongo de kondungwa, ana ene uraglkwa mereyegl pangwa.
43004036	Ana kaiya mokna simakai singwa yomba topomo indre, te kor aimande moraglkwa pre ama ye kaiya mokna simakai sungwa. Yegl eran ana ereyaglkwa yomba ya te simakai sungwa yomba suwo-akiye gun pond yenambrika.
43004037	Ka dingwa i kaima, yomba ta taragl ereyaran ana yomba ta kaiya mokna sinambuka.
43004038	Na ene diendinga i ene pi kaiya mokna ta ere yaglkrimara igle siyo, ana yomba kongun yoko ere nangino giugogl ere yaglmara igle ene pi kaiya mokna yoko siyo.”
43004039	Samaria yomba merkinde taun igle meglmara ambumo ka yegl dungwa, “Na taragl okuna erimere ikra prapra dipogl narkwa.” Ana Samaria yomba i pirtre Yesus pirngi dingwa.
43004040	Okuwo Samaria yomba Yesus moglmara undre ana ye bogl akiye moramnedi krapogl teingo, ana Yesus ande enge suwo igle moglkwa.
43004041	Ana yomba merkinde Yesus ka dungwa i pirtre ana pirngi dingwa.
43004042	Ana ye ambu i diteingwa, “Ene ka dinotnga i pre erme no ta pirngi dikunga, sraglpre erme nono ye dra mina dungo punga i pre, no pirkan ounga. Yagle i kaima yene dumo koglkoglo yomba prapra ikine endinambuka.”
43004043	Yesus ande enge suwo Samaria yomba bogl mogltre ana ende Galili kamun enapre ongwa.
43004044	Yesus ka yegl dipene endungwa, “Propet ta yene makanmo mina moran ana ye kangiye paikrambuka.”
43004045	Ana ye ende Galili dumo ongo, yomba ye gunyei diwakai yei teingwa, sraglpre, Pasova enge kande mina ye prapra Jerusalem pindre ana Yesus taragl prapra orko kanigwa ikra pre yegl erikwa.
43004046	Ana Yesus aglke kordagl ende ikine Kena dumo kande Galili kamun suna ongwa. Igle ye okuna niglkor orko wu wain ongwa. Ana igle king kongunmo yomba ta wam kinde sungo Kaperneam kamun paimoglkwa.
43004047	Ana yaglmo pruko, Yesus ye Judia kamun kondo ende Galili ume dingo, ye wu Yesus moglmara ungwa. Yaglmo prukwa Yesus ende Kaperneam pindre ana ye wam kinde sungo gorambedi ere pangwa i erewakai ere tenambedi pre yana dungwa.
43004048	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene kimagl kanekane ta kankrimbi, ene ta pirngi dikraglkwa.”
43004049	Ana king kimbirmonem yegl di Yesus tongwa, “Yagl kande, na wana gogl dinambiwo ene onglandi wo.”
43004050	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene ende po, wan ukor ongwa.” Ana yaglmo i Yesus kamo pirngi dindre endongwa.
43004051	Ana king kimbirmonem kande ende yungumugl ena pre konbauna bange pi moglko, ye nigl-kongunmo yomba ka ta yundre diteingwa, “Ene wan kindemo argan orko yoko moglkwa.”
43004052	Ana ye krapoglte ande kuiya sragl mina ye wam kindemo argan orme dungo, ana ye di ikine endingwa, “Enduwe 1 klok mina pokndungo wan kindemo argan orkwa.”
43004053	Ana nem pir ikine endungwa, enduwe ande kuiya igle mina Yesus ka ditongwa, “Ene wan kor-moglkwa.” Ana king kimbirmonem ikra, ya yombama yungugl meglkwa i kra prapra Yesus wedi pirngi dingwa.
43004054	Yesus eremogl Judia kamun kondo ende Galili undre ana kimagl i orko, ana wu suwo ongwa.
43005001	Enge i mokomugl, Juda yomba God dembiye siteingwa enge kande ta plau dungo ana Yesus endpi Jerusalem ongwa.
43005002	Jerusalem igle togl kande ta pamara sipsip imenda suna erimara igle ponubun ta moglkwa, i Aram kanno mina Betsaida we dingwa. Nigle bina igle mogl pirpir erikwa angai dumo 5 yongwa.
43005003	Ana yomba merkinde kinde sungo ye dumo igle meglkwa, i yomba ongumutno mim orkwa, ya te katno kinde orkwa ya te yombutno kembir sungwa ye nigl i mong sinambedi pre sugl kanmeglkwa.
43005004	Sraglpre, enge suwara di Yaglkande angelomo ende nigle igle suna pindre nigl kunugo ana pembigl dungo, kinde sungwa yomba komnaiye ta ende nigle atne eingwa, ana ye kindeno i argan ere-ere orkwa.
43005005	Yagl ta igle moglkwa, ye kindemo i aimande si paimogl ongo ana buglayungu 38 orkwa.
43005006	Ana yaglmo i dumo igle paimoglko Yesus kandre, ana ye prukwa, yagl i kindemo enge olto si pai moglkwa, ipre Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene kinden argan eran wakai moragledi pitno?”
43005007	Ana kinde sungwa yagle yegl di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande, nigl i pembigl dungwa enge, yomba ta igle mogl na akepledi nigle endinaglkwa ta moglkriko, ana na ende nigle enagledi eriko yomba tau onglandi ende nigle eingwa.”
43005008	Yesus yegl di yagl i tongwa, “Ene andiglo! Kungutn ake indre ana konbauna endpo.”
43005009	Ana yagl i kindemo tambre yene argan orko, ye kunguglmo akepere indre ana konbo endongwa. Ana enge i Sabat enge taragl i plau dungwa.
43005010	Yeglpre Juda yomba kande wagle ka yegl di yagle argan orkwa ikra teingwa, “Erme Sabat enge yongwa, nono lono mane dumara ene piryei kungutn ake yunga.”
43005011	Ba yagl i di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ta na erewakai orkwa yagle i yegl dinarkwa, ‘Ene kungutn pere indre ana konbo endpo dungwa.’”
43005012	Ana ye krapogl teingwa, “Yagl ira ene dite, kungutn indre ana konbauna endpo dume?”
43005013	Ana yagl kindemo argan orkwa yagle ikra yomba ira ere tongwa, i ye ta pirkan erekrukwa. Sraglpre, yomba igle merkinde meglmara Yesus ende suna pi kolamala ere endongwa.
43005014	Ana enge tau endongo okuwo yaglmo i God holi yungumo mina moglko Yesus kandre ye ditongwa, “Kano, ene kordagl wu wakai kaima enga, ipre ene tandaglme aglketa erekro, ta etn, taragl kinde kaima ene mina plau dinambuka.”
43005015	Ana yaglmo i ende pindre, Juda yagl kande wagle ditongwa, “Na erewakai orkwa ikra Yesus orkwa pangwa.”
43005016	Ana mambuno yegl ipre ye mambuno bogl Yesus eresi tenamnedi pirkwa. Sraglpre, Sabat enge yomba kinde sungwa erewakai orkwa.
43005017	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine ende ye tongwa, “Na Nina kongun engenge ere wu erme igle ungwa, ipre na ama kongun ormere yegl erika.”
43005018	Ka yegl dumara i ana Juda yagl kande wagle Yesus sigoramnedi ningadi pirkwa, i Sabat lo dumara ye ka sendungwa i keunde ta manga, ama God pre nana Nina we dungwa. Ana dumara i yene ere ipi God bogl kokunkuno endungwa.
43005019	Yesus ka mongo ditongwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ana ye Wam yene prumere taragl ta erekrambuka. Ye Nem taragl ta orko kangwa i keunde erambuka. Sraglpre, Nem taragl kanekane ta orkwa i Wam ama orkwa.
43005020	Ana Nem eremogl Wam kanwakai yendre, ana yene taragl kanekane ta orkwa i Wam ombuno ditongwa. Kaima, ye ama Wam taragl kande kaima erambuka pre ombunodi tenan ana ye taragl pond kaima eran ene prapra kandre alagl sinaglkwa.
43005021	Ana Nem eremogl yomba geglkwa ere-ikor ende, ana kor-moraglkwa tongwa, ormere yeglmere, ana Wam kor-moraglkwa i yomba ta tenagledi prukwa mere tongwa.
43005022	Ipre, Nem yene ka-tange yomba ta tekrambuka. Ba yomba ka-tange tenaglkwa kongun i prapra Wam te kondungwa.
43005023	Ipre ana yomba prapra Nem kangiye dembiyesi teimere kuno yegl ombugl Wam kangiye dembiyesi tenaglkwa. Ana yomba ta ye Wam kangiye dembiyesi tekraglkwa i ana Nem ye diendungo ungwa yagle ama kangiye ta dembiyesi tekraglkwa.
43005024	“Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta na kanna i pirtre ana ye na diendungo wingwa yagle i pirngi dimbi, ana ye kor aimande moraglkwa inaglkwa. Ye ka-tange tekrambuka i pre geglkwa mina kindekondo ana kor-moraglkwa.
43005025	Na ka kaima di ene teinga, enge ta unagledi orkwa, i erme wu kondungwa, enge i yomba geglkwa ana God Wam kamo piraglkwa. Ana yomba ta ka i piran kande ye kor-moraglkwa i inaglkwa.
43005026	Ana kor-meglkwa mambuno i Neno kande yene mina pangwa, te ye yombuglomo i Wam tekondungwa pre kor-meglkwa mambuno i Wam yene mina ama pangwa.
43005027	Ana ye ka-tange yomba tenambuka pre yombuglomo i Wam tekondungwa. Sraglpre, ye Yomba Wam moglkwa.
43005028	“Ka ipre ene sipuglo dikriyo, enge ta unan ana yomba geglkwa mauglno mina paingwa ye eremogl Yesus nungomo embriye pirtre,
43005029	ana ye mauglno mina ende menda wimbi ana tau mambuno wakai erikwa i andigl ukor pindre kor-moraglkwa, te tau mambuno kinde erikwa andigl ukor pindre ana topono kinde inaglkwa.
43005030	“Nana pirmere taragl ta erekraglka, na ka ta dinga i God yene dinarumere i keme na yumbu singa, i kuno orkwa, sraglpre, nana pirka yeglmere eragledi ta erekrika, ba na diendungo winga yagle ye prumere i eraglka.
43005031	Ana na nana kongun erika ya te embriyena ipre dimbo, ana yomba ta pirmbi na kaima dinedi ta pirkraglkwa.
43005032	Ba yomba ta igle moglkwa. Ye ombugl na kongun erika ya embriyena i dipene endinambuka, ana na pirka ye na pre ka dipene endinambuka i kaima yene dinambuka.
43005033	“Ene okuna kakep yomba di Jon moglmara endigo ana ye ka kaima ipre dipene endungwa.
43005034	Ana yomba ka boglo kuraglkwa i na ta pirkrika, ba na ka yegl diga i ene wakai moraglkwa.
43005035	Jon ken-lam mereyegl mogltre, ana de ambuglangesi yomba tongo, ana enge sungunagle ta ye ambuglangemo i ene indre gun yeingwa.
43005036	“Ba na kongun erimere Jon ka boglo kugl dipene endungwa, i kandekinde pai Jon kamo i engre tongwa, Nina kongun ero diendumere i ere kondimbo ana na kongun eraglka i embriye kandre, ana Nem kaima diendungo ungwa pamiwodi yomba kanaglkwa,
43005037	te Nina ye na diendungo winga, na mina ye yene ka dinongugl endungwa. Ana ene ye nungo embriye ta pirkre te ye gumadra ta kankrikwa.
43005038	Ana ye kamo ama ene mina suna yeikrukwa; sraglpre, na diendungo winga yomba ikra ene pirngi dikrikwa.
43005039	Ana ka okuna muno beglko pepa mina pangwa i ene prapra giglendi kere pirkwa. Sraglpre, ka i mina ene kor aimande meglkwa i inamunedi pirkwa. Ba ka okuna beglkwa pepa mina pangwa ikra na pre dungwa.
43005040	Ene ende na mina undre ana kor aimande meglkwa ina kiurikwa.
43005041	“Yomba na dembina sinaglmedi pre pirkrika.
43005042	Ba na ene pirkan erika, God wakai kanigwa mambuno i ene nomano suna pai moglkrukwa.
43005043	Ana na Nina kangiye mina winga, ene na di ikrikwa, ba yomba kangiye pangwa ta unan ene ye di-inaglkwa.
43005044	Ana ene mina kangino kande dembiyesi imboriya endinamnedi pirkwa ba God suwara mina dembino si tongwa i ene inakiurikwa. Sragl yegl erikwa ipre ana ene na srambre ere pirngi dinaglme?
43005045	“Na Nina moglmara i ene ta na ka-tange norambedi pirkriyo. Ta manga. Ene ka-tange tenambuka i Moses, sraglpre ene Moses no akeple dinambedi ningadi pirkwa.
43005046	Ba ene Moses kaima pirngi dima daglma ana ene na ama pirngi dinaglkwa, sraglpre, na pre ye pepa muno boglkwa.
43005047	Ba ye ka muno boglkwa ikra ene ta pirngi dikrikwa, ana ene sraglmere na ka diga i pirngi dinaglme?”
43006001	Yesus ka di kondo okuwo ye Galili Niglmong sipraksi ende koglo imbo ongwa, ana niglmo mong i kangiye ta Taiberias.
43006002	Ana yomba merkinde Yesus omara mokomugl eingwa, sraglpre yomba kinde sungwa Yesus erewakai ere tongo, ye diu orkwa kanigwa ikra pre eingwa.
43006003	Ana Yesus ende egli kamun muglo ta ongwa. Ana igle yene disaipelma wagle bogl akiye amedi meglkwa.
43006004	Ana Juda yomba Pasova ne-ne erikwa engeno i ende magl ungwa.
43006005	Enge igle Yesus kangwa yomba merkinde ende ye moglmara wingo, ana ye di Pilip tongwa, “Nono aglomere bret topo ertre ana yomba i tomuno ye prapra neimbi kuno erambe?”
43006006	Yesus eremogl Pilip ta eran kanagledi pre yegl dungwa, ba Yesus sragl taragl erambuka i yene nomane mina pango pirkondungwa.
43006007	Ana Pilip di ikine endungwa, “Nono ba 8 kongun ere topomo ingwa i ende bret topo oun kade ana yomba prapra ye kuri-kuridi neimbi ta kuno erekrambuka.”
43006008	Ye disaipelma wagle suwarata kangiye Andru, ye Saimon Pita angigle, yegl dungwa,
43006009	“Yagl gak ta yawagle moglkwa ye bret bali 5 ya te fis kembra suwo yei moglkwa. Ba yomba prapra i neimbi kuno ta erekrambuka.”
43006010	Ana Yesus eremogl disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Yomba ditembi kugl merkinde moglmara iro amediyondo.” Ana yomba prapra amedingo, yagl nambano 5,000 mereyegl meglkwa.
43006011	Yesus bret ake indre God diwakai yeite, ana yumbusi yomba amedi meglkwa i tongwa. Te ye ombugl fis indre kuno yegl orko, ana yomba prapra ye merkinde ninamnedi pirmere neingo kuno orkwa.
43006012	Enge igle yomba prapra neingwa kuno orko, Yesus yegl di disaipelma wagle tongwa, “Ikine tau yoko moglkwa i ene gande makai siyo, nono diurkwa suwarata akesi dinamuniwo.”
43006013	Yegl dungo ye bret 5 ikra mina yomba prapra neingwa kuno orko, tau yoko yongwa ya diurkwa gande makai sindre ana basket 12 gre kau singwa.
43006014	Ana Yesus kimagl orkwa i yomba kandre yegl dingwa, “Kaima yene, ye propet ta ende makandle unambe dingwa ikra ungwa.”
43006015	Ana Yesus pirkan orkwa, yomba undre yombuglo ere Yesus king morambedi eraglkwa mereyegl pango ana i pre ye yene mundu ende ikine kamun muglo ongwa.
43006016	Ande beinagledi orko, Yesus disaipelma wagle ende ime niglmong eingwa.
43006017	Igle ye bot ta mina ende egli pindre ana niglmong sipraksi ende Kaperneam kamun enapre ende eingwa. Ana kamun mim pai kondungo, ye eimara igle Yesus akiye ta pikrikwa.
43006018	Ana kamun ir pond mangungo ana nigl sitombuno yakemake tongwa.
43006019	Ana disaipelma wagle bot awaresi pi 5 mo 6 kilomita yegl ta pindre ye kanigwa, Yesus nigl bolamugl konbauna wu bot mina mangigl wora ungo kade, ana ye kundugl geglkwa.
43006020	Ba Yesus ditongwa, “Kundugl goglkriyo, i na wingwa.”
43006021	Ye gunyei ana Yesus isuna bot mina endongo ana bot onglandi kaima endpi dumo enamunedi pre eimara igle kra plau dungwa.
43006022	Enge i pradungo tangina yomba nigl koglo ya meglkwa ye kanigwa bot suwarata pai moglkwa, ana bot i mina Yesus disaipelma bogl akiye ta pikrukwa. Ba yene disaipelma keunde ende eingwa.
43006023	Ana okuwo bot tau, Tiberias yei ende wu Yesus ye bret diwakai yei tongo yomba neimara igle kra magl wingwa.
43006024	Yomba kanigwa Yesus disaipelma bogl igle moglkrikwa, ana ye bot tau wingwa ikra mina ende suna pi, Yesus pre doko ende Kaperneam kamun eingwa.
43006025	Yomba ende nigl koglo imbo pi ana Yesus moglko kandre, ye krapogl teingwa, “Beke Notnga, ene enge aunake ende igle une?”
43006026	Yesus ka mongo di ikine endungwa, “Na ka kaima ene di teinga, ene na pre dokingwa, i ene kimagl kanigwa ikra pre ta manga, ba ene bret neingwa dano orkwa ikra pre erikwa.
43006027	Ene kaiya mokna kinde orkwa ipre kongunmo erekraglkwa ba ene kaiya mokna kor aimande moraglkwa ipre kongunmo eriyo. Te kaiya mokna kor-moraglkwa i yene kaneta, Yomba Wam ene tenambuka, taragl i pra erambedi pre ana Nem God yombuglomo te kondungwa.”
43006028	Ye krapogl Yesus teingwa, “No srambre ere God kongun eraglmedi prumere i ouno kuno erambe?”
43006029	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “God kongunmo yegl: God yomba ta diendungo ungwa i ene pirngi dinaglkwa.”
43006030	Ipre ye krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Ene sragl kimagl etn no i kandre ana ene pirngi dinamune? Mo ene sragl taragl eratne?
43006031	No yagl awano okuna makan waule igle mana neingwa i pepa mina muno yegl beglko pangwa: ‘Heven suna bret-mana i God te atne endungo neingwa.’”
43006032	Yesus ditongwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, Moses taragl tongwa i heven bret ta manga, ba na Nina heven suna bret kaima i ene tongwa.
43006033	Ana God bret tongwa i ye heven suna ende atne undre, ana makan yomba koglkoglo kor-moraglkwa pre tongwa.”
43006034	Ye dingwa, “Yagl kande, bret i engenge no noro.”
