43006035	Ana Yesus dinongugl endungwa, “Na nana kor-meglkwa bret, yomba ta ende na mina unambuka ye kindan goglkrambuka, te yomba ta na wedi pirngi dinan, ana ye nigl goglkrambuka.
43006036	Ana na ene diteinga, ene na kan-kondingwa ba pirngi dikrikwa.
43006037	Yomba prapra Nina na narkwa i ye ende na mina unaglmiwo, yomba ta na mina unambuka ana na ye kinde kondokraglka.
43006038	Sraglpre na heven suna ende atne winga i nana pirmere eraglka pre manga, ba na diendungo winga yagle prumere mere eraglka.
43006039	Na diendungwa yagle i yegl eretenedi prukwa, yomba prapra na nare kondungwa i suwarata na kinde kondokraglka ba enge kande mina ye prapra simangimbo andigl ukor enaglkwa.
43006040	Ana Nina yegl prukwa, yomba prapra Wam kandre pirngi ditembi ye kor aimande moraglkwa. Ana enge kande mina na yomba simange ikor endinaglka.”
43006041	Enge igle Juda yomba deno kumbro Yesus teingwa, sraglpre Yesus ka yegl dungwa ipre, “Na bret heven suna imbo ende atne winga.”
43006042	Ipre ye dingwa, “Yagl i Yesus, ye Josep wam moglkrumo? Te ye nem ya mam nono pirkan ounga. Sragl orko ye erme ka yegl di, na heven ende atne wiye dume?”
43006043	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Enene mina deno kumbro di imboriya ende meglkwa i kondiyo.
43006044	Yomba ta yene pirmere ende na mina ukraglkwa, ba Nina na diendungwa yagle ye yomba auro iyu na mina endinambuka. Ana na enge kande mina ye simangimbo andigl ukor enambuka.
43006045	Ana propet wagle ka dingo pepa muno yegl beglko pangwa, ‘Yomba prapra God yene ka di beke tenambuka.’ Te yomba ta Nina kamo pirtre pir imbi, ana ye ende na mina unaglkwa.
43006046	Yomba suwarata Nina kankrikwa ba suwarata God mina ungwa i keme kangwa, God mina mogltre ungwa i keunde ye Nem kangwa.
43006047	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta pirngi dinambuka ye kor aimande meglkwa inambuka.
43006048	Kor meglkwa bret i na nana moglka.
43006049	Ene kowano ye makan waule suna bret-mana neingwa ba ye geglkwa.
43006050	Ba bret-mana heven imbo ende atne ungwa i yomba ta ninaglkwa, ana ye goglkraglkwa.
43006051	Na nana kor-meglkwa bret i heven imbo ende atne wingwa ba yomba ta bret i ninan, ye kor aimande morambuka. Ana bret na tenaglka i na nangina, yomba koglkoglo kor aimande moraglkwa ipre na tenaglka.”
43006052	Juda yomba ye deno kumbro tengramodi yegl dingwa, “Yagl i srambre ere ye nangiye noran ana nono ninamne?”
43006053	Yesus di yomba tongwa, “Na ka kaima di ene teinga, Yomba Wam nangiye ya ye bormaimo i ene ta nekrimbi ana kor-moraglkwa i ene mina paikrambuka.
43006054	Yomba ta na nangina nendre te bormaina neimbi ye kor aimande moraglkwa inaglkwa, te enge kande mina na ye simange ikor endinaglka.
43006055	Sraglpre na nangina i kaiya mokna kaima, te na bormaina i nigl kaima.
43006056	Yomba ta ye na nangina ya te bormaina ninan ana ye na mina suna moran, ana na ye mina suna moraglka.
43006057	Ana Nina kor-moglkwa ye na diendungwa, ana ye mina na ama kor-moglka, mambuno kuno yeglmere, yomba ta na ninambuka ye kor-morambuka, sraglpre na yombrana mina inambuka.
43006058	Bret i heven imbo ende atne ungwa. Ene kowano awano ye bret-mana nendre ana okuwo ye geglkwa. Yeglmere ta manga, ba yomba ta bret i ninambuka ye kor aimande morambuka.”
43006059	Kaperneam kamun makai yungu yungugl kra Yesus ka bekete mogltre ana ka i ditongwa.
43006060	Disaipelma wagle ya yomba merkinde Yesus kamo pirtre ana yegl dingwa, “Ka giglendi kaima beke norkwa, ka i ira pir-inambe?”
43006061	Yomba ta Yesus ka i ditekrikwa, ba Yesus kango ka dungwa ipre tengramo dingwa. Yeglpre Yesus ka di yomba tongwa, “Ka dinga ipre ene yumbun de pirmo?
43006062	Ana Yomba Wam ende ikine pi okuna mogl umara enan ana ene kandre sragl wedi piraglme?
43006063	Ana yomba kor-meglkwa i God Spiritmo tongwa, ba nangino kongunmo ta paikrukwa, na ka ene erme dite moglka i spirit ya te kor-meglkwa ka.
43006064	Ba ene yomba tau pirngi dikrikwa.” I Yesus okuna mambuno bogl umara ime ye kangwa yomba tau ye pirngidi tekrimbi, te iramere ye i-pene ende kunda ikine onguno mina yenambuka i pirkan orkwa.
43006065	Yesus ka di aine yegl dungwa, “Ana mambuno ipre na ene diteinga, yomba yene ta na mina ukraglkwa, ba Nina ta akepledi tenambuka yomba i keunde na mina unaglkwa.”
43006066	Enge igle Yesus ka dikondungo ana yomba mokomugl eingwa ikra ende ikine pindre ana Yesus omara aglketa pikrikwa.
43006067	Yeglpre Yesus krapogl disaipel 12 wagle tongwa, “Ene ama na kondo endinamnedi pirmo?”
43006068	Saimon Pita di ikine ende tongwa, “Yaglkande, no ira moglmara enamune? Ana kor aimande meglkwa ka i ene mina pangwa.
43006069	Ana no etne pirngi dumga, te pirkan ounga i ene Suwara Holi mogltre, God mina unga.”
43006070	Yegl dingo ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene 12 prapra na ta pinde ikrisino? Ba ene mina suwarata spirit kinde moglkwa.”
43006071	Yesus eremogl Judas pre dungwa, ye Saimon Iskariot wam, ana disaipel 12 mina Judas okuwo Yesus i-pene ende kunda ikine tenambuka.
43007001	Enge tau mokomugl, Yesus eremogl Galili suna winambodi wanmogltre, ana Judia kamun suna enakiurkwa. Sraglpre, Juda yomba kande wagle Yesus sigoramnedi pre igle sugl meglkwa.
43007002	Ana Juda yomba kamambuno sel yungu mina makai sindre God ofa teingwa enge kande i magl orkwa.
43007003	Yeglpre Yesus angiglma wagle diteingwa, “Ene dumo igle kondo ende Judia po, ana ene disaipelnen wagle kimagl etn kanaglkwa.
43007004	Yomba ta ye kangiye panambedi pirkwa i kongun ere teke pandiglkrambuka. Ene kongun yegl etnga pre, ana etne ene yomba prapra ongumutno mina ere pene endimin ye kanaglkwa.”
43007005	Ana yene angiglma wagle Yesus pirngi dikrikwa.
43007006	Ipre Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na engena ta magl ukrukwa. Ba engenge i ene engeno yongwa.
43007007	Makandle yomba ene ta kankinde yei tekraglkwa, ba ye kankinde yei na naraglkwa. Sraglpre, ye mambunono kinde erme i na dipene endinaglka.
43007008	Ana ene pi God Akeple Dungwa enge kande plau dumara i piyo. Na igle ta pikraglka, sraglpre na engena ta magl ukrukwa.”
43007009	Yesus ka yegl di angiglma tendre ana ye Galili kamun mogl pangwa.
43007010	Ana ye angiglma wagle God Akeple Dungwa enge kande yomara endpi kondingo, okuwo Yesus ama endongwa. Ye pendigl pikrukwa, ba atne teke konbo ongwa.
43007011	Ana enge kande yomara suna igle Juda yagl kande wagle ye Yesus pre doko ana yegl dingwa, “Yagl i aglokra moglme?”
43007012	Ana yomba merkinde Yesus pre ka ninu dingwa, “Ye yagl wakai moglkwa.” Ba yomba tau yegl dingwa, “Ta manga, ye kakimbi di yomba tongwa.”
43007013	Ba yomba makai simara ye eremogl Yesus pre ka pere ta dikrikwa, sraglpre, Juda yagl kande wagle pre kundutno geglkwa.
43007014	Ana God Akeple Dungwa enge kande makai singwa ikine pradungo ana ikine yoko pango, Yesus ende God holi yungumo mina pindre, ana mambuno bogl ka beke tongwa.
43007015	Ana Juda yagl kande wagle sipuglodi yegl dingwa, “Yagl i skul kande ta dikrukwa. Ba ye srambre ere beke pirkan orkwa i pond pame?”
43007016	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ka beke teinga i nana mina ta ukrukwa, ba God mina ungwa. Ye na diendungo winga.
43007017	Yomba ta God prumere taragl ta eragledi piran kade, ana na ka beke teinga i God mina ungwa mo nana nomano mina diga i ye pirkan erambuka.
43007018	Yomba ta yene nomane mina prumere ka dungwa, ka dungwa i yene kangiye kande inagledi prukwa. Ba yomba ta ye diendungwa yagle i kangiye mina dipene endinan i ye ka kaima dungwa, ana ye mina kakimbi ta suna paikrukwa.
43007019	Moses lo ene tongwa. Ba ene suwarata lo i sika sikrikwa. Ene sraglpre na sigoramnedi erme?”
43007020	Ana yomba merkinde di ikine endingwa, “Spirit kinde ta ene mina suna moglkwa, ira ene sigoragledi orme?”
43007021	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na kimagl suwarata okuna erika i ene prapra nomano kanekane yeingwa.
43007022	Ba ene piryo, ene wano nangino punduno boraglkwa pre Moses yegl eriyo dungwa. I Moses keunde ta kamo manga. Ene kowano awano okuna ye mambuno bogl erikwa. Ana i pre ene yagl gak Sabat enge nangino punduno beglkwa.
43007023	Erme yagl gak ta Sabat enge nangino punduno beglmbi ana Moses lomo i ta erekinde erekrikwa. Sraglpre na okuna yagl ta kinde sungwa, ana Sabat enge kindemo mundu erewakai ere teinga ikra pre ene deno kumbro na narimo?
43007024	Ene ta pirkan erekrimbi yomba ta yumbu sikriyo, ana ene mambuno kaima mina yumbu siyo.”
43007025	Jerusalem yomba tau yegl dingwa, “Yagl i sigoramnedi erikwa ikra moglum kana?
43007026	Kaima, yagl ikra magl moglkwa iwe. Ye yomba merkinde meglmara ka dungwa, ba yomba suwarata ka di ikine endekrikwa. I pre yomba kande wagle pirkwa ye kaima Krais moglme kana?
43007027	Ana Krais unambuka enge yomba suwarata ye aglokra mogl ungwa i ta pirkan erekraglkwa. Ba yagl i dumo aglokra mogl unga i nono pirkan ounga.”
43007028	Ana Yesus eremogl God holi yungumo mina togl sunakra ka bekete ka kande yegl dungwa, “Ene na pirkan ere te dumo aglokra winga i ene pirkan erimo? Na nana pirmere ta ukrika, ba Nina na diendungo winga yagle i kaima moglkwa. Ana ye moglkwa i ene ta pirkan erekrikwa.
43007029	Ba na ye pirkan erika, sraglpre na ye mina winga, te ye na diendungwa.”
43007030	Dungwa ipre yomba ye sikane sinamnedi erikwa, ba Yesus engemo magl ukrukwa. Yeglpre, yomba ta Yesus nangiye akekrikwa.
43007031	Ana yomba prapra meglkwa i merkinde ye Yesus pre pirngi dindre ana dingwa, “Ba Krais unambuka enge ye kimagl mere ertre ana yagl i engrambo?”
43007032	Yomba prapra Yesus taragl orkwa ikra pre ka ninu kanekane dingwa i Parisi wagle pirtre, ana ye yeingo pris kande wagle bogl ye kimbirnem diende, pi Yesus sikane siyo dingwa.
43007033	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Na ene bogl enge sungunagle ta moramga, ana okuwo na diendungo winga ye moglmara ende ikine enaglka.
43007034	Ene na pre doknaglkwa, ba ene na ta doko kan ikraglkwa, te na moraglmara dumo i ene ta ukraglkwa.”
43007035	Ana Juda wagle ye yene di imboriya endingwa, “Yagl i ende aglokra enan, ana nono ye ta kankramune? Mo ye endpi nono yombano okuna singo endpi Grik kamun meglmara suna igle kra pindre, ana kamambuno Grik yomba beke tenapre dum kana?
43007036	Sragl mambuno pango ye ka yegl dum, ‘Na pre ene doknaglkwa, ba na ta doko kan ikraglkwa, ana aglokra moraglmara igle ene ta ukraglkwa?’”
43007037	Ana kamambuno pirkwa enge kande kaima ikra mina mogl wingwa dundinambuka enge Yesus andigl mogl ka pond dindre ana yomba prapra ditongwa, “Yomba ta nigl goran kade kanwinge erimbi ye ende na moglmara undre ana ninambuka.
43007038	Kamambuno mina okuna muno yegl beglko pangwa: ‘Yomba ta na pirngi dinan, ana kor aimande meglkwa nigl i yene munduwo ombo mina suna kuglosi ende bina unambuka.’”
43007039	Ye ka i Holi Spirit pre yegl dungwa. Yomba ta ye wedi pirngi dinaglkwa, ana Holi Spirit inaglkwa. Ana enge igle Yesus kangiye kande ikrukwa ipre Holi Spirit ende atne ukrukwa.
43007040	Yomba tau ka dungwa i pirtre, ana dingwa, “Yagl i kaima propet ta moglkwa.”
43007041	Te tau ye Krais moglme dingwa. Ba tau ama krapeglkwa, “Galili kamun igle Krais sraglmere unambe?”
43007042	Sraglpre, kamambuno pepa mina okuna muno yegl di beglkwa pangwa, “King Devit yungumo ombuno mina suna i Krais plau dinambuka, ye Betlehem kamun kugl yembi, ana Devit okuna taun moglmara igle.”
43007043	Ana yomba eremogl Yesus pre nomano perepere yongo, ana yumbusi epigl suwo erikwa.
43007044	Ana yomba tau sikane sinamnedi pirkwa, ba yomba suwarata onguno waiyadi nangiye ta akekrikwa.
43007045	Ana okuwo kimbirnem ende ikine pi pris kande wagle ya te Parisi wagle meglmara eingo, ana ye krapeglkwa, “Ene sragl orko ye auro isuna ya ukrime?”
43007046	Ana kimbirnem di ikine endingwa, “Yagle i sraglmere orkwa i yomba ta di norokrikwa.”
43007047	Ana Parisi wagle ka yegl di ikine endingwa, “Ye ene ama bakagl tom kana?
43007048	Ana nono mina ende okuna eingwa yomba ya te Parisi wagle ta Yesus wedi pirngi dimo?
43007049	Tamanga, yomba ye Moses lomo pirpogl sikrikwa ikra keunde God wau boraglme dungwa i mina meglkwa.”
43007050	Nikodimas, okuna ye endpi Yesus moglmara ongwa. Ye ama Parisi wagle epitno i ta moglkwa, ana ye eremogl Parisi wagle yegl ditongwa,
43007051	“Nono lono mina yomba yoko ta ka-tange teiyo dumo? Tamanga, nono komnaiye kana ye kamo pirkan ertre, te ye sragl taragl orkwa i ene wakai ere pir kanpogl sinaglkwa.”
43007052	Ba ye di ikine endingwa, “Ene ombugl Galili kamun nem motn kana? God kamo pepa mina suna beglko pangwa i ene kere pirpogl sinaglkwa. Ana propet ta Galili kamun wu pene enambe dikrikura.”
43007053	Yegl dingo ana yomba prapra suwarandi ende ikine yene yungunomugl eingwa.
43008001	Ana yomba prapra ende yungunomugl eingwa. Ba Yesus yene ende kamun muglo, Olip we dimara igle ongwa.
43008002	Kamun tangungo ana tangina kana, ye ende ikine God holi yungumo mina togl sunakra ongwa. Ana yomba prapra ende ye moglmara wu makai singo ana ye amedi mogl kamambuno wakai beke tongwa.
43008003	Ana lo beke teingwa yomba ya te Parisi wagle, ye eremogl ambu ta yagl kunogl gundungwa sikanesi iyu Yesus moglmara endingo andigl moglkwa.
43008004	Ana ye yegl di Yesus teingwa, “Beke Notnga, ambu i ye yagl kunogl gundungo yomba kanigwa.
43008005	Ana ambu yeglmere Moses lomo mina kombuglo si, sigoglo di norkwa. Ana ene sragl we dinatne?”
43008006	Ye yegl dingwa i ana Yesus ka ta di aglau eran pirtre ana ka di nangiye dangina mounedi pre dingwa. Ba ye kan makandle ende ana ongo mongo pagl makan mina muno bogl moglkwa.
43008007	Ana ye prapra igle andigl mogl krapogl Yesus teingo, ana ye andigltre dindre yegl ditongwa, “Ana ene mina yomba suwarata tandaglme erekrambuka, ye kombuglo komnaiye ambu i nangiye mina suwondo.”
43008008	Yegl dindre, ye kordagl mangi dindre ana makan mina muno boglkwa.
43008009	Yomba prapra ka i pirkwa enge, ana yomba dongagl wagle okuna kana ende eingo, ana yomba tau suwara suwarandi okuwo ende eingwa. Yesus yene moglko ana ambu ikra moglmara igle andigl mogl pangwa.
43008010	Yesus andigltre dindre ana ambumo ditongwa, “Ambu ya, yomba ikra aglo meglme? Yomba ene sinaglkwa ta moglkrim kana?”
43008011	Ambumo yegl dungwa, “Yaglkande, yomba suwarata moglkrikwa.” Yesus yegl ditongwa, “I wakai iwe, na ama ene ta si ka-tekraglka, ene ende pindre ana tandaglme aglketa erekro.”
43008012	Yesus eremogl Parisi wagle kordagl ditongwa, “Na makandle ken ambuglange moglka, yomba ta na eimara mokonamugl unambuka, ye mim bongond ormara suna konbauna wankrambuka. Ba ye kor-meglkwa ken ambuglange i inambuka.”
43008013	Ana Parisi wagle yegl di Yesus teingwa, “Ene enene pre ka yegl dinga ba yomba ka dinga i kaima dinedi ta pirkrikwa.”
43008014	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Taman, na nana pre ka dinga i kaima dinga. Sraglpre na dumo aglokra wimara i pirtre ana ende dumo aglokra enaglmara i pirkan erika. Ba ene na dumo aglokra winga mo ende dumo aglokra enaglka i ene ta pirkan erekrikwa.
43008015	Ene yomba embriye mambuno erimere ipre ene yumbu singwa, ba na yomba embriye mambunono i ta yeglmere yumbu sikrika.
43008016	Ba na ta yumbu sinaglka mere pama dagl, na kaima pamere yumbu singo, sraglpre, nana mundu ta manga, Nina na diendungo winga bogl akiye mouglka.
43008017	Ana ene lono mina muno yegl beglko pangwa. Yomba suwo ka boglokiur wu suwara enan, ana ye ka dimbrika i kaima pangwa.
43008018	Ana na nana pre ka dinga ba Nina na diendungwa yagle ombugl na pre dipene endungwa.”
43008019	Parisi wagle yegl di Yesus teingwa, “Nen aglokra moglme?” Yesus yegl di ikine ende tongwa, “Ene na ta pirkan erekrimbi, Nina ombugl ta pirkan erekraglkwa. Ba ene na pirkan erimbi ana Nina ama pirkan eraglkwa.”
43008020	Yesus ka prapra dungwa i God holi yungumo mina yungugl kra, ofa teimara dumo igle mogltre ana ka beke tongwa. Ba yomba ta ye sikane sikrikwa sraglpre ye engemo ta magl erekrukwa.
43008021	Yesus aglke yegl di yomba tongwa, “Na ende bangeta eimbo ene na pre doknaglkwa, ba enene tandaglmeno mina goraglkwa, ene na enaglmara igle ta pirkraglkwa.”
43008022	Ye ka yegl dungwa ipre Juda yomba kande wagle yegl dingwa, “Yagl i eremogl ye enaglmara i nono ta pikraglme dungwa. I yene wisi gora pre dum kana?”
43008023	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ene atne igle yomba meglkwa, ba na kamun mitna imbo atne winga. Ene manginagle igle yomba meglkwa, ba na manginagle yomba ta moglkrika.
43008024	Yeglpre na ene diteinga, ene tandaglmeno mina goraglkwa. Te na yomba ira moglka i ene kaima ta pirngi dikrimbi, ene tandaglmeno mina goraglkwa.”
43008025	Ye krapogl dingwa, “Ene irane?” Ana Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Na ka i prapra okuna kana ene di teingra.
43008026	Ene ka-tange tenaglmara i, na ka merkinde dinaglka pangwa. Ba ye na diendungo winga, ye kaima yene moglkwa. Ye ka dungo pirka mere i yomba koglkoglo diteinga.”
43008027	Ana Yesus eremogl Nem pre dungwa i yomba ta pirpogl sikrikwa.
43008028	Yeglpre Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ana ene Yomba Wam akepledi mitna endinaglkwa enge, ene pirkan eraglkwa. Na kaima moglmedi kanaglkwa, Nina ka yegl do dumere mere dinga.
43008029	Na diendungo winga ye na bogl mouglka, ye na kondungo mundu ta moglkrika, sraglpre na engenge ye prumere i keunde erika.”
43008030	Ana Yesus ka yegl dungwa i yomba merkinde pirtre ana ye pirngidi teingwa.
43008031	Yesus eremogl Juda yomba ye wedi pirngi dingwa wagle ditongwa, “Ene na ka beke teimere erimbi ana ene na disaipelna kaima moraglkwa.”
43008032	Ana ene ka kaima mambuno pirpogl simbi ana ka kaima i ene kane poko endinan yoko moraglkwa.
43008033	Yomba ikra di ikine ende Yesus teingwa, “No Abraham gawama mounga pre no yomba ta nigl kongunmo yoko ere tekunga. Ene sragl mambuno pango pre no kane poko endinagle dine?”
43008034	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ka kaima ene di teinga, yomba ta tandaglme erikwa i ana ye tandaglme kanemo paingwa.
43008035	Ana nigl kongun yoko orkwa yomba ye yagl kande yungumugl ta engenge moglkrambuka, ba yene wam yungugl aimande morambuka.
43008036	Ana Yomba Wam ene kane poko endinan, ene yoko kaima moraglkwa.
43008037	Na pirkan erika ene Abraham gawama meglkwa, ba na ka beke teinga i, ene nomano mina suna yeikrukwa pre ene na sigoramnedi erikwa.
43008038	Na Nina ombuno dumere mere dimoglka, ba ene neno eriyo dumere mere erikwa.”
43008039	Yomba ikra yegl di Yesus teingwa, “No neno Abraham moglkwa.” Ana Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ene Abraham nangiglma meglmbi kade, ana ye mambuno ormere yegl eraglkwa.
43008040	Na Godna ka kaima dungo pirmere mere ene diteinga, ba ene na sigoramnedi erikwa. Abraham taragl yegl mere okuna ta erekrukwa.
43008041	Ene taragl erikwa i enene neno ta ormere mere erikwa.” Ba ye di ikine endingwa, “No mano yagl guagua ta pindre no kugl yeikrukwa. Tamanga. God suwara no Neno moglkwa. No ye nangiglma kaima mounga.”
43008042	Yesus yegl di ye tongwa, “Ene Neno kaima God moran kade ana ene na wakai kanaglkwa. Sraglpre, na God mina undre ana erme igle moglka. Na pirmere ta wu erekrika, ba ye na diendungo wingwa.
43008043	Ana sragl mambuno pango na ka dinga i ene pirpogl sikrime? Yeglpre na ka dinga i ene pir inaglkwa mere manga.
43008044	Ene yagl kinde nangiglma, neno Satan, ene neno prumere i ere-ere erikwa. Okuna imbo ye yomba sigoglkwa yagle, ye ka kaima ta ake moglkruko, te ka kaima nomano mina suna yeikrukwa. Ye kakimbi dungwa i ye mambunomo kaima pangwa. Ye kakimbi dungwa yagle, ana kakimbi dingwa yomba prapra ye neno.
43008045	Yeglpre na ka kaima ene diteinga, ba ene ta pirngi dikrikwa.
43008046	Ene pirmbi na tandaglme ta erika pamo? Na ka kaima dinga panan ana sraglpre ene na pirngi dikrime?
43008047	Yomba ta God mina ungwa i ye God sragl ka dungwa i prukwa. Ba ene God nangiglma ta moglkrikwa pre ene ye kamo ta pirkraglkwa.”
43008048	Juda yomba di ikine ende Yesus teingwa, “Ene Samaria yomba motnga, ana ene mina spirit kinde suna moglme dumga ikra no aglau ere dumun kana?”
43008049	Ana Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Na mina spirit kinde ta suna moglkrukwa, na Nina kangiye di mitna endinga ba ene na kangina ake atne endingwa.
43008050	Na nana kangina akeple dinagledi ta dikrika ba yomba ta na akeple dindre ana ye yumbu sinambuka.
43008051	Na ka kaima di ene teinga, yomba ta na ka dimere pinande eran ye ta goglkrambuka.”
43008052	Ye di Yesus teingwa, “Ana erme no kaima pirkan ounga, spirit kinde ta ene mina moglkwa. Abraham goglko, te propet wagle geglkwa, ba ene yegl dinga. Yomba ta na ka dimere pinande erambuka ye ta goglkrambuka.
43008053	Ana ene mogl-mitna ende no neno Abraham engitno? Ye goglko te propet wagle geglkwa ana ene ira moledi pitne?”
43008054	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ana na, nana kangina ta akeple dinagledi erimbo na kangina ta paikrambuka. Yomba ta na kangina akeple dungwa i na Nina. Ye suwara i ene Godno we dingwa.
43008055	Ene ye kaima ta kankrikwa, ba na ye kaninga. Ana na ye ta kankriye dimbo, ene kakimbi yomba meglmere yegl eraglka. Ba na ye pirkan erika pre ye kamo dumere pinande erika.
43008056	Ene neno Abraham ye gun pond yongwa, sraglpre ye na engena i yenan kanagledi pre gun yongwa. Ye enge i kandre ana munduwo argan orkwa.”
43008057	Juda wagle di Yesus teingwa, “Ene buglayungu 50 ta nekitnga, ana Abraham sraglmere kan-ne?”
43008058	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Na ka kaima di ene teinga, Abraham mam kugl yeikruko, na okuna mogl painga.”
43008059	Ana dungwa ipre yomba kumbruko ye kombuglo ake mina ende ana Yesus sinamnedi erikwa, ba Yesus teke pai ana God holi yungumo togl suna igle kondo ende menda ongwa.
43009001	Yesus konbauna wan ende pindre ana kango yagl ta mam kuglmara ongumuglo mim orkwa igle moglkwa.
43009002	Ana disaipel wagle krapogl Yesus teingwa, “Beke Notnga, ira tandaglme orkwa pre yagl i kugl yemara ongumuglo mim orme? Yagl i yene mo te nem mam tandaglmeno pre ye kuglmara ongumuglo mim orme?”
43009003	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ye yene ya te nem mam tandaglmeno pre tamanga. Ye ongumuglo orkwa i God yombuglomo yagl i mina kongun ere i-pene endinan kanaglkwa pre orkwa.
43009004	Erme ambuglangesi pamere, na diendungo winga ye kongunmo nono eramga. Mim panambuka enge i yomba kongun ta erekraglkwa.
43009005	Na makandle mogl painga enge, na makan mina ambuglange moglka.”
43009006	Ye ka i di kondo ana eursi makan mina ende akewikai orko wu gamba buglkwa ongo ana indre yagl ikra ongumuglo mina koglkoglo akindre,
43009007	ana ditongwa, “Ene ende Siloam Niglmong pindre guman dran nigl koglo.” Siloam mambunomo yegl, ‘Diendungwa.’ Yegl dungo ana yagl ikra pi nigl pango ana ye ongumuglo pinedungo kanpogl sindre ana ende ikine yungumugl ongwa.
43009008	Ana yomba yagl i keipamara magl meglkwa ya te yomba tau okuna yagl i kanigwa yomba ikra yegl pirkwa, sraglmere orumda di krapeglkwa, “Yagl i okuna amedi mogl moni yana di-di orkwa ikra kaima moglmo, mo?”
43009009	Yomba tau yagl i kaima moglme dingwa, te yomba tau dingwa, “Ta manga, yagl ikra mere kuno yene ta moglkwa.” Ba yaglmo yene dungwa, “Na yagl ikra moglka iwe.”
43009010	Ana yomba krapogl teingwa, “Ene ongumutn srambre ere pinedungo kan-ne?”
43009011	Ye di ikine endungwa, “Yagl ta kangiye Yesus we dingwa, ye gamba tau ere i buglkwa endindre ana ongumutna koglkoglo ake nare ana pi Siloam Niglmong paiyo dungo, ana na ende pi nigl paingo, ana ongumutna pinedungo kanpogl singa.”
43009012	Yomba krapogl teingwa, “Yombamo i aglo moglme?” Yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Na ye ta kankrika.”
43009013	Ana okuna ongumuglo mim orkwa yagle ikra yomba auro ipi Parisi wagle meglmara eingwa.
43009014	Yagl ongumuglo mim orko ana Yesus gamba buglkwa indre erewakai orkwa i Sabat enge ta taragl yegl orkwa.
43009015	Ye srambre ere ongumuglo kanmedi Parisi wagle aglke krapogl dipirkwa, “Ene srambre ere ongumutn pinedume?” Ana ye di ikine endungwa, “Ye gamba buglkwa tau indre ongumutna mina koglkoglo ake narko ana na gumana drana nigl koglko ana erme keunde ongumutna pinedungo kaninga.”
43009016	Taragl yegl orkwa ipre Parisi wagle tau yegl dingwa, “Yagl i God mina ta ukrukwa. Sraglpre ye Sabat enge lo pamere ta erekrukwa.” Ba yomba tau dingwa, “Tandaglme yomba srambre ere yene kimagl giglendi yegl erambe?” Yegl dindre yene yumbusi wu ombuno suwo eingwa.
43009017	Ana Parisi wagle aglke kordagl krapogl yagle ikra teingwa, “Ene ongumutn mim orkwa ikra ye erewakai ere narume dinga. Ana ye pre ene sragl we dine?” Ye di ikine endungwa, “Ye propet ta moglkwa.”
43009018	I kaima, yagl i okuna ongumuglo mim orkwa, ba erme ye ongumuglo pinedungo kangwa. Ipre Juda yomba kande wagle ye pre pirngi dina kiurikwa. Yegl ere ana yaglmo nem ya mam aglendi yundre,
43009019	ana krapogl teingwa, “Ene wano ikra kaima moglum kana? Ene ye kugl yembrika enge ye ongumuglo mim orme dimbrika. Ba sraglmere ere ye erme ongumuglo pinedungo kanume?”
43009020	Ana ye nem mam suwo di ikine endimbrika, “Ye kaima no wano moglkwa. No kugl yombuglka enge ye ongumuglo kaima mim orko no kambuglka.
43009021	Ba srambre ere ye ongumuglo pinedungo kangwa, te yomba ira erewakai ere tongwa i no ta pirpogl sikuglka. Ipre ene ye krapogl tembi ana ye yagl moglkwa pre taragl ormere i yene di ene tenambuka.”
43009022	Ye nem mam suwo ka yegl dimbrika i Juda yomba kande wagle pre kundutno gogltre dimbrika. Sraglpre, Juda yomba ka yegl ta ama di gidingwa, yomba ta Yesus pre Mesaia we dinambuka, ana ye makai yungu i mina simenda endinamne dingo pangwa.
43009023	Ka yegl dingo pangwa ipre ana nem mam suwo yegl dimbrika, “Ye yene yagl moglumiwa, ipre ene ye krapogl piryo.”
43009024	Ye aglke kordagl yagle ongumuglo mim orkwa ikra aglendi ikine ende ana yegl di yaglmo teingwa, “Ene God ongumuglo mina ka kaima dinatniwa! No pirkan ounga, yagl ene ongumutn erewakai orkwa i ye tandaglme yomba.”
43009025	Ana yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Ye tandaglme orkwa yomba mo erekrukwa i na ta pirpogl sikrika. Taragl suwarata na pirkan erika i na okuna ongumutna mim orkwa ba erme ongumutna pinedungo kaninga.”
43009026	Ana ye krapogl teingwa, “Ye sragl ere ene to du? Ye sraglmere ere ene ongumutn mim orkwa i erewakai orme?”
43009027	Yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Na ene dite kondingra, ba ene pirpogl sikrikwa. Sraglpre ene aglke kordagl ka i piramnedi pre dime? Mo, ene ombugl yaglmo i disaipelmo moramnedi pirm kana?”
43009028	Ye eremogl yagl i ka-tendre ana dingwa, “Ene yagle i disaipelmo motnga, ba no Moses disaipelmo mounga.
43009029	No pirkan ounga God ka di Moses tongwa. Ba yagl i aglokra ungwa i no ta pirkanpogl sikunga.”
43009030	Ana yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Ene ka kaneta kaima dingwa! Ye aglokra ungwa i ene pirkan pogl sikrikwa, ba na ongumutna mim orkwa ikra ye erewakai ere narkwa.
43009031	Nono punga tandaglme erikwa yomba kanno i God ta pir tekrambuka, ba yomba God dumere pinande ertre te God prumere erikwa yomba i ana ye kanno God prukwa.
43009032	Te okuna imbo kamun makan plau dungwa enge yei ende wu erme ungwa, yomba ta mam kugl yongwa ongumuglo mim orkwa erewakai erikwa i kamo boglo ta pirkunga.
43009033	Ba yagl i God mina ta ukran, ye taragl yegl ta erekrambuka.”
43009034	Yegl dungo ye di ikine endingwa, “Ene tandaglme mina kugl yeingo ana tandaglme ene mina pango ana yake wu kande enga, ba ene erme no beke noragledi pre dino?” Yegl dindre ye makai yungu mina simenda endingwa.
43009035	Yaglmo i simenda end-ime dingo Yesus pirtre ana yagle i doko kan indre, ditongwa, “Ene Yomba Wam i pirngi dino?”
43009036	Yaglmo di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande, yaglmo i irane? Dinatn kade ana na ye pirngi dinaglka.”
43009037	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Kaima, ene ye kan kondinga, ana yaglmo i erme ene bogl ka di miurka iwe.”
43009038	Yaglmo ikra dungwa, “Yaglkande, na pirngi diga.” Yegl dindre ana Yesus moglmara gumamugl dembiye karaugl ere tongwa.
43009039	Ana Yesus dungwa, “Na yomba yumbu sina pre ende makandle winga, yegl erimbo ana yomba ongumutno kin yongwa pinedinan kanimbi te ongumutno pinedungo kanigwa ye ongumutno kin yenambuka.”
43009040	Ana Parisi wagle tau ye bogl meglkwa ka dungwa i pirtre ye krapogl teingwa, “No ama ongumutno kin yongo pre din kana?”
43009041	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene ongumutno kin yenan, tandaglme dange paikrambuka, ba erme ene ongumutno wakai pame dingwa, ipre ene tandaglmeno yoko pai moglkwa.
43010001	“Na ka kaima ene di teinga, sipsip togl sunakra meglmbi, ana yomba ta ye togl dra yomara ende suna ukrambuka, ba ye togl bange oglosi ende suna unan, ana ye kunogl gogl yomba taragl wau sina pre ungwa.
43010002	Ana yomba ta togl dra yomara ende suna ungwa i ye sugl yomba kaima, yene sipsipmo meglmara pre ungwa.
43010003	Ana togl dra sugl moglkwa yomba togl dra ye pre yauro ende tenan ana sipsip ye ka dungwa nungo embriye pirkwa. Ana ye sipsipmo kangino dagltre, auro yend menda ongwa.
43010004	Ye sipsip prapra auro yend menda ongwa enge, ana yene ende komuno kaima ongo, ye sipsipmo ombugl omara eingwa. Sraglpre, ye ka dungo nungo embriye pirkwa.
43010005	Ba yomba kor ta enambara i moko mina ta pikraglkwa. Tamanga, ye tekemo enaglkwa. Sraglpre, yomba kor nungo embriye i ye ta pirpogl sikrikwa.”
43010006	Yesus ka i di simbogl dungwa, ba yomba ditongwa i sragl ka di tongwa ye ta pirpogl sikrikwa.
43010007	Yeglpre Yesus ka kordagl dungwa, “Na ka kaima ene diteinga, na nana sipsip konbono dra moglka.
43010008	Ana yomba tau okuna kana wingwa i ye kunogl gogl yomba ya taragl wau sineingwa yomba, yeglpre sipsip ye kanno pirkrikwa.
43010009	Na, nana konbo dra moglka. Ana yomba ta na moglmara unan ye wakai morambuka. Ana ye ende yungugl pindre te ende menda undre, ana kaiya mokna doko i-ninambuka.
43010010	Ana kunogl gogl yomba ungwa i kunogl nendre, te sigogltre, ana siderwagl baruwagl era pre ungwa. Ba na winga i kor-meglkwa indre, ana i aimande i-kau sinaglkwa.
43010011	“Na, nana sipsip sugl yomba wakai moglka. Ana sugl yomba wakai, ye yene kor-moglkwa i sipsipmo pre kinde kondo gorambuka.
43010012	Ana moni pre kongun orkwa yomba, ye sipsip sutno yomba wakai ta moglkrukwa, te ye yene sipsipmo ta moglkrikwa. Yeglpre ye kanan agl are unan ana sipsip kindekondo teke endinambuka. Yegl eran kade agl are eremogl sipsip tau si ninan ana tau teke perepere enaglkwa.
43010013	Ana moni pre kongun orkwa yomba teke endongwa. Sraglpre ye topo pre kongun ere sipsip kakimbi kogl sugl moglkwa.
43010014	“Na, nana sipsip sutno yomba wakai moglka, na sipsipna kaningo, ana ye na pirkan erikwa.
43010015	Kuno yegl keunde, Nina na pirkan orko, na Nina pirkan erika. Yeglpre na kor-moglka i sipsip pre kinde kondinga.
43010016	Na sipsipna tau ama kuglka meglkwa, ye togl suwara igle ta moglkrikwa. Ipre na ye ombugl auro yunaglka, yegl erimbo na nunguna embriye pirtre togl suwara meglmbi ana sugl yomba nana suwara moraglka.
43010017	Ana Nina, na wakai kangwa i yegl pangwa. Na kor-moglka i kindekondo ana kordagl i-ikine endinaglka.
43010018	Yomba ta na kor-moglka i ta ikorugl endekraglkwa, ba na nana pirmere ere kor-moglka i kinde kondinaglka. Na goraglka ya te kor-moraglka i na yombutna pra kuno orkwa. I Nina taragl yegl ero dinare kondungwa.
43010019	Ana Juda yomba ka i pirtre aglke kordagl yumbusi wu epigl suwo eingwa.
43010020	Ana yomba merkinde yegl dingwa, “Ye mina spirit kinde suna moglko, ye du kaima orkwa. Sraglpre ye ka dungo ene kinano yei pir meglme?”
43010021	Ba yomba tau yegl dingwa, “Ye yegl dungwa i spirit kinde moglkwa mere ta dikrukwa. Ana spirit kinde yomba ongumutno kin yongwa ta erewakai erambo?”
43010022	Ana Jerusalem suna enge kande ta plau dungo yomba makai singwa. I okuna God holi yungumo kei kondo ana i God yungumo we dingwa engemo yongwa. Enge i bi orkwa enge.
43010023	Ana God holi yungumo mina Solomon yungumo tekrika yei yomara yungugl kra Yesus konbauna ongwa.
43010024	Ana Juda yomba wu ye moglmara makaisi winambo dindre, yegl dingwa, “Ene etngo no nomano wu suwo pi paimoglkwa. Ipre ene kaima Krais motn kade ana no dinongugl ende noro.”
43010025	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ene kade dite kondinga, ba ene na ta pirngi dikrikwa. Na eremogl Nina kangiye mina kimagl erika i na pre dinongugl endungwa.
43010026	Ene na sipsipna ta moglkiurikwa, ipre ene na ta pirngi dikrikwa.
43010027	Na sipsipna ka dinga i nunguna embriye pirko, na ye pirkan eriko, ana ye na mokonamugl wingwa.
43010028	Ana na kor aimande moraglkwa pre teinga, ana ye ta goglkraglkwa te yomba ta na onguna mina i ta simenda endekraglkwa.
43010029	Na Nina eremogl yomba i prapra na narkwa. Ye mogl-mitna ende taragl prapra engrukwa te Nina ongo mina yomba meglkwa i yomba ta wausi imenda endekrambuka.
43010030	Nina ya na yomba suwara yene mouglka.”
43010031	Ana aglke kordagl Juda wagle kombuglo mauro indre ana Yesus kombuglo sinamnedi erikwa.
43010032	Ba Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na Nina kimagl wakai mere ero dungo ana ere ene ombuno diteinga. Ana yegl erimara igle taragl ta aglau orko pre ene kombuglo na sina erimo?”
43010033	Ana Juda yomba di ikine endingwa, “No ene taragl wakai kanekane etnga ipre ene kombuglo sinamnedi ta ere dikungra, ba ene God dikinde yenga ipre ounga. Ene yomba yoko motnga, ba enene God mole dinga.”
43010034	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Enene lono mina God ka yegl muno beglko pangwa ikra na di teinga, ‘Ene god wagle meglkwa.’
43010035	No pirkan ounga, God kamo okuna muno beglko pangwa i ta dundikrambuka, kaima pangwa. Ipre God eremogl yomba pre god meglme dinan ana yomba i mina God kamo tenan di menda endinaglkwa.
43010036	Ba na Nina pinde indre na di makandle endungwa. Ipre na God Wam kaima mole diga, ba ene sraglpre na God dikinde yome dime?
43010037	Na Nina kongunmo i ta erekrimbo, ana ene na pirngidi narekriyo.
43010038	Ba na ye kongunmo erimbo, ene na pirngidi narekrimbi ana na kimagl erika ene i pirngi diiyo. Yegl ere ana na Nina mina moglko te Nina na mina moglkwa i ene pirkan eraglkwa.”
43010039	Ye aglke kordagl Yesus sikane sinamnedi erikwa. Ba Yesus meglmara igle ye kindekondo endongwa.
43010040	Enge igle Yesus ende ikine koglo imbo Jodan kamun Jon Baptais okuna yomba baptais tomara ikra pindre ana igle enge tau moglkwa.
43010041	Ana yomba merkinde ende ye moglmara undre ana dingwa, “Kaima, Jon okuna kimagl ta erekrukwa, ba Jon yagl i pre kamo dungwa ikra kaima yene pangwa.”
43010042	Ana dumo igle yomba merkinde Yesus pirngi dingwa.
43011001	Yagl ta kangiye Lasarus we dingwa ye kinde sungwa. Yaglmo i Betani kamun nem, dumo igle Maria ambauglo Marta bogl yungunomugl yongwa.
43011002	Ambumo Maria i angigle Lasarus kinde sungo pangwa, ambumo suwara i kungo demine orkwa toindi Yaglkande kagle mina endindre, ana bre yungo pagl ye kagle mina koko endungwa.
43011003	Ana Maria ya Marta ka-singiye yegl di Yesus moglmara endimbrika, “Yaglkande, ene wakai kanga yagle ikra kinde sungwa.”
43011004	Yesus ka i pirtre ana dungwa, “Kinde sungwa i Lasarus ta goglkrambuka. Taman. I God kangiye kande inambuka pre orkwa, te sragl yegl mina God Wam kangiye kande inambuka.”
43011005	Yesus eremogl Marta ambauglo Maria bogl ya Lasarus akiye wakai kangwa.
43011006	Ba ye eremogl Lasarus kinde sume dingo prukwa enge, ye moglmara angai igle ande enge suwo ombugl mogl pangwa.
43011007	Ana okuwo ye disaipelma wagle ditongwa, “Nono ende ikine Judia kamun enamga.”
43011008	Ba disaipelma wagle di ikine endingwa, “Beke Notnga, Juda yomba ene kombuglo sinamnedi erikwa ikra enge olto ta ende pikrukwa, ba ene erimara ikra aglke kordagl ende ikine enatno?”
43011009	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ande enge suwara mina ande kuiya 12 paikrumo? Yagl ta ermine konbauna ende enan ana yange sikrambuka, sraglpre ye makandle ambuglange i kangwa.
43011010	Ba ye enduwer konbauna ende enan ye yange sinambuka, sraglpre, ye ambuglangemo ta yeikrukwa.”
43011011	Yesus ka i dindre ana okuwo disaipelmo wagle ditongwa, “Nono yomba yeinomga Lasarus ye ugl pangwa, ba na pindre ana uglo yokimbo ye andrambuka.”
43011012	Ye disaipelma wagle di ikine endingwa, “Yaglkande, ye ugl panan, ana argan eran andrambuka.”
43011013	Lasarus goglkwa ipre Yesus dungwa, ba disaipelma wagle ugl kaima pangwa pre dumedi pirkwa.
43011014	Yeglpre Yesus dinongugl ende disaipelma wagle tongwa, “Lasarus goglkwa.
43011015	Ana ye pamara na moglkrika ipre kinde ta pirkrika, ba gun yeinga. Sraglpre ene pirngino singigle dinaglkwa pre na taragl ta eraglka. Ana nono ende ye pamara omuno.”
43011016	Ana Tomas kangiye ta Didimas we dingwa ye di disaipel tau tongwa, “Nono ombugl ende pindre ana Lasarus bogl akiye goramga.”
43011017	Yesus disaipelma bogl endpi Betani kamun plau dindre, ye pirkan orkwa Lasarus goglko kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara yungugl endingo pangwa i ande enge 4 dundungwa.
43011018	Ana Betani kamun yei ende Jerusalem ongwa i eglke ta manga, 3 kilomita keunde yongwa.
43011019	Ana Juda yomba merkinde Marta ya Maria ye angro goglkwa ipre ana gaugl wu ounga yungu meglkwa.
43011020	Marta eremogl Yesus ume dingo pirtre, ye ende menda pi kan inagledi pre ongwa, ba Maria yungugl mogl pangwa.
43011021	Ana Marta di Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, ene mangigl igle motna daglma, na angra Lasarus ta goglkruko.
43011022	Ba na pirkan erika, ene taragl ta erme ombugl inagledi pre God kra poratnga i ene tenambuka.”
43011023	Yesus di Marta tongwa, “Ene angitn andigl ukor enambuka.”
43011024	Ana Marta ka mongo di ikine endungwa, “Na pirkan erika, enge kande mina yomba geglkwa andraglkwa enge ye andigl aglke ukor enambuka.”
43011025	Yesus di Marta tongwa, “Yomba kor-meglkwa ya ta geglkwa andraglkwa i mambuno nana moglka. Yomba ta na wedi pirngi dinambuka ye gorambuka ba kondo kor-morambuka.
43011026	Ana yomba ta kor-mogltre na wedi pirngi dinambuka ana ye goglkrambuka. Na ka dinga i ene pirngi dino?”
43011027	Marta di ikine endungwa, “Owo, Yaglkande. Kaima na pirngi dinga. Ene Mesaia, God Wam. Ene ende makandle unatne dingura.”
43011028	Ana Marta ka yegl dikondo, ye ende ikine pindre ambauglo Maria aglendi bina endindre ana ninudi kina mina ende yegl ditongwa, “Beke narikwa yagle ungwa magl ya mogltre ana ene we dungwa.”
43011029	Maria ka i pirtre ana onglandi andigltre ende Yesus moglmara ongwa.
43011030	Ana Yesus ende yungu epigl suna pikrukwa, ba Marta ka ditomara dumo igle kra mogl pangwa.
43011031	Juda yomba ye Maria bogl akiye ounga yungu meglkwa ikra ye kanigwa Maria ende menda ongo, ana ye kombuglo dra yomba geglko pandiglmara igle kai era pre omedi ye mokomugl eingwa.
43011032	Ana Maria ende pi Yesus moglmara kandre ana yange ye kagle mina sindre dungwa, “Yaglkande, ene eglya motna dagl na angra ta goglkruko!”
43011033	Ana Yesus kangwa Maria kai orko, te Juda yomba akiye wingwa i ye ama kai erikwa. Yesus kinde pirtre ana kai eragledi orkwa.
43011034	Yesus krapogl tongwa, “Ene aglokra ye maugl sime?” Ana ye diteingwa, “Yaglkande, kanatna wo.”
43011035	Ana Yesus kai orkwa.
43011036	Ana Juda yomba kandre dingwa, “Kaniyo! Ye Lasarus wakai kaima kangwa pamiwo!”
43011037	Ba yomba tau dingwa, “Ye okuna kana yomba ongumutno mim orkwa erewakai orkura? Ana ye akeple dinan yagle i goglkrambuka ba?”
43011038	Yesus nomanemo yumbun pond kaima dongo, ana ye endpi Lasarus goglko pandiglmara dumo ongwa. I kombuglo dra ta waugl yeimara igle pandigl ana kombuglo ta dramugl sipegl dingwa.
43011039	Ana Yesus yegl dungwa, “Kombuglo i-eglke endiyo!” Ana yagl goglkwa ambauglo Marta yegl dungwa, “Yaglkande, erme kumbuno kinde orkwa. Sraglpre, ye pandiglkwa ande enge 4 igle pangwa.”
43011040	Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene pirngi dimin, God yombuglomo kanatnedi na ditekrisino?”
43011041	Yegl dungo ana yomba kombuglo egla pagl i-eglke endingwa. Ana Yesus kanimbo heven ende yegl dungwa, “Nina, na ene diwakai yeinga, sraglpre ene kamange okuna erika pirpir etngra.
43011042	Na pirka, ene engenge na kamangena pitnga ba na ka dinga i yomba magl meglkwa ya pre dinga. Sraglpre, ene diendingo ye umedi pirngi dinaglkwa.”
43011043	Yesus ka i di kondo ana agle binan bogl dungwa, “Lasarus, ene ende menda wo!”
43011044	Yagl goglkwa ikra ende menda ungwa ba ye ongo ya kagle mina gagl alap yombugl tendre, ana gumadra mina gagl alap ta were teingwa i yoko pai moglkwa. Ipre Yesus di yomba tongwa, “Gagl alap yombugl pandiglkwa i poko ende ana kan winge erimbi endenano.”
43011045	Juda yomba merkinde Maria kana pre wingwa ikra ye Yesus taragl orkwa i kandre ana Yesus pirngi diteingwa.
43011046	Ba yomba tau ende Parisi wagle meglmara pindre ana Yesus taragl orkwa ikra diteingwa.
43011047	Ana pris kande wagle ya Parisi wagle ye kaunsol bogl wu suwara pi ka-tange, ana dingwa, “Nono sragl eramne? Yagl i kimagl mere orkwa.
43011048	Nono kanwinge ouno ye mambuno yegl ere paimoran, yomba prapra yagl i pirngidi tembi, ana Rom yomba kande wagle undre God holi yungumo erekinde ere ana nono dumono makano akiye inaglkwa.”
43011049	Ana ye mina yagl suwarata moglkwa kangiye Kaiapas, ye buglayungu igle mina pris kande moglkwa, ye yegl dungwa, “Ene taragl prapra ta pirpogl sikrikwa!
43011050	Ene pirpogl sikrimo, yagl suwarata yomba prapra goraglkwa i mere, ye suwara gorambuka i wakai pangwa, nono yombano prapra ye gogl dinaglkwa.”
43011051	Ana Kaiapas ka dungwa i yene prumere ta dikrukwa, buglayungu igle ye pris kande Jerusalem dumo suna i mogltre, ana ye ka propet dungwa i kaima yene ana Yesus eremogl Juda yomba pre gorambuka.
43011052	Ana Juda yomba keunde tamanga, ye gogltre God yombamo makan koglkoglo perepere meglkwa kombusi isuna endinan, ana ye wu yungu ombuno suwara enaglkwa.
43011053	Enge igle Juda yomba mina ende okuna eingwa yomba Yesus sigoramnedi pre mambuno ere ka dikeglkwa.
43011054	Yegl erikwa ipre Yesus eremogl Juda yomba meglmara pendigl ta wankrukwa. Ye dumo igle kondo ana ende pi dumo mangigl ta makan waule yomara ongwa, dumo i kangiye Iprem. Ana igle yene disaipelmo wagle bogl meglkwa.
43011055	Ana Juda yomba Pasova engeno kande magl orko, dumo kande igle yomba prapra ende egli Jerusalem suna pindre ana yene tandaglmeno koko endimbi kade ana okuwo Pasova yenambuka pre eingwa.
43011056	Ana ye God holi yungumo suna makai sindre, Yesus pre doko ye yene mina di pirpir erikwa, “Ene sragl wedi pirme? Enge kande mina ye kaima ukrambu-kana?”
43011057	Ana pris kande wagle ya Parisi wagle ka giglendi di yomba teingwa. Yesus moglpai ormara yomba ta kanimbi ana wu dinongugl endimbi ye kane sinaglkwa.
43012001	Pasova ninaglkwa ande enge 6 paimoglko, Yesus ende Betani kamun ongwa. Igle Lasarus dumomo ana ye goglko Yesus aglendi ikor endungwa yagle ikra.
43012002	Ye eremogl Yesus gunyei tendre, ana pokndungo kaiya moknamo igle akekun eriko ana Marta suro tongwa. Yesus ya yomba bogl meglmara igle Lasarus suna moglko akiye kaiya mokna neingwa.
43012003	Ana Maria kungo demine orkwa mendugl mingi mundu kausi moglko, ana topo pond boglkwa yundre toindi Yesus kagle mina ende, ana bre yungo pagl koko ende tongwa. Ana deminemo wakai yungugl igle mundu kau sungwa.
43012004	Ba Yesus disaipelma mina suwarata kangiye Juda Iskariot, yagl i okuwo Yesus tekoglo kunda ikine onguno mina endinambuka yagle yegl dungwa,
43012005	“Sraglpre kungo demine orkwa mingi i nono topo K300 bogl indre, ana yomba kiuglgiunde meglkwa i tekune?”
43012006	Ye dungwa i yomba kiuglgiunde tenapre kaima ta dikrukwa. Sraglpre, ye kumbu kunogl yagl, ye eremogl Yesus disaipelma wagle monino gagl kine i-wangwa, ana ye nongura nina pre dungwa.
43012007	Ba Yesus yegl dungwa, “Ambu i kanwinge eriyo! Na goraglka enge maugl na sinaglkwa pre, kanwinge erimbi kungo demine orkwa i ake morano.
43012008	Ana yomba kiuglgiunde ene bogl engenge moraglkwa. Ba na ene bogl engenge ta moglkraglka.”
43012009	Juda yomba merkinde pirkan erikwa, Yesus Betani kamun moglkwa. Yeglpre ye moglmara igle eingwa, ye pi Yesus keunde kana pre ta pikrikwa, taman, Lasarus akiye kana pre eingwa. Lasarus okuna goglko Yesus simange ikor endungwa.
43012010	Ikor endungwa ipre, pris kande wagle ye Lasarus ombugl sigoramnedi ka merkinde dikeglkwa.
43012011	Sraglpre Yesus eremogl Lasarus ikor endungwa ipre Juda yomba merkinde yombano kande wagle kindekondo ana Yesus wedi pirngi dingwa.
43012012	Tangina yomba merkinde kaima Pasova mina wingwa ikra pirkwa, Yesus ende Jerusalem ungwa.
43012013	Ipre yomba endi palm yaundongo bukondi ake indre ana ye umara kanamnedi ende menda pindre ana ye mangre, oodi, dingwa, “God dembiye siyo!” “God ere wakai ere yomba i tenambuka, ye Yaglkande kangiye mina ungwa!” “God ere wakai ere Israel yomba kingno tongwa!”
43012014	Ana Yesus dongi nangigle kowo ta indre ana amedi mogltre endongwa, i kamambuno pepa mina dungwa pamere,
43012015	“Saion dumo kande, yomba ene kundugl goglkriyo! Kaniyo, ene kingno ye dongi nangigle kowo mina bolamugl mogl ungwa.”
43012016	Komnaiye kana yene disaipelma wagle sragl i prapra pirpogl sikrikwa. Ba okuwo Yesus andigl ukor pi ende heven ongo, ana taragl prapra ye pre pepa muno beglko pangwa ikra ya te ye mina taragl prapra ta okuna ereteingwa ikra disaipelma wagle pirpogl singwa.
43012017	Ana Lasarus goglko kombuglo dra mina pandiglmara igle yomba mere Yesus bogl akiye meglko, ye agle dungo andigl ukor ongwa ikra pre ye kamo i aimande yomba boglo kugl wai dingwa.
43012018	Yomba mere pi Yesus umara konbo bange tengigl yeingwa sraglpre, ye kimagl orkwa i ye pirkwa pre.
43012019	Ana Parisi wagle ye yene ka i dipirkwa, “Ene kaniyo, nono taragl ta eramga kuno erekrukwa, sraglpre, yomba dumo koglkoglo ikra prapra pi Yesus omara mokomugl pi kondingwa i we.”
43012020	Pasova engemo yongo ana yomba God dembiye karaugl ere tena pre ende Jerusalem eingo, ana Grik yomba tau eimara pukamugl eingwa.
43012021	Ana Grik yomba ikra wu Pilip moglmara wingwa, ye Betsaida kamun Galili suna igle nem. Ana Grik yomba dingwa, “Yagl kande, no Yesus kanamnedi punga.”
43012022	Ana Pilip pi Andru ditongwa. Ana ye suwo-akiye pindre Yesus ditembrika.
43012023	Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Yomba Wam kangiye kande inambuka engemo erme magl orkwa.
43012024	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, wit mongo suwarata yange makan mina si goglkran ana mongo suwara i keunde yei panambuka. Ba mongo i makan mina goran ana ye mongo merkinde korambuka.
43012025	Yomba ta yene kor-moglkwa ipre munduwo panan ana okuwo kor-moglkwa i wau borambuka. Yomba ta makandle kor-moglkwa i moko tenan ana ye kor aimande morambuka i ye inambuka pre yongwa.
43012026	Yomba ta na konguna erambuka ye na enaglmara unambuka, yeglpre na moglmara igle na konguna yomba ye akiye morambuglka. Yomba ta na konguna erambuka ye kangiye kande Nina tenambuka.
43012027	“Erme na nomana yumbun dongwa ana na sragl we dinagle? Nina, ene akepledi naro, yumbun i na mina ukrano? Taman, yumbun ipre na winga, yeglpre yumbun unambuka enge i pra na inaglka.
43012028	Nina, ene etn kangin kande wu pene enano.” Ana okuwo heven imbo ka ta dungwa, “Na kangina ere i-kande ende kondiga, te kordagl ere i-kande endinaglka.”
43012029	Yomba merkinde igle andigl meglkwa ka i pirtre ana ye dingwa, “Kamun gurgagla dungwa.” Te yomba tau dingwa, “Angelo ka ta di ye tongwa.”
43012030	Ba Yesus yegl di yomba tongwa, “Ka dungwa i na pre tamanga ba yomba ene pre dungwa.
43012031	Erme God eremogl makandle yomba ka-tange tendre yumbu sinambuka enge yongwa, te makandle sugl moglkwa yagl kande i ka-tange tendre ana simenda endinambuka.
43012032	Te makandle na ake i-mitna endinaglkwa enge, yomba prapra imakai simbo nana mina unaglkwa.”
43012033	Ye ka dungwa i yene srambre ere giugogl gorambuka ipre dungwa.
43012034	Ana yomba merkinde di ikine endingwa, “No punga lo yegl dungwa pangwa i Mesaia ye kor aimande morambuka, ba sraglpre ene ka yegl dine, ‘Yomba Wam ye ake i-mitna imbo endinaglkwa?’ Yomba Wam i ye irane?”
43012035	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ken ambuglange i enge sungunagle keunde ene mina depai enambuka. Etne ene kenno-lam depangwa ipre engenge ambuglange igle mina wanmoglpai eriyo, te tamanan ana mim pond ere wu ene ake i-atne ende dinambiwo, te yomba ta ye mim mina suna wanmoglkwa i ye ende aglokra ongwa i yene ta kanpogl sikrikwa.
43012036	Ken ambuglange i ene mina yongwa pre i ene pirngi diyo, yegl erimbi ana ene ken ambuglange yombama moraglkwa.” Yesus ka yegl dikondo okuwo ye ende pindre, ana yomba ye kan dinaglmedi teke pangwa.
43012037	Yesus kimagl merkinde orko kanigwa, ba yomba ye wedi pirngi dikrikwa.
43012038	Yegl erikwa i ana propet Aisaia ka dungwa ikra pai yungwa: “Yaglkande, no ka ditomga i ira pirngi dume? Te yomba ira mina Yaglkande yombuglo- mo ombuno ditome?”
43012039	Mambuno ipre ye ana pirngi dinaglkwa kuno erekrukwa, sraglpre, propet Aisaia ka ta ama yegl dungwa,
43012040	“God eremogl ye ongumutno akemim ertre te ka pirkraglkwa pre nomano konbo yonguglko, ipre ye ongumutno kankraglkwa te ye nomano pirpogl sikraglkwa. God yegl dungwa, ana ye erewakai ere norambedi pre na mina ukraglkwa.”
43012041	Aisaia ka dungwa i sraglpre, ye Yesus ambuglangemo kangwa pre ana Yesus kamo dungwa.
43012042	Kaima, Juda yomba kande wagle tau Yesus pre pirngi dingwa. Ba ye pirngino i dinongugl endekrikwa, sraglpre, Parisi wagle eremogl ye makaino yungo mina simenda ende di poraglmedi pre kundugl geglkwa.
43012043	Te kangino yomba ake mitna endinaglkwa i pirkwa kande orkwa, ba God ye kangino ake mitna endinambedi pirkrikwa.
43012044	Yesus ka kande di yegl dungwa, “Yomba ta na wedi pre pirngi dinambuka ye na keunde pirngi dikrukwa, ba na diendungwa yagle i akiye pirngi dungwa.
43012045	Yomba ta na kanigwa i ombugl na diendungwa yagle i akiye kanigwa!
43012046	Na ken ambuglange yeglmere ende makandle winga. Yeglpre yomba ta na pirngi dinambuka, ye mim ormara suna ta moglkrambuka.
43012047	“Ba yomba ta na kanna pirtre ana na kanna i sika sikran, ana na ka-tange ye tekraglka. Na makandle winga i yomba yumbu sina pre ukrika, ba yomba ere-ina pre winga.
43012048	Yomba ta na moko nartre ana na kanna i pir ikran, ana yomba ta ye ka-tange tenambuka i pere moglkwa. Na ka dinga kamo i enge kande mina ka-tange tenambuka.
43012049	Ka i kaima sraglpre, nana pirmere mere ka ta dikrika, ba Nina na diendungwa yagle ka do dumere mere dinga te ama dinongugl endinaglka.
43012050	Ana na pirka ye ka dumara i kor aimande moraglkwa i dipene endungwa. Te na ka prapra dinga i Nina yegl do di narumere dinga.”
43013001	Pasova ne-ne erikwa engemo i mangigl orko. Yesus prukwa ye makandle kondo ana ende ikine Nem moglmara enambuka engemo i magl orkwa. Ye yene yombama makandle meglkwa i engenge wakai kangwa mambuno i ye mina aimande paimoran ana ye gorambuka.
43013002	Yesus disaipelma wagle bogl pokndungo kaiya mokna ne meglko. Ana Satan okuna kana nomano kinde tongo Judas mina yongwa, ye Saimon Iskariot wam, ye Yesus ipi kunda ikine onguno mina yenambuka.
43013003	Ana Yesus pirkan orkwa i Nem yombuglomo giglendi mundu ye tekondungwa. Ana ye prukwa yene God mina ungwa ana aglke ende ikine God moglmara enambuka.
43013004	Ana ye kaiya mokna ne meglmara andigltre gaglmo suna olto tembe endungwa i gugl yei, ana gagl taul ta indre kumagl mereyegl ere dane mina dongwa.
43013005	Yegl ere ye niglkor tau toindi dis mina ende, ana ye mambuno bogl disaipelma wagle katno nigl kogltre, ana gagl taul kumagl dongwa ikra mina koko endungwa.
43013006	Ye ende Saimon Pita moglmara ungo ana Pita yegl dungwa, “Yaglkande na katna ene nigl kogl naratno?”
43013007	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Na taragl erme erika i ene ta pirpogl sikitnga, ba okuwo ene pirpogl sinatnga.”
43013008	Ana Pita mane dungwa, “Ene na katna nigl koglkratnga.” Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “Ba na ene katn nigl kogl tekrimbo ene na disaipelna ta moglkratnga.”
43013009	Saimon Pita di ikine endungwa, “Yaglkande, ene na katna keunde nigl kogl narekratnga, ba na onguna ya te bitna ama akiye nigl kogl naratnga.”
43013010	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta ye nigl mundu pai kondungwa i deglmbi kaima ta moglkrukwa, ipre ye nigl aglketa paikrambuka, ba ye kagle keunde nigl korambuka. Ene prapra deglmbi ta yeikrikwa ba yomba suwarata deglmbi yongwa.”
43013011	Sraglpre, yomba ira mere Yesus ipi yaglkumba onguno mina yenambuka i Yesus yene pirkan orkwa. Yeglpre ye dungwa, “Ene prapra deglmbi ta yeikrikwa, ba yomba suwarata deglmbi yongwa.”
43013012	Ana Yesus yene disaipelma wagle katno nigl kogl kondindre, ye gaglmo suna olto i ende pandigl, ana ende ikine kaiya mokna neimara boglmo mina amedi mogltre, ana ye krapogl tongwa, “Na taragl erme ereteinga i ene mambuno ta pirpogl simo?
43013013	Ene eremogl na pre Beke Notnga ya Yaglkande we dingwa, ana ene yeglmere kuno kaima dingwa, sraglpre dimere yegl na moglka.
43013014	Ana na ene Yaglkandeno ya te Beke Teinga yagle moglka, na erme ene katno keunde nigl kogl teinga. Ene ombugl na erimere enene ya te yomba ta katno nigl kogl teiyo.
43013015	Ene yegl eraglmedi na ombuno dinga. Ana na ene ereteinga yeglmere ene ama kuno yegl eriyo.
43013016	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, kongun yomba yoko ye mogl-mitna ende suglmo yomba ta engre tekrukwa, te kakep yongwa yomba ye mogl-mitna ende ana ka diendungwa yagle ta engre tekrukwa.
43013017	Ana erme ene mambuno kaima i pirkan kondingwa, ba ene kongunmo i duwo ere erimbi ana God eran ene gun pond yenaglkwa.
43013018	“Na ka dinga i ene prapra pre tamanga, yomba na pinde inga wagle ye na kaninga. Ba kamambuno pepa mina okuna muno beglko pangwa ikra mongomo panambuka: ‘Ana yagl ta no bret akiye nombuglka ye kagle i-mitna ende na engre siderwagl erambuka.’
43013019	“Na ka erme diteinga i mongomo okuwo wu pene enambuka, ana taraglmo i wu pene enambuka enge ene na pirngi dinaglkwa. Na yagl i moglkwa pamiwo dinaglkwa.
43013020	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, yomba ta na diendinga i yomba ta di-inambuka, ye, na di-ingwa, te na yomba di-ingwa i ye ama na diendungwa yagle i di-ingwa.”
43013021	Yesus ka i di kondo, okuwo ye nomano yumbun pond dongo ana nongugl dipene endungwa, “Na kaima ene diteinga, ene mina suwarata na i-pene ende kunda ikine tenambuka.”
43013022	Disaipelma wagle toro kan imbara ende, ana ira pre Yesus dungwa i ye pirpogl sikrikwa.
43013023	Disaipel suwarata, Yesus wakai kangwa ikra Yesus moglmara magl wora amedi moglkwa.
43013024	Saimon Pita bre gimande disaipelmo i tendre ana dungwa, “Ira pre dum manda, ene ye krapogl pro.”
43013025	Ana disaipel i goindi Yesus moglmara magl kaima ende ana krapoglkwa, “Yaglkande, ira pre dine?”
43013026	Yesus ka mongo dipoglkwa, “Na bret nigl dis mina simbai tenaglka yagle, i suwara.” Yegl dindre ana bret ta indre dis mina nigl simbai ana Judas tongwa, ye Saimon Iskariot wam.
43013027	Judas bret ake yungwa enge, Satan ende Judas mina suna ongwa. Ana Yesus ditongwa, “Ene taragl ta eragledi pitnga i onglandi ero.”
43013028	Ana Yesus ka i sraglpre di Judas tongwa, i disaipelma wagle tau kaiya mokna ne meglkwa i suwarata pirpogl sikrikwa.
43013029	Judas moni gagl sugl moglkwa pre disaipel tau yegl pirkwa, ye pindre Pasova enge kande pre taragl tau topo erambuka pre ditomo mo, kiuglgiunde yomba taragl tau tenambuka pre ditomedi pirkwa.
43013030	Judas bret indre ana onglandi ende menda ongwa. Ana dumo mim ere kondungwa.
43013031	Judas ende menda ongo ana Yesus yegl dungwa, “Etne Yomba Wam kangiye kande yungwa. Ana Yomba Wam mina God ama kangiye kande yungwa.
43013032	Ba God kangiye kande Yomba Wam mina inan, God ye yene Yomba Wam kangiye kande i-pene endindre. Ana God onglandi ye kangiye kande ye tenambuka.
43013033	“Nangrima wagle, enge sungunagle ta ene bogl moraglka. Ana okuwo ene na pre doknaglkwa, te Juda yomba prapra diteimere ikra ene erme diteinga. Na enaglmara dumo i ene ta ukraglkwa.
43013034	“Na erme lo kor ta ene teinga. Yomba prapra i ene kanwakai yeiyo. Na ene wakai kaninga yeglmere ene ama yomba prapra kanwakai yenaglkwa.
43013035	Ba ene yomba prapra wakai kanimbi, ana yomba prapra kanaglkwa, ene Yesus disaipelmo meglmedi piraglkwa.”
43013036	Ana Saimon Pita krapogl Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, ene ende aglokra enatne?” Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na dumo aglokra enaglmara i ene erme ta ukratnga, ba okuwo, na enaglmara i ene unatnga.”
43013037	Pita krapogl tongwa, “Yaglkande, sraglpre ene enatnara na erme sikasi ukragle? Na ene pre goragledi akekun erika.”
43013038	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na pre ene kaima goragledi pitno? Na kaima ene diteinga, konduwagle kumugl wi sikran, ana enge suwota na ye kankrika we dinatnga.
43014001	“Ene kinde pirtre nomano yumbun dekrano, ene God wedi pirngi dindre, ana na akiye pirngi diyo.
43014002	Na Nina yungumo mina igle kula merkinde yongwa, ana yegl ta yeikruma, na ene ta ditekriko. Ba na ende igle pindre ana ene moglpai eraglkwa dumono i akekun eraglka.
43014003	Ana na pindre angaino dumo ake kuno ertre, na ende ikine undre ene auro i-yeimbo, ana na moraglmara igle nono akiye moramga.
43014004	Na dumo aglo enaglka konbaunamo i ene pirkan erikwa.”
43014005	Tomas di Yesus tongwa, “Yaglkande, ene ende aglokra enga i no pirpogl sikunga. Ana konbauna yei ende dumo igle ongwa i srambre ere no pirkan eramne?”
43014006	Yesus ka mongo di ikine ende tongwa, “Na nana konbauna mogl, ana ka kaima mogl, ana kor-meglkwa i na, nana moglka. Ana Nina moglmara enaglkwa i konbauna ta ta yeikrukwa. Ba na mina suwara yongwa.
43014007	Ana ene kaima yene na pirkan erimbi, ana Nina ama pirkan eraglkwa. Ana erme mambuno bogl ende imbor omga i ene ye pirtre ana kandre erikwa.”
43014008	Ana Pilip ditongwa, “Yaglkande, ene Nen ombunodi notn ana no munduno pangwa i kuno erambuka.”
43014009	Ana Yesus ka mongo ditongwa, “Na ene bogl enge olto nono akiye mogl umgra, Pilip, i ene pirpogl sikitno? Ana yomba na kanigwa i Nina ombugl kanigwa. Ba ene sraglpre Nen ombunodi noro dine?
43014010	Ana na Nina mina moglko te Nina na mina moglkwa. I ene pirngi dikrimo? Ana na ka ene diteinga i nana pirmara ta ditekrika. Sraglpre, Nina na mina moglkwa i yene kongunmo orkwa.
43014011	Na Nina mina moglko te Nina na mina moglme dinga i ene pirngi diyo, ka dimara i ene pirngi dikrimbi, ana na kimagl erimara i ene pirngi dinaglkwa.
43014012	Na ka kaima diteinga, yomba ta na wedi pirngi dinan, ana na taragl prapra erika i ye ama erambuka. Ba i kaima, na kongun erimere yegl ye kongun pond kaima ere kawa tenambuka. Sraglpre, na ende Nina moglmara eingwa.
43014013	Ana ene na kangina mina taragl ta pre krapotn, i pra eraglka. Yegl erambara i Nem kangiye kande Wam mina inambuka.
43014014	Ana na kangina mina ene taragl ta pre krapogl dimbi ana i na pra eraglka.
43014015	“Ene na wakai kanimbi kade, ana na ka kindine dimere i ene duglo boraglkwa.
43014016	Ana na Nina krapogl teimbo, ye ene akeple dinan yomburo panambuka pre ta tenan ana ye ene bogl aimande yene morambuka.
43014017	I ka kaima dungwa Spirit, makandle yomba ta ikraglkwa. Sraglpre, ye ta kankre te pirpogl sikrikwa. Ba ene ye pirpogl singwa. Ipre ye ene bogl moglkwa, te ene mina suna morambuka.
43014018	Na endinaglka enge ene kinde kondimbo mundu gak-mua mereyegl ta moglkraglkwa. Ba okuwo na ende ikine ene meglmara unaglka.
43014019	Enge sungunagle ta makandle yomba na aglketa kankraglkwa. Ba ene na kanaglkwa. Sraglpre, na kor-moglka ipre ene ama kor-moraglkwa.
43014020	Ana enge igle ene pirkan eraglkwa, na Nina mina suna moglko, te ene na mina suna meglko, ana na ene mina suna moglka.
43014021	Ana yomba ta na ka kindine dinga i pir indre ana duglo borambuka i ye na wakai kaima kangwa. Yomba ta na wakai kanan ana Nina ama yombamo i wakai kanambuka, ana na ama ye wakai kandre ana na nana ye mina wu pene eimbo ye na kanambuka.”
43014022	Ana Judas Iskariot tamanga, ba Judas dimo ta dungwa, “Yaglkande, ene no keunde ombuno dimin, ene kanamniwa, ana makan yomba koglkoglo i sraglpre ene kankraglme?”
43014023	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Yomba ta na wakai kanan ana ye na ka beke teimere i ere duglo borambuka. Ana na Nina ye wakai kanambuka, ana na Nina bogl yombamo i moglmara umbuglo, ana ye bogl akiye aimande moramga.
43014024	Yomba ta na wakai kankran, ye na ka beke teinga i ta duglo boglkrambuka. Ana na ka ene diteinga, pirkwa i nana kanna tamanga, ba ka i Nina na diendungo winga yagle kamo.
43014025	“Na ene bogl akiye mogl painga enge ana ka i prapra ene diteinga.
43014026	Ba Holi Spirit ene akeple dinambuka, Nina eremogl na kangina mina diendinambuka. Ye ene taragl prapra beke tenambuka, te na ka okuna diteinga ikra ene prapra ditenambuka.
43014027	Na dena munduna bipokndi i ene mina yendre, te na kordagl bipokndi i ene teinga. Na makandle yomba teimere yegl ene tekrika. Yeglpre ene nomano yumbun dekran te kundugl goglkriyo.
43014028	“Ene na ka dinga i pirkwa, ‘Na ende bangeta pindre ana na aglke ende ikine ene meglmara unaglka.’ Ba ene na wakai kanimbi, ana na ende Nina moglmara enaglka i ene gun yenaglkwa. Sraglpre, Nina mogl-mitna ende na narkwa.
43014029	Ana taragl i plau dikriko kade na ka erme i ene diteinga, ana taragl i plau dinambuka enge ene pirngi kaima dinaglkwa.
43014030	Na ene bogl ka denbi wakane ta dikraglka. Sraglpre, makandle sugl moglka king i erme ungwa. Ba ye yombuglomo ta panan kade na engre atne endekrambuka.
43014031	Ba makandle yomba pirkan eraglkwa na Nina kanwakai yeinga. Ipre Nina taragl yegl ero dinarumere i keunde na erika. “Ende wiyo. Nono dumo igle kondo endinamuna.”
43015001	“Na wain endiye kaima moglko, ana Nina ereyaglkwa yagle.
43015002	Na mina yongagle ta paimogltre mongo koglkrukwa i prapra Nina boro endungwa. Ana yongagle na mina pai mogl mongo keglkwa i prapra ye beke ake orkwa, ipre mongo merkinde koraglkwa.
43015003	Na ka di teimara i ene erewakai ere kondungwa.
43015004	Ene na mina mogl paiyo, ana na ene mina mogl panaglka. Yongagle yene ta mongo koglkrambuka, ye wain endiye mina pai mogltre mongo korambuka. Ene na mina moglkrimbi mongo ta koglkraglkwa.
43015005	“Na wain endiye moglka, ana ene prapra yongagle, yomba ta na mina mogl panan, ana na ye mina suna moglmbo, ye mongo merkinde korambuka, ana na kondimbi ene taragl ta erekraglkwa.
43015006	Ana yomba ta na mina mogl paikrukwa, ye wain yongagle gigle goglko ana boro kinde kondingwa yeglmere. Yongagle yeglmere gande makaisi piyasi donga mina endingo dongwa.
43015007	Ene na mina meglmbi, ana na kanna ene mina yei panan, ana taragl kanekane ta munduno panan kra poraglkwa, i pra inaglkwa.
43015008	Ene mongo merkinde koraglmara i mina na Nina kangiye kande wu pene enambuka, mambuno yegl mina enene na disaipelna mounedi ombuno dingwa.
43015009	“Nina na wakai kanumere yeglmere, na ama ene wakai kaninga. Na kanwakai yeinga i mina ene aimande moraglkwa.
43015010	Ana na ka kindine dinga i ene dimere pinande erimbi, na kanwakai yeimara suna igle ene moraglkwa. Ana kuno yegl Nina ka kindine dungwa i na pinande ertre, ana ye kanwakai yomara suna igle na moglka.
43015011	Na ka i ene diteinga, yeglpre na gun yeinga i ene mina suna yenambuka, ana ene yegl erimara ipre, gun pond kaima yenaglkwa.
43015012	Na lona i yegl pangwa, ene suwara suwarandi angro ta kan wakai yenaglkwa. Na ene wakai kanimere kuno yegl.
43015013	Ana yomba ta ye yombama tau pre kan wakai kaima yeinan, ana ye pra yombama ipre kor-moglkwa i kondo gogl tenambuka. I ye pamere orkwa.
43015014	Ba na kongun eriyo diteinga i erimbi, ana ene na angrima kaima moraglkwa.
43015015	Na ene pre nigl-kongun yomba we ta dikrika, sraglpre nigl-kongun yomba ye kongun sugl moglkwa yagle kongun eremoglkwa i ye kankrikwa. Ba na ene pre yeineinga we dinga, sraglpre, na Nina ka kanekane dungwa pirka i ene dite kondingo.
43015016	Ana ene na pinde ikrikwa, na ene pinde indre ana kere i-pere endinga i ene pindre ana mongo merkinde koraglkwa, i mongo kaneta aimande kogl panambuka. Ana ene yegl ere na kangina mina ene taragl ta inamunedi Nina krapogl tembi, ye ene tenambuka.
43015017	Ana na lona i yegl pangwa, enene mina angro kanwakai yeiyo.
43015018	“Makandle yomba ye ene dikinde yembi, ene piraglkwa ye komnaiye na kankinde yembi
43015019	ene makandle yomba meglmbi, ana makandle yomba yene yombano mereyegl ene kanwakai yenaglkwa. Ba na makandle igle ene pinde i-kondinga pre ene makandle yomba moglkrikwa. Yeglpre makandle yomba kankinde yei ene teingwa.
43015020	Na ka diteinga ikra ene piryo: ‘Kongun yoko orkwa yomba ta mogl-mitna ende suglmo yomba engre tekrukwa.’ Ye na eresi tembi, ye ombugl ene eresi tenaglkwa, ye na kanna pinande erimbi ye ombugl ene kanno pinande eraglkwa.
43015021	Ye taragl yegl pra ere ene tenaglkwa, sraglpre ene na yombana meglkwa, yeglpre na diendungo wingwa yagle i ye ta pirkan erekrikwa.
43015022	Na okuna kana ta ukre ana ka i ta ditekriya ye tandaglmeno ta paikruko. Ba erme ye tandaglmeno uglmange erekraglkwa.
43015023	Yomba ta na kanwakai yei narekrukwa i ye ama Nina kanwakai yeitekrukwa.
43015024	Ba yomba ta okuna kana wu kongun giglendi erekrimere yegl na ye mina pukamugl mogl ana kongun giglendi i ta erekriya, ana ye tandaglmeno pre angai goglkraglkwa. Ba erme ye kimagl na erika i prapra kandre ana kunda ikine ere na nare ama Nina kunda ikine ere teingwa.
43015025	Ba ye yegl erikwa i lono mina muno beglko pangwa i paiyungwa. Ka i yegl, ‘Ye mambuno paikrumara kunda ikine yoko ere narikwa.’
43015026	“Spirit ene akepledi tenambuka, ye Nina bogl moglkwa ana na ye diendimbo ene mina unambuka. Ye ka kaima dungwa Spirit, ana Nina bogl moglkwa. Ye undre ana na embriyena ya konguna i dipene endinambuka.
43015027	Ana ene ama na pre ka dipene endinaglkwa. Sraglpre, na kongun mambuno ere erika enge ene na bogl mogl wu erme wingwa.
43016001	“Ene pirngi dingwa gugl sikrambuka pre, na ka i di ene teinga.
43016002	Ye makai yungu mina ene simenda ende, te okuwo enge ta unan yomba ene sigogltre, ana ye God kongunmo wakai ere tomunedi piraglkwa.
43016003	Ye na Nina pre pirpogl sikre te na ama pirpogl sikrikwa, ipre ye mambuno yegl eraglkwa.
43016004	Ba na ka i okuna ene diteinga, ipre ye taragl yeglmere eraglkwa engemo i ta plau dinan ana na ka diteinga i ene poglodi piraglkwa. Na okuna ene bogl moglka pre taragl yeglmere ene ta ditekrikra.
43016005	“Na erme diendungo winga yagle moglmara endinaglka, i ene suwarata na krapogl nare, ‘Ende aglo enatne?’ ta dikrikwa.
43016006	Na ka i erme diteinga pre ene nomano yumbun pond dongwa.
43016007	Ba na ka kaima ene diteinga, ene wu wakai enaglkwa pre na endinaglka. Na ende pikrimbo ana ene akeple dinambuka i ta ukrambuka. Ba na ende imbo ana ye di ene mina endinaglka.
43016008	Ana ye unambuka enge, makandle yomba tandaglmeno erikwa ombuno dindre te mambuno du-wakai ombuno dindre ana God ka-tange tenambuka mambuno i i-pene endinambuka.
43016009	Ye aglau ere ana tandaglme erikwa, sraglpre ye na wedi pirngi dikrikwa.
43016010	Mambuno du-wakai i yegl, na ende Nina moglmara eimbo ana ene enge olto na kankraglkwa.
43016011	Ana ye ka-tange tenambuka mambuno i yegl, makandle igle sugl moglkwa yomba komnaiye kana God ka-tange tongo ye yange sungwa.
43016012	“Na ka merkinde pangwa ene ditenaglka, ba erme ka merkinde i ene dimbo pir-inaglkwa kuno erekrukwa.
43016013	Ba ka kaima dungwa Spirit i undre ene nomano wakai tendre ana ye ene auro ipi ka kaima mina suna enambuka. Ye yene prumere ka ta dikrambuka, ye God kamo prukwa i keunde dindre, ana taragl okuwo plau dinambuka i pre di ene tenambuka.
43016014	Na kangina kande ya yombura wu pene enambuka pre, na ka dinga i ye indre ana ene ditenambuka.
43016015	Taragl prapra Nina mina yongwa i na taratna yongwa. Ipre na yegl dinga, na ka di Spirit teimbo ye indre ana ene ditenambuka.
43016016	“Enge sungunagle ta ene na kankraglkwa, ana okuwo enge sungunagle ta ene aglke na kanaglkwa.”
43016017	Ye disaipelma tau ye yene krapogl imboriya endingwa, “Ye ka dungwa i mambuno sraglmere pame? Ye yegl di norkwa, ‘Enge sungunagle ta ene na kankraglkwa, ana okuwo enge sungunagle ta na aglke kanaglkwa. Te ye ombugl yegl dungwa, na ende Nina moglmara enaglka?’”
43016018	Ye ama krapeglkwa, “‘Enge sungunagle’ i mambuno sraglpre dume? Ye sraglpre ka dungwa i nono ta pirpogl sikunga.”
43016019	Yesus pirkan orkwa disaipelma wagle krapogl tenamnedi pirko, ana ye ditongwa, “Na yegl dinga, ‘Enge sungunagle ta ene na kankraglkwa, ana okuwo enge sungunagle ta na kanaglkwa.’ Ka ipre enene mina krapogl di imboriya endim kana?
43016020	Na ka kaima ene diteinga, ene kai pond ere te munduno kinde piraglkwa, ba makandle yomba gun yenaglkwa, te ene kinde piraglkwa, ba ene kinde piraglkwa yake tenan ana gun pond yenaglkwa.
43016021	Ana ambu ta gak kugl yenambuka engemo magl ungo ana ye kinde prukwa, sraglpre giu gorambuka engemo yongwa, ba ye gak kugl yendre ana nangiye giugl ta pirkrukwa. Ye gun yongwa, sraglpre, gak kembra makandle wu pene ongwa.
43016022	Kuno yeglmere ene mina panambuka, erme ene kinde pirkwa, ba na aglkekor ene kanimbo, ana ene gun pond kaima yenaglkwa. Ana ene gun yenaglkwa i yomba ta ikorugl endekraglkwa.
43016023	Ana engemo igle ene taragl ta pre na kra ta poglkraglkwa. Na ka kaima ene di teinga: Ene taragl ta inamunedi pre na kangina mina Nina krapogl tembi, ana ye ene tenambuka.
43016024	Okuna yei ende wu etne ungwa i ene taragl ta inamunedi na kangina mina krapoglkrikura, ene krapeglmbi ana indre ene gun yenaglkwa, i ene mina kausi panambuka.
43016025	“Okuna na ka pandum keunde dite wingra, ba enge ta yenan na ka pandum ta dikraglka. Ba okuwo na Nina pre ka nongugl mongo bogl ene ditenaglka.
43016026	Enge i plau dinan ene na kangina dagltre ana Nina kraporaglkwa. Ene dinaglmere na Nina krapogl tenagle ta dikrika.
43016027	Taman, Nina yene ene pre munduwo pangwa, sraglpre ene na pre munduno pango, te na God mina umedi pirngi dingwa.
43016028	Na Nina mina mogltre ana ende makan mina winga, ana erme na makan mina kondo, ende ikine Nina moglmara enaglka.”
43016029	Ana disaipelma wagle di Yesus teingwa, “Erme ene ka pandum ta dikitnga, ka nongugl mongo bogl dinga.
43016030	Erme no kamga, ene taragl prapra pirpogl singa, ana yomba suwarata krapogl ene tekrikwa. Ye poglodi pirkwa i ene kan-kondinga, yegl etnara i no pirngi dumga, ene God moglmara mogltre unga.”
43016031	Yesus yegl di ikine endungwa, “Ene erme pirngi dimo?
43016032	Ba enge ta unambuka ikra wu kondungwa. Engemo igle ene teke wu perepere pindre ana ende enene yungunomugl enaglkwa. Na kondimbi mundu moraglka, ba nana mundu ta moglkraglka, Nina na bogl akiye mouglka.
43016033	“Na taragl i prapra ene dite kondinga. Yeglpre na bogl akiye meglmbi ene nomano pokndi yenambuka. Makandle yomba ene yumbun tenaglkwa, ba ene andigl giglendi molo, na makan yomba yombutno i engre atne ende kondinga.”
43017001	Yesus ka i dite kondindre, mokomugl ye kan mitna ende ana kamange orkwa: “Nina, enge ikra magl orkwa. Etne Wan kangiye kande i-pene ende temin, ana Wan ama ene kangin kande i-pene ende tenambuka.
43017002	Ene yombutn ye tenga pre, makan yomba koglkoglo meglkwa i ye sutno morambuka, yegl ertre ana yomba ene di ye mina endinga i keunde, ye kor aimande moraglkwa i tenambuka.
43017003	Ana kor aimande moraglkwa i mambuno yegl pangwa. Yomba pirpogl sinaglkwa, i God kaima ene suwara motnga, te ye ama Yesus Krais kanpogl sinaglkwa, ye ene diendinga ungwa.
43017004	Ene yombutn na ombuno dingo makan yomba kan-kondingwa, te na kongun ero dinatnere ikra pra ere kondinga.
43017005	Nina, okuna dumo makan plau dikrukwa enge na ene bogl akiye mouglka, ana na kangina kande pangwa. Ana kangina kande ikra erme aglke nare ikine endimin ana na ene bogl akiye morambuglka.
43017006	“Makandle yomba tau na natnga ikra yombamo ene kangin dipene ende ombunodi teinga. Ye ene yombanma meglko ana ye na narekondinga, ana ka i ye pirngi dindre pinande erikwa.
43017007	Ana taragl prapra na natnga ikra ye pirkan erikwa i ene mina ungwa.
43017008	Sraglpre, ene ka dinatnga i ye diteingo ana ye pir i-kondingwa. Na ene mina winga i ye pirkwa, ka i ka kaima pangwa, ana na diendingo winga i ye pirngi dingwa.
43017009	Na ye pre kamange ere teinga. Makandle yomba prapra pre na kamange eretekrika, ba yomba ene natnga i keunde pre kamange ereteinga, sraglpre ye ene yombanma meglkwa.
43017010	Na yombanma i prapra ene yombanma, te ene yombanma i prapra na yombanma, ana na ambuglangena kande i ye mina wu pene ongwa.
43017011	Na erme ende ene motnara unaglka, na makandle igle wakane ta wanmoglkraglka, ba ye makandle moraglkwa. Nina, ene tandaglme paikrukwa kangin yombuglo pangwa i mina ye sugl wakai mogl tenatnga, ene kangin i na mina pangwa, ipre ene ya na suwara mouglere yegl ye ama wu suwara pi moraglkwa.
43017012	Ana na ye bogl moglka enge, ene kangin natnga i mina ye wau bogl dinaglmedi sutno wakai moglka, te ye ama wu korugl pikrikwa, ba yomba suwarata wu korugl pindre erekinde erambuka, i kamambuno pepa mina okuna muno beglko pamere kaima pai ingwa.
43017013	“Na erme ende ene motnara unaglka, ba na makandle mogltre ka i prapra di ye tekondinga te na wakaina i ye mina suna kausi panambuka.
43017014	Ene ka dinere i na di ye tekondiga. Sraglpre ye makandle igle yomba ta moglkrikwa, te na ama makandle yomba ta manga. Ba makandle yomba ka i kinde pir mokono teingwa.
43017015	Na kamange erika i ene makandle igle ye ikorugl endo dikrika. Ba yomba kinde mina ene sutno wakai moratnedi pre na kamange erika.
43017016	Ye makandle igle yomba ta moglkrikwa, te na ama makandle igle yomba ta moglkrika.
43017017	Ene ka kaima mina etn yomba wu holi enaglkwa, ene ka dinga i ka kaima.
43017018	Ene na diendinga makandle wimere yegl ana na ye diendimbo endpi dumo makan koglkoglo enaglkwa.
43017019	Ana ye pre nana wu holi enaglka, ye ama kuno yegl wu holi eingwa.
43017020	“Na kamange erika i disaipel keunde pre ta manga. Ye kamambuno dimbi kade yomba pirtre na wedi pirngi dinaglkwa ipre na akiye kamange erika.
43017021	Ye prapra nomano suwara panan moraglkwa, i yeglmere. Nina, ene na mina motngo na ene mina moglka. Te ye ama nono mina meglmbi kade ana ene diendingo na winga i makandle yomba prapra pirngi dinaglkwa.
43017022	Ene ambuglangen na natnga ikra na ye teinga, i nono nomano suwara yei mouglere yegl ana ye nomano suwara yei moraglkwa.
43017023	Na ye mina moglko ana ene na mina motnga. Ana ye nomano suwara kaima panambuka, yegl erimbi kade makan yomba kandre ana ene diendingo na winga i ye pirpogl sinaglkwa, ene ye kanwakai yenga i na kanwakai yei natnere kuno yegl.
43017024	“Nina, yomba na natnga i keunde na moraglmara igle mogltre ana ye na ambuglangena i kanaglkwa, te ambuglangemo i ene na natnga, sraglpre kamkua ya makan ere yeikre ene okuna kana na kanwakai yenga.
43017025	“Nina ene du-wakai kaima motnga, makan yomba ene pre pirpogl sikrikwa, ba na ene pirkan eriko te yomba na bogl meglkwa i ye pirkan erikwa, ene na diendingo winga.
43017026	Na ene kangin ye mina dipene endingo ye pirpogl singwa, te na dimere yegl dimogl eimbo ana na wakai kanga mambuno ikra ye mina panan kade ye yomba tau kanwakai yembi ana na ye mina moraglka.”
43018001	Yesus kamange erekondungo, ana okuwo ye disaipelma wagle bogl endpi Kitrong nigl koglo imbo eingwa. Dumo igle ende olip yaglko moglmara ana ye disaipelma wagle bogl ende suna igle eingwa.
43018002	Ana Judas eremogl Yesus imenda ende kunda ikine tenambuka yagle angai i pirkan orkwa, sraglpre dumo igle Yesus disaipelma bogl makaisi-si erikwa.
43018003	Ana Judas eremogl kimbirnem ya te pris kande wagle konguno yomba ya te Parisi wagle tau auro yungo ana ye ken gagl indre te kunda taragl ama ake indre ana Yesus pre doko eingwa.
43018004	Yesus yene mina taragl prapra plau dinambuka i pirtre, ana ye ende okuna undre krapogl tongwa, “Ene ira pre dokime?”
43018005	Ye di ikine endingwa, “Yesus Nasaret nem.” Ana Yesus dungwa, “I na moglka iwe.” Ana Judas ipi kunda ikine tenambuka yagle ye akiye igle andigl meglkwa.
43018006	Ana Yesus yegl ditongwa, “I na moglka iwe” dungo, ana ye mokonokra pi yangesi pai eingwa.
43018007	Yesus aglkekor krapoglkwa, “Ene ira kan ina pre dokime?” Ana ye dingwa, “Yesus Nasaret nem.”
43018008	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ene diteingra, i na moglka iwe, ba ene na pre dokimbi prawa, yagl wagle tau i kondimbi ende piyondo.”
43018009	Ye ka yegl dungwa i okuna kana ka dungwa ikra paiyungwa, “Nina ene yomba na natnga i ye suwarata wau boglkraglkwa.”
43018010	Ana Saimon Pita dikumba prak gundo indre pris kande kongunmo yomba ta kina wokra simbiglkidi endungwa. Nigl-kongun yagl i kangiye Malkus.
43018011	Yesus di Pita tongwa, “Dikumba prak towo mina ende ikine endo. Ene pitnga Nina geu nigl minge narkwa i na nekraglka pre etno?”
43018012	Kimbirnem sutno kande moglkwa yagle ye kimbirmonem yeingo te Juda kimbirnem yeingo ana ye wu suwara pi Yesus sikane sindre,
43018013	ana komnaiye kana Yesus yendpi Anas moglmara eingwa. Anas ambuglo wiye Kaiapas moglkwa, ana buglayungu igle mina Kaiapas ye pris kande moglkwa.
43018014	Ana ye ka wakai yegl di Juda yomba yegl tongura, “Yomba suwarata gogl ana yomba prapra akeple dinambuka i wakai kaima pangwa.”
43018015	Yesus kanesi yend eimara Pita yongo disaipel ta bogl ye mokomugl embrika, ana pris kande ye disaipel ta i pirkan orkwa pre, ana Yesus yendpi pris kande toglmo suna eimara disaipel i mokomugl ana ende suna ongwa.
43018016	Ba Pita ye togl dra mendakra moglkwa. Ana disaipel ta pris kande pirkan orkwa ikra, ye ende ikine wu ambai dua sugl moglkwa i ditongo, ye yungu dra yauro endungo, ana Pita auro yend togl suna ongwa.
43018017	Ambai yungu dra sugl moglkwa ikra krapogl Pita tongwa, “Ene ye disaipelmo ta motn kana?” Ana Pita di ikine endungwa, “Na ta manga.”
43018018	Ana endi gaiglko depamara igle kongun yomba ya te kimbirnem ye bi gogltre ana endi pir meglkwa. Te Pita ama meglmara igle akiye andigl mogl endi pir moglkwa.
43018019	Yesus disaipelma ya te yomba ka beke tongwa ikra pre ana pris kande krapogl tongwa.
43018020	Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na ka pene keunde di yomba prapra teinga, i makai yungu yomara prapra ya te God holi yungumo mina na ka beke te-te erika, igle Juda yomba prapra wu makaisi-si erimara. Na uglmange ere ka ta beke tekrika.
43018021	Ene sraglpre na krapogl natn? Na ka dinga pirkwa yomba i ene krapogl to. Na ka sragl wedi ye teinga i ene krapogl pro, na ka dinga i ye pirkan erikwa.”
43018022	Ana Yesus ka yegl dungo, kimbirnem igle meglkwa suwarata Yesus atndang sindre ana yegl dungwa, “Ene ka yegl sraglpre di pris kande tene?”
43018023	Ana Yesus di ikine ende tongwa, “Ba na ka dinga i aglau ere dinga panan, ana yomba magl meglmara i sragl ka dinga aglau erambuka i ene dipene endo. Ba na ka kaima dinga panan, ene sraglpre na sine?”
43018024	Yesus ongo kane keglkwa i paimoglko ana Anas diendungo ye ende pi Kaiapas pris kande moglmara ongwa.
43018025	Endi gaglmara igle Pita andigl endi pir moglko, ana yomba tau yegl di ye teingwa, “Ene ombugl yagl i disaipelmo ta motngra iwe?” Ba Pita ditorwa ere yegl dungwa, “Taman, na ta manga.”
43018026	Ana pris kande kongunmo yomba ta, komnaiye Pita eremogl kina goglum diendungwa ikra, yombamo ta ka muglkumdi dungwa, “Ene ye bogl endi olip yaglko moglmara igle miurko na kankrisino?”
43018027	Pita kordagl yegl dungwa, “Taman” dungo, ana konduwagle kumugl wi sungwa.
43018028	Tangina kinde kana Kaiapas yungumo mina kondo Yesus yendpi gawana yungumo mina eingwa. Ana Juda yagl kande wagle ende Pailat angaimo suna igle pikrikwa. Sraglpre ye pirkwa, no suna omun ana God ongumuglo mina no sideglmbi yenan kade ana Pasova kaiya mokna i nekramga, yeglpre ye ende angai suna igle pikrikwa.
43018029	Yegl eriko ana Pailat ende menda ye meglmara pindre ana krapogl tongwa, “Yagl i sragl orko ene ka-tange tenamnedi erime?”
43018030	Ye ka mongo yegl di ikine endingwa, “Yagl i mambuno kinde ta erekruma dagl no auro i ene motnara ta ukramga.”
43018031	Ana Pailat di ye tongwa, “Enene ye indre lono ta panambere ka-tange teiyo.” Ana Juda wagle di ikine endingwa, “No lono mina yomba ta sigolo dikrukwa.”
43018032	Taragl plau dungwa i okuna kana Yesus sraglmere ere gorambere pre dipanduglmara i kaima paiyungwa.
43018033	Pailat ende ikine gavana yungumo i yungugl pindre ana Yesus aglendi indre ye krapogl tongwa, “Ene Juda yomba kingno motno?”
43018034	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Ene ka krapotnga i enene pitnere dino mo yomba ta na pre diteme?”
43018035	Pailat di ikine endungwa, “Ene pitnga na Juda yomba ta mogl kana? I enene yombanma ya te pris kande wagle ye ene iyu na narikwa. Ene sragl etne di?”
43018036	Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na kingdomna i makandle igle ta manga. Na kingdomna i makandle igle yenan, ana konguna yomba kunda erimbi kade na tekoglo Juda yomba kande wagle ta tekraglkwa. Taman. Ba na kingdomna i manginagle igle ta manga.”
43018037	Yegl dungo Pailat krapogl tongwa, “Ene king ta motn kana?” Ana Yesus di ikine endungwa, “Na king ta moglme dinga i kaima dinga. Na kugl yeingo ende makandle winga i taragl suwarata pre winga. I ka kaima dinaglka pre. Yomba ka kaima mina meglkwa ana na ka dinga i pirkwa.”
43018038	Pailat krapoglkwa, “Ka kaima i sratne?” Ana okuwo Pailat ende ikine mendakra yomba meglmara pindre yegl ditongwa, “Ye mambunomo kinde ta panan na kan i-pene ende ana kot eretenaglka mere manga.
43018039	Ba ene mambunono yegl ta pangwa, Pasova yei-yei orkwa enge na kane paingwa yomba suwarandi dimenda ende-ende erika. Ana Juda yomba kingno i kane poko ende norambedi ene pirmo?”
43018040	Ye mangre ka giglendi di ikine endingwa, “Ye ta manga! Barabas i-noro.” Ye kunogl gogl nendre te kigl kunda orkwa yagle.
43019001	Pailat eremogl Yesus indre kumba sinaglkwa pre te menda endungwa.
